xAswAnu viBAgavu wayArikA viBAgakkeV hawwiraxalli iruvuxu eVlla xqRtiyiMxalU uwwama
sAmAnyavAgi xAswAnu viBAgavannu uwpAxaneV viBAgakkeV hawwira iruva aWavA uwpAxaneV viBAgakkeV paxArWavannu ravAnisalu anukUla iruvaMwiruva sWalYaxalli iruwwaxeV
ixariMxa paxArWa ravAneVyiMxa uMtAguva veVcca mawwu samaya hAlYAguvikeVyannu wadeVgattabahuxu
uwpAxaneVgeV bekAguva paxArWagalYu heVccu BAra mawwu alYaweVgalYu ixxalli AMwarika sArigeV vyavasWeVya samasyeVyannu svalpa bageVharisikoVlYlYabahuxu .
sAmAnyavAgi paxArWa xAswAnu mAduvuxakkeV prawyeka kattada iruwwaxeV .
saMsWeVya prAraMBaxiMxale yAvayAva viBAga yAvayAva sWalYaxalli irabeku eVMbuxannu pariNawaru ( veVcca leVkka SAswrajFanU serixaMweV ) samagravAgi yocisi , nirXarisuvAga I keVlYakaMda aMSagalYannu weVgeVxukoVlYlYabekAguwwaxeV .
xAswAnu viBAgavannu sariyAxa sWalYaxalli vyavasWeV mAdiruwwAreV .
iMwaha viRaya saMsWeVya sWApanA yojaneVyalli seriruwwaxeV mawwu jArigoVlYisiruwwAreV .
rasweV mawwu rElu mArgagalYigeV anukUla Aguva sWalYavU AgirabekAguwwaxeV .
AgiMxAggeV koVlYlYuva paxArWagalYu rasweV mawwu rElu mArgagalYalli barabekAgiruvuxu , ixariMxa paxArWagalYannu vAhanagalYiMxa ilYisi xAswAnu viBAgakkeV oVyyuva samaya mawwu KarcugalYannu kadimeV mAdabekAguwwaxeV .
AxxariMxa xAswAnu viBAgaxa sWalYa nirXarisuvAga I keVlYakaMda aMSagalYannu weVgeVxukoVlYlYabekAguwwaxeV .
1 ) xinaniwya paxArWa ravAneV Agabeku AxuxariMxa xAswAnu viBAgavu wayArikA viBAgakkeV hawwira irabeku .
2 ) BAravAxa mawwu gAwraxalli xoVddaxu iruva paxArWagalYigeV anuguNavAgi xAswAnu viBAgaxa sWalYa nirXAra Agabeku .
3 ) AgiMxAggeV paxArWa koVlYlYuvuxariMxa rasweV mawwu rElu mArgagalYigeV anukUla Agirabeku
vAhanagalYiMxa paxArWagalYannu ilYisuva sWalYakkU xAswAnu viBAgakkU heVccu xUra irabAraxu .
4 ) surakRiwa praxeSaxalli irabeku .
keMxrIkqwa  xAswAnu mawwu vikeMxrIkqwa xAswAnu : paxArWagalYa gAwra , wUka , mOlya , paxArWa ravAneVya SIGraweV mawwu wayArikA Gatakaxa avaSyakaweVgalYigeV anuguNavAgi xAswAnu viBAgavannu keMxrIkarisabahuxu aWavA vikeMxrIkarisabahuxu .
idI wayArikA GatakakkeV oVMxe sWalYaxalli paxArWa xAswAnu mAdixxareV keMxrIkqwa  xAswAnu eVMxu kareVyabahuxu .
paxArWa upayogavAguva keMxragalYalli saNNasaNNa paxArWa upaviBAgagalYannu weVreVyuvuxannu vikeMxrIkqwa  xAswAnu eVMxu kareVyabahuxu .
vikeMxrIkqwa xAswAnu upaviBAgagalYu keMxrIkqwa  xAswAnina joVweVyalli iruwwaveV .
koVMda paxArWagalYu eVllavU keMxrIkqwa xAswAnu viBAgakkeV baMxa naMwara vikeMxrIkqwa upaviBAgagalYigeV ravAnisalpaduwwaveV .
xAswAnu aXikAriyu wayArikA aXikAri mawwu veVccAXikAriyoVdaneV samAlocisi , paxArWa ravAnisuva samasyeVgalYannu bageVharisikoVlYlYabekAguwwaxeV .
ixakkAgi Gatakaxa viviXa viBAgagalYigeV bekAguva paxArWagalYannu neravAgi xAswAnu viBAgaxiMxa kalYuhisabahuxe mawwu ixariMxa waguluva samaya mawwu sArigeV KarcugalYu kadimeVye aWavA jAswiye eVnnuvuxara vivaragalYannu pariSIlisi , xAswAnu viBAgavannu keMxrIkarisabahuxe aWavA vikeMxrIkarisabahuxe eVnnuvuxannu nirXarisikoVlYlYabekAguwwaxeV
ixariMxa eVradU viBAgagalYa samasyeVgalYu bageVhariyuwwaveV .
AxarU vikeMxrIkarisixa upaviBAgagalYa vyavasyeV mawwu saMGataneV xAswAnu aXikAriya sAmarWyaxa  meleV niMwiruwwaxeV .
keMxrIkqwa  xAswAnina anukUlagalYu : 1 ) oVMxe sWalYaxalli paxArWa xAswAnu mAdixalli heVccina gamanavannu alle keMxrIkarisabahuxu .
2 ) keMxrIkqwavAxa xAswAnu  kadimeV Karcu iruwwaxeV .
keMxrIkqwavAxa JJ xAswAnu vyavasWeVgeV ivu eVllavU heVccu bekAguwwaxeV .
3 ) Kuxxu xAswAnannu xAKaleVya aMkigalYoVdaneV AgiMxAggeV parIkRisuvuxu anukUlakara AgiruwwaxeV .
illaxeV ixxalli AyAya sWalYagalYalli iruva xAswAnugalYannu leVkkakkeV weVgeVxukoVlYlYuvuxaralli Srama mawwu kaRta eVnisuwwaxeV .
4 ) xAKaleVgalYa xqRtiyiMxa kadimeV xAKaleVgalYa mawwu xAKalAwigalYu iruvuxariMxa wappugalYigeV avakASa iruvuxilla .
5 ) heVccu sibbaMxi illaxa kAraNa xAswAnu viBAgavannu heVccu samasyeV illaxeV nadeVsikoVMdu hogabahuxu .
6 ) vikeMxrIkarisixa xAswAnu vyavasWeVgeV heVccu baMdavAlYa bekAguwwaxeV .
anAnukUlagalYu : 1 ) keMxrIkqwa  xAswAnu viBAgaxiMxa wayArikA GatakakkeV AgiMxAggeV paxArWa ravAneV Aguvuxaralli hAlYAguva samaya mawwu sArigeVya vyavasWeVya samasyeV iruwwaxeV mawwu Karcu iruwwaxeV .
2 ) paxArWa ravAneVyalli surakRaweV iruvuxilla .
3 ) oVMxekadeV iruva paxArWagalYu heVccu paxArWa saMxaNiyaMweV wori saMGataneVgeV kaRtavAgi goVMxala AguwwaxeV .
4 ) keMxrIkqwa JJ xAswAnu mAduvuxu vikeMxrIkqwa xAswAnu .
5 ) paxArWa ravAneV oVMxe sWalYaxiMxa AguvuxariMxa wayArikeV niXAna AxaMweV woruwwaxeV .
vikeMxrIkqwa xAswAnu : paxArWa upayoga Aguva wayArikA GatakagalYalli xAswAnu upaviBAgavannu weVreVxu alliMxa paxArWa sulaBavAgi ravAneV Aguva hAgeV mAduvuxu vikeMxrIkqwa xAswAnu .
ixu keMxrIkqwa xAswAnina upaviBAga .
I upaviBAgagalYu keMxra viBAgaxiMxa AgiMxAggeV paxArWagalYannu ravAnisikoVMdu SeKarisi ittukoVlYlYuwwaveV .
I upaviBAgagalYu neravAgi paxArWagalYannu koVlYlYuvuxu illa .
I eVlla upaviBAgagalYa catuvatikeVgalYigeV muKya xAswAnu aXikAriye melvicAraka Agixxu keVlasa nirvahisa bekAguwwaxeV .
I vyavasWeVyalli upaviBAgagalYigeV nirxiRta avaXigeV bekAguva paxArWa pramANavannu keMxra xAswAnu viBAgavu nirXarisuwwaxeV .
uxA : oVMxu wiMgalYigeV bekAguva prawi paxArWa pramANavannu AraMBaxalli upaviBAgakkeV ravAnisuwwaxeV .
Iga I upa xAswAnu viBAgavu wayArikeVgeV bekAxAga paxArWa koVduwwaxeV .
wiMgalYina koVneVyalli koVtta oVttu paxArWa pramANaxalli ulYikeV AxareV , Karcu Agiruva paxArWa pramANavannu wuMbikoVduwwaxeV .
eVlla paxArWa pramANavu Karcu Agixxalli nirXariwa pUrNa pramANavannu upaviBAgakkeV kalYuhisikoVduwwaxeV .
ixu oVMxu rIwiya iMpreVst paxXawiyaMweV iruwwaxeV .
aMxareV muMgadavAgi paxArWa koVttaMweV iruwwaxeV .
I vyavasWeVyu xAswAnu paxXawi iruva nyUnaweVgalYannu  pariharisuwwaxeV .
AxareV keMxrIkqwa xAswAnu vyavasWeVyalli iruva anukUlagalYiMxa vaMciwavAguwwaxeV .
paxArWa viMgadaNeV : paxArWagalYannu avugalYa prakqwigeV anuguNavAgi vargIkaraNa aWavA viMgadaNeV mAdabeku .
Gana mawwu xrava paxArWagalYannu prawyekavAgi idabekAguwwaxeV .
I eVradu prakqwigalYalli aneka viXavAxa paxArWagalYu wayArikeVgeV avaSyakavAgi irabekAguwwaxeV .
prawi viXavAxa paxArWaxalli viviXa alYaweV , wUka , gAwra mawwu guNamattagalYu iruwwaveV .
kabbiNa mawwu ukku , eVNNeV iwyAxi Binna paxArWagalYu , rAsAyanika  paxArWagalYu , baNNa , bidi BAgagalYu prawyeka sWalYaxalli idabekAguwwaxeV .
I guMpugalYa sWalYakkeV praXAnavAgi kANuva hAgeV nAma PalakagalYannu wagulisi irabeku .
ixu AyAya guMpina paxArWagalYu AxareV axu eVccarikeV koVttaMweV AguwwaxeV .
uxA : oVMxu kArKAneVgeV bekAguva rAsAyanika paxArWa xAswAnu viBAgaxalli ittiruvAga apAyakAriyAgi iruva saMxarBaxalli eVccarikeVya nAmaPalaka apAyaxiMxa xUra iruva sUcaneV AguwwaxeV .
prawi viBAgaxa paxArWagalYannu avugalYa wUka , gAwra , alYaweV mawwu iwara guNamattagalYigeV anuguNavAgi anukUla rIwiyalli viMgadisi idabeku .
paxArWa viMgadaNeV eVMxareV , viviXa paxArWagalYa sAmAnya lakRaNagalYa AXAraxalli avugalYannu guMpannu Agisuva prakriyeV AgixeV .
ixariMxa prawi paxArWavannu wakRaNa guruwisabahuxu .
sAmAnyavAgi prawi paxArWakkeV oVMxoVMxu sWalYa ixxe iruwwaxeV .
eVlla binnugalYigeV anukramavAgi saMKyeV koVdabeku .
xAswAnu viBAgaxalli iruva viviXa BAgagalYa pakRinotakkeV oVMxu nakReVyannu wayArisi muKya sWalYagalYalli praxarSisuvuxu xAswAnu viBAgaxa oVttAreV saMGataneVya saMkewa eVnisuwwaxeV .
eVlla bin mawwu paxArWagalYigU ' a ' kArAxi patti wayArisi ittirabeku .
ixu wakRaNa bin mawwu paxArWagalYannu guruwisuvuxakkeV anukUla AguwwaxeV .
yAvuxe saMxarBaxalli vaswuvina wayArikeVgeV oVttu paxArWaxa saMKyeV eVRtu eVnnuvuxu wilYiyabeku .
paxArWa saMkewana aWavA krodikaraNa prakAra saMkewa eVMxareV , ' oVMxu viMgadaNeVyAxa vaswugalYa guMpigeV anvayisalu rUpiwavAxa cihneVgalYa oVMxu vyavasWeV .
saMkewana eVMxareV , ' paxArWa guruwisuvikeV sulaBa mawwu anukUla AguvaMweV prawiyoVMxu paxArWaxa heVsarina joVweVgeV oVMxu saMKyeV aWavA cihneVyannu koVduvuxu oVMxu prakriyeV AgixeV .
prawi paxArWavannu guruwisalu koVduva saMkewa aWavA cihneV wayArikeVgeV bekAguva bidi BAgagalYu xAswAnu viBAgaxalli nUrAru iruwwaxeV .
oVMxoVMxu bidi BAgavU halavAru vEviXyaweVgalYiMxa kUdiruwwaxeV .
aMxareV alYaweV , wUka , gAwra mawwu guNamattaxalli BinnaweV iruwwaxeV .
I prawi paxArWaxa alYaweV , wUka , gAwra iwyAxigalYu eVllavannu serisi heVsarisuvuxu AxareV , paxagalYa saramAleVye Agi oVMxoVMxakkU uxxuxxavAxa heVsaru ittukoVlYlYabeku AguwwaxeV .
I eVlla heVsarugalYannu bareVxittu bekAxAga nodixareV goVMxala AxaMweV kANuwwaxeV .
melAgi prawi paxArWaxa bin kArd mawwu iwara xAKaleVgalYalli I uxxa uxxaxa heVsarugalYannu bareVxu iduvuxu kaRta AguwwaxeV .
sulaBaxalli paxArWagalYannu guruwisalu sAXya Aguvuxilla .
melAgi paxArWa ittiruva sWalYagalYalli uxxa uxxaxa nAmaPalakagalYannu hAkalu kaRta AguwwaxeV .
ixakkkAgi , paxArWagalYigeV avugalYa svaBAva mawwu upayogakaweVgalYiga anuguNavAgi saMkewagalYannu koVdalAguwwaxeV .
uxA : 1 ' a 8 ' saMkewaxa arWa ' a ' eVnnuvuxu upayogisuva muKya paxArWaxa oVMxane xarjeV SIt , ' 8 ' eVnnuvuxu , eVMtu aMgula uxxaxa saMkewa irabahuxu .
2 ' A 892 I saMkewaxalli ' A ' - eVradane xarjeV SIt 8 - aMgula uxxa 9 - aMgula agala 2 - arXa aMgula xappa .
I saMkewagalYu sAmAnyavAgi eVllarigU arWa  Agaxa BAReV Agixxu , xAswAnu viBAgaxalli iruva sibbaMxi , koVlYlYuva viBAgaxa sibbaMxi mawwu wayArikA viBAgaxa sibbaMxigalYigeV rUDi AgiruwwaxeV .
ivarugalYigeV mAwra I saMkewagalYannu guruwisalu sAXya mawwu anukUla AguwwaxeV .
sAmAnyavAgi I sibbaMxigalYu mAwra paxArWagalYannu nirvahisuvuxariMxa bereV yArigU I saMkewagalYa arivu aRtAgi bekAguvuxilla .
paxArWa krodIkaraNaxiMxa Aguva anukUlagalYu : 1 ) paxArWagalYa uxxa uxxaxa heVsaru mawwu lakRaNa bareVyuva keVlasavannu wappisuwwaxeV mawwu kadimeV mAduwwaxeV .
2 ) I saMkewa BAReV paxArWagalYannu guruwisalu sahAyaka AguwwaxeV mawwu sulaBa AguwwaxeV .
3 ) paxArWagalYannu vyavasWiwavAgi xAswAninalli idalu sahAyaka AguwwaxeV .
4 ) paxArWakkeV saMbaMXapatta guttannu gOpyavAgi idabahuxu .
5 ) wayAru Aguva vaswuvina oVttu veVcca kaMduhidiyalu upayoga Aguva paMcukArdugalYalli paxArWa veVccakkeV saMkewa BAReV bahalYa upayoga baruwwaxeV .
anAnukUlagalYu : 1 ) saMkewa BAReV goVMxalakkeV eVdeVkoVttaMweV AguwwaxeV .
2 ) keVlave sibbaMxigeV arWa Aguva BAReV .
paxArWa krodikaraNaxalli anAnukUlagalYu ixxarU ixariMxa Aguva anukUlagalYu halavAru AxxariMxa iMxina kEgArikA yugaxalli vyavasWiwa xAswAnu kArya nirvahaNeVgeV saMkewa BAReV bahalYa avaSya .
krodIkaraNa aWavA saMkewana paxXawigalYu : halavAru krodIkaraNa paxXawigalYu iveV .
avu yAvuvu eVMxareV : ( 1 ) ' a ' kArAxi paxXawi ( 2 ) saMKyAsUcaka paxXawi ( 3 ) nyUmoVnik paxXawi ( 4 ) ' a ' kArAxi saMKyAsUcaka paxXawi 1. ' a ' kArAxi paxXawi : I paxXawiya prakAra xAswAnu viBAgaxalli iruva prawi paxArWakkeV oVMxu aWavA oVMxakkiMwa heVccina akRaravannu cihneVyAgi upayogisuvuxu .
uxA : ' a ' eVnnuvuxu rabbar eVMwalU ' A ' eVnnuvuxu kabbiNa eVMwalU .
axe rIwi iMglIRina akRaragalYu AxareV , ' A ' eVnnuvuxu baNNa eVMwalU , ' i ' eVnnuvuxu kalleVNNeV eVMwalU anvaya Agabahuxu .
2. saMKyAsUcaka paxXawi : I paxXawiyalli paxArWa krodikaraNavannu saMKyeVgalYa AXAraxiMxa saMkewa aWavA cihneVyannu koVdalu Aguvuxu .
saMKyeV oVMxannu moVlYeV eVMwalU , saMKyeV 2 annu SItu , saMKyeV mUrannu iwyAxiyAgi upayogisabahuxu .
paxArWagalYa wUka , xappa , uxxa , agala , guNamatta iwyAxi vivaragalYannu heVccuheVccu wilYiyuvaMweV saMKyeVya xaSamAMSavannu serisi cihneVyannu koVdabahuxu .
3. nyumonik paxXawi : I paxXawiyU akRaragalYa sahAyavannu padeVyuwwaxeV .
AxareV cihneVyannu koVduvAga paxArWaxa moVxala akRaravannu cihneVyannAgi padeVyuwwaxeV .
uxA : ' ka ' eVnnuvuxu kabbiNakkU , ' eV ' eVnnuvuxu eVNNeV eVMwalU , ' ba ' eVnnuvuxu baNNa eVMwalU , ' rA ' eVnnuvuxu rAsAyanika eVMwalU iwyAxiyAgi viviXa paxArWagalYannu saMkewisalu Aguvuxu .
ixariMxa paxArWa cihneVgalYannu sulaBavAgi neVnapinalli ittukoVlYlYabahuxu AgiruwwaxeV .
4 ' a ' kArAxi saMKyAsUcaka paxXawi : I paxXawiyu akArAxi paxXawi mawwu saMKyA sUcaka paxXawi ivugalYa saMyojaneV AgixeV .
ixara prakAra akRaragalYannu mawwu saMKyeVgalYannu paxArWaxa saMkewa koVduvuxakkeV upayogisalu Aguvuxu .
akRaravannu paxArWa sUcisuvuxakkU saMKyeVyannu paxArWaxa alYaweV uxxa , agala aWavA guNamattavannu sUcisuvuxakkU upayogisabahuxu .
uxA : a2 saMkewaxalli ' a ' eVnnuvuxu moVlYeV Agixxu , saMKyeV ' 2 ' eVnnuvuxu 2 aMgula uxxa irabahuxu .
axe rIwiyalli i3 ' saMkewaxalli , ' i ' akRaravu kalleVNNeV Agixxu , ' 3ne saMKyeVyu mUrane xarjeV Agirabahuxu .
I paxXawiyu moVxala mUru paxxawigalYAxa ' a ' kArAxi , saMKyAsUcaka mawwu nyumonik paxXawigalYigiMwa uwwama eVnnabahuxu .
I paxXawiyalli paxArWagalYigeV koVduva cihneVyu paxArWagalYa pUrwi viRayagalYannu wilYisaxeV ixxareV kadeVya pakRa paxArWa mawwu paxArWaxa alYaweV , uxxa , agala aWavA xarjeVyannu wilYisuva cinheV AgiruwwaxeV .
moVxala mUru paxXawigalYalli paxArWa yAvuxu eVMbuxannu mAwra wilYisi avugalYa alYaweVyAgalIN_NN mawwu xarjeVyayannAgali sUcisuvuxilla .
I xqRtiyalli akArAxi saMKyAsUcaka paxXawiyu eVradu paxXawigalYa saMyojaneV Agixxu uwwama AgixeV .
ixe mAxariyalli xAswAnu viBAgaxa avaSyakaweVgalYigeV anuguNavAgi eVradakkiMwalU heVccu yAvuxe saMkewa paxXawiyannu alYavadisikoVMdu ixxarU , xAswAnu aXikAriyu krodikaraNa pattiyannu wayArisi ittukoVlYlYabeku .
I pattiyu eVlla paxArWagalYa heVsaru mawwu  koVttiruva AyAya cihneVgalYannu sUcisi irabeku .
I pattiyalli paxArWa guMpugalYa saMkewa , prawi paxArWaxa pUrwi heVsaru mawwu axara muMxeV A paxArWakkeV koVttiruva saMkewa aWavA cihneVyannu namUxisabeku .
yAvuxe saMxarBaxalli paxArWavannu saMkewaxa mUlaka guruwisalu kaRta AxAga kUdaleV I sixXa ulleKa aWavA pattiyannu nodi neVnapu mAdikoVlYlYalu sahAyaka AguwwaxeV .
I pattiya prawigalYannu weVgeVsi xAswAnu viBAgaxa prawi gumAswana balYi iruva hAgeV vyavasWeV mAdi , xAswAnu aXikAriyu oVMxu prawiyannu wanna balYakeVgAgi ittukoVMdirabeku .
paxArWakkeV saMbaMXapattaMweV wayArikA viBAga mawwu koVlYlYuva viBAgakkU I pattigalYa avaSya ixxu , prawigalYannu kalYuhisi koVdabekAguwwaxeV .
mattagalYu : xAswAnu aXikAri yAva saMxarBaxalli paxArWa koVlYlYabeku eVMba nirXAravannu weVgeVxukoVlYlYalu AXAra iruwwaxeV .
I AXAragalYe ' mattagalYu ' .
paxArWaxa xAswAnigeV miwi iraxeV ixxalli xAswAnu aXikArigeV yAva mawwu eVRtu koVlYlYabeku eVMba viRayaxa baggeV nirXAra sAXya illa .
yAvuxe saMxarBaxalli prawi paxArWaxa xAswAnu kaniRTa pramANa iralebeku .
illaxeV ixxalli wayArikA GatakakkeV paxArWa illaxeV naRta uMtu AguwwaxeV .
AxareV yAvuxe paxArWa pramANavannu miwi illaxeV xAswAnu mAdabAraxu .
axakkAgi gariRTa miwiyannu nirXAra mAdi irabeku .
kaniRTa mawwu gariRTa pramANaxoVdaneV koVlYlYuva haMwavannu nirXarisixalli xAswAnu aXikAri yAvuxe saMxarBaxalli xAKaleVgalYannu nodikoVlYlYuva korikeVyannu koVlYlYuva viBAgakkeV sallisabahuxu .
gariRTamatta : yAvuxe paxArWa pramANavannu I gariRTa mattakkiMwa heVccu xAswAnu mAdabAraxu .
I mattaxa paxArWa pramANavannu nirXarisalu parigaNisabekAxa aMSagalYu yAvuvu eVMxareV : - 1 ) prawi xina wayArikeVgeV bekAguva paxArWa pramANa .
2 ) saMsWeVya ArWika parisWiwi .
3 ) paxArWa pramANavannu SeKarisi idabekAxa sWalYAvakASa .
4 ) paxArWa sarabarAjina mArukatteVya erilYiwagalYu .
5 ) paxArWaxa prakqwi svaBAva .
6 ) paxArWa SeKarisi ittukoVlYlYalu waguluva Karcu .
7 ) paxArWagalYa melina sarkAri niyaMwraNa .
8 ) sarabarAjuxArariMxa paxArWavannu warisikoVlYlYalu weVgeVxukoVlYlYuva samaya .
paxArWa pramANaxa gariRTa mattavannu nirXarisixxarU yAvuxAxarU avaSya saMxarBaxalli I miwiyannu sadilagoVlYisabahuxu .
mArukatteVyalli paxArWavu sulaBa xaraxalli ixxAga aWavA muMxina xinagalYalli aBAva kaMdubaruva sUcaneV ixxAga miwiyannu sadilisabahuxu .
AxareV sulaBa xaraxalli ixxa paxArWavu sawawavAgi mArukatteVyalli siguvaMwAxareV , miwiyannu sadilagoVlYisuva avaSyakaweV illa .
kaniRTa matta : wayArikeVgeV upayoga Aguva yAvuxe paxArWa eVlla samayaxallU iMwiRtu pramANa xAswAninalli irabeku .
ixu kaniRTa matta .
I mattakkiMwa kadimeV xAswAnu yAva saMxarBaxallU irakUdaxu .
kaniRTa mattavannu nirXarisalu parigaNisuva aMSagalYu eVMxareV : 1 prawixina wayArikeVgeV bekAguva paxArWa pramANa .
2 ) mArukatteV parisWiwi .
3 ) sarabarAjuxArariMxa paxArWagalYannu warisikoVlYlYalu weVgeVxukoVlYlYuva samaya .
oVMxu muKya aMSa eVMxareV sarabarAjuxArariMxa paxArWagalYu saMsWeVgeV baruvavareVgU uwpAxaneV viBAgaxa agawyavannu pUrEsuvaRtu xAswAnu viBAgaxalli xAswAnu iralebeku .
koVlYlYuva korikeV matta : paxArWavannu koVlYlYalu korikeV yAvAga sallisabeku eVnnuvuxu xAswAnu aXikArigeV samasyeV AguwwaxeV .
axakkAgi yAvuxe paxArWaxa xAswAnu iMwiRtu pramANaxa mattakkeV baMxAga koVlYlYuva korikeV pawravannu sallisabahuxu .
I pramANaxa mattave koVlYlYuva korikeV matta .
xAswAnu aXikArigeV keVlasa mAdalu mawwu samayakkeV sariyAgi paxArWavannu mawweV xAswAnigeV padeVxukoVlYlYalu sAXya AguwwaxeV .
illa Axalli xAswAnannu nodi aWavA prawi samayaxallU prawi paxArWavannu eVNikeV mAdi , koVlYlYuva korikeV pawra sallisuvuxu AxareV , mawweV xAswAnu baruvuxu bahalYa kAla Agabahuxu .
alliyavareVgeV uwpAxanA viBAgakkeV paxArWa illaxeV yaMwra mawwu kArmikaru keVlasa illaxeV irabekAguwwaxeV .
I mattavannu nirXarisalu parigaNisuva aMSagalYu eVMxareV , prawixina wayArikeVgeV eVRcu paxArWa pramANa irabekAguwwaxeV mawwu sarabarAjuxAraru paxArWavannu sarabarAju mAdalu sAmAnyavAgi weVgeVxukoVlYlYuva kAla .
bin : prawi paxArWavannu uwpAxanA viBAgakkeV ravAnisuvavareVgU xAswAnu viBAgaxalli ittirabekAguwwaxeV .
prawiyoVMxu paxArWakkU prawyeka sWalYa erpattu iruwwaxeV .
I sWalYave bin aWavA yArk .
bin eVRtu pramANaxa paxArWagalYannu koVlYlYalAyiwu , wayArikeVgeV ravAnisixxu eVRtu mawwu ulYikeV eVRtu ixeV eVMba viRayagalYannu xAKalu mAduva kArdu binkArd .
ixu xAswAnu viBAgaxa praWama xAKaleV .
I kArdannu prawi binnina meleV wagalu hAkalpattiruwwaxeV .
sarva paxArWa niyaMwraNa xAKaleV : ixannu paxArWa hawoti xAKaleV eVMxU kareVyabahuxAgixeV .
xAswAnu viBAgaxalli prawi paxArWaxa vivaragalYannu xAKalu mAdalu bin kArdannu praWama xAKaleV Agisixxa , ixara joVweVgeV sarva paxArWa niyaMwraNa xAKaleVyannu xAswAnu aXikAri idabekAguwwaxeV .
bin kArdannu prawi binninalli wagalu hAkiralAguwwaxeV .
yAvuxe saMxarBaxalli paxArWa vivaragalYannu wilYixukoVlYlYabekAxareV , prawi binnina sWalYakkeV Beti koVdabekAguwwaxeV .
AxuxariMxa I anAnukUlavannu wappisalu , sarva paxArWaxa niyaMwraNa xAKaleVyannu ittu bin kArdinalli prawi paxArWakkeV saMbaMXisixa vivaragalYannu I xAKaleVyalli eVlla paxArWaxa vivaragalYannu xAKalisabekAguwwaxeV .
bin kArd xAKaleVgU sarva paxArWa niyaMwraNa xAKaleVgU yAva vyawyAsa illaxeV ixxarU , bin kArdinalli oVMxe oVMxu paxArWaxa vivaragalYu ixxareV sarva paxArWa niyaMwraNa xAKaleVgalYalli eVlla paxArWagalYa vivaragalYu xAKalu AgiruwwaveV .
I sarva paxArWa niyaMwraNa xAKaleV xAswAnu aXikArigeV heVccu prayojanakAri AgiruwwaxeV mawwu keVlasa sulaBa AguwwaxeV .
kAlavilYaMba Aguvuxannu wappisuwwaxeV .
paxArWagalYa melina hawoti iruwwaxeV .
yAva paxArWa koVlYlYuva korikeV matta walupixeV eVMbuxannu wamma kaCeriyalle nodi koVlYlYuva korikeV sallisabahuxu .
illa Axalli prawi binnina sWalYakkU Beti nIdi vivaragalYannu padeVxukoVlYlYuvuxu kAla vilYaMbakkeV eVdeV koVttaMweV AguwwaxeV .
sarva paxArWa niyaMwraNa xAKaleV paxArWagalYa meleV hawoti ittukoVlYlYalu sahAyaka Aguvuxara joVweVgeV , saMsWeV AgiMxAggeV wilYixukoVlYlYabekAguva viRaya enu eVMxareV , oVttu xAswAnu pramANa mawwu mOlya .
ixu saMsWeVya leVkkagalYannu AKEru mAdalu mawwu lABave aWavA naRtave eVnnuvuxannu wannalli iruva xAswAnina mOlyaxa AXAraxa meleV sAlagalYannu eVwwalu yojisiruwwAreV .
ixakkAgi  oVttu xAswAnu eVRtu ixeV eVMbuxannu sarva paxArWa xAKaleVyiMxa padeVyabahuxu .
I xAKaleV oVMxe puswaka Agirabahuxu aWavA prawi paxArWakkeV oVMxu hAlYeV ittu oVMxu xoVdda xapwarakkeV PEl mAdabahuxu .
oVMxe puswakakkiMwa prawyeka hAlYeVya xapwara anukUla AgiruwwaxeV .
paxArWa wapAsaNeV : koVMda paxArWaxa oVttu Kuxxu pramANa xAKaleVyalli namUxisiruva vivaragalYoVdaneV wAlYeV irabeku aWavA xAKaleVyalli iruva aMki aMSaxaMweV Kuxxu paxArWa pramANa irabeku .
yAvoVMxaralli vyawyAsa kaMdubaMxarU sariyAxa mAhiwi xoVrakuvuxilla .
Kuxxu paxArWakkU xAKaleVya aMkigU vyawyAsa kaMdubaruva sAXyaweVgalYu iruwwaveV .
I sAXyaweVgalYigeV kAraNagalYu keVlYakaMdaMwiveV .
oVMxaneVya aMSa eVMxareV uwpAxanA viBAgakkeV paxArWa ravAnisuvAga wappAxa eVNikeV aWavA wappAxa wUka mAdiruvuxu .
eVradaneVya aMSa eVMxareV paxArWa svaBAvaxa kAraNa kadimeV wUka barabahuxu .
mUraneVya aMSa eVMxareV avyavasWiwa mawwu avEjFAnika paxArWa jodaNeV mawwu xAKaleV .
4 kalYavu .
xAswAnu aXikAriyu paxArWavannu koVlYlYalu korikeV pawra sallisabekAxareV xAKaleVyalli iruva aMkigalYannu AXAravAgi ittukoVlYlYabekAguwwaxeV .
ekeVMxareV prawi bAriyU prawi paxArWavannu eVNikeV mAdalu sAXya Aguvuxilla .
AxuxariMxa yAvuxe saMxarBaxalli Kuxxu paxArWakkU xAKalAxa aMkigalYigU wAlYeV irabekAxareV , AgAggeV Kuxxu paxArWavannu mawwu xAKaleVya aMkigalYannu wapAsaNeV mAdabeku .
yAvuxe vyawyAsa kaMdubaMxareV Kuxxu paxArWaxa pramANakkeV xAKaleVya aMkigalYannu jAswi aWavA kadimeV mAdikoVlYlYabekAguwwaxeV .
vyawyAsa kaMdubaMxa paxArWa pramANavannu jAswi aWavA kadimeV mAdalu wakRaNa sAXyavAguvuxilla .
Kuxxu paxArWa wapAsaNeV : Kuxxu paxArWa wapAsaNeVyannu I keVlYakaMda eVradu paxXawigalYalli nadeVsabahuxu .
oVMxaneVya aMSa eVMxareV eVdeVbidaxeV mAduva wapAsaNeV .
eVradaneVya aMSa eVMxareV vArRika wapAsaNeV .
saMsWeVya catuvatikeV mawwu anukUlagalYigeV anuguNavAgi yAvuxAxarU oVMxu paxXawiyannu paxArWa wapAsaNeVgAgi alYavadisikoVlYlYabahuxu .
oVMxaneVya aMSa eVMxareV eVdeVbidaxeV mAduva wapAsaNeV : haxinExu xinagalYigeV oVmmeV aWavA wiMgalYigeV oVmmeV Kuxxu paxArWa mawwu xAKaleVya aMkigalYannu wAlYeV noduvuxu I paxXawiya krama .
I paxXawiya wapAsaNeVyalli bahalYa anukUlagalYu iveV .
avugalYu yAvuvu eVMxareV : paxArWa Silku vyawyAsagalYannu AgiMxAggeV saripadisikoVlYlYabahuxu .
Kuxxu paxArWa pramANakkU xAKalAxa aMkigU yAvAgalU wAlYeV iruwwaxeV .
xAswAnu aXikAriyu xAKaleVya AXAraxa meleV paxArWa korikeV pawravannu sallisuwwirabahuxu .
I paxXawiya wapAsaNeVyalli paxArWa Silku vyawyAsaxa kAraNagalYannu wakRaNa saripadisi , kalYavu , avyavasWiwa jodaNeV mawwu xAKalAwiya baggeV krama jarugisabahuxu .
eVdeVbidaxeV wapAsaNeV ixxareV paxArWa jodaNeV mawwu xAKalAwiya keVlasagAraru saxA eVccaraxiMxa iruwwAreV .
kAraNa wamma meleV krama jarugabahuxu eVMba eVccarikeV iruwwaxeV .
6 ) xEnaMxina xAKalAwigalYu samayakkeV sariyAgi AguwwiruwwaveV .
I paxXawiyalli iruva anAnukUlagalYu mawwu avugalYa parihAra : I paxXawiyaMweV eVdeVbidaxeV wapAsaNeV AguwwirabekAxareV xAswAnu viBAgaxalli xAKaleVgalYu wapAsaNA aXikArigalYa vaSa irabekAxAga svalpa keVlasagalYu kuMTiwa Aguva saMBava iruwwaxeV .
AxareV vyavasWiwavAgi wapAsaNeVyannu nadeVsuwwA ixxareV , yAva keVlasavU kuMTiwa Aguva saMBava iruvuxilla .
iMwaha rIwiya yojaneVyannu veVcca SAswrajFanU nirvahisikoVlYlYabekAguwwaxeV .
eVradaneVya anAnukUla eVnnuvuxu , I paxXawiyiMxa awi veVcca Agabahuxu eVMxu .
ekeVMxareV prawyeka wapAsaNA sibbaMxi erpadisabekAgixxu , ivarugalYigeV waguluva saMbalYa Karcu .
AxareV I paxXawiyiMxa uMtAguva anukUlagalYannu pariSIlisixAga anAnukUlagalYu bahalYa kadimeV eVnisuwwaxeV .
lakRAMwara rUpAyi mAlannu xAswAnu viBAgaxalli SeKarisittu avugalYa nirvahaNeV mawwu leVkkAcAraxa baggeV melina kevala anAnukUlagalYiMxa eVdeVbidaxa wapAsaNeV paxXawiyannu alYavadisikoVlYlYaxeV ixxareV , waguluva naRta bahalYa iruwwaxeV .
mawwu veVccaleVkka SAswraxa wawvagalYa AXArakkeV beVleV illaxe ixxu veVccanirNaya viBAgaxa avaSyakaweVye iruvuxilla .
ixariMxAgi avyavasWeV mawwu avEjFAnika parisWiwi uMtAguwwaxeV .
2. vArRika wapAsaNeV : varRakkeV oVmmeV Kuxxu paxArWaxa pramANavannu xAKaleVya aMkiyoVdaneV wAlYeV nodabekAguwwaxeV .
saNNa uxyamagalYalli I paxXawiya krama irabahuxu .
I kramaxa uxxeSa eVradu bageVyaxu iruwwaxeV .
1 ) vArRika leVkkagalYannu sixXapadisalu bekAguva oVttu paxArWa pramANa mawwu mOlya avaSyaka .
2 ) Kuxxu paxArWa mawwu xAKaleVgalYa aMkigalYannu wAlYeV noduvuxu .
saMsWeVyu paxArWa wapAsaNeVya yAvuxe paxXawiyannu alYavadisikoVMdarU vArRika wapAsaNeV ixxe iruwwaxeV .
vArRika leVkkagalYannu AKEru mAdi lABave aWavA naRtave eVMbuxannu noduvuxu mawwu oVttu Aswi nodalu I vArRika wapAsaNeV anukUla AgixeV .
I xqRtiyiMxa anukUla ixxarU , varRaxa AxiyiMxa aMwyaxavareVgeV xAswAnu viBAgaxalli nadeVyuva catuvatikeVgalYannu varRaxa koVneVyalli alYeVyuvuxu AxareV , paxArWa pramANaxa yAvuxe vyawyAsagalYigeV enu krama jarugisabekAxarU vArRika wapAsaNeVya anaMwarave AguwwaxeV .
varRa maXyaxalli yAvuxe naRtavu kalYavuniMxa Agirabahuxu , aswavyaswa xAswAnu paxXawiyiMxa Agirabahuxu mawwu keVlasagArara asAmarWyaxiMxa irabahuxu .
iMwaha saMxarBaxalli wapAsaNeV illaxa kAraNa , vArRika wapAsaNeVgAgi kAxu , vivaragalYannu padeVxu , kAraNagalYannu nodi krama jarugisuvuxu AxareV , keVlasagArarigeV wamma asAmarWyaxa wappugalYannu muccidalu avakASa koVttaMweV AguwwaxeV .
melAgi uwpAxanA viBAgakkeV paxArWavannu sawawavAgi ravAnisabekAgi iruvuxariMxa iMwaha GataneVgalYiMxa kuMxu uMtAguwwaxeV .
iMxina vEjFAnika yugaxalli saMsWeVgalYu saNNa aWavA xoVddaxu irabahuxu .
AxareV vEjFAnika wawvagalYannu alYavadisikoVlYlYuvuxu uwwama AgiruwwaxeV .
yAva uxyamaxalli wapAsaNeVgAgi prawyeka sibbaMxiyannu erpadisalAgaxeV ixxarU , iruva sibbaMxiyannu wapAsaNeVgAgi upayogisikoVlYlYabekAguwwaxeV .
hAlYAxa aWavA naRtavAxa paxArWa naRtaxalli eVradu bageVgalYu iveV .
avugalYu yAvuvu eVMxareV : oVMxu sAmAnya naRta eVradu asAmAnya naRta wayArikA saMsWeVgalYalli paxArWa naRta saMBavisuvuxu asAmAnya enu alla .
AxareV saMBavisixa naRtavu sAmAnyave aWavA asAmAnyave eVnnuvuxu praSneV .
oVMxu sAmAnya naRta : vaswugalYannu wayArisuva viviXa haMwagalYalli paxArWa upayoga AguvAga paxArWaxa kaniRta aMSa hAlYAguwwaxeV .
I naRtavu paxArWa svaBAvakkeV anuguNavAgi iruwwaxeV .
paxArWa svaBAvakkeV anuguNavAgi paxArWaxalli iruva kaniRTa aMSa hAlYAgale bekAguwwaxeV .
I naRtavannu sAmAnya naRta eVMxu parigaNisalAguvuxu .
ixannu wappisalu sAXya AguvuxillaV_VM mawwu niyaMwrisalu Aguvuxilla .
uxA : pITopakaraNagalYigeV upayogisuva mara , gAlYiyalli AviyAguva xrava paxArWagalYu , guNamattaxalli kadimeVyAgi hAlYu Aguva hawwi iwyAxigalYu .
aMxareV saMBavisale bekAxaxxannu sAmAnya naRta eVMxu parigaNisalAguwwaxeV .
I naRtavannu hidiwaxalli ittukoVlYlYalu sAXya illa .
sAmAnya naRta parigaNisuvikeV : veVccaleVkka SAswraxa prakAra sAmAnya naRtavannu ' oVlYlYeVya aMSagalYiMxa heVccuvari beVleVyalli padeVxukoVlYlYabekAguwwaxeV .
eVradu asAmAnya naRta : sAmAnya naRtakkiMwalU heVccuvari paxArWa naRta saMBavisixAga aMwaha naRtavannu asAmAnya naRta eVMxu parigaNisalAguvuxu .
asAmAnya naRta saMBavisalu halavAru kAraNagalYu ixxu , avugalYalli keVlavu kAraNagalYannu niyaMwrisabahuxAgixxu , innu keVlavugalYannu niyaMwrisalu Aguvuxilla .
niyaMwrisabahuxAxa kAraNagalYu eVMxareV : oVMxu ) asAmarWyaxa keVlasagalYu .
eVradu ) lopa  ulYlYa yaMwraxiMxa vaswu wayArisuvuxu .
mUru ) kadimeV xarjeV paxArWa upayogisuvuxu .
nAlku ) uwpAxanA viBAgakkeV paxArWavannu sawawavAgi ravAnisaxeV aswavyaswa iruvuxu .
Exu ) koVlYlYuva viBAga mawwu xAswAnu viBAgaxalli vyavasWiwa yojaneV illaxiruvuxu .
Aru ) uwpAxaneVgeV saMbaMXapatta viBAgagalYalli sahakAra illaxeV iruvuxu .
I kAraNagalYiMxa asAmAnya naRta uMtAguwwaxeV .
ivugalYannu vyavasWiwa yojaneVyiMxa wadeVgattabahuxu .
asAmAnya naRta saMBavisalu halavAru niyaMwrisalAgaxa kAraNagalYu iveV .
avugalYu yAvuvu eVMxareV : oVMxu ) paxArWagalYannu sarabarAjuxArariMxa padeVyalu pravAha pIdiwaxiMxa niMwuhoguvuxu , eVradu ) beVMki anAhuwaxiMxa .
mUru ) kArmikara muRkaragalYiMxa .
nAlku ) yaMwra sidiwaxiMxa .
Exu ) vixyucCakwi sWagiwaxiMxa .
asAmAnya naRtavu niyaMwriwa aWavA niyaMwraNakkeV oVlYagAgaxa kAraNagalYiMxa AgixxarU , I naRtavannu wayArAxa vaswuvina oVttu veVccakkeV serisalAguvuxilla .
AxuxariMxa asAmAnya naRtavannu veVccanirNaya puswakaxa lABa mawwu naRta KAweVgeV vargAyisabekAguwwaxeV .
cUrupAru aWavA raxxi paxArWagalYannu sixXa vaswugalYannAgi wayAru mAduva viviXa haMwagalYalli paxArWa haxa mAduvAga baruva cUrupAru aWavA raxxi naRtaxalli iruwwaxeV .
I cUrupAru praswuwa wayArikA saMsWeVgeV mawweV wayArikeVgeV upayogisalu baruvuxilla .
AxareV bereV wayArikA saMsWeVgeV upayogakkeV barabahuxu aWavA baraxeV irabahuxu .
keVlavu saMxarBagalYalli I cUrupArannu beVleVgeV mAralAguwwaxeV aWavA beVleV iraxeV iruwwaxeV .
paxArWagalYannu haxa mAduvAga mawwu prawi vaswu wayAru mAduvAga cUrupAru iMwiRteV pramANaxalli irabeku eVMxu nirXarisabekAguwwaxeV .
aMxareV , baruvaMwaha cUrupArugalYa pramANaxallU niyaMwraNa irabekAguwwaxeV .
cUrapAru aWavA raxxi mArAtaxa beVleVyannu I keVlYakaMdaMweV parigaNisabahuxu : oVMxu ) paxArWaxa cUrupArannu mArAta mAdixAga baMxaMwaha beVleVyannu wayArikA vaswuvigeV upayogisuva paxArWa veVccaxalli kalYeVyabekAguwwaxeV .
ixannu paxArWa cUrupAru aWavA paxArWa raxxi mArAta eVMxu kareVyalAguvuxu .
ixariMxa paxArWa veVcca svalpa kadimeV AguwwaxeV .
eVradu baMxaMwaha cUrupAru yAvuxe wayArikA haMwakkeV serixxu eVMxu wilYiyalu asAXya AxAga , cUrupAru mArAta mAdixa beVleVyannu paxArWa veVccaxalli kalYeVyaxe , kArKAneV melkarcinalli kalYeVyabekAguwwaxeV .
ixannu kArKAneV cUrupAru aWavA raxxi mArAta eVMxu kareVyalAguvuxu .
ravAnisikoVMda paxArWavannu xAswAnu viBAgakkeV hiMxirugisuvuxu : uwpAxanA viBAgaxalli vaswugalYannu wayArisalu warisikoVMdixxa paxArWagalYu 261 upayogisaxe ulYixixxareV , xAswAnu viBAgakkeV hiMwirugisabekAguwwaxeV .
uwpAxanA viBAgavu paxArWa hiMwirugisuvAga xAKaleVya AXAraxa meleV hiMwirugisa bekAguwwaxeV .
I xAKaleVyeV paxArWa hiMwirugisixa xAKaleV .
paxArWa hiMwirugisixa xAKaleVyannu wri prawigalYalli sixXapadisi paxArWaxa joVweV xAswAnu viBAgakkeV uwpAxana viBAgavu kalYuhisa bekAguwwaxeV .
xAswAnu aXikAriyu oVMxu prawiyannu xAKaleVgAgi ittukoVMdu ulYixa eVradu prawigalYigeV paxArWa vApassu baMxaxxakkAgi sahi hAki , vApassu uwpAxanA viBAgakkeV oVMxu prawi mawwu veVccanirNaya viBAgakkeV oVMxu prawiyannu kalYuhisabekAguwwaxeV .
I xAKaleVya AXAraxa meleV stors KAwAXikAri stors KAweVyalli paxArWa hiMxirugisixa vivaragalYannu ' koVMdixxu ' kalamugalYa mUlaka xAKalu mAdi Silku bareVya bekAguwwaxeV .
hiMwirugi baMxa paxArWavannu xAswAnu aXikAriyu svasWAnaxalli aMxareV axara binninalli ittu bin koVMdaxxu ' kalamu mUlaka xAKalu mAdi Silku bareVya bekAguwwaxeV .
ixe vivaragalYannu ' sarva paxArWa niyaMwraNa xAKaleV ' allU xAKalu mAdabekAguwwaxeV .
uwpAxanA viBAgaxalli paxArWa upayoga AguvAga paxArWavu keVttuhoxalli , A paxArWavannu xAswAnu viBAgakkeV hiMwirugisalAguvuxu .
hiMwirugisixa paxArWavannu xAKaleVya muKAMwara jamA mAdabekAguwwaxeV .
aMxareV paxArWa hiMwirugisixa xAKaleVyannu wri prawiyalli wayArisi xAswAnu aXikArigeV uwpAxana viBAgavu kalYuhisi koVdabeku .
hIgeV keVttuhogi hiMwirugi baMxa paxArWavannu punarmOlya mAdi , saMbaMXapatta xAKaleVgalYalli namUxisa bekAguwwaxeV .
oVMxu prawiyannu veVccanirNaya viBAgakkeV kalYuhisixAga stors KAwAXikAriyu storsalli punarmOlya beVleVyalli xAKalisa bekAguwwaxeV .
aMwara viBAga paxArWa vargAvaNeV oVMxu wayArikA viBAgakkeV xAswAnu viBAgaxiMxa ravAnisikoVMda paxArWavu heVccuvari AxareV mawwoVMxu viBAgakkeV I paxArWaxa avaSya ixxareV , oVMxu viBAgaxiMxa mawwoVMxu viBAgakkeV paxArWa vargAvaNeV mAduvuxe aMwara viBAga paxArWa vargAvaNeV .
vicAra xqRtiya ugama hIgeV jIvanakkeV oVMxu hoVsa baNNavannu koVttu vijFAna mAnavana xqRtiXyeyagalYa melU saMGasaMsWeVgalYa melU wanna praBAvavannu AraMBisiwu .
yAva AxarSavannu AgalI naMbikeVyannu AgalI kevala sanAwana eVMba mAwraxiMxa naMbaxAyiwu .
vicAra xqRtigeV oVreVhacci noduvuxu moVxalu Ayiwu .
avu mAnavana purovqxXigeV neVravu Agawakkave eVMxu pariSIlisuvuxU AraMBa Ayiwu .
' yAva saMGasaMsWeVgalYe Agali , yAva saMpraxAyave Agali , mAnavaniMxa nirmiwavAxavu ; AraMBa AxAga hege Agirali Iga avu mAnavana puroBivqxXigeV neVravu AguwwiveVyo ? illavAxareV avannu alYisi aWavA mArpadisi iMxina mAnavanigeV neVravu AguvaMweV ekeV mAdabAraxu ? ' eVMba vicAra xqRti jIvanaxa eVlla kRewragalYallU eVxxukoVMdiwu .
' sarve janA suKino BavaMwu ' eVMbuxu AXunika yugaxa mUla maMwra .
' avaravaru kelYikoVMdu baMxaMweV avaravaru suKaxuKa:galYannu anuBavisabeku ' eVMba halYeVya vAxa mAyavAgi ' eVlla vyakwigalYigU svAwaMwrya , saMwqpwi , suKaSAMwigalYu mUlaBUwa hakku ' eVMbuxannu samAja aMgIkarisixeV .
I wawva xqRti anusarisiye samAja nUwanavAgi rUpugoVlYlYuwwixeV .
samAjaxa aXipawyaxalli keVlasa mAduwwiruva yAva saMGasaMsWeVgalYu Agali saMpraxAyagalYu Agali vyakwiya mUlaBUwa hakkannu moVtaku mAduvaMwiraxeV axannu eVwwi hidiyuva svarUpaxavu AguwwiveV .
hIgeV eVlla vyakwigalYigU samAna hakkannu xoVrakisikoVttaxxu vicAra xqRti .
A hakkannu gOravisuva samAja pOrasawwAwmaka rIwiyaxu .
aMWa rARtraxa AdalYiwa kramavU pOrasawwAwmaka rIwiyalli vyavasWeVgoVlYlYuwwixeV .
vijFAna yugaxa mUru guNagalYu meleV vivarisixaMweV AXunika jIvanaxa halavu muKya aMSagalYalli mArpattixeV .
jIvanaxa mattavannu heVccisixa Oxyogika pragawiyU , kArya kAraNa jFAnakkeV prAXAnyavannu koVtta vicAra xqRtiyU , eVlla vyakwigalYigU samAna hakku BAXyaweVyannu iwwu gOravisuva pOrasawwAwmaka samAja jIvanavU , vijFAna yugaxa mUru guNavAgi eVxxu kANuwwaveV .
iMWa yugaxa nirmANaxalli muKya pAwravahisi iruvuxu vijFAna xqRti .
hAgAxareV A vijFAnaxqRti eVMxu AraMBa Ayiwu Oxyogika pragawigeV vijFAnaxa neVravannu xoVrakisikoVMdaxxu haxineVMtaneVya SawamAnaxa maXyakAlaxiMxa IceVgeV .
axu vyavasWiwa rIwiya jFAnavAgi beVlYeVyalu AraMBisixxu haxinelYaneVya SawamAnaxa Axi BAgaxiMxa .
ixu  iRtariMxa  , A sumArinalli yAvuxe oVMxu xina mAnavanu vijFAna yugakkeV kAlu ittanu eVMxu BAvisabAraxu .

aRtu prAcIna AxarU axu XArmika xqRtigeV aMjikoVMdu , hiMbaxiyalli ixxukoVMdu beVlYeVxukoVMde baMwu .
koVneVgeV kalYeVxa N_NNV eVradu SawamAnagalYiMxa wanna  varcassannu janajIvanaxa meleV bIruva Sakwiyannu galYisikoVMdiwu .
mAnavana saMskqwiyannU nAgarikaweVyannU hoVsa vAswavika muMbinalli poRisuva kAryavannU vahisikoVMdiwu .
hAgeV nUwana yugavoVMxannu racisuva kAryaxalli praXAna pAwravahisi saMskqwiyannu nirmisuva kAryaxalli neVravAxa janAMgagalYu yAvuvu ? A kAryaxalli gaNanIya seveVsallisixa vyakwigalYu yAru ? vijFAna beVlYavaNigeVya mUru GattagalYu namma saMpraxAyagalYU saMGasaMsWeVgalYU AcAra vyavahAragalYU nammiMxale nirmiwa Axavu .

Xarma graMWagalYalli serixa aristAtal , tAleVmi muMwAxa AcAryara vANi paviwra eVnisi mawapITagalYu BaxragoVMdaMweV avugalYa praBAva janaweVya meleV heVccuwwA baMwu .

aMWavaralli kri. pU. mUraneVya SawamAnaxalli jIvisixxa ArkimidIs eVMbAwanu prasixXa vyakwi .

' paxArWa nIrinalli mulYugixAga axu BAraxalli kadimeV AxaMweV woruwwaxeV .

roman cakrAXipawyaxa pawanaxa naMwara aleVksAMdriyaxalli saMgraha Agixxa grIk mawwu romanara vijFAna graMWagalYu arabara haswagawa Axavu .

yAva kAlaxalli yuropu mawapITaxavara kaTiNa SAsanagalYigeV wuwwAgi janaweVya prawiBeVgeV xigbaMXana hidixu vijFAnaxa pragawigeV avakASa illaxeV iwwoV A kAlaxalli arabarU BArawIyarU sallisixa seveV vijFAnaxa beVlYavaNigeVya iwihAsaxalli cirasmaraNIya eVnisixeV .

axU ArWika lABaxa xqRtiyiMxa .

bEballinalli ' sqRtiya eVlla prANigalYU sasyagalYU xevariMxa Axiyalli nirmiwavAxa svarUpaxalle ulYixiveV .

gawakAlaxa prANiyoVMxu BUmiyalli bittu hogiruva wanna xehaxa SilA muxrikeVyannu BUgarBaxiMxa huduki weVgeVxu pariSIlisixanu .

' gawakAlaxa prANigalYu pIlYigeV pIlYigeVgU mArpaduwwA baMxaxxariMxale avugalYa saMwawiya iMxina pIlYigeVyalli iRtoVMxu vyawyAsa kaMdubaruvuxu ' eVMxu GoRisi bEballinalli iruva jIvajAwigalYa sWirasvarUpaxa wawva husi eVMbuxannu worisi koVttanu .
koparnikas wanna prawiBeVyiMxa grahagalYa calaneVya svarUpavannu xarSisixxanu .
' BUmigU svargIya grahagalYigU yAva vyawyAsavU illa .
eVllavU niyamavannu anusarisi calisuwwaveV .

avanigeV neVravAgi keVplar eVMba mawwoVbba vijFAni ' svargIya grahagalYu eVllA cakrAkAravAgi suwwuvuvaMweV ; BUmi mAwra vakrAkAravAgi suwwuvuxaMweV ! axu eVllA AxarSavAxaxa kattukaweV .

yAva graha Agali Bexa illaxeV oVMxe niyamavannu anusarisi calisuwwaxeV eVMxu vAxisi grahawAreVgalYa calaneVgeV oVMxu sArvawrika svarUpavannu koVttanu .
krEswamawa Xarmaxalli AcArya puruRanaMweV gaNaneV Agixxa aristAtal mawwu tAleVmi ivaru ibbara vANiyU husiyAgi hoyiwu .
mawapITa wanna prawiRTeVgeV oVxagixa A AGAwavannu hegeV wAne sahisuvuxu ? ' svargIyavU awimAnuRavU paviwravU eVMxu gaNaneVyalli iruva grahagalYu vakrAkAravAgi suwwuvuxu eVMxareV enu ? ' eVMxu mawapITaxavaru AgrahagoVMdu urixeVxxaru .

I vyavasWeVyiMxa baMdavAlYa kadimeV bekAguwwaxeV , xAswAnu mAduva sWalYAvakASaxa samasyeV iruvuxilla mawwu mArukatteV beVleVyalli paxArWa koVlYlYabahuxu .

keMxrIkqwa koVlYlYuvikeV saMsWeVya wayArikA Gataka oVMxe ixxalli paxArWavannu mArukatteVyalli saMxarBakkeV anuguNavAgi koVlYlYabahuxu .

koVlYlYuva aXikAriyalli irabekAxa lakRaNagalYu : muKyavAgi , saMsWeVya hiwavannu xqRTiyalli ittukoVMdu keVlasa mAdabekAgi iruvuxariMxa , koVlYlYuva aXikArigeV iMwahaxe SikRaNa paxavi irabeku eVMxu niyama illa hAgU agawya illa .

ixakkAgi koVlYlYuva aXikArigeV sarakAraxa rARtrIya ArWika nIwi , Amaxu raPwu nIwigalYu , viXAnagalYu , Amaxu raPwu mAduva saMsWeVgalYu , haNa vinimaya nIwigalYu , viviXa rARtragalYoVdaneV namma rARtraxa haNa vinimaya xaragalYu , sArigeV vyavasWeV vicAragalYu , vimeV , sumaka , xAswAnu malYigeVgalYu iwyAxigalYa arivu irabeku .

koVlYlYuva viBAgaxa muKya keVlasagalYu : yAva paxArWa xAswAninalli mugixu hogixeV , yAvAga koVlYlYabeku eVMba viRaya koVlYlYuva viBAgakkeV wilYixiruvuxilla .

ixe rIwiyalli iwara viBAgagalYavarU saha wamageV bekAxavugalYannu- koVlYlYuva korikeV pawraxa mUlaka koVlYlYuva aXikArigeV wilYiyapadisabekAguwwaxeV .
I pawraxalli irabekAxa viRayagalYu yAvuvu eVMxareV , yAva viBAga , korikeV saMKyeV , wArIKu , bekAguva paxArWa , ixara saMKyeV aWavA pramANa , saMkewa , guNamatta , bekAguva paxArWa uwpAxisuva vaswuvigeV saMbaMXisixxeV mawwu eVRtu xinagalYa oVlYagadeV bekAgixeV .

koVlYlYuva korikeV pawravu I keVlYakaMda viBAgagalYiMxa barabahuxu : oVMxu ) sAmAnyavAgi koVlYlYuva korikeV pawravu xAswAnu viBAgaxiMxa niwya balYakeVya paxArWa xAswAnigAgi baruwwaxeV .
eVradu ) grAhakara avaSyakaweVgalYigeV anuguNavAxa sixXavaswu wayArikeVgeV AxeSa pawra baMxAga uwpAxanA viBAgavu , wayArisabekAgiruva vaswuvigeV bekAguva paxArWa pattiyannu sixXapadisi koVlYlYuva viBAgakkeV bedikeV pawraxoVdaneV kalYuhisuwwaxeV .

saMsWeVya agawyakkeV anuguNavAgi vivaragalYannu mawwu kAlaMgalYannu serisabahuxu .
koVlYlYuva korikeV pawraxa pariSIlaneV : koVlYlYuva korikeV pawraxalli irabekAxa muKya vivaragalYu yAvuvu eVMxareV bekAguva paxArWa , pramANa , guNamatta , yAva wArIKina oVlYageV beku iwyAxi .

koVlYlYuvuxakkAgi anusarisuva viXAna : koVlYlYuva aXikAriyu saMsWeVya niyamaxaMweV paxArWa sarabarAjuxArariMxa aMxAju patti mawwu XAraNeV pattiyannu warisikoVlYlYabeku .

aWavA pawrikeVgalYalli prakataNeV nIdabahuxu .
baMxa XAraNeV pattigalYa AXAraxa meleV eVlla sarabarAjuxArara pattiyannu wayArisikoVlYlYabekAguwwaxeV .
I pattiyalli irabekAxa viRayagalYu enu eVMxareV , sarabarAjuxArara heVsaru , vilYAsa , paxArWa vivaraNeV , beVleV , sarabarAju mAduva pramANa , sarabarAju niyamagalYu aMxareV haNa pAvawi rIwi .
sodi , sArigeV veVccaBarikeV iwyAxi mawwu sarabarAju mAduva samaya .

yAvuxAxarU saMxarBaxalli moVxalaneV AxyaweVya sarabarAjuxAra sarabarAju mAduva asAXyaweVyannu vyakwapadisixalli eVradaneVya AxyaweVya sarabarAjuxAranigeV wilYisabekAguwwaxeV .
hIgeVye mUrane sarabarAjuxArana saraxi barabahuxu .
hIgeV nirXarisixa sarabarAjuxAranigeV ' koVlYlYuva AxeSavannu kalYuhisabeku .
koVlYlYuva AxeSavannu saMsWeVya anukUlaxaMweV nAlku aWavA Exu prawi wayArisi , moVxala prawiyannu sarabarAjuxAranigeV ravAnisi , eVradane prawiyannu xAswAnu viBAgakkU , mUraneVya prawiyannu paxArWa svIkqwa mawwu wapAsaNeV viBAgakkU , nAlkaneVya prawiyannu veVcca nirNaya viBAgakkU mawwu koVneVya prawiyannu koVlYlYuva viBAgavu xAKaleVgAgi ittukoVlYlYabeku .
jFApaka pawra koVlYlYuva AxeSavannu sarabarAjuxAranigeV ravAnisixa naMwara , sarabarAju mAdalu nIdiruva gaduvina oVlYageV paxArWa saMsWeVgeV baMxiweV eVMbuxannu koVlYlYuva aXikAriyu wilYixukoVlYlYabeku .
yAvuxe kAraNaxiMxa vilYaMba AxareV , sarabarAjuxAranigeV jFApaka pawravannu kalYuhisabeku .

I keVlasakkAgi prawyeka viBAgaxa vyavasWeV mAdi paxArWa padeVyuva mawwu parIkRisuva aXikAriya nemaka AgiruwwaxeV .

baMxa paxArWagalYu kalYuhisuva salaheVyannu koVdabeku .
mawwu paxArWagalYalli iruva nyUnyaweVgalYannu wilYisabeku .

I aXikAri sixXapadisixa varaxi sAmAnya Agi nAlku prawiyalli ixxu , moVxalaneVyaxannu koVlYlYuva aXikArigU , eVradaneVyaxannu xAswAnu viBAgakkU , mUraneVya prawiyannu veVcca nirNaya viBAgakkU mawwu koVneVya prawiyannu parIkRaNa viBAgaxalli xAKaleVgAgi ittukoVlYlYalAguwwaxeV .
svIkqwa mawwu parIkRaNeV viBAgaxa avaSyakaweV xoVddaxoVdda saMsWeVgalYalli sAXya Agabahuxu .
saNNasaNNa uxyamagalYalli veVccaxa xqRtiyalli sAXyavAgalAraxu eVMba aBimawa ixeV .
AxareV paxArWa veVcca hidiwa aWavA niyaMwraNa xqRtiyiMxa koVMda paxArWagalYa guNamatta wapAsaNeV illaxixxareV , wayArisixa sixXavaswuvina guNamattaxalli kadimeV irabahuxu .

ixariMxAgi heVccu kArmika velYeV , yaMwraxa upayoga , vixyucCakwi iwyAxigalYiMxa naRta uMtAguvuxannu wAlYeV nodixAga , parIkRaNa viBAgaxa veVcca heVccAgalAraxu eVMxu eVnisuwwaxeV .

aXyAya - nAlku paxArWagalYu - xAswAnu saMGataneV svIkqwa mawwu parIkRaka paxArWavannu wapAsaNeV mAdi sammawisixa meleV paxArWagalYu xAswAnu viBAgakkeV ravAnisalpaduwwaveV .

I viBAgaxalli lakRAMwara rUpAyi beVleVya paxArWagalYannu SeKarisittiruvuxariMxa , ixara nirvahaNeV saMsWeVya mikka eVlla viBAgagalYigiMwalU Binna AgiruwwaxeV .
I viBAgaxa nirvahaNeV hoVwwa aXikAriye xAswAnAXikAri .
paxArWagalYa xAswAnu kArya xAswAnAXikArigeV saMbaMXa paduwwaxeV .
xAswAnu saMGataneV paxArWa jodaNeV , viMgadaNeV , paxArWa guruwisuvikeV , xAKalAwi mawwu ravAneV xAswAnu saMGataneVya aMgagalYu .
oVMxoVMxu aMgavU oVMxoVMxu muKya Axa keVlasa .
AyAya paxArWagalYa svaBAva , guNamatta mawwu viXagalYa AXAraxa meleV I oVMxoVMxu keVlasavannu nirvahisabekAguwwaxeV .
ixakkAgi  xAswAnAXikAriya kEkeVlYageV sahAyakaru iruwwAreV .

Aru sAla koVduvavara meleV nirbaMXa : sahakAri saMGagalYigeV wamma saxasyarannu hoVrawupadisi bereV yArigU sAla koVdalu baruvuxilla .
AxareV 29ne kalamina prakAra oVMxu sahakAri saMGa mawwoVMxu sahakAri saMGakkeV sAla koVdabahuxu .
elYu sAla padeVyuvuxara melina nirbaMXa : yAva sahakAri saMGa wanna liKiwa kattalYeVgalYa prakAra saxasyaru allaxavariMxa TevaNi aWavA sAla padeVyabahuxu .
eVMtu noMxaNi Sulka , AxAya  weVrigeV mawwu stAMp weVrigeVya vinAyawi : kalamu 28ra prakAra noMxaNi Sulka , AxAya weVrigeVyannu mawwu stAMp weVrigeVyannu sahakAri saMGagalYu koVdabekAgilla .
oVMBawwu mIsalu niXi mawwu lABAMSa haMcuvuxu : prawiyoVMxu sahakAri saMGavu kalamu 33ra prakAra saMGaxa lABaxa prawiSawa 25raRtannu mIsalu niXigeV vargAyisabeku .
ulYixa lABavannu lABAMSa eVMxu saxasyaralli haMcabahuxu .
AxareV aniyamiwa hoVNeVgArikeVya , sahakAri saMGagalYigeV sarakAraxa pUrvAnumawi illaxeV lABAMSa haMcalu baruvuxilla .
hawwu leVkka iduva viXAna : 43ne paricCeXaxa prakAra prawiyoVMxu rAjya sarakAravu niyamagalYannu racisi A prakAra leVkka idalu saMGagalYigeV wilYisabahuxu .
sAXAraNavAgi eVlla saMGagalYu , AxAya - Karcina leVkka , lABa - naRta KAweV mawwu aDAveV pawrikeVgalYannu iduwwaveV .
hannoVMxu leVkka pariSoXaneV : 1912ra kAyxeVya 17ne paricCeXaxa prakAra rAjyagalYa rijistrAraru prawiyoVMxu sahakAri leVkka pawravannu prawi varRa wapAsisuvaru .
hanneVradu leVkka pariSoXakanannu nemisuvuxu : rAjya sarakAraxa sahakAri saMGagalYa rijistrAraru leVkka pariSoXakanannu nemisuvaru .
wamma viBAgIya leVkka pariSoXakariMxale leVkka pariSoXaneV nadeVsuvaru .
keVlavu saMxarBagalYalli vqwwi nirawa leVkka pariSoXakarigU I kAryavannu oVppisalAguvuxu .
kAraNa vqwwi nirawa leVkka pariSoXakanu I saMGagalYa bageVgeV heVccu wilYixukoVlYlYabeku .
mawwu aRte eVccarikeVyiMxa leVkka pariSoXaneV mAdabeku .
ekeVMxareV sahakAri saMGagalYalli nuriwa , warabewi ixxa keVlasagAraru illaxe iruvuxariMxa , haNaxa apavyaya heVccAgi nadeVyuva uxAharaNeVgalYu bahalYa .
kAraNa leVkkapariSoXakanu keVlYagina viSeRa aMSagalYannu neVnapinalli ittukoVlYlYabeku .
leVkka pariSoXakana karwavyagalYu : 1 1912ra keMxrIya sahakAri saMGagalYa kAnUninalli iruva niyama parIkRisabeku .
eVradu rAjya sarakAragalYu racisixa niyamagalYannu mawwu prawiyoVMxu saMGavu mAdikoVMda liKiwa kattalYeVgalYannu oxi wilYixukoVlYlYabeku .
mUru AMwarika niyaMwraNaxa paxXawiya baggeV vicArisabeku .
4 saxasyara xAKaleV puswaka pariSIlisi baMdavAlYa rUpaxalli padeVxa nagaxu haNavannu xqDapadisabeku .
saxasyaru allaxavariMxa padeVxa vaMwigeVyannu prawibaMXisi , niyamagalYigeV anuguNavAgi ixeV , eVMbuxannu nodabeku .
Exu TevaNi rUpaxalli padeVxa nagaxu haNavannu rasIxiyiMxa xqDapadisabeku .
6 sarakAraxiMxa padeVxa anuxAnaxa haNavannu sarakAraxa AxeSaxa pawraxoVMxigeV xqDapadisabeku .
yAva uxxeSakkeV Agi anuxAna baMxixeVyo , A uxxeSakkeV viniyogisixeV eVMbuxannu wilYixukoVlYlYabeku .
elYu saraku xAswAnugalYa aswiwvaxa xqDIkaraNa saMpUrNa nadeVsabeku .
eVMtu lABaxa 25nnu mIsalu niXigeV vargAyisixxannu nodabeku .
9 lABAMSa haMcixxannu parIkRisabeku .
10 byAMkugalYiMxa padeVxa sAlavannu keMxrIya sahakAri byAMkiniMxa padeVxa sAlavannu nagaxu puswakaxalli namUxisixeVye illave eVMbuxannu Kaciwa padisikoVlYlYabeku .
hannoVMxu haNa woVdagisixxannu pariSIlisi axu niyamakkeV anuguNavAgi ixeVyo illavo eVMbuxannu wilYixukoVlYlYabeku .
hanneVradu prawiyoVMxu veVccakkeV purAveV pAvawiyannu padeVxu axu mUla pAvawiye hegeV eVMbuxannu Kaciwa padisikoVlYlYabeku .
akrama veVcca nadeVxareV kaMduhidiyabeku .
haximUru sAlagArariMxa baMxa baddi , sAlaxa maru pAvawi eVllavU niyamakkeV anusAravAgi iruvavo illavo eVMbuxannu Kaciwa padisikoVlYlYabeku .
haxinAlku saMGavu saxasyarigeV sAla koVtta baggeV saxasyariMxa padeVxa purAveV pAvawigalYannu nagaxu puswakavannu pariSIlisabeku .
haxinExu 1949ra byAMkina niyaMwraNa kAnUnina 56ne kalamu , 3ne paricCeXa , 5ne viBAgaxalli koVtta namUneVya prakAra , lABa naRta mawwu aDAveV pawrikeVyannu wayArisabeku .
haxinAru niyamagalYigeV anusAravAgi leVkka ittiruvuxo mawwu axu nEja mawwu vAswava AgixeVyo eVMbuxannu Kaciwa padisakoVlYlYabeku .
haxinelYu SAsanagalYa prakAra mawwu prawirAjyaxa niyamakkeV anusAravAgi , leVkkapariSoXakanu wanna koVneVya varaxiyannu wayArisabeku .
sahakAri saMGagalYa leVkka wapAsisuvAga , leVkka pariSoXakanigeV leVkkaxa puswakaxa xAKaleVgalYannu mawwu saMbaMXisixa TarAvu puswakagalYannu hAgU liKiwa kattalYeVgalYannu noduva hakku iveV .
akrama veVcca , akrama vyavahAra kaMduhidiyabeku .
aswiwvaxa leVkka pariSoXaneV , aDAveV pawrikeVya leVkka pariSoXaneVya joVweVgeV kArya nirvahaNeVya leVkka pariSoXaneV nadeVyabeku .
AxuxariMxa leVkka pariSoXakana karwavyagalYu viswqwa AxavugalYu .
ixallaxeV leVkka pariSoXakanu saMGaxa samagra ciwravannu wanna varaxiyalli bareVxu kANisabeku .
ba nyAsa mawwu haNakAsu saMsWeVgalYu nyAsa mawwu haNakAsu saMsWeVgalYa leVkka pariSoXaneV mAduvAga leVkka pariSoXakanu keVlYakaMda aMSagalYannu gamanisabeku .
oVMxu nyAsa mawwu haNakAsu saMsWeVgalYa nivexanA pawrikeV mawwu liKiwa kattalYeVgalYalli namUxisiruva niyamagalYannu parIkRisi - avugalYa guri , uxxeSa mawwu haNa woVdagisuvuxara melina nirbaMXaneVgalYannu wilYixukoVlYlYabeku .
eVradu brokarina karAru puswakaxalli ixxaMweV KarIxisixa mawwu mArAta mAdixa baMdavAlYa pawragalYannu xqDapadisabeku .
mUru barabekAgiruva baddi mawwu lABAMSa baMxixeVye illavo wilYixukoVMdu , axu nagaxu puswakaxalli sariyAgi namUxu AgixeVyo illavo eVMbuxannu Kaciwa padisikoVlYlYabeku .
nAlku baMdavAlYa pawragalYa aswiwvaxa xqDIkaraNa mAdabeku .
Exu baMdavAlYa pawragalYa mOlya mApanaxa paxXawiyu avaSyakave eVMbuxannu vicArisabeku .
beVleVgalYalli ilYiwa AxareV , axannu aDAveV pawrikeVyalli namUxisabeku .
Aru sWirAswigalYalli woVdagisixa baMdavAlYa pawragalYa mArAtaxalli naRta saMBavisixareV axannu baMdavAlYa naRta eVMxu parigaNisabeku .
oVMxu velYeV baMdavAlYa pawragalYannu carAswigalYalli woVdagisixxareV A naRtavannu lABa naRta KAweVgeV vargAyisabeku .
sWirAswigalYalli woVdagisixa baMdavAlYa pawragalYa mArAta mAdixAga lABa AxareV , axannu baMdavAlYa lABa eVMxu parigaNisi axannu ReruxAraralli lABAMSa eVMxu haMcabahuxu .
elYu 1956ra kaMpeVniya kAnUnina 205ra paricCeXaxa prakAra , baMdavAlYa pawragalYa meleV savakalYi weVgeVyuvuxu kAnUnina anusAravAgi viroXa AgixxarU haNakAsina xqRtiyiMxa savakalYi weVgeVyuvuxu yogya AgixeV .
AxareV ivugalYannu carAswigalYigAgi KarIxisixxareV , savakalYi weVgeVyalebeku .
eVMtu baMdavAlYa pawragalYannu KarIxi aWavA mArAta mAdixAga avugalYa mUla haNavannu mawwu baddiyannu sariyAgi viBAgisalAgixeV eVMbuxannu Kaciwa padisabeku .
oVMBawwu weVrigeV koVduvuxixxareV mawwu axu aDAveV pawrikeVyalli bAkiyAgi ulYixixxareV , axannu adi tippaNi mUlaka worisabeku .
hawwu arXa saMxAya mAdixa RerugalYannu kaMpani KarIxisixxareV kareV saluvAgi saMBavisabahuxAxa hoVNeVgArikeVya baggeV aDAveV pawrikeVyalli helYalAgixeVye eVMbuxannu wilYixukoVlYlYabeku .
hannoVMxu prawyakRavAgi  padeVxukoVMdiruva baddi mawwu lABAMSagalYa jamA Karcannu sariyAgi nagaxu puswakaxalli bareVxixeVyo eVMbuxannu nodabeku .
eVradu nagaxu haNaxa Silkannu prawyakRavAgi eVNikeV mAdi axu nagaxu puswakaxalli worisuva SilkigeV sarihoVMxuvuxo eVMbuxannu prawyakRavAgi pariSIlisabeku .
ka calanaciwra maMxira mawwu nAtaka gqhagalYu : sAmAnyavAgi ciwramaMxira nAtaka gqhagalYa AxAyavannu , nAtakaxa mawwu ciwra maMxiragalYa prawi AtakkAgi mArAta mAdixa tiketugalYiMxa mawwu ciwramaMxiragalYalli jAhIrAwu worisuvuxariMxa baMxa haNaxiMxa leVkka hAkalAguvuxu .
kAraNa , leVkkapariSoXakanu ciwramaMxira mawwu nAtaka gqhagalYa leVkkapariSoXaneV mAduvAga I keVlYagina aMSagalYannu gamanisabeku .
oVMxu - AMwarika prawibaMXa mawwu niyaMwraNaxa paxXawi wilYixukoVlYlYabeku .
eVradu - tiketiniMxa aMxareV mIsalu tiketiniMxa mIsalu idaxa tiketiniMxa baMxa haNa eVRtu ? mawwu axannu nagaxu puswakaxalli worisixeVyo illavo eVMbuxannu wilYixukoVlYlYabeku .
mUru - muMgadavAgi mArAta mAdixa tiketiniMxa baMxa haNavannu AyA xinAMkagalYavareVgeV muMxuvareVsikoVMdu hogi prawixinaxa leVkkakkeV hoVMxisabeku .
nAlku - prawixinaxa uwpannavu prawixina mArAta mAdixa tiketina leVkkakkeV sari hoVMxabeku .
avugalYa melina manaraMjanA weVrigeVyannu sarakArakkeV wuMbixa baggeV KaciwapadisikoVlYlYabeku .
Exu - jAhIrAwiniMxa padeVxa haNavu sariyAgi jamA AgixeVyo illavo eVMbuxannu parIkRisi , jAhIrAwina oVppaMxaxa karAru kAgaxa pawragalYannu xqDapadisabeku .
Aru - baMdavAlYaxa veVccavannu sari Agi leVkkakkeV weVgeVxukoVMdixeVyo illavo eVMbuxannu nodabeku .
elYu - kaMxAyaxa veVccagalYu Axa kUli , saMbalYa , vixyuw muMwAxa avaSyaka vaswugalYa purAveV pAvawigalYannu idalAgixeVye eVMbuxannu wilYixukoVlYlYabeku .
eVMtu - prawiyoVMxu AswigalYa meleV savakalYi weVgeVxixeVyo illavo eVMbuxannu parIkRisabeku .
oVMBawwu - pAna , bIdi , sodA , sEkal , cahA , guwwigeVxArariMxa baruva uwpannavannu pariSIlisabeku .
hawwu - tiketina puswakaxa xara sWAnavannu parIkRisabeku .
hannoVMxu - calanaciwra nirmApakarigeV aWavA viwarakarigeV muMgada Agi haNa koVttixxareV moVxalu karAru pawragalYannu pariSIlisabeku .
hanneVradu - sinemA atogrAPik kAyxeVya prakAra eVlla noMxaNi puswaka idabeku .
hAgeV ittixeVyo illavo eVMbuxannu nodabeku .
haximUru - pravAsi ciwra maMxira ixxareV , myAnejaranu oVppisixa leVkka xqDapadisabeku .
haxinAlku - vArRika leVkka pawravu nEjaweV mawwu vAswavikaweVyannu worisuwwaxeVyo illavo eVMbuxannu KAwari mAdikoVlYlYabeku .
haxinExu - oVttu kUruva sWalYaxa saMKyeV , koVtta manaraMjaneVya weVrigeV prawi praxarSanaxiMxa baMxa nagaxu haNa ivu eVllavugalYa meliMxa ciwra maMxiraxa oVttu uwpannaxa aMxAju mAdabeku .
haxinAru - ciwra maMxira bAdigeVyiMxa padeVxixxareV bAdigeV karAru pawra mawwu axakkAgi koVduva nagaxu bAdigeV veVccavannu pariSIlisabeku .
upahAra gqhagalYu upahAra gqhagalYa leVkkavu alli nadeVyuva vyavahAragalYannu avalaMbisiruvuxu .
iMWa gqhagalYalli upahAra , Uta , vasawi , seVreV , maxya pAnIyagalYa kudiwa nadeVyuvuvu .
ivu allaxeV maxuveVya samAraMBagalYu iwara sArvajanika niyamiwa saBeV muMwAxa kAryagalYu nadeVyuvuvu .
hIgeV bereV bereV viXaxiMxa AxAyavu baruvuxu .
kAraNa , AxAya mawwu veVccavannu viMgadisalpatta nagaxu puswaka , KarIxi puswaka , iwyAxigalYalli bareVyalAguvuxu .
AxxariMxa leVkka pariSoXakanu I keVlYagina aMSagalYannu gamanaxalli idabeku .
oVMxu AMwarika niyaMwraNa paxXawi mawwu axara pariNAmaxa baggeV wilYixukoVlYlYabeku .
eVradu upahAra gqhagalYu iduva leVkkaxa viXAna wilYiyabeku .
mUru nagaxu gumAswaru grAhakariMxa haNa padeVva viXAna wilYiyabeku .
nAlku AhAra paxArWa , pAwreV mawwu maxyagalYa saluvAgi mAduva Karcina viXAna wilYiyabeku .
Exu aByAgawara saluvAgi anusarisuva viXAna , grAhakariMxa mawwu aByAgawariMxa padeVxa haNa ivugalYannu nagaxu puswakaxiMxa wilYixu koVlYlYabeku .
Aru maxyaxa aMgadi , biliyarda , Uta , upahAraxiMxa baMxa nagaxu haNavannu kArban nakalu pAvawiyiMxa xqDapadisabeku .
elYu baMdavAlYaxa veVccavannu prawyekisi axannu sari Axa leVkkakkeV vargAyisabeku .
eVMtu kUli , saMbalYa pAvawi mAdixxannu Kaciwa padisikoVlYlYabeku .
oVMBawwu saraku xAswAnu , maxya , sigaretu , AhAra sAmagri , glAs , pletu , hAsigeV sAmAnugalYu , pITopakaraNagalYu iwyAxigalYa baggeV prawyakRavAgi pariSIlisabeku .
hawwu sAkaRtu pramANaxalli savakalYi weVgeVxixeVyo illavoV eVMbuxannu wilYixukoVlYlYabeku .
hannoVMxu nagaxu puswaka mawwu kitaki KAweVgalYannu parIkRisabeku .
hanneVradu cillareV veVccagalYigAgi ittiruva leVkka pawravannu pariSIlisabeku .
haximUru vArRika leVkka pawravu nEjaweVyannu worisuvuxo illavo eVMbuxannu xqDapadisabeku .
14 bAdigeV AXAraxa meleV aWavA guwwigeV AXAraxa meleV upahAra gqhagalYixxareV , karAru pawragalYannu parIkRisabeku .
haxinExu suMkaxa niyamagalYa prakAra suMka AXAriwa sarakugalYannu xAswAnu mAdiruvaro illavo eVMbuxannu wilYixukoVlYlYabeku .
i AspawreVgalYu iMWa saMsWeVgalYa leVkka pawravannu pariSIlisuvAga avugalYa noMxaNi kAgaxa pawra mawwu avugalYannu sWApisuva uxxeSa , avugalYannu nadeVsalu mAdikoVMda niyamAvalYigalYannu wilYixukoVlYlYabeku .
kAraNa leVkka pariSoXakanu keVlYagina aMSagalYannu wilYixukoVlYlYabeku .
oVMxu rasIxi puswakaxa neVraviniMxa oVttu saMxAya Axa nagaxu haNa eVRtu mawwu nagaxu puswakaxalli namUxisixa haNa eVRtu eVMbuxannu wilYixukoVMdu pariSIlisabeku .
eVradu iwara bereV mUlagalYiMxa padeVxa baddi , lABAMSa mawwu bAdigeV iwyAxigalYannu xqDapadisabeku .
mUru xAna Agi mawwu vaMwigeVyiMxa baMxa haNa eVRtu eVMbuxannu Kaciwa padisikoVlYlYabeku .
nAlku AswigalYa mawwu baMdavAlYa pawragalYiMxa baruva AxAya eVRtu eVMbuxannu wilYixukoVlYlYabeku .
Exu sWAnika saMsWeVgalYiMxa mawwu sarakAraxiMxa baMxa sahAyaXanavu sari Agi leVkkapawra AgixeVye eVMbuxannu nodabeku .
Aru eVlla KarIxigeV sari Axa pAvawi mawwu anumawi ixeVyo illavo eVMbuxannu parIkRisabeku .
elYu xAswAnugalYa sarakugalYannu xqDIkarisabeku .
eVMtu saMbalYa , kUli iwyAxigalYa baggeVyU pariSIlisabeku .
oVMBawwu kaMxAya mawwu baMdavAlYaxa veVccagalYannu sari Agi viBajisalu AgixeVyo illavo eVMbuxannu parIkRisabeku .
hawwu aMxAju pawrikeVyalli hAsigeV hAgU vExyakIya salakaraNeVgalYigeV heVccina pAlu weVgeVxixeVyo eVMbuxannu nodabeku .
hannoVMxu AswigalYa meleV sAkaRtu savakalYi weVgeVxirisixeVyo hegeV eVMbuxannu pariSIlisabeku .
hanneVradu koVneVyaxAgi GatanA pawrikeV mawwu AMwarika niyamagalYa pawrikeVyaMweV AdalYiwa nadeVyuwwixeVyo illavo eVMbuxannu Kaciwa padisikoVlYlYabeku .
Pa XarmArWa saMsWeVgalYu ; XarmArWa saMsWeVgalYannu leVkka pariSoXaneV mAduvAga leVkka pariSoXakanu I keVlYagina aMSagalYannu gamanisabeku .
oVMxu kAnUnina xqRtiyiMxa iMWa saMsWeVgalYu sArvajanika XarmArWa saMsWeVgalYo aWavA KAsagi saMsWeVgalYo eVMbuxannu Kaciwa padisikoVlYlYabeku .
eVradu saMsWeVgalYa saMviXAna , nibaMXaneV mawwu nyAsapawragalYannu kUlaMkaRavAgi pariSIlisabeku .
3 I XarmArWa saMsWeVgalYu bereV bereV saMGa saMsWeVgalYiMxa sarakAraxiMxa enAxarU Xana sahAya padeVyuwwiveVyo , illave wamma uwpannaxiMxale saMsWeVyannu nadeVsuwwiveVyo eVMbuxannu wilYixukoVlYlYabeku .
nAlku AxAya mawwu veVccaxa baggeV AMwarika niyaMwraNa hegeV ixeV eVMbuxannu wilYixukoVlYlYabeku .
Exu xeNigeV rUpaxiMxa mawwu vaMwigeV rUpaxiMxa padeVxa eVlla haNavannu nagaxu puswakaxalli namUxisixeVyo illavo eVMbuxannu pAvawi puswakaxiMxa xqDapadisabeku .
Aru upayogisaxe ixxa eVlla pAvawi puswakagalYu hoVNeVgAra aXikAriya aXInaxalliveVyo illavo eVMbuxannu Kaciwa padisikoVlYlYabeku .
elYu baMdavAlYa pawragalYa melina AxAya , TevaNi melina baddi , kattadagalYa bAdigeV mawwu iwara bAbwugalYiMxa baMxa haNavu nagaxu puswakaxalli xAKaleV AgixeVyo hegeV eVMbuxannu nodabeku .
eVMtu baMdavAlYa pawragalYa melina lABAMSavannu padeVxAga mawwu axaralli varamAna weVrigeVya kadiwa AgixxareV , A haNavannu varamAna weVrigeVya aXikArigalYiMxa padeVxixeVyo hegeV eVMbuxannu pariSIlisabeku .
oVMBawwu AdalYiwa veVcca mawwu XarmArWaxa saluvAgi mAdixa veVccagalYannu xqDapadisabeku .
hawwu sWira mawwu cara AswigalYa yAxi mAdi avugalYa meleV savakalYi weVgeVxixeVyo eVMbuxannu parIkRisabeku .
hannoVMxu nagaxu haNaxa Silkannu prawyakRavAgi eVNisi KAwari mAdikoVlYlYabeku .
hanneVradu I saMsWeVgalYigeV saMbaMXisixaMweV rAjya sarakAragalYa kAyxeV ixxareV axakkeV anuguNavAgi leVkkapawra itta baggeV pariSIlisabeku .
haximUru mqwyu pawragalYiMxa baMxa AswigalYannu saMbaMXisixa pawravyavahAragalYannu aByasisi goVwwu mAdikoVlYlYabeku .
ga SEkRaNika saMsWeVgalYu - keVlavu saMsWeVgalYu XarmArWa xawwi kAyxeVya anvaya mawwu iwara keVlavu sarakAri saMGagalYa kAyxeVya anvaya SEkRaNika saMsWeVgalYannu nadeVsuwwixxu , avugalYannu nAvu SEkRaNika saMsWeVgalYu eVMxu kareVyuwweveV .
SEkRaNika saMsWeVgalYa leVkka pariSoXaneV mAduvAga leVkka pariSoXakanu pAlisuva karwavyagalYu keVlYaginaMweV iveV .
oVMxu saMsWeVgeV saMbaMXisixa kAnUnu pawragalYannu saMviXAna , mAnyaweV padeVxa pawra , sarakAraxoVMxigeV Axa oVppaMxaxa pawragalYannu aByAsa mAdabeku .
eVradu saMsWeVya AdalYiwa maMdalYiya nIwi niyamAvalYigalYannu mawwu aXiniyamagalYannu pariSIlisabeku .
mUru leVkka pawragalYannu iduva paxXawiyannu wilYixukoVlYlYabeku .

A naMwara haNa ulYixareV , axannu sAmAnya SeruxArarigeV avara SerugalYa moVwwavannu koVdalu upayogisalAguvuxu .
hIgeV praWama hakkina SeruxAraru nirxiRta padisixa lABAMSavannu prapraWamavAgi padeVyalu hAgU kaMpaniyannu muccuva saMxarBaxalli wamma SerugalYa haNavannu vApassu padeVyalu viSeRa hakkugalYannu padeVxiruwwAreV .
sAmAnya SerugalYigeV yAva AxyaweVgalYU iruvuxilla .
aMxareV sAmAnya SeruxAraru lABAMSavannu padeVyalu mawwu kaMpaniyannu muccuva saMxarBaxalli wamma SerugalYa moVwwavannu vApassu padeVyalu viSeRa hakkugalYannu padeVxiruvuxilla .
avaru padeVyuva lABAMSaxa xaravu nirxiRtavAgi iruvuxilla .
axu varRavarRavU baxalAguwwA hoguwwaxeV .
nirxiRta padisixa lABAMSavannu praWama hakkina SeruxArarigeV koVtta naMwara bahalYaRtu lABa ulYixareV , Aga sAmAnya SeruxAraru heVccu xaraxa lABAMSavannu padeVyuwwAreV .
kadimeV lABa ulYixareV , avaru kadimeV xaraxa lABAMSavannu padeVyuwwAreV .
lABa enU ulYiyaxeV ixxareV avaru lABAMSavanne padeVyuvuxilla .
SerugalYannu nIduvuxu sAmAnya Agi kaMpaniyu wanna SerugalYannu koVMdukoVlYlYalu sArvajanikarigeV AhvAnisixAga , Serina mOlyavannu oVMxe kaMwinalli koVdabeku eVMxu helYuvuxilla .
kaMpaniyu Serina mOlyavannu sAmAnya Agi nAlku aWavA Exu kaMwugalYalli weVgeVxukoVlYlYuwwaxeV .
axu moVxalaneVya kaMwannu arjiya joVweVgeV weVgeVxukoVlYlYuwwaxeV .
ixakkeV SerugalYa arjiya kaMwu eVMxu kareVyuwwAreV .
sArvajanikaru kaMpaniya SerugalYannu koVlYlYalu icCisixAga avaru kaMpanigeV arjiyannu mAdabekAguwwaxeV .
A arjiyoVdaneV prawi SerigeV iMwiRtu eVMxu haNa kalYisi koVduwwAreV .
eVRtu kalYisi koVdabeku eVMbuxannu vivaraNA pawrikeVyalli sUcisalAgiruwwaxeV .
avara arjiyu svIkqwa Agi avaru kelYixaRtu SerugalYu avarigeV sikkareV , avaru eVradaneVya kaMwannu kaMpanigeV kalYisi koVduwwAreV .
ixakkeV ' SerugalYa viwaraNeVya kaMwu ` eVMxu kareVyuwwAreV .
A naMwara kaMpaniyu wanageV agawya eVnisixAga Serina ulYixa haNa SeruxArariMxa eVradu mUru kaMwugalYalli padeVxukoVlYlYuwwaxeV .
ivugalYigeV ' SerugalYa melina kareVgalYu ' eVMxu kareVyuwwAreV .
ivugalYalli moVxalina kareVgeV ' praWama kareV ' eVMxU , eVradaneVya kareVgeV ' xviwIya kareV ' eVMxU mawwu koVneVya kareVgeV ' koVneVya kareV ' eVMxu kareVyuwwAreV .
I prakAra kaMpaniyu wanna Serina haNavannu kaMwugalYa mUlaka padeVxukoVlYlYuwwaxeV .
a ) praWama kaMwu : ixakkeV ' SerugalYa arjiya haNa ' eVMxu heVsaru .
ixu kaniRTa Se. 5raRtu AxarU iralebeku .
arjixArarigeV SerugalYannu haMcixa naMwara kaMpaniyu avariMxa SerigeV iMwiRtu eVMxu mawwiRtu haNavannu padeVyuwwaxeV .
ka ) praWama kareV : SerugalYannu arjixArarigeV haMcixa naMwara mawwu SeruxAraru viwaraNeVya kaMwannu koVtta naMwara , keVlavu samayaxa naMwara , kaMpaniyu SeruxArarigeV prawi SerigeV iMwiRtu haNa kalYisi koVdabeku eVMba kareVyannu nIduwwaxeV .
ixakkeV ' praWama kareV ' eVMxu heVsaru .
da ) xviwIya kareV : praWama kareVyAxa naMwara , keVla avaXiya naMwara , kaMpaniya SeruxArarigeV prawi SerigeV iMwiRtu eVMxu mawweV haNa kalYisi koVdalu kareV koVduwwaxeV .
ixakkeV ' xviwIya kareV ' eVMxu heVsaru .
i ) koVneVya kareV : kaMpaniya SeruxArarigeV wamma Serina meleV ulYixa haNavannu koVdabeku eVMxu kareV nIduwwaxeV .
iMwaha kareVgeV ' koVneVya kareV ' eVMxu heVsaru .
SeruxAraru kaMpanigeV wamma SerugalYa meleV koVdabekAxa koVneVya kaMwina haNave koVneVya kareV AgiruwwaxeV .
bAkiyalli iruva mawwu muMgada baMxa kareVgalYu kaMpaniyu SeruxArarigeV haNavannu kalYisi koVdalu kareV nIdixAga haNa kalYisi koVduva koVneVya xinAMkavannU prakatisuwwaxeV .
koVneVya xinAMkaxa oVlYagAgiye SeruxAraru sAmAnya kareVya haNavannu kaMpanigeV kalYisi koVduvuxu uMtu .
AxareV keVlavu SeruxAraru ixakkeV wappabahuxu .
aMWavaru koVneVya xinAMkaxa oVlYageV kareVya haNavannu koVdalu wappixAga , aMWavaru koVdabekAxa kareVya haNakkeV ' bAki niMwiruva kareVgalYu ' eVMxu kareVyuwwAreV .
innu keVlavu SeruxAraru wamma SerugalYa melina kareVya haNavannu muMgadavAgiye kaMpanigeV kalYisi koVdabahuxu .
hIgeV muMgada kalYisixa kareVya haNakkeV ' muMgada baMxa kareVgalYu ' eVMxu kareVyuwwAreV .
muMgadavAgi baMxa kareVgalYa haNavannu oVMxu prawyeka KAweVgeV jameV bareVyabeku .
axannu muMgada baMxa kareVgalYa KAweVgeV jameV bareVxu axannu aDAveV pawrikeVyalli pAvawi Axa baMdavAlYaxa keVlYageV prawyekavAgi worisabeku .
muMxeV A saMbaMXisixa kareVyannu mAdixAga , muMgada baMxa kareVgalYa KAweVgeV Karcu mawwu saMbaMXisixa kareVya KAweVgeV jameV bareVyabeku .
Aga muMgada baMxa kareVgalYa KAweVyu muccalpaduvu .
kaMpaniyu muMgada baMxa kareVgalYa haNaxa meleV Se. 6ra baddiyannu koVdabekAguwwaxeV .
AxareV bAki niMwiruva kareVgalYa haNaxa meleV kaMpaniyu Se. 6raMweV aWavA axakkiMwalU kadimeV xaraxiMxa baddiyannu Akarisabahuxu .
AxareV baddiyannu Akarisaleku eVMba niyama illa .
SerugalYannu nIduva viXAnagalYu - kaMpeVniyu wanna SerugalYannu mUru bageVyAgi sArvajanikarigeV nIdabahuxu .
axu wanna SerugalYannu muKabeVleVgeV nIdabahuxu .
aWavA sodigeV aMxareV muKa beVleVgiMwa kadimeV beVleVgeV nIdabahuxu .
aWavA muKa beVleVgiMwa heVccina beVleVgeV nIdabahuxu .
ixannu oVMxu uxAharaNeVyiMxa spaRtavAgi wilYixukoVlYlYabahuxu .
oVMxu Serina mOlya 100 rU ixeV eVMxu wilYiyoNa .
axannu sArvajanikarigeV nUru rUpAyige koVMdukoVlYlYalu AhvAnisixareV , axakkeV ' muKa beVleVgeV SerugalYa nIdikeV ' eVMxu kareVyuwwAreV .
oVMxu velYeV kaMpaniyu axannu sArvajanikarigeV 95 rUgalYigeV koVMdukoVlYlYalu AhvAnisixareV , axakkeV ' sodiya beVleVgeV aWavA kadimeV beVleVgeV SerugalYa nIdikeV ' eVMxu kareVyuwwAreV .
kaMpaniyu axannu sArvajanikarigeV 105 rUgalYigeV koVMdukoVlYlYalu AhvAnisixareV , axakkeV ' heVccina beVleVgeV SerugalYa nIdikeV ' eVMxu kareVyuwwAreV .
sodiya beVleVgeV SerugalYa nIdikeV wanna SerugalYannu muKa beVleVgiMwa kadimeV beVleVgeV mArAta mAdabekAxareV kaMpaniyu keVlYagina niyamagalYannu anusarisabeku .
sAmAnya Agi kaMpaniyu wanna SerugalYannu muKa beVleVgiMwa kadimeV beVleVgeV mArAta mAduvuxilla .
hoVsaxAgi prAraMBisalpatta kaMpaniyaMwU kAnUnina prakAra wanna SerugalYannu muKa beVleVgiMwa kadimeV beVleVgeV mArAta mAdalAraxu .
hAgeV mAdixareV axu kAnUnina viruxXa AguwwaxeV .
aswiwvaxallixxa mawwu I moVxale wanna SerugalYannu mArAta mAdixa kaMpaniyu mAwra wanna SerugalYannu sodigeV mArAta mAdabahuxu .
Aga keVlYageV koVtta niyamagalYannu axu pAlisabekAguwwaxeV .
1 ) kaMpaniyu sAmAnya saBeVyalli saxasyaru I baggeV TarAvannu pAsu mAdabeku mawwu kortina appaNeVyannu padeVyabeku .
2 ) sAmAnya saBeVyalli saxasyaru pAsu mAdixa goVwwuvalYiyalli sodiya xaravannu nigaxi mAdabeku .
sodiya xaravu Se. 10kkiMwalU heVccu AgirabAraxu .
3 ) kaMpaniyu vyavahAravannu prAraMBisixa kaniRTa oVMxu varRa Axa naMwara wanna SerugalYannu sodigeV mArAta mAdabahuxu .
4 ) kortina appaNeVyannu padeVxa eVradu wiMgalYa oVlYagAgi kaMpaniyu wanna SerugalYannu sodigeV mArAta mAdabahuxu .
heVccina beVleVgeV SerugalYa nIdikeV kaMpaniyu wanna SerugalYannu muKa beVleVgiMwalU heVccina beVleVgeV mArAta mAdabahuxu .
Aga keVlYageV koVtta niyamagalYannu axu anusarisabekAguwwaxeV .
1 ) yAva kaMpani AxarU wanna SerugalYannu muKa beVleVgiMwalU heVccina beVleVgeV mArAta mAdabahuxu .
aMxareV hoVsaxAgi sWApisalpatta kaMpaniyu saha wanna SerugalYannu I rIwiyAgi mArAta mAdabahuxu .
2 ) hIgeV heVccigeV padeVxukoVMda haNavannu prawyekavAxa KAweV oVMxannu weVreVxu axakkeV jameV mAdabeku .
3 ) primiyam haNavannu keVlavoVMxu uxxeSagalYigAgi mAwra upayogisabeku .
uxAharaNeVgeV , saxasyarigeV bonas SerugalYannu koVduvuxakkAgi axannu upayogisabahuxu aWavA kaMpaniyannu sWApisixa veVccagalYannu woVdeVxu hAkalu axannu upayogisabahuxu .
SerugalYa mArAtaxa baggeV mAduva jamA Karcu kaMpaniyu wanna SerugalYannu sAmAnya Agi nagaxu haNakkeV mArAta mAduvuxu uMtu .
AxareV keVlavoVMxu sala axu Aswiyannu koVMdAga A Aswiya beVleVyannu nagaxu rUpaxalli koVduvaxara baxalu SerugalYa rUpaxalli koVduvaxu uMtu .
sAmAnya Agi oVppaMxavannu barahaxalli iduvaxakkeV pAlugAraru icCisuwwAreV .
ekeVMxareV muMxeV saMBavisabahuxAxa wappu wilYuvalYikeV aWavA vAxa - vivAxagalYannu sulaBavAgi nivArisalu liKiwa oVppaMxavu bahalYa neVravu Aguvuxu .
oVppaMxavu barahaxalli ixxareV Aga pAlugArikeVya kAnUninalli koVtta mAxariya oVppaMxavu mAwra anvayisalpaduwwaxeV .
pAlugArikeVya oVppaMxavu saMsWeVya oVlYAdalYiwaxa baggeVyU hAgU pAlugArara hakku - bAXyaweVgalYa baggeVyU niyamagalYannu oVlYagoVMdiruwwaxeV .
pAlugArikeVya oVppaMxavu sAmAnya Agi keVlYagina aMSagalYa baggeV beVlYakannu ceVlluwwaxeV .
1 ) pAlugArikeVya heVsaru , vyavahAraxa sWalYa mawwu vyavahAraxa svarUpa .
2 ) pAlugArara heVsaru mawwu vilYAsa .
3 ) pAlugAraru woVdagisuva baMdavAlYa .
4 ) vyavahAraxalli Axa lABavannu haMcikoVlYlYuva pramANa .
5 ) pAlugAraru aXika baMdavAlYa mawwu sAla koVduva baggeV niyamagalYu .
6 ) pAlugAraru wamma svaMwaxa KarcigAgi hiMweVgeVxukoVlYlYuva haNaxa miwi .
7 ) baMdavAlYa , hiMweVgeVxukoVMda haNa , sAlaxa moVwwa ivugalYa meleV AkarisabekAxa baddi .
8 ) pAlugArarigeV saMbalYa , xallAlYi aWavA bonas koVduvuxixxareV axara baggeV niyamAvalYigalYu .
9 ) jamA Karcina avaXi .
10 ) pAlugArikeVya visarjaneVya niyamagalYu .
11 ) pAlugAraralli uxBavisuva vAxa - vivAxagalYannu bageVharisuva viXAna .
12 ) leVkka pawragalYannu iduva viXAna , iwyAxi .
pAlugArikeVya oVppaMxa illaxixxalli pAlugAraru anusarisabekAxa niyamagalYu pAlugAraralli liKiwa oVppaMxa ixxareV axaralli namUxisixa karArugalYannu eVlla pAlugArarU anusarisabekAguwwaxeV .
I oVppaMxave avara naduvina saMbaMXavannU mawwu saMsWeVya vyavahAravannU niyaMwrisuwwaxeV .
iMwaha oVppaMxavannu bareVyuvAga pAlugAraru bahalYa jAgraweV vahisuwwAreV .
muMxeV AgabahuxAxa wappu wilYuvalYikeV aWavA yAvuxe waMteVgalYannu sulaBavAgi nivArisuvaMweV aWavA aMwaha wappu wilYuvalYikeV mawwu vAxa - vivAxagalYigeV avakASave sigaxaMweV oVppaMxaxalli eVlla viRayagalYU serpadeV AguvaMweV nodikoVlYlYuwwAreV .
AxareV eVRte muMjAgraweV vahisixarU keVlavu sala oVppaMxaxalli illaxa parisWiwi uxBavisabahuxu .
iMwaha prasaMgaxalli pAlugAraru kAnUnina moVreV hogabekAguwwaxeV .
illaveV wamma wammalliye axannu bageVharisikoVlYlYabahuxu .
hIgeV pAlugArikeVya oVppaMxavu pAlugArikeVya walYahaxi AgixeV .
AxareV oVMxu velYeV pAlugAraralli yAvuxe viRayaxa baggeV oVppaMxa AgiraxixxareV aWavA keVlavoVMxu viRayagalYa baggeV oVppaMxaxalli bareVyuvuxannu bittixxareV , Aga 1932ra BArawaxa pAlugArikeVya kAnUnina prakAra keVlYageV koVtta niyamagalYu anvayisuwwaveV .
1 . eVlla pAlugAraru saMsWeVya lABavannu samAnavAgi haMcikoVlYlYabeku .
2 . wanna saMsWeVya vyavahAraxalli sakriyavAgi BAgavahisalu mawwu wanna karwavyavannu nirvahisalu prawi oVbba pAlugAranigU hakku ixeV .
3 . pAlugAraralli oVppaMxa iraxa hoVrawu , yAva pAlugAranigU wanna saMsWeVya vyavahAraxalli seveV sallisixa baggeV saMBAvaneV kelYuva hakku illa .
4 . pAlugAraralli oVppaMxa iraxixxareV , pAlugArarigeV wamma baMdavAlYaxa meleV baddiyannu kelYuva aXikAra illa .
axe prakAra avaru wamma svaMwaxa KarcigeV hiMweVgeVxukoVMda haNaxa meleV saMsWeVgeV baddi koVdalu bAXyasWaru Aguvuxilla .
5 , pAlugAranu saMsWeVgeV sAlavannu koVttalli , axara meleV SekadA 6raMweV avanigeV saMsWeVyu baddiyannu koVdabekAguwwaxeV .
6 , pAlugArikeVya vyavahAraxa eVlla leVkkaxa puswakagalYannu mawwu kAgaxa pawragalYannu saMsWeVyu vyavahAraxa muKya sWalYaxalli idabeku mawwu prawi oVbba pAlugAranigU saMsWeVya leVkkaxa puswaka mawwu kAgaxa pawragalYannu parIkRisuva hakku ixeV .
pAlugArikeVya jamA Karcu sAmAnyavAgi ekavyakwi oVdeVwanaxa saMsWeV mawwu pAlugArikeV saMsWeVya jamA KarcugalYalli yAva vyawyAsavU illa .
paxXawiya prakAra , jamA Karcina eVlla puswakagalYannU pAlugArikeVyalli idalAguwwaxeV .
AxareV aveVllavugalYannu saMsWeVya heVsarinalli idalAguwwaxeV .
varRAMwyakkeV paxXawiya prakAra , wAlYeVpatti , vyApAri KAweV , lABa - naRtaxa KAweV mawwu Aswi - javAbxAri waHKweV aMxareV aDAveV pawrikeVgalYannu wayArisalAguwwaxeV .
mawwu nivvalYa lABavannu pAlugAraralli avaru oVppikoVMda pramANaxalli haMcalAguwwaxeV .
axannu prawi oVbba pAlugArana KAweVgeV vargAyisalAguwwaxeV .
I prakAra , pAlugArikeVyalli jamA Karcannu eka vyakwi oVdeVwanaxa saMsWeVyalliyaMweVye ittarU , keVlavoVMxu avaSyaka baxalAvaNeVyannu mAdabekAguwwaxeV .
axannu keVlYageV vivarisixeV .
pAlugArara baMdavAlYa KAweVgalYu pAlugArikeVya vyavahAraxalli prawiyoVbba pAlugAranu eVRtu baMdavAlYa woVdagisabeku eVMbuxannu moVxale nirXarisalAguwwaxeV .
eVlla pAlugAraru samAnavAgiye baMdavAlYavannu warabeku eVMba niyama enU illa .
aWavA avaru lABavannu haMcikoVlYlYuva pramANaxalliye baMdavAlYavannu warabeku eVMba niyamavU illa .
aneka saMxarBagalYalli pAlugAraru sama pramANaxalli baMdavAlYavannu woVdagisi , asama pramANaxalli lABa haMcikoVlYlYabahuxu .
aWavA innu keVlavu saMxarBagalYalli avaru asama pramANaxalli baMdavAlYavannu woVdagisi , sama pramANaxalli lABavannu haMcikoVlYlYabahuxu .
aWavA innu keVlavu saMxarBagalYalli , yAvane oVbba pAlugAranu baMdavAlYavannu woVdagisaxe lABaxalli BAgavahisabahuxu .
iMwaha pAlugAranu sAmAnya Agi vyavahAraxalli wajFa AxavanU , leVkka pawra ballavanU AgiruwwAneV .
AxxariMxa pAlugAranu Agalu baMdavAlYavannu waralebeku eVMba kaddAya illa .
oVttinalli helYabeku eVMxareV prawiyoVbba pAlugAranu eVRteVRtu baMdavAlYavannu warabeku eVMbuxannu pAlugAraru wammoVlYage moVxalu nirXarisikoVlYlYuwwAreV .
prawiyoVbba pAlugArana heVsarinalli oVMxu baMdavAlYa KAweVyannu weVreVyalAguvuxu mawwu avanu woVdagisixa baMdavAlYavannu avana baMdavAlYa KAweVgeV jameV bareVyalAguvuxu .
baMdavAlYaxa melina baddi keVlavu saMxarBagalYalli wAvu woVdagisixa baMdavAlYaxa meleV pAlugAraru baddiyannu weVgeVxukoVlYlYalu oVppaMxa mAdikoVMdiruwwAreV mawwu baddiya xaravannU saha nigaxi mAdiruwwAreV .
vyavahAraxa lABavannu hegeV ixxarU eVlla pAlugArarU haMcikoVlYlYuvaxariMxa baMdavAlYaxa meleV baddiyannu mawwe ekeV Akarisabeku eVMba praSneV uxBavisuwwaxeV .
I praSneVgeV keVlYagina vivaraNeV nIdalAgixeV .
a ) pAlugAraru asama pramANaxalli baMdavAlYavannu woVdagisi sama pramANaxalli lABavannu haMcikoVlYlYuwwA irabahuxu , iMwaha saMxarBaxalli heVccu baMdavAlYavannu woVdagisi pAlugAranigeV baMdavAlYaxa pramANakkeV wakkaMweV lABa siguvuxilla AxxariMxa wanageV anyAya AguwwaxeV eVMxu avanu BAvisuwwAneV .
iMwaha BAvaneVyiMxa vyavahAraxalli viRama vAwAvaraNavannu uMtu mAdabahuxAgixeV .

ba ) keVlavu sala , pAlugAraru sama pramANaxalli baMdavAlYa woVdagisi asama pramANaxalli lABavannu haMcikoVlYlYuwwA irabahuxu .

avana asaMwoRavannu nivArisalu baMdavAlYaxa meleV baddiyannu koVdalAguwwaxeV .
ka ) innu keVlavu sala , pAlugAraru sama pramANaxalli baMdavAlYavannu woVdagisi , sama pramANaxalliye lABavannu haMcikoVlYlYuwwA irabahuxu .
iMwaha saMxarBaxalliyU saha baMdavAlYaxa meleV baddiyannu Akarisuvaxu yogya eVMxu worisi koVdabahuxu .
baMdavAlYaxa meleV baddiyannu AkaraNeV mAduvuxariMxa saMsWeVya vyavahAravu wulanAwmakavAgi lABaxAyakavAgi nadeVxixeVyo illavo eVMbuxannu kaMdu hidiyalu sAXya AguwwaxeV .
pAlugArikeVya vyavahAraxalli woVdagisalpatta baMdavAlYavannu sarakAri sAla pawra aWavA kaMpanigalYa Seru aWavA dibeVMcarugalYalli woVdagisixxareV aWavA byAMkinalli TevaNi eVMxu ittixxareV pAlugAraru keVlavoVMxu moVwwaxa AxAyavannu padeVyuwwixxaru .
iMwaha AxAyakkiMwalU pAlugArikeV AxAyavu aMxareV lABaxa pramANavu heVccu ixxareV mAwra pAlugArikeVyalli baMdavAlYavannu woVdagisixuxu yogya eVMxu kaMdubaruwwaxeV .
I prakAra wulanAwmaka Agi lABaxa pramANavannu kaMdu hidixu , pAlugArikeVya vyavahAraxa baggeV yogya nirNaya kEkoVlYlYalu pAlugArarigeV sAXya .
prawiyoVbba pAlugArana baMdavAlYaxa meleV nirxiRta padisixa xaraxa prakAra baddiyannu Akarisi , axannu pAlugArana baMdavAlYaxa KAweVgeV jameV bareVxu , baMdavAlYaxa meleV baddiya KAweVgeV Karcu bareVyalAguvuxu .

aMwaha oVppaMxa AgixxareV , baddiyannu leVkka mAdi , pAlugArana Kuxxu KAweV aWavA svaMwaxa KAweVgeV Karcu bareVxu , Kuxxu KAweVya melina baddi ' ya KAweVya jameV bareVyalAguvuxu .
ixu pAlugArikeVya vyavahAraxa xqRtiyiMxa AxAyaxa kalamu agiruvuxariMxa axannu lABanaRta KAweVgeV vargAyisalAguvuxu .

sAmAnya Agi I paxXawiyanne eVllarU anusarisuvuxu uMtu .

lABa aWavA naRtavannu haMcuvuxu pAlugAraru lABa aWavA naRtavannu hegeV haMcikoVlYlYabeku eVMbuxu avaru mAdikoVMda oVppaMxavannu avalaMbisixeV .

a ) heVccu kadimeV Aguwwiruva baMdavAlYa paxXawi ; I paxXawiyalli , prawi oVbba pAlugArana heVsariniMxa eVradu KAweVgalYannu weVreVyalAguvuxu : 1 ) pAlugArana baMdavAlYa KAweV mawwu 2 ) pAlugArana Kuxxu KAweV .

hiMxina xivasa samAraMBaxa gadibidiyiMxAgi kUlaMkaRavAgi A waMwiyannu aXyayana mAduva wAlYmeV - vyavaXAnagalYu iralilla eVMxu BAvisuvuxu uciwavU , sahajavU AgixeV .
AxareV , pawra vyavahAraxa mAXyamaxalli iMWa aspaRtaweVgeV aRtAgi eVdeV iruvuxilla - awiyAxa saMkRepaNa viXAnavannu ASrayisaxeV iruvuxariMxa hAgU agawyavAxa vivaragalYannu namUxisiruvuxariMxa , waMwi aWavA xUravANi vyavahAragalYigeV XqDIkaraNa agawya AguvuxakkeV ixU oVMxu kAraNa .

akRara anukramaxalli vargIkarisi koVttiruva I paxa puMjagalYu , nudigattugalYu mawwu avugalYigeV koVttiruva kannada paryAyagalYu , kannada I agawyagalYannu awyaMwa sulaBavAgiye pUrEsaballaxu eVMbuxannu nirxeSisuwwaveV .

I xqRtiyiMxa I keVlYagina uxAharaNeVgalYannu pariSIlisabahuxu : iMgliRina nudigattugalYaRte adaka Agiruvuvu : anumawi koVdalu Aguvuxilla woVMxareVgeV viRAxisixeV ukwa niyama svayaMpUrNa svayaMspaRta iMgliRigiMwalU heVccu pariNAmakAri Agiruvuvu : aXikArAvaXiyalli lopa xoRagalYa vinA kAnUnu sammawa halYawu praSneV elYuvuxilla iMWalleVlla yAMwrikavAgi kAryanirvahisalu avakASa iruvaMweVye , eVccarikeVyiMxa vyavaharisuvuxu agawya AguvaMWa saMxarBagalYU iveV eVMbuxu I uxAharaNeVgalYiMxa spaRta AguwwaxeV .

ekeVMxareV , ivu aMWa yAva samasyeVgalYannU sqRtisilla .
uxA : aXIkqwa keVlasa mAduwwiruvuxu hiMxina / moVxalina nirNayakkeV / wIrmAnakkeV aMtikoVMdiruvuxu niyamaviruxXa leVkkaxalli iruva rajeV halYawu kaCeri gamanisali mawwu paripAlisali vaMxaneV svIkarisu kaMdalli guMdidu pariSIlisixeV mawwu sariyAgixeV uxxeSapUrvaka asaddeV / nirlakRya pUrva - prawyayagalYu eVRtu bageVyalli kArya nirvahisuwwaveV eVMbuxannU , paxa puMjagalYannu sqRtisuva haMwaxiMxa innU oVMxu heVjjeV muMxeV hogi hegeV nudigattugalYannu rUpisuwwaveV eVMbuxannU mawwaRtu spaRtavAgi nirUpisuva saluvAgi eVMba pUrva prawyayavannU weVgeVxukoVlYlYabahuxu .
I keVlavu vAkyagalYannu pariSIlisi 1 e 2 e 3 e 4 e 5 e koVneVya vAkyaxa BARAMwaravannu oVMxu kRaNa baxigirisoNa .

uxAharaNeVgeV ' kE ' eVnnuva nAmapaxa mawwu axara nudigattugalYannu pariSIlisi kE eVwwu , kE mAdu , kE nIdu , kE koVdu , kE koVlYlYu , kE melAgu , kE oV mAdu , kE masagu , kE cAcu , kE jAru , kE nodu , kEyAreV , kE kattu , kE keVdisu , kEworu , kE jodisu , kE nadeV , kEmIru , kE sAru iwyAxigalYiMxAgi , namma BAReV eVRtu jIvaMwa AgixeV hAgU SrImaMwa AgixeV eVMbuxannu iMWa saMxarBagalYu nixarSisuwwaveV .

uxA : viRaya : ippawwu aMSagalYa ArWika kArya jAriyalli vahisabekAxa pAwra .
praXAniyavara ippawwu aMSagalYa ArWika kAryakrama , grAmAMwara praxeSaxa janaweVya axarallU xurbala vargaxavara ArWika mawwu sAmAjika pragawigAgi eVMbuxannu mawwoVmmeV wilYiyapadisabekAgilla .
I kArya anvaya mawwu pragawiya vimarSeVgAgi rAjya sarkAraxavaru wAllUku hAgU jillA mattaxalli racisiruva samanvaya samiwigalYu IgAgale kAryAraMBa mAdiruwwaveV .

2 I kArya paMcAyiwi , yuvaka saMGa , mahilYA maMdalYigalYu , sahakAra saMsWeV mawwu samanvaya samiwiya saxasyarugalYu sakriyapAwra vahisuvaMweV mAduvuxu .
