mahArARtraxa samAja SikRaNa samiwiyiMxa akRara keMxragalYigeV viwaraNeVyAxa sAhiwyaxalli nigaxiyAxa BAgavannu nodikoVMdu bareVyuvuxu .
sarveVyalli akRarasWanannu guruwisalu keVlYagina aMSagalYu AXAra .
akRarasWa : salIsAgi oxaballavanu , innoVbbara sahAyaxiMxa oxuvanu , nodikoVMdu wappu illaxeV salIsAgi bareVyuvavanu aWavA svalpa kaRtaxiMxa wappu illaxeV bareVyuvavanu - ivaru sAkRaraweVyannu ulYisikoVMdiruvaru .
areV sAkRarasWa : niXAnavAgi pUrNa pyAsejannu aWavA axannu BAgaSaH oxaballavanu mawwu wappu illaxeV bareVyuvavanu .
avarigeV baravaNigeVyalli svalpa aByAsa beku .
anakRarasWaru : innoVbbara sahAya padeVxu oxubaraha mAdalAraxavaru , oxalu mawwu bareVyalu prayawna mAdaxixxavaru aMwahavaru nirakRaraweVgeV jAriruvavaru .
sarveVya prakAra akRarasWara vargIkaraNa varga : gaMdasaru , heVMgasaru , oVttu sAkRararu , 42 45.1 43.9 spalpa punaraByAsaxiMxa sAkRararAgaballavaru 43.5 34.1 38.0 anakRaraweVgeV jArixavaru 14.5 20.5 18.1 gaMdasarigiMwa heVccu pramANaxalli sAkRaraweVyannu ulYisikoVMdiruvaru , aMweVye anakRaraweVgeV jAriruvavaralli heVMgasare heVccu .
eVNikeV mAduvuxaralli kaMdubaMxa sAXaneV Sekada 1 , wappu illaxeV sulaBavAgi eVNikeV mAdaballavaru 49.02 , svalpa kaRta AxarU eVNikeV mAdaballavaru 20.53 , wappu illaxeV BAgaSaH eVNikeV mAdixavaru 11.04 , wappuwappAgi BAgaSaH eVNikeV mAdixavaru 7.45 , eVNikeV mAdalu prayawnavanne mAdaxixxavaru 12.1 .
saralYavAgi kUduva mawwu kalYeVyuva leVkka mAduvuxu Sekada aMSa .
saralYavAxa kUduva mawwu kalYeVyuva leVkka wappu illaxeV mAdixavaru 36 , niXAnavAgi wappu illaxeV kUduva ' 30.6 ' , kUduva mawwu kalYeVyuva leVkka mAdalAraxavaru 18.9 .
I , leVkka mAdalu prayawnavanne mAdaxavaru 13.9 navasAkRararalli kaMdubaMxa baxalAvaNeVgalYu navasAkRararu oxubaraha kaliyuva munna ixxuxakkiMwalU bahalYa mattigeV suXArisiruvaru .
bahumaMxi heVMgasaru mawwu gaMdasaru oVgeVxu SuBravAxa batteVyannu Xarisuva aByAsavannu , Suci Agiruvuxannu kaliwixxaru .
SoXisixa nIrannu balYasuvuxu goVwwu .
koVccuva kakkassugalYu balYakeVgeV baMxixxavu .
kAyi palyeVyannu oVlYlYeVya nIriniMxa woVlYeVxu upayogisuva paxXawi rUDigeV baMxiwu .
jamInina viswIrNa pAvawi mAdabekAxa kaMxAya , waMbAku mawwu bIdigeV veVcca mAduva haNa eVRtu eVMbuvuxu navasAkRararigeV iveVllaxara mAhiwi uMtu .
grAmINarigeV SikRaNaxa baggeV oVlavu mUdixeV .
avaru wamma makkalYannu SAleVgalYigeV kalYuhisuwwiruvaru .
I aMSa SAleVgeV hoVsaxAgi seriruva makkalYa saMKyeVya heVccalYaxiMxa vyakwa Ayiwu .
avaru wamma manassinalli iruvuxannu svalpa mattigAxarU aBivyakwapadisaballaru .
avaralli sAmAjika prajFeV mUdixeV .
vqwwapawrikeVgalYannu oxabeku eVMba manassu AgixeV .
wamma suwwamuwwa Aguwwixxa aBivqxXi kAryakramagalYa arivu AgixeV .
svalpamattigeV muMxAlYawvaxa manoBAva mUduwwixeV .
halYlYigaralli sahakAra manoBAva uMtAgixeV .
svAvalaMbigalYu Agalu prayawna nadeVxixeV .
avaru yojaneVgalYa baggeV wilYixukoVlYlYalu prayawna nadeVsixxAreV .
oVttinalli halYlYigalYa ciwra baxalAguwwA baMxiwu .
kurudu naMbikeVgalYu kadimeV AguwwA baMxavu .
grAmagalYalli nErmalya suXArisiwu .
aspqSyaweVya baggeV BAvaneV baxalAguwwA baMwu .
mahilYeVyaru GoRa paxXawiyannu kiwwoVgeVxaru .
kudiwa , jUju muMwAxa keVtta cAlYigalYu kadimeV Axavu .
gqhiNi ugrANaxalli adugeV sAmAnugalYannu hudukuvaMwilla .
dabbagalYa meleV sAmAnugalYa heVsarannu bareVxu hudukuva Srama kadimeV mAdikoVMdaru .
adugeV maneV gqhiNi vAcanAlaya Ayiwu .
adugeV mAduvAga biduvina velYeVyalli oxuva havyAsa mAdalAyiwu .
grAmagalYalli aBivqxXi kAryagalYu sparXA manoBAvaneVyiMxa nadeVxavu .
aMwaha sAXaneVyannu beVlYakigeV waruvuxu muKyavAxa oVMxu BAga .
ixariMxa A halYlYiyavarigU mawwu neVreVya grAmagalYigU aBivqxXi kAryaxa yaSassu manavarikeV Aguvuxu .
joVweVgeV muMxuvariyalu prowsAha xoVreVwaMweV Aguvuxu .
I xqRtiyiMxa pUrNa sAkRaraweVyannu galYisixa grAmagalYu grAmagOrava samAraMBagalYannu erpadisuvuxu eVMbuxAgi jillA vixyA aXikArigalYu sUcisixaru .
avare calYavalYiya cAlakarU hOxu .
AxxariMxa avara mAwigeV beVleV baMxiwu .
grAmasWaru gOrava samAraMBavannu nadeVsalu hiMxeV bIlYalilla .
grAma gOrava samAraMBa erpadisuva munna grAmaxalli AgabekAxa aBivqxXi kAryagalYannu grAmasWare mAdikoVlYlYuwwixxaru .
grAma gOrava samAraMBagalYalli suwwamuwwalina halYlYiyavaru saha pAlugoVlYlYuwwixxaru .
halYlYiya heVMgasaru saha heVccina uwsAhaxiMxa BAgavahisaxeV ulYiyuwwA iralilla .
saBeVyalli jAnapaxa gIweVgalYannu hAduwwixxaru .
saBeVyalli XvanivarXaka yaMwraxa muMxeV baMxu wamageV wocixa nAlku mAwugalYannu XEryavAgi helYuwwixxaru .
nAvu kaliwa oxu baraha upayoga AguwwaxeV
halYlYigalYalli oVggattannu kApAdalu sahakarisuwweveV .
halYlYiya oVlYiwigAgi SramisuwweveV .
vyavasAyaxa uwpannakkeV SraxXApUrvakavAgi xudiyuwweveV , eVMbuxAgi navasAkRararu Uraxevara heVsarinalli prawijFeV svIkarisuwwixxaru .
neVreVxixxa akkapakkaxa I weVranAxa samAraMBagalYannu nodi uwwejiwa Aguwwixxaru .
grAmasWaru manassu mAdixalli enannAxarU sAXisabahuxu .
joVweVgeV wamma grAmaxallU saha ixe kAryakramavannu ekeV Suru mAdabAraxu eVMba uwsAha avaralli mUduvuxu .
I weVranAxa viSvAsa mawwu AwmanaMbikeVya PalavAgi avaralli XqDa nirXAra mUduwwiwwu .
ixe grAma SikRaNa moVhIMna mUla maMwra .
sarvekRaNeVya prakAra sAkRaraweVyannu ulYisikoVMdiruva halYlYigalYa saMKyeV sAkRaraweV ulYisikoVMdiraxa halYlYigalYa saMKyeV a Sekada 90kkiMwa heVccAgi sAkRaraweV ulYisikoVMdiruva halYlYigalYu 1100 A Sekada 80riMxa 90ravareVgeV 36 i Sekada 70 riMxa 80ravareVgeV 26 I Sekada 60 riMxa 70ra vareVgeV 20 mUru praXAna aMSagalYu : mOlya mApaneVyiMxa I mUru aMSagalYa baggeV vivaragalYu beVlYakigeV baMxiveV : akRarasWa Agalu preraNeV akRarasWa Agalu saMGataneV navasAkRararu sAkRaraweVyannu ulYisikoVMdiruvuxu .
akRarasWa Agalu preraNeV : bahu maMxi oxu baraha kaliyalu preraNeV illa .
prAraMBaxalli kaliyuvavaralli maneV mAdikoVMdixxa niruwsAhavannu hogalAdisuvuxu kaRta Ayiwu .
oxu barahaxa AvaSyakaweV avarigeV aRtAgi kANabaralu illa .
joVweVgeV avarigeV vayaskara SikRaNa keMxragalYigeV hAjaru Agalu sAkaRtu samaya illa .
vyavasAya praXAnavallaxa xUra praxeSagalYu mawwu beVtta guddagalYiMxa AvqwavAxa praxeSagalYu uMtu .
aMwaha kadeVgalYalli grAmasWaru hoVtteV hoVreVyalu hoVrageV valaseV hoguvaru .
AxxariMxa avaru vayaskara SikRaNa keMxragalYigeV hAjaru Agalu woVMxareV .
wilYivalYikeV ulYlYa hAgU grAmasWaralli anukaMpa ulYlYa muMxAlYugalYu .
samAja kAryakarwaru mawwu oVlYlYeVya upAXyAyaru iruva kadeVgalYalli nirakRara kukRigalYu vayaskara SikRaNa keMxragalYigeV seruvaMweV praBAva bIruvuxu sulaBa .
aneka praxeSagalYalli upAXyAyaru , samAja kAryakarwara mawwu iwarara AxarSa guNagalYu kaliyuvavara meleV praBAvavannu bIriruvuxAgi wilYixubaMxixeV .
prAraMBaxalli ixxa woVdakugalYu nivAraNeVyAxa naMwara keVlavu kadeVgalYalli kaliyuvavaralli sAkaRtu uwsAha kaMdubaMwu .
pUrNa sAkRaraweVyannu sAXisixa grAmagalYalli erpadisixa grAma gOrava samAraMBagalYu pariNAmakAri Agixxavu .
I samAraMBagalYiMxa grAmaxavaru mawwu neVreVhoVreVya grAmasWaru prowsAhiwaru Aguwwixxaru .
kaliyuvavarannu prowsAhisalu keVlYageV keVlavu salaheVgalYu sUciwa AgiveV
1 nirakRarakukRigalYannu kaddAyavAgi oxu baraha kaliyuvaMweV oVwwAyisabeku .
prawiyoVbbanu wAnu sallisuva arjigeV ruju hAkalebeku .
oxu baraha kaliwavarigeV mAwra riyAyiwigalYannu nIdi prowsAhisawakkaxxu .
2 vayaskara SikRaNa keMxragalYigeV hAjaru Aguva kArmikarigeV AyA kArKAneVya mAlikaru keVlavu riyAyiwigalYannu nIduvuxu oVlYlYeVyaxu .
kArKAneVya keVlasaxa velYeVyalli oxu baraha kaliyalu svalpa biduvu mAdikoVduvuxu agawya .
kaliwa kArmikarigeV badwi muMwAxa AmiRagalYannu nIduvuxu oVlYlYeVyaxu .
3 paMcAyiwigalYigeV BUkaMxAyaxalli Sekada 30 BAga anuxAnavannu oVMxu Rarawwina meleV koVdabahuxu .
grAmaxalli iruva eVlla anakRarasWarannu nigaxiyAxa avaXiyalli akRarasWarannAgi mAduvuxe A Rarawwu .
4 sAmUhika mAXyamagalYa mUlaka sAkRaraweVya avaSyakaweVyannu janarigeV manavarikeV mAdikoVdabeku .
5 sAkRarawA kAryakramagalYannu iwara aBivqxXi kAryakramagalYoVMxigeV heVNeVyawakkaxxu .
AxxariMxa I kAryakramavannu kRewra aBivqxXi aXikArigalYigeV vahisuvuxu oVlYlYeVyaxu .
Aga avaru oxubaraha kaliyuvavarigeV saMxarBAnusAra sarakAraxiMxa xoVreVyuva riyAyiwigalYannu nIdi prowsAhisalu anukUla Aguvuxu .
6 nigaxiyAxa mattaxa sAkRaraweV padeVxavarigeV mAwra mawaxAna hakku irawakkaxxu .
grAma paMcAyiwi , paMcAyiwi samiwi mawwu jillA pariRaw saMsWeVgalYa saxasyaru Agalu oxubaraha anivArya .
7 prawi kutuMbaxalli iruva nirakRarakukRigalYannu akRarasWarannAgi mAduva hoVNeV AyA kutuMbaxa yajamAnarigeV serixxu .
oxubaraha sAla mawwu iwara savalawwugalYannu oVxagisalu avakASa kalpisabeku .
8 vayaskara SikRaNa keMxragalYigeV hAjaru Aguva bada vixyArWigalYigeV svalpa mattigeV prowsAhavannu koVdawakkaxxu .
9 grAma SikRaNa moVhIM kAryakramaxa sAXaneVyannu viSeRa rIwiyalli pracAra mAduvuxu anivArya .
akRarasWarannAgi mAdalu saMGataneV : yuxXaxalli jaya galYisalu idI rARtra oVMxAgi toVMkakatti keVlasa mAduvaMweV nirakRarawA Sawruvannu nirmUlagoVlYisalu eVlla ilAKeVgalYu aMxareV reVvinyU , vyavasAya , Arogya mawwu nErmalya , sahakAra , samAja kalyANa mawwu saMsWeVgalYu oVMxAgi xudiyabeku .
prasakwa grAma SikRaNa moVhIMna yaSassu viviXa ilAKeVgalYu kUdi seveV sallisixa Pala .
keVlavu kadeVgalYalli viviXa ilAKeVya aXikArigalYu , samAja kAryakarwaru , mahilYAmaMdalYi , yuvakamaMdalYi , paMcAyawisamiwi mawwu paMcAyawi saxasyaru grAmINaralli aBivqxXi yojaneVya vicAraxalli jAgqwi mUdisiruvaru .
oxubaraha kalisuva hoVNeV upAXyAyarigeV mawwu SAleVgeV serixxu .
oVggattina halYlYigalYalli keVlasa ceVnnAgi nadeVxixeV .
Binna aBiprAya ulYlYa hAgU caxurixa maneVgalYu iruva halYlYigalYalli keVlasa aRtAgi yaSasvi Agilla .
SAleVya hiriya vixyArWigalYa pAwra meVccuvaMwahuxu .
vixyArWigalYu yAva woVMxareVyillaxeV salIsAgi wamma waMxeVwAyaMxirigeV oxubaraha kalisiruvuxuMtu .
waMxeV wAyaMxirigeV saha wamma makkalYiMxa maneVyalle kaliyuvuxu cEwanyaxAyaka Agiwwu .
nirakRarawA nivAraNA calYavalYiyannu saMGatisalu keVlavu salaheVgalYu hIgiveV .
1 upAXyAyaru saMBAvaneV illaxeV seveV sallisalu wayAru .
yojaneVya prakAra upAXyAyarigeV saMBAvaneV koVdalu avakASavilla .
meleV helYixaMweV viviXa ilAKeVgalYu kaliyuvavarannu saMGatisalu heVccu prayawna mAdiveV .
saMGatiwa prayawna illaxixxareV upAXyAyaru kaliyuvavara maneVmaneVgeV hogi avarannu vayaskara SikRaNa keMxrakkeV serisuvuxu kaRta Aguwwiwwu .
2 sahakAra , vyavasAya , Arogya , samAjakalyANa pracAra mawwu viswaraNA ilAKeVgalYu AgAggeV vayaskara keMxragalYigeV anukUla AguvaMwaha sAhiwyavannu racisixavu .
AxareV A sAhiwyaka viRayagalYu vixyArWigalYa BAReV mawwu bOxXika mattakkeV anuguNa Agirabeku .
vixyA ilAKeVgalYa sahakAra padeVxu SAswrIya sAhiwyavannu wayArisawakkaxxu .
3 sWalYIya graMWAlayagalYigeV heVccu saMKyeVyalli puswaka , niyawakAlika mawwu iwara sAhiwyavannu oVxagisawakkaxxu .
aMwaha sAhiwya viviXa ilAKeVgalYa sahakAraxiMxa racisixxAgirabeku .
sWalYIya grAma sevakiyaru graMWAlayaxa hoVNeVyannu vahisawakkaxxu .
4 SAleVyallina bada hAgU hiriya vixyArWigalYannu sAkRarawA pracAraxalli woVdagisabeku .
avarigeV vixyArWi vewana , paTya puswakagalYu , leKana sAmagri , stEpeVMd muMwAxa rIwiyalli prowsAhisawakkaxxu .
5 upAXyAyaru nirakRarawA nivAraNA kAryavannu saMBAvaneV illaxeV kEgoVlYlYalu sixXariruvaru .
AxareV avara makkalYigeV unnawa mattaxa SikRaNavannu muPawwAgi nIdalu vyavasWeV mAdabeku .
axariMxa upAXyAyara seveVyannu heVccina rIwiyalli padeVyalu anukUla .
AxareV ixu bahu heVccina riyAyiwi Ayiwu hAgU sAXya illaxa mAwu .
yAva PalApekReV illaxeV nirakRarawA nivAraNA kArya kEgoVlYlYuvuxu oVlYlYeVyaxu .
6 prAWamika SAleVyiMxa hidixu viSvavixyAlaya mattaxavareVvigeV eVlla upAXyAyaru nirakRarawA nivAraNeVyalli woVdagawakkaxxu .
prawiyoVMxu SAlA kAleju I kArya nadeVsalu oVMxoVMxu grAmavannu xawwu weVgeVxukoVlYlYawakkaxxu .
7 vixyAvaMwa niruxyogigalYu wamma heVsarannu uxyoga vinimaya keMxraxalli noMxAyisalu vayaskarigeV oxubaraha kalisixa baggeV sartiPiketannu padeVxu axannu arjiyoVdaneV lagawwisabeku .
8 SEkRaNika keMxragalYigeV praveSa padeVyalu sAkRarawA seveVyU saha oVMxu AXAra Agirabeku .
9 aneka kadeVgalYalli prAWamika SAlA upAXyAyarigeV vAsisalu maneVyu illa .
AxxariMxa avaru keVlasa mAduva sWalYagalYalli ulYiyalu avakASa illa .
hIgAgi avaru keVlasa mAduva grAmagalYalli vayaskara SikRaNa seveVyannu mAdalAraru .
AxxariMxa avaru keVlasa mAduva grAmagalYalli vAsisalu maneVgalYannu oVxagisuvuxu oVlYlYeVyaxu .
kaliwa oxannu ulYisikoVlYlYuvuxu : mOlya mApaneVya prakAra Sekada 44 maMxi navasAkRararu wAvu kaliwixxannu ulYisikoVMdiruvaru .
aMwahavara pEki mahilYeVyare heVccu , grAma SikRaNa moVhIM nAlku wiMgalYa kAryakrama .
I avaXiyalli kaliwa sAkRaraweVya matta bahalYa keVlYamattaxxu .
aMxareV oxu baraha kaliwavanu kevala saralYa paxa mawwu sulaBa hAgU saralYavAxa vAkyagalYannu oxaballanu .
kaliwixxu wanna heVsaru mawwu vAsisuva grAmaxa heVsarannu bareVyuvuxakkeV mAwra baraha sImiwa .
I mattaxa sAkRaraweV upayoga Agaxu .
aWavA kaliwixxannu muMxuvarisalu sAXya Aguwwilla .
grAma gOrava samAraMBagalYu nadeVxa sWalYagalYalli vixyArWigalYigeV puswakagalYannu haMcixxeno sari .
AxareV A puswakagalYannu vixyArWigalYu eVRtaramattigeV oxiruvaru eVMbuxannu pariSIlisalu avakASa iralilla .
bahu maMxi vixyArWigalYu sAkaRtu virAma mawwu prowsAha illaxeV puswakagalYannu oxilla .
2 oVxagisixa sAhiwyaxa pEki anekavu kaliwavara mattakkeV iralilla hAgU avara aBirucigeV anuguNa Agiralilla .
puswakagalYu saNNa akRaragalYiMxa kUdixxavu .
nodalu AkarRaka Agiralilla .
joVweVgeV vicAragalYu manassigeV hidisuvaMwa pUrakavAxa ciwragalYu iralilla .
3.14riMxa 50 varRaxa vixyArWigalYu oVMxu kadeV seri kaliyuwwixxaru
20 riMxa 50 vayassinavarigiMwa 14-20 vayassinavarigeV oxu muMxuvarisalu Asakwi ixeV .
hAgU kaliwixxannu ulYisikoVlYlYuva Asakwi uMtu .
14-20 , 20-25 , 35-50 vayassina vixyArWigalYa mAnasika beVlYavaNigeVyalli wuMbA ixeV .
AxxariMxa avarannu vayoguNakkeV anuguNavAgi prawyekisi oxu baraha kalisixalli heVccu upayukwa AxIwu .
avaravara vayassigeV anuguNavAgi prawyeka waragawigalYannu erpadisuvuxariMxa anukUla .
ixu sAXyaveV eVMbuxe namma muMxeV iruva samasyeV .
4 14-20 vayassinavarigeV oxu baraha kalisalu AxyaweV irawakkaxxu .
anaMwara muMxina eVradu mUraneVya haMwagalYalli 20-25 , 35-50 vayomiwiya vixyArWigalYigeV kalisuvuxu oVlYlYeVyaxu .
I mUru haMwaxa vixyArWigalYalli uwsAha ixxu heVccina saMKyeVyalli aMxareV waragawigeV 30 raMweV vixyArWigalYu muMxeV baMxareV mAwra sAXya AxIwenoV .
eVlla vargaxavarigU pariNAmakAriyAxa sWirIkaraNa kAryakramavannu kEkoVlYlYabeku .
5 nAlku wiMgalYa kAla oxu baraha kaliwavaru sAkRaraweVyannu ulYisikoVlYlYalu pUrNakAlaxa SAleVgalYannu weVreVyabeku .
hAgU A SAleVgalYa upAXyAyarigeV saMBAvaneV koVdawakkaxxu .
6 sWirIkaraNa kAryakrama yaSasvi Agaxiralu vayaskara SikRaNa keMxra nadeVsuva upAXyAyarannu maXyaxalle vargAyisuvuxu oVMxu kAraNa .
oVMxu grAma pUrNa sAkRaraweV padeVyuvavareVgeV alliya rAwri SAlA upAXyAyarannu vargAyisabahuxu .
hAgeV avaru icCeVpattalli mawwu axariMxa vayaskara SikRaNa keMxra muMxuvariyalu woVMxareV illaxixxalli mAwra aMwaha upAXyAyarannu vargAyisabahuxu .
7 vayaskara SikRaNa AdalYiwaxa pUrNa hoVNeV hoVwwa aXikAri pUnAxalli iruvaru .
avarigeV sahAyaka sibbaMxi jilleV , wAlUku mawwu grAma mattaxalli iruvaru .
avarigeV avara keVlasa kAryagalYe heVccu , hIgAgi avaru prasAra kAryakramaxa uswuvAri nodalAraru .
sWirIkaraNa kAryakrama yaSasviyAgi nadeVyalu vixyA ilAKeV , jillApariRawwu mawwu wAlUku mattaxalli sAkaRtu sibbaMxiya koVraweV iruvuxu .
AxxariMxa sibbaMxivargavannu heVccisabeku mawwu kAryakramaxa hiwaxqRtiyiMxa viviXa vayaskara SikRaNa aXikArigalYa javAbxAriyannu nigaxipadisabeku .
I kAryaxalli nirawarAxa aXikArigalYigeV pravAsa mAdalu anukUla AguvaMweV sOkaryavannu oVxagisawakkaxxu .

rAjya mawwu keMxra sarakAragalYa neVraviniMxa karnAtaka rAjya vayaskara SikRaNa samiwi ) , muMbayi nagara samAja SikRaNa samiwi , sAkRarawA nikewana , lakno , beVMgAl soSiyal sarvIs lIg muMwAxa heVsarAMwa saMsWeVgalYu vayaskara SikRaNa kRewrakkeV wammaxe Axa kANikeVyannu sallisiveV .

BArawa mawwu pUrva xeSagalYallina iwara xvIpagalYa naduveV purAwana kAlaxalliye nOkA vyApAra nadeVyuwwixxu , bahuSaH aMwaha vyApArigalYiMxa adikeV PilippEns niMxa BArawakkeV baMxirabeku .

BArawaxalli adikeVya kqRi eRyA KaMdaxa AxyaMwa adikeVyannu agiyuva paxXawi ixeV .
AxarU axannu BArawa mawwu bAMglA xeSagalYalli mAwra vyavasWiwavAgi kqRi mAdalAguwwixeV .
BArawaxa praXAna nagaxu beVlYeVgalYalli adikeVyU oVMxu .
ixara vyApaka kqRi mawwu ixara baggeV saMSoXaneV nadeVyuwwiruvuxu BArawaxalli mAwra .
BArawaxalli ixara kqRi , kac niMxa hidixu keralYaxavareVgina paScima wIragalYeVlleVdeVyallU , pUrva wIraxalli wamilYunAdu , assAM , AMXrapraxeSa , oVrissA , wripura , paScimabaMgAlYa mawwu assAM serixaMweV nEqwyaBArawaxa bahu BAgagalYalli kaMdubaruwwaxeV .
BArawaxalli adikeVyannu beVlYeVyuva praswuwa viswIrNaxalli SeKada 90 BAga mawwu uwpAxaneVya SeKada 95 BAga keralYa , karnAtaka mawwu assAM rAjyagalYalli keMxrIkqwa Agiruvuxu koRtaka 1.1riMxa vexya AguwwaxeV .
ArWika mahawva ; 1,85,400 tan galYaRtu adikeV uwpAxaneVya oVttu aMxAjumOlya praswuwa xaraxa mereVgeV , sumAru 370 koti rUpAyigalYu .
namma xeSaxalli sumAru Aru xaSalakRa janaru adikeV kEgArikeVyannu AvalaMbisixxAreV .
ixaralli halavAru lakRa jana wamma xEnaMxina jIvanakkeV kevala adikeVyanne avalaMbisixxAreV  .
adikeV kqRi munnadeV ; halavu varRagalYa hiMxeV BArawaxallina uwpAxaneV AMwarika bedikeVyanne pUrEsuwwa iralilla .
uxAharaNeVgeV , 1956 - 57ralli adikeVya uwpAxaneV kevala 90,000 tannugalYaRtu mAwra .
AxxariMxa , nAvu maleRiyA , SrIlaMkA , siMgapura mawwu iwara xeSagalYiMxa sumAru 40,000 tannugalYaRtu adikeV Amaxu mAdikoVlYlYuwwixxeVvu .
koRtaka 1.2riMxa ixu wilYixu baruwwaxeV .

keMxra hAgU rAjya sarkAragalYu aneka saMSoXaneV hAgU aBivqxXi kAryakramagalYannu paMcavArRika yojaneVgalYa aMgavAgi , kEgoVMdu namma xeSaxallina adikeVya uwpAxaneVyannu heVccisixuxe ixakkeV kAraNa .
muKya aBivqxXi kAryakramagalYu aMxareV , yogyavAxa narsarigalYa sWApaneV , uwwama guNamattaxa sasigalYa uwpAxaneV hAgU sarabarAju mawwu adikeV kqRi praxeSaxa viswIrNa , axara oVttigeV roga - saMrakRaNAkramagalYannu kaMdu hidiyuvuxu .

Evawwara xaSakaxa AraMBaxiMxa AMwarika mArukatteVgalYalli sWiravAgi eruwwixxa beVleVyu 1970 - 71ra naMwara ilYiyuva oVlavanne woriwu .

aMwara besAya - oVMxoVMxu praxeSaxalli oVMxoVMxu bageVya aMwara besAya kramagalYu balYakeVyalli iveV .
sAXAraNavAgi sUcisabahuxAxa vyavasAya kramagalYu eVMxareV : malYeVgAla mugiyuva hoVwwigeV mqxuvAgi maNNu keVwwuvuxannu aWavA cuccumulYlYiniMxa maNNu keVxakuva keVlasa mAdabeku .
ixariMxa melina maNNu oVdeVyuvuxallaxeV kalYeVgalYannU budasamewa weVgeVxuhAkixaMweV AguwwaxeV .
maNNina melina BAgaxiMxa 50 seVM. mI. AlYaxalli adikeV gidaxa berugalYu keMxriwa Agiruva sAXyaweV  iruvuxariMxa maNNannu AlYavAgi ageVyabAraxu .
hAgeV mAdixareV berugalYigeV etu bIlYuwwaxeV .

kAyi biduwwiruva oVMxu marakkeV 100 grAM sArajanaka , 40 grAM raMjaka , 140 grAM poVtyASannu oVxagisuva rAsAyanika goVbbaragalYannu hAkabeku .
ixaroVMxigeV 12 keVji kAMpost illave koVttigeV goVbbara mawwu hasiru eVleVgalYannu hAkabeku .
I pramANavannu eVradu kaMwugalYalli koVdabeku .
kAMpost , koVttigeV goVbbara hAgU hasiru eVleVgalYannu nIrAvariyiMxa beVlYeVyuva mawwu malYeVya neVraviniMxa beVlYeVyuva eVradu bageVya beVlYeVgalYigU seVpteVMbar - aktobaranalli hAkabeku .
rAsAyanika goVbbaraxa pramANaxalli , 1/2 aRtannu oVMxu varRaxa gidagalYigU , 2/3 BAgaxaRtu eVradu varRaxa gidagalYigU , mUru varRa mawwu axakkiMwa heVccu vayassina gidagalYigeV pUrNa pramANavannu hAkabeku .
rAsAyanika goVbbaragalYa arXa pramANavannu sAvayava goVbbaragalYa pUrNa pramANaxoVMxigeV seVpteVMbaranalli hAkabeku .
mawwoVMxu arXa rAsAyanika goVbbaragalYa pramANavannu mAwra malYeVya neVraviniMxa beVlYeVyuva beVlYeVgeV menallU nIrAvariyiMxa beVlYeVyuva beVlYeVgeV PeVbravariyallU hAkabeku .
seVpteVMbar aktobaranalli goVbbara hAkuvAga maragalYa budaxalli suwwalU 75 riMxa 100 seVM. mI. xUraxalli 15 riMxa 20 seVM. mI. AlYaxalli gulYi weVgeVyabeku .
axaralli goVbbara hAkixa naMwara weVlYuvAgi maNNannu haradi muccabeku .
eVradaneVya bAri hAkuvAga moVxalu kalYeVgalYannu keVwwirabeku ; anaMwara goVbbaravannu maragalYa budaxa suwwalU eVraci cuccumulYlYiniMxa keVwwi maNNina oVlYakkeV beVreVsabeku .

I kAraNagalYiMxAgi beVlYeVgalYannu adikeV wotagalYalli beVlYeVsuvuxu oVlYlYeVyaxu .
adikeV wotagalYalli hAgeV beVlYeVsuva beVlYeVgalYannu avugalYa melina BAgaxa AvaraNa , berina samUha , neVralYannu sahisuva Sakwi , bahuvAgi malYeV bIlYuva kAlaxalli adikeV maragalYiMxa bIlYuva nIrina hanigalYannu sahisuva Sakwi , aMwaha beVlYeVgalYigeV mArukatteVyalli iruva bedikeV muMwAxavuxara AXAraxa meleV avannu nirNayisalAguwwaxeV .

aRte alla , upabeVlYeVgalYigU adikeVgU wakka pramANaxalli goVbbara hAkabeku .
nIrannU hAyisabeku .
wotaxalli iruva adikeV maragalYa naduvina aMwaragalYalli vArRika mawwu xvEvArRika beVlYeVgalYannu beVlYeVyuvuxakkeV naduvina beVlYeVyannu beVlYeVyuvuxu eVMxu helYuwwAreV .

maragalYa I naduvina sWalYavannu muMgAru malYeVya prAraMBaxalli keVwwi naduvina beVlYeV weVgeVyalu sixXamAdabeku .

ivu tAksik prawikriyeVgalYu ; aMxareV I viRavaswugalYu eVllA janarallU xuRpariNAma uMtumAdaballavu .

uxAharaNeVgeV , rEwaru upayogisuva kItanASaka ORaXigalYa Akasmika sevaneV , KanijagalYa gaNi keVlasagAraralli XUlYina xeVseVyiMxa uMtAguva SvAsakoSagalYa kAyileVgalYu , iwara viRavaswugalYa pariNAmagalYu .

namma xehaxalli , byAktiriyAgalYu mawwu vEras eVxurisalu pariRkarisalpatta rakRaNA vyavasWeV ixeV .

imyuno glAbyulin xehaxa viviXa liMP aMgagalYalli wayArAguwwaveV .
tisIliyas mawwu kAbAt eVMba vijFAnigalYu 1940ralli rakwaxalli prawiroXaka Sakwi iruva protIn gAmA viBAgaxalli iruwwaveV eVMxu kaMduhidixaru .

Exu bageVya glAbyulin pawweV mAdalAgixeV .
ive EM , EeV , Eu , EA mawwu EU .
ivugalYalli EeV mawwu EMgalYu rakwaxalli heralYa Agixxu , rogANugalYoVMxigeV horAdalu bahalYa agawya AgiruwwaveV .
EA eVMbuxu carma mawwu myUkas paxaragalYalli kANabaruwwaveV mawwu sWalYIya prawiroXaka Sakwiyannu heVccu mAduwwaveV .

ixu mikka glAbyulin galYigiMwalU bahu kadimeV pramANaxalli ixxarU , alarjik pravqwwi iruvavaralli heVccu kaMdubaruwwaxeV .
sWUlavAgi helYuvuxAxareV , anuvaMSikavAgi heVccu heVccu EU annu wayArumAduva pravqwwiye alarjiya mUlaBUwa lakRaNa eVnnabahuxu .

xehaxa eVllA aMgAMSagalYallU mAst seVl eVMba viSiRta seVlgalYu iruwwaveV .
ivugalYalli histamIn moVxalAxa rAsAyanika vaswugalYu .
yAvuxe kAraNaxiMxa seVlgalYiMxa histamIn hoVrakkeV sravisalpattareV , axariMxa prawikUla pariNAmagalYu uMtAguwwaveV .
histamIn uMtumAduva muKya pariNAmagalYu eVMxareV rakwanAlYagalYannu saMkucisi sIraM hoVrakkeV jinuguvaMweV mAduvuxu ; xehaxa viviXa naya mAMsaKaMdagalYannu saMkucisuvuxu ; sWalYIya rakwanAlYagalYalli heVccu rakwa saMcaya AguvaMweV mAduvuxu I pariNAmagalYiMxale piwwaxa gaMXeV uMtAguvuxu .
aswamaxalli Aguva SvAsanAlYagalYa saMkuciwa parisWiwiyU praXAnavAgi histamInniMxale .
alarjik neVgadiyalli mUgu kattuvuxu hAgU soruvuxU rakwanAlYagalYu oVwwalpaduvuxariMxa , hAgU rakwa paricalaneV mUgina myUkas meVMbren  nalli bahu jAswi AguvuxariMxa .
Iga maneVXUlYina uxAharaNeVyannu upayogisi alarjik prawikriyeVyalli Aguva baxalAvaNeVgalYannu vivaravAgi wilYiyoNa .
XUlYigeV alarji iraxeV Arogya Agiruva , XUlYu iruva parisaraxallU , sInu keVmmu iraxeV iruwwAneV .
XUlYigeV alarji iruvavaralli , XUlYina kaNagalYigeV viruxXa wayArAgiruva viSiRta EU heralYa AgiruwwaveV .
I EU kaNagalYu rakwaxalli paricalisuwwiruwwaveV hAgU mAst seVlgalYa meleV iruwwaveV .
XUlYina kaNagalYu mUgannu praveSisixareV , mUgina mAst seVlgalYa meleV iruva EUyoVdaneV XUlYina kaNagalYu saMparka hoVMxuwwaveV .
wakRaNa mAst seVlgalYiMxa histamIn mawwu iwara halavu rAsAyanika vaswugalYu sravisalpaduwwaveV .
moVxale helYiruvaMweV histamIn na pariNAmagalYiMxa mUgina rakwasAMxraweV jAswiyAgi mUgu kattixaMwAguwwaxeV ; histamIn niMxa mUgina meVMbren keVralYi , sInugalYa surimalYeV baruwwaxeV ; mUginiMxa soruvuxU AraMBa AguwwaxeV .
ixe rIwiya alarjik prawikriyeV SvAsanAlYagalYalli Axalli , histamIn na praBAvaxiMxa saNNa SvAsanAlYagalYa suwwa iruva naya mAMsaKaMdagalYu saMkuciwa AguwwaveV .
ixariMxa SvAsanAlYagalYa vyAsa kadimeVyAgi usirAdalu kaRta .
oVttinalli helYuvuxAxareV histamIn mawwiwara vaswugalYu mAst  seVl galYalli iruwwaveV .
2 . alarji uMtumAduva aMSa SvAsakoSagalYannu praveSisi , mAst seVl melmEyalli iruva EU kaNagalYoVdaneV saMparka hoVMxuwwaveV .
I EU alarji iruvavaralli heVccu pramANaxalli iruwwaxeV .
I saMparka AxoVdaneV histamIn mawwu iwara praBAvaSAli vaswugalYu seVlniMxa hoVrakkeV sravisalpaduwwaveV .
I vaswugalYa pariNAmave alarjik neVgadi hAgU aswama .
parisaraxalli irabahuxAxa viviXa alarjeVn viruxXa EU annu heralYavAgi uwpAxisuva guNa anuvaMSika Axaxxu .
I pravqwwiyanne alarjik , eVnnabahuxu .
alarjeVn prakqwiyalli iruva halavAru vaswugalYu mAnavanalli alarjik prawikriyeVyannu uMtumAdaballavu .
I alarjeVn xehavannu mUgu , bAyiyiMxa SvAsaxoVdaneV praveSisabahuxu ; aWavA AhAraxa rUpaxalli jIrNAMgagalYannu seriyU prawikriyeV uMtumAdabahuxu .
allaxeV saxA vAwAvaraNakkeV saMparka carma hAgU kaNNugalYalli alarji neravAgi uMtAgabahuxu .
I alarjeVn halavu viXaxalli iruwwaveV .
XUlYugalYu maneVya oVlYagina vAwAvaraNaxalli iruva XUlYu wIrA sAXAraNavAgi alarji uMtumAduwwaveV .
maneVXUlYu halavu aMSagalYiMxa kUdiruwwaveV hawwiya waMwugalYu , keVlavu bURtugalYu , carmaxiMxa uxuruva hoVttu hAgU iwara aMSagalYu .
allaxeV , maneVXUlYinalli mEt eVMba kIta iruwwaxeV .
sUkRmaxarSakaxalli nodalu mAwra sAXyavAxa I kItagalYu XUlYinoVdaneV beVreVwiruwwaveV .
hAsigeVya xuppata , xiMbugalYa parisaraxalli ivu heVccu saMKyeVgalYalli iruwwaveV .
alarji uMtumAduvuxaralli mEt praBAvaSAli pAwra vahisuwwaveV .
mEtgalYu vqxXi hoVMxalu vAwAvaraNaxalli wevAMSa jAswi irabeku .
ixariMxale malYeVgAlaxalli alarjik rogigalYu jAswi woVMxareV paduwwAreV .
maneVXUlYu allaxeV , APIs , lEbrarigalYalli , halYe kadawagalYannu ittiruva koNeVgalYalli iruva XUlYu kUda alarji uMtumAdaballaxu .
kArKAneVgalYalli iruva XUlYu , allalli wayArAguva vaswugalYannU hoVMxiruvuxariMxa , alarji uMtumAdabahuxu .
maneVXUlYigeV alarji bahu sAmAnya .
nAvu bAlyaxiMxa maneVya vAwAvaraNaxalli halavAru gaMteV kalYeVyuvuxariMxa maneVXUlYigeV saMparka ceVnnAgiye AguwwiruwwaxeV .
maneVyannu eVRtu svacCavAgittarU XUlYannu nirmUla mAduvuxu sAXya illa .
parAgagalYu jatilavAxa racaneV viviXa parAgagalYu alarji uMtumAduvuxaralli muKyavAxa pAwra vahisuwwaveV .
parAgagalYu mUru viXavAgi sWalYaxiMxa sWalYakkeV sAgisalpaduwwaveV .
gAlYiyalli welAdi haraduvuxu , nIrina mUlaka haraduvuxu hAgU kItasparSa - ive parAgagalYu haraduva rIwigalYu .
manuRyarigeV alarji uMtumAduvuxaralli gAlYiyalli haraduva parAgagalYu muKyavAxavu eVMbuxu AScaryaxa mAwalla .
viviXa maragalYu varRaxa bereV bereV qwugalYalli parAgagalYannu uwpAxisuwwaveV .
aMxareV , oVMxu Urina parisaraxalli yAva parAgagalYu yAva qwuvinalli heralYavAgi iruwwaveV wilYixareV Aga rogiya alarjiyu yAva yAva parAgagalYiMxa jAswi Agabahuxu eVMxu Uhisabahuxu .
gAlYiyalli haraduva parAgagalYannu viSiRta salakaraNeVgalYa sahAyaxiMxa SeKarisi , yAva maragalYa parAgagalYu parisaraxalli sAmAnyavAgi iveV eVMbuxannu kaMduhidiyabahuxu .
I viXAnagalYannu erobayAlaji eVMxu kareVyuwwAreV .
3 bURtugalYu wevavAxa vAwAvaraNaxalli beVlYeVyuva bURtugalYu gAlYiyalli haraduva bIjakaNagalYannu uwpAxisuwwaveV .
I spor alarji uMtumAdaballavu .
parAgagalYannu parIkRisi yAva yAva parAgagalYu iveV eVMxu kaMduhidiyuvaMweV bURtugalYannU parIkRisabahuxu .
ixariMxa parisaraxa sAmAnya alarjik bURtugalYu yAvuvu eVMxu niKaravAgi helYabahuxu .
AhAraxiMxa alarji parisaraxa gAlYiyalli welAduwwixxu , usirAtaxiMxa SvAsakoSagalYalli alarji uMtumAduva alarjeVngalYu , AhAraxa mUlakavU alarji uMtAgabahuxu .
sAmAnyavAgi helYuvuxAxareV , AhAraxa alarji cikka makkalYalli heVccu kaMdubaruwwaxeV .
I pravqwwi kadimeV Aguwwa hoguwwaxeV .
aswamA allaxeV AhAraxa alarji piwwaxa gaMXeV hAgU alarjik hoVtteV novu , BexiyannU uMtumAduvuxu .
alarjik Agiruva AhAravannu sevisixa keVlavu gaMteVgalYalle sAmAnyavAgi prawikriyeV uMtAguwwaxeV .
rogigalYu svAnuBavaxiMxa nanageV toVmeVto winnalu Aguvuxilla ; nanageV moVtteVyiMxa alarji baruwwaxeV , eVMxu helYabahuxu .
paxe paxe prayoga rUpaxalli I vaswugalYannu sevisi woVMxareV prawisalavU uMtAxareV mAwra AhAraxa alarji ixeV eVnnuvuxu Kaciwa Agaballaxu .
rogigeV saMSaya baMxa AhAraxa aMSagalYu eVllavannU eVradu aWavA mUru vAra pUrNavAgi varjisi , punaH axe AhAragalYannu sevisi nodixareV , AhAraxa alarji ixeVye eVMbuxu KAwari AguwwaxeV .
illi innoVMxu aMSavannu oVwwi helYabeku .
halavAru wAyi waMxeVyaru maguvigeV alarji uMtAguwwaxeV eVMba BayaxiMxa kattunittAxa paWyagalYannu viXisuwwAreV .
hIgAgi maguvigeV pORTika AhAragalYa koVraweVyU uMtAgabahuxu .
bariya aWavA avarivaru helYixa aBiprAyagalYa BayaxiMxa I rIwi arWavillaxa paWyagalYannu Acarisuvuxu sammawavalla .
bAlyaxalli AhAraxa alarji ixxa magu vayassu AxaMweV axe paxArWagalYannu sahisabahuxu .
innoVMxu muKya viRaya eVMxareV alpa pramANaxalli sevisixAga alarji uMtumAdaxeV ixxa AhAraxa aMSavu heVccu gidixu wiMxAga woVMxareV koVdabahuxu .
namma adigeV UtagalYalli halavAru paxArWagalYannu serisi palya , rasavAMgi , hulYi iwyAxigalYannu mAduvuxariMxa , AhAraxa yAva aMSaxiMxa alarji baruwwixeV eVMxu Uhisuvuxu kaRtasAXya .
parisaraxa iwara alarjeVn galYu nAvu xEnaMxina jIvanaxalli balYasuva halavAru vaswugalYu alarjeVn galYAgi woVMxareV koVdabahuxu .
sIgeVkAyipudi , pAwreV woVlYeVyalu upayogisuva pudi , SqMgAra sAmagrigalYu , soPAxa XUlYu , soVlYlYeV baraxiralu iduva surulYi iwyAxi , I kalYeVxa xaSakagalYalli I alarjiya mUla rUpavannu ariyalu halavAru prawiBAvaMwa vijFAnigalYu saMSoXaneVgalYannu nadeVsixxAreV .
ivugalYiMxa alarjik prawikriyeVyannu arWamAdikoVlYlYalu sAXya AgixeV .
alarji eVMxareV yAvuxAxarU parisaraxa vaswuviniMxa xehaxa meleV uMtAguva xuRpariNAma eVMxu saralYavAgi helYabahuxu .
I waraha prawikriyeV eVllarallU AgaxeV , nUru janaralli ibbaru aWavA mUru janakkeV AguwwiruwwaxeV .
innoVMxu viRaya eVMxareV halavAru rAsAyanika vaswugalYu , kEgArikeVyalli , kArKAneVgalYalli balYasalpaduva vaswugalYu xehaxa meleV keVlavu xuRpariNAma uMtumAdaballavu .
ivu tAksik prawikriyeVgalYu ; aMxareV I viRavaswugalYu eVllA janarallU xuRpariNAma uMtumAdaballavu .
ivu alarjik rUpaxa prawikriyeVgalYalla .
uxAharaNeVgeV , rEwaru upayogisuva kItanASaka ORaXigalYa Akasmika sevaneV , KanijagalYa gaNi keVlasagAraralli XUlYina xeVseVyiMxa uMtAguva SvAsakoSagalYa kAyileVgalYu , iwara viRavaswugalYa pariNAmagalYu .
alarjik prawikriyeVyalli sAmAnyavAgi xehaxa aMgAMgagalYa meleV yAva keVtta pariNAmavannU uMtumAdaxeV iruva vaswu , halavu janaralli mAwra prawikUlavAxa bavaNeVgalYannu uMtumAduvuxu , eVMxu wilYiyabahuxu .
maneVya XUlYina saralYavAxa uxAharaNeVyannu pariSIlisi .
maneV gudisuvAga elYuva XUlYigeV alarji iruvavaru mAwra , XUlYina vAsaneV kaMdoVdaneV sInuvuxakkeV AraMBisuwwAreV ; keVmmu barabahuxu , AxareV maneVyalli iruvavareVllarigU I rIwi Aguvuxillavalla .
aMxareV , alarjiya rogigeV awi sUkRmavAxa prawikriyeV uMtumAduva pravqwwi ixeV eVMxaMwAyiwu .
gAlYiyalli awi wIra pramANaxalli XUlYu haradixarU , wuMba alarji iruva vyakwi axakkeV prawikriyeV worisaballa .
I alarji AnuvaMSikavAgi hegeV baruwwaxeV ixaralli xehaxalli Aguva baxalAvaNeVgalYu enu mUginalli soruvuxu , keVmmu , ubbasa hegeV uMtAguwwaxeV I vivaragalYannu arWamAdikoVlYlYalu prayawnisoNa .
namma xehaxalli , byAktiriyAgalYu mawwu vEras galYannu eVxurisalu pariRkarisalpatta rakRaNAvyavasWeV ixeV .
I vyavasWeV mAnavana vikAsaxoVMxigeV mArpAdu hoVMxi , soMkugalYannu eVxurisalu sajjAgixeV .
I vyavasWeVya eVradu pramuKa BAga eVMxareV rakwaxalli iruva viSeRa protInugalYAxa gAmA glAbyulin galYu rakRaNA vyavasWeVya jIvakoSagalYu .
imyuno glAbyulin galYu xehaxa viviXa liMP aMgagalYalli wayArAguwwaveV .
tisIliyas mawwu kAbAt eVMba vijFAnigalYu 1940ralli rakwaxalli prawiroXaka Sakwi iruva protIn galYu N_NN gAmA viBAgaxalli iruwwaveV eVMxu kaMduhidixaru .
muMxina varRagalYalli , imyunoglAbyulingalYa racaneVyannu prayogagalYa mUlaka kaMduhidiyalAyiwu .
portar mawwu eVdeVlman eVMbavaru I vivaragalYannu kuriwu aByasisixxAreV .
imyunoglAbyulin racaneVyannu ciwraxalli worisalAgixeV .
Exu bageVya glAbyulingalYannu pawweV mAdalAgixeV .
ive EM , EeV , Eu , EA mawwu EU , ivugalYalli EeV mawwu EMgalYu rakwaxalli heralYa Agixxu , rogANugalYa horAdalu bahalYa agawya AgiruwwaveV .
EA eVMbuxu carma mawwu myUkas paxaragalYalli kANabaruwwaveV mawwu sWalYIya prawiroXaka Sakwiyannu heVccu mAduwwaveV .
EU eVMbuxu alarjik prawikriyeVyalli muKya pAwra vahisuva glAbyulin .
ixu mikka glAbyulingalYigiMwalU bahu kadimeV pramANaxalli ixxarU , alarjik pravqwwi iruvavaralli heVccu kaMdubaruwwaxeV .
sWUlavAgi helYuvuxAxareV , AnuvaMSikavAgi heVccu heVccu EU annu wayArumAduva pravqwwiye alarjiya mUlaBUwa lakRaNa eVnnabahuxu .
EUyu rakwaxalli bahu kadimeV pramANaxalli iruvuxariMxa axannu alYaweV mAduvuxu kaRta sAXya Agiwwu .
Icina varRagalYalli , suXArisixa vEjFAnika prakaraNagalYiMxa EUyannu niKaravAgi alYeVyalu sAXya AgixeV .
alarjik neVgadi aWavA aswamA ixxavaralli EU heVccu uwpannagoVlYlYuwwaxeV .
xehaxa eVllA aMgAMSagalYallU mAst seVl eVMba viSiRta seVlgalYu iruwwaveV .
ivugalYalli histamIn moVxalAxa rAsAyanika vaswugalYu iruwwaveV .
yAvuxe kAraNaxiMxa seVlgalYiMxa histamIn hoVrakkeV sravisalpattareV , axariMxa prawikUla pariNAmagalYu uMtAguwwaveV .
histamIn uMtumAduva muKya pariNAmagalYu eVMxareV rakwanAlYagalYannu saMkucisi sIraM hoVrakkeV jinuguvaMweV mAduvuxu ; xehaxa viviXa naya mAMsaKaMdagalYannu saMkucisuvuxu ; sWalYIya rakwa nAlYagalYalli heVccu rakwa saMcaya AguvaMweV mAduvuxu I pariNAmagalYiMxale piwwaxa gaMXeV uMtAguvuxu .
aswamAxalli Aguva SvAsanAlYagalYa saMkuciwa parisWiwiyU praXAnavAgi histamInniMxale .
alarjik neVgadiyalli mUgu kattuvuxu hAgU soruvuxU rakwanAlYagalYu oVwwalpaduvuxariMxa , hAgU rakwa paricalaneV mUgina myUkas meVMbren  nalli bahu jAswi AguvuxariMxa .
Iga maneVXUlYina uxAharaNeVyannu upayogisi alarjik prawikriyeVyalli Aguva baxalAvaNeVgalYannu vivaravAgi wilYiyoNa .
XUlYigeV alarji iraxeV Arogya Agiruva , XUlYu iruva parisaraxallU , sInu keVmmu iraxeV iruwwAneV .
XUlYigeV alarji iruvavaralli , XUlYina kaNagalYigeV viruxXa wayArAgiruva viSiRta EU heralYa AgiruwwaveV .
I EU kaNagalYu rakwaxalli paricalisuwwiruwwaveV hAgU mAst seVlgalYa meleV iruwwaveV .
XUlYina kaNagalYu mUgannu praveSisixareV , mUgina mAst seVlgalYa meleV iruva EUyoVdaneV XUlYina kaNagalYu saMparka hoVMxuwwaveV .
wakRaNa mAst seVlgalYiMxa histamIn mawwu iwara halavu rAsAyanika vaswugalYu sravisalpaduwwaveV .
moVxale helYiruvaMweV histamIn pariNAmagalYiMxa mUgina rakwasAMxraweV jAswiyAgi mUgu kattixaMwAguwwaxeV ; histamIn mUgina meVMbren keVralYi , sInugalYa surimalYeV baruwwaxeV ; mUginiMxa soruvuxU AraMBa AguwwaxeV .
ixe rIwiya alarjik prawikriyeV SvAsanAlYagalYalli Axalli , histamIn praBAvaxiMxa saNNa SvAsanAlYagalYa suwwa iruva naya mAMsaKaMdagalYu saMkuciwa AguwwaveV .

sumAru 7 gaMteVya oVlYageV Uta mugisuvuxu sUkwa .

biyar wayArisuva mAlt alarji ixxareV biyar kudixAga ubbasa rAwri heVccu Agabahuxu .
mawweV keVlavarigeV vEn kudixareV alarjik prawikriyeV uMtAgabahuxu .
oVttinalli , AhAraxa alarji ixeV eVMxu KAwri AxareV paWyavannu Acarisuvuxu aRtu kaRta eVnalla .
AhAraxa praBAva bAlyaxalli heVccu muKya AgiruwwaxeV .
hava baxalAvaNeV eVRto jana rogigalYu namageV I Urina havA oVgguvuxilla ; bereV UrigeV varga mAdisikoVMdu prayawna paduvuxe ? eVMxu vExyarannu praSnisuwwAreV .
avara praSneVya arWa nAnu bereV Urinalli neVlasixareV kAyileV saMpUrNavAgi guNa AguwwaxeVye eVMxu .
I rIwiya praSneVgeV uwwara koVduvuxu sulaBa sAXya alla .
saMsAra samewa bereV UrigeV , bereV BAReVya janaroVMxigeV neVlasi , alliya parisWiwigalYigeV hoVMxikoVMdu jIvisuvuxu eVllarigU sulaBa alla .
rogigalYu avara saMbaMXigalYallo , snehiwarallo yArigo aswamA wIvra Agixxu , avaru bereV prAMwyakkeV hogi neVleVsixa meleV kAyileV guNa Ayiwu eVMba sanniveSaxa uxAharaNeVyannu koVdabahuxu .
AxareV vivaravAgi nodixalli I rIwi aswamA pUra guNa Aguvuxu viralYa .
alarjik aMSagalYiMxa aswamA wIvra Agixxa rogiya uxAharaNeVyannu nodoNa .
beVMgalYUrinalli neVlasi sumAru 4 varRavAxa meleV aswamAxiMxa naralYixa rogi keralYaxavanu .
uwwaraBArawakkeV varga mAdisikoVMda ; mUru varRa Arogya Agixxa meleV , malYeVgAlaxalli aswamA punaH baralAraMBisiwu .
ixakkeV kAraNa iRte .
beVMgalYUrina parisaraxalli iruva halavu parAgagalYu mawwu maneVXUlYigeV alarji ixxa I rogi bereV UrigeV hoxAga , I nirxiRta parAgagalYu alli iralillavAgi , halavu varRa avana kAyileV kammi Agixxiwu .
A parisaraxa parAgagalYu , viSiRta XUlYugalYu - ivakkeV rogi niXAnavAgi alarjik prawikriyeV worisawoVdagixa ; ixariMxa punaH aswamA Suru Ayiwu .
innoVMxu aMSa , mAnasika Axaxxu .
I jAgavannu bittareV nanageV aswamA kammi AguwwaxeV eVMxu xqDavAgi naMbiruva , Uru bitta meleV ixe manaSSAMwiyannu uMtumAdi kAyileVya wIvraweVyannu ilYisabahuxu .
IgAgale vivarisiruvaMweV vayaskaralli aswamA halavu kAraNagalYa saMyojaneVyiMxa uMtAguva kAyileV .
bereV UrigeV hoxarU alliyU XUlYu , mAnasika oVwwadagalYu , parisaraxa alarjeVn , vEras ixxe iruwwaveV .
yAvAga I aMSagalYu prabalavAgi rogiya aswamAvannu supwasWiwiyiMxa keVralYisuwwaveV eVMxu pravAxisuvuxu vExyarigU sAXyavilla .
I aMSagalYannu gamanisuvuxariMxale nuriwa vExyaru ' bereV UrigeV varga mAdisikoVMdu nodi ' eVMxu salaheV koVdalu hiMjariyuwwAreV .
AxareV rogiya kAyileVya wIvraweVya vivaragalYannu ceVnnAgi ariwa vExyaru Ayxa sanniveSagalYalli I rIwiya salaheVgalYannu koVduvuxu sUkwa Axaxxu .
ORaXigalYu I aswamAxa cikiwseVyalli prawiyoVbba rogiyU wanna vExyariMxa ORaXigalYa pramANa mawwu hegeV niyawakAlikavAgi sevisabeku eVMbuxannu wilYixukoVlYlYuvuxu agawya hAgU kRema .
SvAsanAlYa viswAraka ORaXigalYu aswamAxalli uMtAguva pramuKa baxalAvaNeVye SvAsanAlYagalYu saMkuciwa Aguvuxu eVMxu ariweVvu .
SvAsanAlYagalYannu suwwuvarixiruva naya mAMsaKaMdagalYannu sadila mAduvuxariMxa I parisWiwiyannu nivArisabahuxu .
Aga SvAsanAlYagalYa oVlYavyAsa jAswiyAgi usirAta sarAga AguwwaxeV .
iMWa pariNAma uMtumAduva ORaXigalYu sAXAraNavAgi balYakeVyalli iveV ; ivanne SvAsanAlYa viswAraka ORaXigalYu eVMxu kareVyabahuxu .
eV . amEnoVPilis :- bahalYa varRagalYiMxa upayogaxalli iruva I ORaXi iMjeVkRan rUpaxallU , mAwreVgalYa rUpaxallU xoVreVyuwwaxeV .
makkalYa upayogakkAgi xrava rUpaxalliyU balYasalAguwwaxeV .
aswamA wIvra AxAga vExyaru rakwanAlYaxoVlYakkeV niXAnavAgi koVduva I iMjeVkRan bahu bega usirAtavannu sarAga mAduvuxaralli yaSasvi AguwwaxeV .
amEnoPilin mAwreVgalYU sAmAnyavAgi balYakeVyalli iveV .
keVlavu rogigalYu I mAwreVgalYiMxa hoVtteV uri , kasivisi AguwwaxeV eVMxu helYuwwAreV .
Uta Axa meleV aWavA mAwreV nuMgixareV sAXAraNavAgi I woVMxareV iruvuxilla .
I mAwreVgalYannu bahukAla sevisixarU yAva xuRpariNAmavU uMtAguvuxilla .
allaxeV , upayogisixaMweV axara praBAva kammi Aguvuxilla .
bi . adreVnalin :- aswamA jAswi AxAga iMjeVkRan rUpaxalli koVdalu Aguva I ORaXi bahalYa kAlaxiMxa upayogisalpaduwwixeV .
alpa pramANaxalli koVttarU bahu bega aswamAxa Sramavannu kammi mAdaballa I ORaxi keVlavu iwara pariNAmagalYannU uMtumAduwwaveV .
kEgalYu naduguvuxu , hqxaya dabadaba hoVdeVxukoVlYlYuvuxu ive sAmAnya iwara pariNAmagalYu .
hqxayaxa badiwaxa vegavannu wAwkAlikavAgi heVccu mAdixxariMxa sAXAraNavAgi yAva keVdukU Aguvuxilla .
AxarU vqxXaralli hAgU hqxayaxa xurbalaweV ixxavaralli I ORaXavannu sAmAnyavAgi balYasuvuxilla .
si . eVPeVdrin :- ixU adreVnalin jAwiya ORaXiye AxarU , ixannu mAwreVya rUpaxalli sevisabahuxAgixxu , jAswi balYakeVyalli ixeV .
aswamAkkAgi iruva bahuweka mAwreVgalYalli kUda seriruwwaxeV .
keVlavu rogigalYalli eVPeVdrin kE naduka , nixreV bAraxiruvikeV uMtumAdabahuxu .
di . nUwana ORaXigalYu : IceVgeV , halavAru varRagalYa saMSoXaneVgalYa naMwara , bariya SvAsanAlYagalYa meleV jAswi praBAva bIri , hqxayaxa badiwa hAgU mE kE naduka ivugalYa meleV bahu kadimeV pariNAma uMtumAduva ORaXigalYannu kaMduhidiyalAgixeV .
ivu Igina varRagalYalli bahu sAmAnyavAgi balYakeVyalli iveV .
I guMpina sAmAnya ORaXigalYu eVMxareV sAl , ArsipreVnalin mawwu tar .
I suXArisixa ORaXigalYu mAwreV , iMjakRan hAgU xravarUpaxalli wayArAguwwaveV .
I ORaXigalYannu mAwreV aWavA xravarUpaxalli sevisixareV SvAsakoSagalYa meleV pariNAma uMtAgalu halavu nimiRagalYu AguwwaveV .
ekeVMxareV bAyiMxa sevisixa ORaXi rakwagawavAgi anaMwara SvAsakoSakkeV rakwa paricalaneVya mUlaka walupabekaRteV .
I vilYaMbavannu kadimeV mAdalu hAgU ORaXi heVccu pramANaxalli neravAgi seralu in sAXanagalYannu wayArisalAgixeV .
ivugalYalli ORaXiyannu xravarUpaxalli oVwwadaxalli iduva erpAdu mAdiruwwaxeV .
usirannu oVlYageV weVgeVxukoVlYlYuvAga , I in balYasi ORaXi saNNa saNNa hanigalYa rUpaxalli SvAsanAlYagalYannu praveSisuvaMweV mAdabahuxu .
ixariMxa wakRaNa usirAta sarAga Agaballuxu .
aRtu wIvravallaxa aswamAxalli in bahalYa prayojanakAri AgiruwwaveV .
ivugalYannu balYasuva munna , vExyaralli salaheV hAgU hegeV balYasabekeVMba wilYuvalYikeV padeVyuvuxu agawya .
yAva ORaXiye Agali , bereVbereV rogigalYalli bereVbereV pramANaxa pariNAmavannu uMtu mAdabahuxu .
ORaXigalYiMxa nirIkRisaxixxa pariNAmagalYu enAxarU uMtAxalli , rogi wanna vExyaroVdaneV carcisi cikiwseVyalli sUkwa mArpAdugalYannu mAdikoVlYlYabeku Aguvuxu .
ORaXiya parimANa :- vExyaru ORaXiyannu bareVxu koVduvAga , I mAwreV xinakkeV iRtu sala , iRtu hoVwwinalli sevisi eVMxu sAmAnyavAgi helYuwwAraRteV .
halavu velYeV rogigalYu I rIwiya miwiyannu mIri wamma manassigeV wocixaMweV ORaXigalYannu sevisuwwAreV .
I aByAsa oVlYlYeVyaxalla .
ORaXiya xuRpariNAmagalYu uMtAguvuxakkeV sAmAnya kAraNa ixe AgiruwwaxeV .
sakAlaxalli vExyara salaheV padeVxareV bega kAyileV hawotigeV baruva sAXyaweV heVccu .
uxAharaNeVgeV , soMkiniMxa aswamA jAswi Ayiwu aMxukoVlYlYoNa .
sAXAraNavAgi weVgeVxukoVMda mAwreVgalYannu heVccu pramANaxalli sevisixarU AMtibayAtik weVgeVxukoVMda hoVrawu kAyileV bega kadimeV Aguvuxilla .
nodoNa innU oVMxeVradu xina eVMxu upekReV mAdixareV , muMxeV oVMxeVradu vAra naralYabekAgabahuxu .
aMxareV kAyileV svalpa ulbaNagoVMdareV bega sUkwa kramagalYannu kEgoVlYlYuvuxu uciwa .
stirAyd ORaXigalYu mAnava xehaxalli bahu muKyavAxa nirnAlYa graMWigalYu iveV .
ivu hArmon viSiRta vaswugalYannu , mUwrapiMdagalYa meleV iruva adrinal graMWigalYa baggeV saMSoXaneVgalYu nadeVxu 1929ralli moVxala bArigeV diyAksikArton eVMbuxannu saMyojisalAyiwu .
anaMwara halavAru stirAyd prayoga SAleVyalli saMyoga mAdixxariMxa ivugalYa kArya mawwu pariNAmagalYa baggeV vivaragalYu wilYixubaMxavu .
adrinal graMWigalYiMxa uwpannavAguva stirAyd xehaxa viviXa aMgagalYalli uMtAgabahuxAxa uriyUwavannu kadimeV mAduwwaveV .
I mUlaBUwa guNakkAgiye stirAydgalYannu bahu viXavAxa kAyileVgalYalli upayogisalAguwwaxeV .
alarjik prawikriyeVyiMxalU uriyUwa uMtAguwwaxeV ; I uriyUwa SvAsanAlYagalYalli uMtAxareV aswamA ulbaNa AguwwaxeV eVMxu moVxale ariweVvu .
stirAyd ORaXigalYu alarjik uriyUwavannu kadimeV mAduvuxariMxa , aswamAxa wIvraweVyannu kadimeV mAduwwaveV .
AxareV stirAyd ORaXigalYa praBAva SvAsakoSagalYa meleV mAwra sImiwa Agiruvuxilla .
xehaxa iwara aMgagalYa meleV xuRpariNAmagalYannu uMtumAduva guNa iruvuxariMxa I ORaXigalYannu jAgarUkaweVyiMxa sevisabekAguwwaxeV .
muKyavAxa I xuRpariNAmagalYu eVMxareV :- xehaxa wUka jAswi Aguvuxu , muKa xappa Aguvuxu , bladpreVRar jAswi Aguvuxu , dayAbitis kANisikoVlYlYuvuxu , iwyAxi .
keVlavaralli kaNNina pareV vqxXApyakkeV muMceVye baruvuxu , mUlYeVgalYu SiWila Aguvuxu , soMkugalYannu wadeVgattuva Sakwi kadimeV Aguvuxu - I pariNAmagalYU uMtAgabahuxu .
I rIwi apekRiwa allaxa pariNAmagalYu ixxarU , stirAyd bahu prayojanakAriyAxa ORaXigalYu .
wIvravAgi hAgU paxe paxe aswamAxiMxa bAXeVpaduva rogigalYu sUkwakramavAgi stirAyd balYasixareV kAyileVya hawoti sAXya Aguvuxu .
illi innoVMxu muKyAMSa mareVyabAraxu .
vExyaru , ' I mAwreVgalYannu oVMxu vAra upayogisi , naMwara baMxu worisi ' eVMxu salaheV koVttareV , ' I mAwreVyiMxa ceVnnAgi guNa AgixeV innU oVMxeVradu vAra weVgeVxukoVlYlYoNa ' eVMxu yAvAgalo bareVxu koVttixxa ORaXiyannu wiMgalYugattaleV sevisuvuxu sari alla .
AxareV I rIwi sanniveSagalYu asAmAnya enalla .
I weVrana upekReVyiMxa ORaXiya xuRpariNAma uMtAguva sAXyaweV bahalYa mattigeV jAswi Aguvuxu .
xehaxalli adrinal graMWigalYu xinaniwya niKaravAxa pramANaxalli kArtisonannu uwpawwi mAduwwiruwwaveV .
stirAyd niraMwara sevaneVyiMxa I graMWigalYu kArtison uwpannavannu bahumattigeV kadimeV mAduwwaveV ; avu swabXavAxaMweV AguwwaxeV .
I sWiwiyalli stirAyd sevaneVyannu haTAwwaneV nillisuvuxU sAXya illa .
ekeVMxareV , adrinal graMWigalYu swabXa sWiwiyiMxa punaH cewarisikoVMdu samarpaka pramANaxalli kArtison wayArisalu bahalYakAla bekAguwwaxeV .
bahukAla stirAyd sevaneV mAdixa rogi I kAraNaxiMxale sevaneVyannu bahu niXAnavAgi kadimeV mAdabekAguwwaxeV .
I saMxarBaxalli vExyara balYi salaheVyannU bereV ORaXigalYa balYakeVyannU paxe paxe mAdabekAgi baruwwaxeV .
oVttinalli stirAyd ORaXigalYu bahu pariNAmakAri AgixxarU , avugalYa sevaneVyannu vExyara salaheVya mereVgeV mAwra muMxuvarisabeku .
wIvravAxa aswamAxalli , iwara ORaXigalYoVMxigeV sUkwa parimANaxalli hAgU niyawakAlikavAgi balYasixareV , I ORaXigalYu rogiya xEnaMxina catuvatikeVgalYannu ArogyavAgi nadeVsikoVMdu hogabahuxu .
bahu wIvravAxa aswamA : stetas AswamAtikas :- keVlavu velYeV aswamA bahalYa wIvravAgi ulbaNisi rogiya Srama bahu jAswi AguwwaxeV .
sAXAraNavAgi balYasuva mAwreVgalYu , adreVnalin mawwu amEnoVPilin iMjakRan ubbasavannu kadimeV mAdalu Aguvuxilla .
I rIwi Axalli rogiyannu AspawreVyalli xAKalu mAdabekAguwwaxeV ; wurwu kramagalYannu kEgoVlYlYabekAguwwaxeV .
I parisWiwiyalli glUkos bAtaligalYannu drip mUlaka sawawavAgi koVdalAguwwaxeV .
I bAtalugalYalli amEnoPilin mawwu stirAyd ORaXiyannu heVccu pramANaxalli koVduwwAreV .
usirAtaxa Srama kadimeV mAdalu Aksijan koVdalAguwwaxeV .
I rIwiya cikiwseV sakAlaxalli nadeVxareV rogi oVMxeVradu xinaxalli sAmAnyavAgi guNamuKa AguwwAneV .
aswamAxiMxa xIrGakAla naralYuva rogi hAgU avana kutuMbaxavaru ariwirabekAxa viRaya oVMxannu illi oVwwi helYabeku .
AgAggeV ubbasaxiMxa naralYuvuxariMxa rogi halavu sala kAyileV jAswi ixxAgalU asaddeV mAdabahuxu .
I rIwi AxareV kAyileV haTAwwaneV ulbaNagoVMdu AspawreVgeV hogabekAxa prameya uMtAgabahuxu .
kromolin sodiyaM aswamAvannu hawotiyalli idalu nUwana viXAnagalYigeV hAgU ORaXigalYigAgi saMSoXaneVgalYu sawawavAgi nadeVyuwwiveV .
I prayawnagalYa PalavAgi kromolin sodiyaMna wayArikeV halavu varRagalYa hiMxeV sAXya Ayiwu .
rojar Altanyan eVMba britiR vijFAni I ORaXiya wayArikeVya praWama haMwagalYalli pramuKa pAwra vahisixxAneV .
I vijFAnigeVye aswamA ixxaxxu Akasmika Allaveno kromolin , kromon  eVMba viSiRta vaswugalYa guMpigeV seriruwwaxeV .
kromolin na viSeRa guNa eVMxareV , axu aswamAkkAgi sAXAraNavAgi balYasuva ORaXigalYaMweV kArya mAdaxiruvuxu ; aMxareV , kromolin SvAsanAlYagalYannu viswarisuvuxilla .
hAgU axu stirAydgalYaMweV alarjik uriyUwavannu kadimeV mAduvuxilla .
hAgAxareV aswamAxa wIvraweVyannu axu hegeV kadimeV mAduwwaxeV ?
IgAgale nAvu wilYixaMweV aswamAxalli alarjik prawikriyeVyiMxa histamIn srAva AguwwaxeV .
I histamIn mAst seVl uwpanna AguwwaveV eVMxU ariweVvu .
kromolin mAst histamIn sulaBavAgi hoVrabIlYaxaMweV mAduwwaxeV .
ixariMxa histamIn uMtAguva aswamA kadimeV AguwwaxeV .
aMxareV alarjik aMSagalYigeV rogiya prawikriyeV kadimeV AguwwaxeV .
illi I ORaXiya muKya guNavannU oVwwi helYabekAgixeV .
kromolinannu niyawakAlakkeV sevisuwwirabeku .
ubbasa baraxaMweV axu prawibaMXisuwwaxeVye hoVrawu , ubbasa SuruvAxa meleV yAva pariNAmavannU bIruvuxilla .
I vivaravannu vExyaroVdaneV carcisi ORaXiya saxupayoga mAdikoVlYlYuvuxu sUkwa .
kromoVlin , aswamAxalli upayogisalpaduva iwara mAwreV , histamIn woVMxareV jAswi AxAga upayogisuva warahaxa ORaXi alla .
I ORaXiya sevaneVyU viSiRta rIwiyaxu .
bilYiya pudiya rUpaxalli iruva kromoVlinannu SvAsakoSagalYoVlYakkeV usiru eVlYeVxukoVlYlYuvAga neravAgi sevisabeku .
ixakkAgi I ORaXiya kyApsUlgalYoVdaneV prawyekavAxa in oVMxannu koVMdu upayogisalAguwwaxeV .
ixannu hegeV sariyAxa rIwiyalli upayogisabeku eVMbuxannu vExyaralli kaliyuvuxu agawya .
I ORaXiyannu kAyileV jAswi Axalli , bereV mAwreV aWavA iMjeVkRan vExyara salaheVya mereVgeV weVgeVxukoVlYlYabeku .
kArtison sevisuwwiruva rogigalYalli keVlavaru kromoVlin sahAyaxiMxa kArtison balYakeVyannu nillisuvuxaralli yaSasvi AguwwAreV .
makkalYalli aswamA wIvra Agixxalli kromoVlin halavAru sala prayojanakAri AguwwaxeV ; hAgU odAtaxiMxa uMtAguva aswamAvannu wadeVgattuwwaxeV .
keVlavu rogigalYu wamageV malYeVgAlaxalli mAwra aswamA baruvuxannu kromoVlin mUru nAlku wiMgalYu upayogaxiMxa bahumattigeV kadimeV mAdikoVlYlYabahuxu .
oVttinalli sUkwavAgi upayogisixalli , kromoVlin praBAvaSAli ORaXi .
xuRpariNAmagalYu illaxiruvuxe ixara muKya anukUla .
stirAyd in kArtison ORaXigalYu aswamAvannu hawotiyalli iduva SakwiyannU padeVxixxarU , halavu xuRpariNAmagalYiMxa avugalYannu sawawavAgi upayogisuvuxu hAnikara Agabahuxu eVMxu hiMxeV ariweVvu .
stirAyd mAwreVgalYannu sevisi , ORaXi rakwagawavAgi SvAsakoSagalYa meleV pariNAma uMtumAduvuxariMxa , heVccu pramANaxalli sevisabekAguwwaxeV .
ixara baxalu kArtison in rUpaxalli balYasixareV awi sUkRma pramANaxalli ORaXiya sevaneV sAXya Agabahuxu .
I viRayavannu kUlaMkuRavAgi saMSoXisi , stirAyd in wayArisalAgixeV .
ivugalYannu balYasixareV stirAyd galYa mAwreVgalYa sevaneV bahumattigeV kadimeV Aguva sAXyaweV ixeV .
ivu kalYeVxa xaSakaxa awi muKya saMSoXaneVgalYu eVMxareV wappu AgalAraxu .
iwara ORaXigalYu a . histamIn viroXi ORaXigalYu : aswamAxoVdaneV bahu sAmAnyavAgi kaMdubaruva alarjik neVgadiyannu Samana mAdalu histamIn viroXi ORaXigalYannu balYasalAguwwaxeV .
ivu sInu , mUgu kattikoVlYlYuvuxu mawwu soruvuxu ivannu kadimeV mAduwwaxeV .
I ORaXigalYu SvAsakoSagalYa meleV gaNanIya pariNAma uMtumAdaxixxarU neVgadiya bAXeVyannu hawotiyalli iduwwaveV .
I guMpina ORaXigalYa muKya ananukUla eVMxareV keVlavu maMparu baruvaMweV mAduvuxu .
I weVrana rogigalYalli ORaXiyannu rAwri malaguva hoVwwinalli mAwra upayogisabekAgabahuxu .
A . keVmmina ORaXigalYu : halavAru bageVya keVmmina ORaXigalYu xina balYakeVyalli iveV .
ivu muKyavAgi eVradu waraha praBAva ulYlYa ORaXigalYannu hoVMxiruwwaveV - oVMxu , histamIn viroXi aMSa ; eVradu , kaPa sulaBavAgi hoVrabaruvaMweV mAduva aMSa .
keVlavu wayArikeVgalYalli eVPeVdrinannU serisiruwwAreV .
wAwkAlikavAgi keVmmina wIvraweVyannu kadimeV mAdalu I ORaXigalYu neVravu Agaballavu .
alarjiya viSiRta nivAraNeV :- ixuvareVgU vivarisixa cikiwsA kramagalYu rogiya SvAsanAlYagalYa saMkuciwa parisWiwi hAgU avugalYa uriyUwavannu kadimeV mAduvuxara mUlaka aswamAvannu hawotigeV waruwwaveV eVMxu ariweVvu .
AxareV mUlaBUwavAgi alarjiyiMxa uMtAguva aswamAxa wIvraweVyannu kadimeV mAdalu bereV yAvuxAxarU prakAra ixeVye ?
alarjiya prawikriyeVyannu kadimeV mAdalu sAXyave ? I xikkinalli balYasalAguwwiruva alarjiya viSiRta nivAraNeVye muKya pragawi .
ixara vivaragalYannu sWUlavAgi wilYiyuva .
malYeVgAla Suru AxoVdaneV sAXya heVccAguwwixxa rogiyoVbbana uxAharaNeVyannu nodoNa .
ivanigeV maneV XUlYigeV alarji iruvuxu sulaBavAgi wilYixubaMwu .
allaxeV malYeVgAla Suru AxAga parisaraxalli iruva halavu sAmAnya parAgagalYu , bURtugalYu ivakkeV alarji irabahuxeV ?
ixannu pawweV haccalu rogiya carmaxa meleV halavAru parIkReVgalYannu mAdabekAguwwaxeV .

' leVkka pariSoXanA SAswra ' eVMba I graMWavannu muKyavAgi viSva vixyAnilayagalYa paxavi waragawiya vANijya vixyArWigalYigAgi racisalAgixeV .

hubbalYlYi - 21 28-8-1984 keV. di. basavA prakASakara mAwu ' leVkka pariSoXanA SAswra ' I graMWavannu kannada mAXyamaxalli kAleju mattaxalli vyAsaMga mAduva vixyArWigalYigeV vANijya viRayaxalli upayukwa AguvaMweV racisalAgixeV .
' leVkka pariSoXanA SAswra ' viRayaxa baggeV IvareVgU kannada BAReVyalli prakata Agiruvuxu viralYa .
I graMWavannu racisixa proV. keV. di. basavA avarigU hAgU aMxavAgi muxrisi koVtta umA priMtars na mAlikarigU kqwajFaweVgalYu .
prakASakaru praveSikeV aXyAya leVkka pariSoXaneVya mUla ' leVkka pariSoXaneV ' eVMbuxu AMgla BAReVya ' pariSoXaneV ' eVMba paxaxa sarisamAna kannada paxa .

lyAtin BAReVyalli ' AdEr ' eVMxareV ' kelYu ' aWavA ' Alisu ' eVMxu arWa .
prAcIna kAlaxalli vyApArasWarigeV wamma leVkkaxa puswakagalYannu bareVyuva gumAswara meleV apanaMbikeV AxAga , avugalYannu pariSoXisi , sawyAsawyaweVyannu kaMduhidiyalu avaru keVlavu vyakwigalYannu nemisuwwixxaru .
I vyakwigalYu gumAswarannu kareVxu , leVkka pawragalYa baggeV avaru helYuvuxannu kelYuwwixxaru mawwu naMwara avugalYa sawyAsawyaweVya baggeV wamma aBiprAya helYuwwixxaru  .
hIgeV I vyakwigalYu leVkka pawragalYannu pariSoXisuwwa ixxuxariMxa , avarigeV ' leVkka pariSoXakaru ' eVMxU , mAduva I kAryakkeV ' leVkka pariSoXanA SAswra ' eVMxU kareVyalAyiwu .
Iga pracaliwaxalli iruva leVkka pariSoXanA SAswravu niKaravAgi yAvAga aswiwvaxalli baMxiwu eVMxu helYuvuxu kaTiNa .
sAvirAru varRagalYa hiMxeV , ijipwa , grIk mawwu roman cakrAXipawigalYu sArvajanika Aya-vyayagalYannu pariSIlisalu karaNikarannu nemisuwwixxaru eVMxu ArWika iwihAsavu helYuwwaxeV .
sarakAraxa AxAya - veVccagalYannu pariSIlisi , avugalYa sawyAsawyaweVyannu cakrAXipawigalYigeV wilYisuvuxu Agina leVkka pariSoXaneVya muKya uxxeSa Agiwwu .
aMxareV Aga leVkka pariSoXaneVyu haNaxa levA-xevi vyavahAragalYigeV mAwra sImiwa Agiwwu mawwu axu kevala sArvajanika haNakAsina vyavahAragalYigeV mAwra parimiwa Agiwwu .
KAsagi vyavahAra kRewraxalli axara avaSyakaweVye kaMdu baralilla .
ekeV eVMxareV , Agina kAlaxalli gAwra bahalYa cikkaxu Agiwwu mawwu vyApArasWaru hAgU uwpAxakaru wamma haNaxa levA-xevi vyavahAragalYannu svawaH wAve avugalYa leVkkavannu saha avaru svawaH wAve bareVxiduwwixxaru .
hIgeV haNaxa levAxevi vyavahAragalYannu svawaH mAduvAga mawwu leVkka pawragalYannu svawaH bareVxiduvAga , leVkka pariSoXaneVya avaSyakaweV uMtAguvuxilla .
AxareV avugalYannu iwararigeV oVppisixAga , avugalYa sawyAsawyaweVyannu wilYixukoVlYlYalu leVkka pariSoXaneVya avaSyakaweV uMtAguvuxu svABAvika eVMbuxu ixariMxa goVwwAguwwaxeV AxuxariMxa , Agina kAlaxalli KAsagi kRewraxalli leVkka pariSoXanA SAswrakkeV prAmuKyaweV ixxilla .
AxareV krameNa , vANijya vyavahAragalYu aXika AxaMweV mawwu mArukatteVgalYu viswqwa AxaMweV , leVkka pariSoXaneVya avaSyakaweV aXika AxaMweV , axakkeV heVccina prAmuKyaweV laBisawoVdagiwu .
15ne SawamAnaxalli yuropa KaMdaxa halavAru rARtragalYalli vANijyoxyama kRewraxalli keVlavoVMxu mahawvaxa vANijyoxyama beVlYeVxixxariMxa , leVkkaSAswra mawwu leVkka pariSoXanA SAswragalYa beVlYavaNigeVgeV heVccina avakASa sikkiwu .
kri. Sa. 1494ralli italiya vhenis nagaraxa lyUka peVsiyoVlo eVMbavanu praWama bArigeV xvi-namUxu paxXawiya leVkka SAswravannu kaMduhidixanu .
ixariMxa vANijyoxyama saMsWeVgalYigeV wamma leVkkavannu uwwama rIwiyalli accukattAgi SAswrIyavAgi bareVxidalu sAXya Ayiwu .

aMxiniMxa , leVkka pariSoXanA SAswraxa vyApwi mawwu leVkka pariSoXakara karwavya hAgU hoVNeVgArikeVgalYalli bahalYaRtu baxalAvaNeVgalYu AguwwA baMxiveV .
18 mawwu 19ne SawamAnaxalli saMBavisixa kEgArikA mawwu vANijya krAMwiya mUlaka , vANijyoxyama kRewraxalli bahalYaRtu baxalAvaNeVgalYu Axavu .
ekavyakwi saMsWeVgeV baxalAgi , pAlugArikeVgalYu mawwu bqhaw pramANaxa kUdu baMdavAlYa saMsWeVgalYu vyApakavAgi aswiwvaxalli baMxavu .

I moVxalu leVkka pariSoXaneVyu kevala haNaxa levAxevi vyavahAragalYa waniKeVgeV mAwra sImiwa Agiwwu .
AxuxariMxa leVkka pariSoXaneV eVMxareV leVkkaxa puswakaxalli kevala guruwugalYannu hAkuvuxalla aWavA aMki - aMSagalYannu mAwra parIkRisuvaxalla aWavA leVkkapawraxalli kaMdubaruva wappu aWavA vaMcaneVya aMSagalYannu pawweV haccuvuxalla .
axu ivu eVllavugalYigiMwalU heVccina arWa vivaraNeVyannu hoVMxixeV .

BArawaxalli leVkka pariSoXaneV : BArawaxalli kri. Sa. 1913ravareVgU , kaMpanigalYigeV leVkka pariSoXaneVyu Agiwwu .
AxareV kri. Sa. 1913ra BArawIya kaMpanigalYa kAyixeVyu mAwra axannu kaddAyavannAgi mAdiwu .
I kAyixeVyu praWama bArigeV leVkka pariSoXakana arhaweVgalYannu sUcisiwu allaxeV , avana karwavya , hoVNeVgArikeV mawwu aXikAragalYannu spaRtavAgi vivarisiwu mawwu avanannu nemisuva viXAnavannU sUcisiwu .
muMxeV kri. Sa. 1932ralli keMxra sarakAravu ' BArawIya leVkkaSAswra maMdalYi ' oVMxannu sWApisi , leVkka pariSoXakaru AguvavarigeV anukUla AguvaMweV keVlavu niyamAvalYigalYannu racisiwu .

I xqRtiyiMxa leVkka pariSoXaneVya vyAKyeVyannu I rIwiyAgi koVdabahuxu .
' oVMxu vyavahAri saMsWeVya leVkkaxa puswakagalYallina xAKaleVgalYa sawyAsawyaweVyannu wilYixukoVlYlYalu , arhanAxa oVbba svawaMwra vyakwiyiMxa axara leVkkaxa puswakagalYannu mawwu avugalYigeV saMbaMXisixa kAgaxa pawragalYannu kUlaMkuRavAgi pariSIlisuvuxe leVkka pariSoXaneV AgixeV .

amerikeVya suprasixXa leVkkaSAswrajFa mawwu leKakaru Axa mAMtgomeVri avara prakAra , ' yavuxAxarU oVMxu vyavahAra saMsWeVya haNakAsina vyavahAragalYannu mawwu avugalYiMxa Axa pariNAmavannu kaMduhidiyalu mawwu avugalYa baggeV varaxi sallisalu A saMsWeVya leVkkaxa puswakagalYannu mawwu xAKaleV pawragalYannu suvyavasWiwavAgi pariSIlisuvuxe leVkka pariSoXaneV AgixeV .
' spEsara mawwu peVglara eVMbavara prakAra , ' leVkka pariSoXakanu wanageV xoVreVwa mAhiwiyiMxa mawwu wanageV nIdixa hAgU leVkkaxa puswakagalYu oVxagisixa vivaraNeVyiMxa , oVMxu vyavahAri saMsWeVya aDAveV pawrikeVyu vyavahAraxa nEja ArWika parisWiwiyannu biMbisuvaMweV wayArisalpattixeVyo hegeV , illaxixxareV axu yAva rIwiyalli asawya AgixeV aWavA asamarpaka AgixeV eVMbuxannu wanageV wqpwi Aguva rIwiyalli kaMduhidiyalu axara leVkkaxa puswakagalYannu , leVkkapawragalYannu mawwu jamA hAgU Karcina pAvawigalYannu kUlaMkuRavAgi pariSIlisuvuxe leVkka pariSoXaneV AgixeV .

' jeV. Ar. bAtlibAy avara prakAra , ' lABa naRtaxa ' KAweVyu worisuvaMweV oVMxu nirxiRta avaXiya vyavahAraxa pariNAmagalYu mawwu aDAveV pawrikeVyu biMbisuvaMweV haNakAsina sWiwigawigalYu sariyAgi mawwu samarpakavAgi nirXarisalpattiveVye hegeV mawwu avugalYannu wayArisalu javAbxArarAxa vyakwigalYiMxale avu hegeV eVMbuxannu kaMduhidiyuva uxxeSaxiMxa , vyavahAri kAgaxa pawragalYu mawwu jamA mawwu Karcina pAvawigalYa sahAyaxiMxa bareVyalpatta leVkkaxa puswakagalYannu I kAgaxa pawragalYoVMxigeV kUlaMkuRavAgi mawwu sUkRmavAgi pariSIlisuvuxe leVkka pariSoXaneV AgixeV .

1 gumAswara wappugalYu : 2 wAwvika wappugalYu : 1 gumAswara wappugalYu : saMsWeVya gumAswaru leVkka bareVyuvAga kEwappi mAdixa wappugalYu gumAswara wappugalYu AgiveV .
I wappugalYannu keVlYaginaMweV viMgadisalAgixeV .
bitta wappugalYu , bareVyuvAga uMtAxa wappugalYu , immadiya wappugalYu , sarixUgisuva wappugalYu , bareVyaxe bittiruva wappugalYu : sAmAnyavAgi gumAswara alakRawanaxiMxa iMwaha wappugalYu saMBavisuwwaveV .
yAvuxe vyavahAravannu leVkkaxa puswakagalYalli pUrwiyAgi illaveV BAgaSaH bareVyuvuxanne bittAga , iMwaha wappu saMBavisuwwaxeV .
oVMxu vyavahAravannu pUrwiyAgi bareVyuvuxannu bittixxareV , axariMxa bAkigalYa wAlYeVpattiya meleV yAva pariNAmavU Aguvuxilla .
uxAharaNeVgeV , mAlina uxxari KarIxiyannu KarIxi puswakaxalli aWavA uxxari mArAtavannu vikraya puswakaxalli bareVyaxeV bittubiduvuxu .
iMWa wappugalYiMxa saMsWeVya lABa - naRtaxa KAweV mawwu aDAveV pawrikeVgalYa meleV A wappugalYa svarUpakkeV  anuguNavAgi pariNAma AguwwaxeV .
AxareV iMwaha wappugalYannu kaMduhidiyuvuxu bahalYa kaTiNa .
AxarU leVkka pariSoXakanu KarIxi patti , vikraya patti , mAlina xAswAnu puswaka moVxalAxavugalYannu kUlaMkuRavAgi pariSIlisi , wappugalYannu , kaMduhidiyabahuxAgixeV .
keVlavu sala , oVMxu vyavahAravannu BAgaSaH bareVyalAguwwaxeV .
uxAharaNeVgeV , uxxari KarIxiya vyavahAravannu KarIxi puswakaxalli bareVxu , KAweV puswakaxalli pUrEkeVxArana KAweVgeV axannu erisuvuxannu bittAga , BAgaSaH wappu uMtAguwwaxeV .
BAgaSaH wappugalYiMxa bAkigalYa wAlYeVpattiyu bAyigU duvuxilla AxxariMxa , avugalYannu sulaBavAgi kaMduhidiyabahuxu .
bareVyuvAga saMBavisuva wappugalYu : leVkkaxa mUla puswakagalYalliye aMxareV rojavahigalYalli mawwu KAweVvahiyalliye vyavahAragalYannu pUrwiyAgi illaveV BAgaSaH wappu bareVxAga , iMwaha wappugalYu saMBavisuwwaveV .
uxAharaNeVgeV , 1450 rU KarIxiya vyavahAravannu KarIxi puswakaxalliye 1540 eVMxu bareVyuvuxu .
hIgeV leVkkaxa mUla puswakagalYalli saMBavisixa wappugalYiMxa bAkigalYa wAlYeVpattiya meleV yAvuxe pariNAma Aguvuxilla .
ekeVMxareV oVMxe moVwwaxiMxa oVMxu KAweVgeV Karcu , innoVMxu KAweVgeV jamA bareVyalAgiruwwaxeV .
sahAyaka puswakagalYa niyawakAlika baxalAvaNeVgalYannu mAduvAga , KAweVgalYa Karcina mawwu jameVya BAgagalYa baxalAvaNeVgalYannu mAduvAga , mawwu avugalYa bAkiyannu weVgeVyuvAga , sahAyaka vahigalYiMxa KAweVgalYigeV erisuvAga , KAweV bAkigalYannu muMxuvarisuvAga , sahAyaka roja puswakagalYiMxa KAweVgalYigeV erisuvAga , KAweVya Karcina BAgakkeV erisuvuxara baxalu jameVya BAgakkeV erisuvuxu , wappu moVwwavannu KAweVgeV erisuvuxu ive moVxalAxavu BAgaSaH wappugalYu AgiveV .
ivugalYiMxa bAkigalYa wAlYeVpattiyalli vyawyAsa uMtAguwwaxeV .
leVkkaxa mUla puswakagalYalli saMBavisixa wappugalYannu kaMduhidiyuvuxu kaTiNa .
AxareV BAgaSaH wappugalYannu sulaBavAgi kaMduhidiyabahuxu .
immadiya wappugalYu : oVMxe vyavahAravannu eVradu sala leVkkaxa mUla puswakagalYalli bareVxAga , iMWa wappugalYu AguwwaveV .
iMWa wappugalYiMxa bAkigalYa wAlYeV pattiyalli yAva vyawyAsavU Aguvuxilla .
iMWa wappugalYannu kaMduhidiyuvuxu svalpa kaTiNa .
wappugalYu : leVkka bareVyuvAga oVMxu wappu innoVMxu wappiniMxa sarixUguwwaxeV aWavA oVMxu wappu , eVradu aWavA eVradakkiMwa heVccu wappugalYiMxa sarixUguwwaxeV , hIgeV iMWa wappugalYu AguwwaveV .
iMWa wappugalYiMxa bAkigalYa wAlYeVpattiyalli yAva vyawyAsavU Aguvuxilla .
uxAharaNeVgeV , ' a ' na KAweVgeV 100 rU Karcu hAkabekAgiwwu .
AxareV kEwappi kevala 10 rU Karcu hAkalAguwwaxeV .
axe velYeVgeV , ' ba ' na KAweVgeV 10 rU Karcu hAkabekAgiwwu .
AxareV avana KAweVgeV 100 rU Karcu bareVyalAguwwaxeV .
illi ' a ' na KAweVgeV 90 rU. kadimeV Karcu bareVxaxxu ' ba ' na KAweVgeV 90 rU. aXika Karcu bareVyuvuxariMxa , oVMxu wappu innoVMxu wappiniMxa sarixUguwwaxeV .
axaraMweV , ' a ' nigeV 100rU mAlannu mArAta mAdi , ' a ' na KAweVgeV kevala 10 rU eVMxu Karcu bareVyalAgixeV mawwu KarIxi puswakaxa oVMxu wiMgalYa beriju 100 rU.galYiMxa aXika AgixeV .
illi saha , oVMxu wappu innoVMxu wappiniMxa , ' a ' na KAweVgeV 100 rU kadimeV Karcu bareVxaxxu mAlina KAweVgeV 100 rU. heVccu Karcu bareVxaxxu ivu eVradU oVMxakkoVMxu sarixUguwwaxeV .
axe prakAra , oVMxu KAweVya Karcina BAgaxa berijannu mAduvAga heVccu Axaxxu innoVMxu KAweVya jameVya BAgaxa berijannu mAduvAga aRte moVwwaxiMxa kadimeV AxAga , oVMxu wappu axara viruxXa Axa wappiniMxa sarixUguwwaxeV .
iMwaha wappugalYiMxa bAkigalYa wAlYeVpattiyalli yAva vyawyAsavU Aguvuxilla .
AxuxariMxa bAkigalYa wAlYeVpattiyiMxa iMwaha wappugalYannu kaMduhidiyalu baruvuxilla .
iMwaha wappugalYiMxa bAkigalYa wAlYeVpattiyalli yAva vyawyAsavU Aguvuxilla .
AxareV iMWa wappugalYannu kaMduhidiyuvuxu mAwra bahalYa kaTiNa .
wAwvika wappugalYu leVkkaSAswraxa niyamagalYa prakAra vyavahAragalYannu leVkkaxa puswakagalYalli bareVyaxixxAga , wAwvika wappugalYu saMBavisuwwaveV .
iMWa wappugalYu sAmAnyavAgi gumAswara ajFAnaxiMxa uMtAguwwaveV .
leVkkaSAswraxa mUlaBUwa wawvagalYu mawwu jamA Karcina niyamagalYa bageVgeV pUrwi jFAna illaxAga , iMWa wappugalYu AguwwaveV .
uxAharaNeVgeV , saMsWeVya oVMxu xoVdda pramANaxa veVccaxalli baMdavAlYaxa veVcca eVRtu mawwu kaMxAya veVcca eVRtu eVMbuxannu sariyAgi nirXarisaxiruvuxu , koVdabekAxa veVccaxa bAbugalYannu aWavA muMgadavAgi koVtta veVccaxa bAbugalYannu gaNaneVgeV weVgeVxukoVlYlYaxiruvuxu , sWirAswigalYa aWavA koVneVya Silku mAlina beVleVyannu sariyAgi kattaxiruvuxu , savakalYi , karadu sAla , saMSayAspaxa sAla moVxalAxavugalYannu sariyAgi nirXarisaxiruvuxu iwyAxi .
wAwvika wappugalYu gumAswara jFAnaxiMxa aWavA alakRyawanaxiMxa uMtAgabahuxu .
aWavA uxxeSapUrvaka AgiyU Agabahuxu .
saMsWeVyu uxxeSapUrvakavAgi heVccu lABa worisalu illaveV kadimeV naRta worisalu iMWa wappugalYannu mAdabahuxu .
ekeV eVMxareV wAwvika wappugalYiMxa bAkigalYa wAlYeVpattiya meleV yAva pariNAma AgaxixxarU , lABa - naRta KAweV mawwu pawriya meleV viparIwa pariNAma AguwwaxeV .
iMwaha wappugalYixxarU , bAkigalYa wAlYeVpattiyu bAyi kUduvuxariMxa , ivugalYannu kaMduhidiyuvuxu bahalYa kaTiNa .
ixU allaxeV , sAmAnya wapAsaNeVyiMxalU saha , iMWa wappugalYannu kaMduhidiyalu sAXya Aguvuxilla .
AxuxariMxa , leVkka pariSoXakanu iMWa wappugalYannu kaMduhidiyalu bahalYaRtu muMjAgraweVyannu vahisabekAguwwaxeV .
ixakkAgi avanu bahalYa jANawanaxiMxa vicAraNeVyannu mawwu waniKeVyannu kEkoVlYlYabekAguwwaxeV .
leVkka pariSoXaneVya prakAragalYu mawwu paxXawi .
leVkka pariSoXaneVya prakAragalYu leVkka pariSoXaneVyu muKyavAgiN_NN nAlku prakAra AgiveV .
avu yAvuvu eVMxareV - a ) SAsanabaxXa leVkka pariSoXaneV A ) pAlugArikeV leVkka pariSoXaneV ka ) KAsagi vyakwigalYa leVkka pariSoXaneV mawwu da ) nyAsa saMsWeV moVxalAxavugalYa leVkka pariSoXaneV a ) SAsanabaxXa leVkka pariSoXaneV , kAnUnina prakAra sWApisalpatta saMsWeVgalYa leVkkapawragalYa pariSoXaneVyannu AyA kAnUninalli viXisixa niyamagalYa prakAra mAdisabekAguwwaxeV .
AxuxariMxa ixakkeV ' SAsanabaxXa leVkka pariSoXaneV ' eVMxu kareVyuwwAreV .
I saMsWeVgalYu yAvuvu eVMxareV : kri. Sa. 1956ra BArawIya kaMpanigalYa kAnUnina prakAra sWApiwavAxa kaMpanigalYu .
kri. Sa. 1949ra byAMkiMg niyaMwraNa kAnUnina prakAra sWApiwavAxa byAMkiMg kaMpanigalYu .
kri. Sa. 1938ra vimA kAnUnina sWApiwavAxa vimA kaMpanigalYu .
viviXa XArmika kAnUnugalYa prakAra sWApiwavAxa sArvajanika mawwu Xarma nyAsagalYu .
sahakAri saMGagalYa kAnUnina prakAra sWApiwavAxa sahakAri saMGagalYu .
I saMsWeVgalYa leVkka pariSoXaneVyannu AyA kAnUninalli koVtta niyama nibaMXaneVgalYigeV anuguNavAgi kEkoVlYlYabekAguwwaxeV .
AxareV I saMsWeVgalYa AdalYiwagArarAgali aWavA saxasyarAgali leVkka pariSoXakana hakku - bAXyaweVgalYannu yAvuxe rIwiyalli parimiwagoVlYisalAraru aWavA kasixukoVlYlYalAraru .
aMxareV moVtakugoVlYisalAraru .
oVMxu velYeV avaru hAgeV mAdixareV , avara kqwiyu kAyixeVbAhira AguwwaxeV .
illi oVMxu kaMpaniya uxAharaNeVyanne weVgeVxukoVlYlYoNa .
kri. Sa. 1956ra BArawIya kaMpanigalYa kAnUnu leVkka pariSoXakana hakku bAXyaweVgalYannu mawwu karwavyagalYannu spaRtavAgi ulleKisuwwaxeV .
AxuxariMxa , kaMpaniya nirxeSakarAgali aWavA ReruxArarAgali leVkka hakku bAXyaweVgalYannu yAvuxe rIwiyiMxa nirbaMXisalAraru .
kaMpaniyu leVkka pariSoXakanannu kaddAyavAgi prawi varRa nemisabeku mawwu avaniMxa wanna leVkka pawragalYannu wapAsaNeV mAdisabeku .
ixakkeV ' SAsanabaxXa leVkka wapAsaNeV ' eVMxu kareVyuwwAreV .
ReruxAraru vArRika sAXAraNa saBeVyalli leVkka pariSoXakanannu nemisuwwAreV .
AxuxariMxa avanu ReruxArara prawiniXi .
ReruxArara haNavannu kaMpaniya nirxeSakaru xurupayoga padisikoVMdilla eVMbuxannu avanu KAwri mAdikoVlYlYabeku .
kaMpaniya leVkkapawragalYa bageVgeV muKyavAgi lABa naRta KAweV hAgU aDAveV pawrikeVgalYu kaMpaniya vyavahAraxa sawyAsawyaweVyannu worisuwwaveVyo illavo eVMbuxannu ReruxArarigeV wilYisabeku .
nirxeSakaru ReruxArariMxa cunAyiwarAxa AdalYiwaxa prawiniXigalYu AgiruvuxariMxa , avaru kaMpaniya melvicArakaru AgixxAreV .
avaru ReruxArara prawiniXiyU mawwu hiwaciMwakanU Axa leVkka pariSoXakanigeV kaMpaniya eVlla mawwu AwanigeV bekAguva agawyavAxa mAhiwiyannU oVxagisabekAguwwaxeV .
ixU allaxeV , Awanu kelYuva praSneVgalYigeV samarpakavAxa uwwaragalYannU koVdabekAguwwaxeV .
leVkkapawragalYu sari AgiveV , lABa naRta KAweVyu nijavAxa mawwu sariyAxa lABavannu worisuwwaxeV hAgU aDAveV pawrikeVyu kaMpaniya haNakAsina nijavAxa parisWiwiyannu worisuwwaxeV eVMbuxannu xqDapadisikoVMdaN_NNV naMwarave leVkka pariSoXakanu axara baggeV oVMxu pramANa pawravannu nIduwwAneV .
oVMxu velYeV , avanigeV keVlavoVMxu viRayagalYalli wqpwi AgaxixxareV , wanna pramANa pawraxoVMxigeV I viRayagalYa baggeV wanna aBiprAyavannU koVduwwAneV .
ReruxArarigeV leVkka pariSoXakanalli pUrwi naMbikeV iruwwaxeV .
AxuxariMxa leVkka pariSoXakanu nirxeSakara yAvuxe anuciwa praBAvakkeV oVlYagAgi sawyAMSavannu baccittu , wanna varaxiyannu nIdabAraxu , avanu wanna kAryavannu nirBayaxiMxa nirvahisabeku .
axe velYeVgeV , avanu nirxeSakara viRayaxalli anAvaSyavAgi apanaMbikeV saMSaya ittukoVMde wanna kAryavannu prAraMBisabAraxu .
wanna jANmeV mawwu buxXiSakwigalYannu upayogisi , wanageV agawyavAxa eVlla vivaragalYannU padeVyabeku .
mosa mawwu anyAyaxa prakaraNagalYu nadeVxixxareV , avugalYannu baccidalu prayawnisabAraxu .
avugalYannu avanu ReruxArarigeV wilYisabeku .
kaMpaniya leVkkapawragalYa wapAsaNeVyiMxa , iwara sAmAnya lABagalYoVMxigeV keVlYageV koVtta viSeRa lABagalYU laBisuwwaveV : ReruxArarigeV kaMpaniya leVkkapawragalYannu pariSIlisuva aXikAra iruvuxilla .
AxuxariMxa kaMpaniya leVkkapawragalYu sari AgiveV eVMba baggeV avarigeV BaravaseV bekAguwwaxeV .
aMWa BaravaseVyu kaMpaniya leVkka pariSoXakaniMxa avarigeV xoVreVyuwwaxeV .
kaMpaniya leVkka pariSoXakanu kaMpaniya leVkkapawragalYannu pariSoXisi , wanna varaxiyannu ReruxArarigeV oVppisuwwAneV .
avana varaxiyannu ReruxAraru sAmAnyavAgi naMbuwwAreV .
kaMpaniya prAmANika nOkarara meleV yogya niyaMwraNavannu hoVMxalu sAXya AguwwaxeV .
pariSoXakanu kaMpaniya haNakAsina BaxraweVgeV yogya salaheVyannu nIduvuxariMxa , yAvuxe rIwiya mosa aWavA KoVtti xAKaleV pawragalYa nirmANakkeV avakASa illaxaMwAguwwaxeV .
pAlugArikA saMsWeVgalYa leVkka pariSoXaneV pAlugArikA saMsWeVyu kaddAyavAgi leVkka wapAsaNeV mAdisabeku eVMba niyamavilla .
AxareV leVkka wapAsaNeVyiMxa aneka prayojanagalYu iruvuxariMxa , prawi varRa axara leVkkapawragalYa wapAsaNeV Aguvuxu oVlYlYeVyaxu .
leVkka pariSoXakana nemakakkeV eVlla pAlugArara oVppigeV avaSyaka .
kri. Sa. 1932ra BArawIya pAlugArikA kAyixeVyu leVkka pariSoXaneVya bageVgeV enannU helYuvuxilla .
AxxariMxa , leVkka pariSoXakana aXikAra , hakku bAXyaweV mawwu hoVNeVgArikeVgalYu pAlugAraru mawwu leVkka pariSoXakana naduveV Aguva oVppaMxaxa prakAra nirXarisalpaduwwaveV .
AxareV avugalYannu AgAggeV baxalAyisalu illi avakASa iruwwaxeV .
aneka saMxarBagalYalli , pAlugArikA saMsWeVya leVkkapawragalYannu wapAsisuvuxaroVMxigeV , axara leVkkapawragalYannU wayArisalu leVkka pariSoXakanannu kelYikoVlYlYuvuxariMxa , avanu axara leVkkawajFanu eVMxU keVlasa mAduwwAneV .
iMwaha saMxarBagalYalli avanu wanna hiwarakRaNeVgAgi wanna keVlasaxa nirxiRta svarUpavannu barahaxalli weVgeVxukoVlYlYuvuxu oVlYlYeVyaxu .
ixariMxa muMxeV yAvuxe warahaxa waMteVgeV avakASa illaxaMweV AguwwaxeV .
arhanAxa leVkka pariSoXakaniMxa leVkkapawragalYannu wapAsaNeV mAdisuvaxariMxa , iwara sAmAnya lABagalYoVMxigeV , keVlYagina viSeRa lABagalYu pAlugArikA saMsWeVgeV laBisuwwaveV .
pAlugAraralli uxBavisabahuxAxa waMteVgalYannu sulaBavAgi nivArisabahuxu .
hoVsa pAlugArarannu serisikoVlYlYuvAga , halYeVya pAlugAranoVbbanu pAlugArikeVyannu bittuhoguvAga aWavA niXana hoVMxixAga , saMsWeVya sunAmaxa mOlyavannu nirXarisuvAga mawwu pAlugAraru wamma leVkkagalYannu paraspara bageVharisikoVlYlYuvAga iMWa leVkka pariSoXaneVyiMxa bahalYa anukUla AguwwaxeV .
varamAna weVrigeVyannu nirXarisuvAga , leVkka wapAsisalpatta leVkkapawragalYannu weVrigeV aXikArigalYu heVccina vicAraNeV illaxeV oVppikoVlYlYuwwAreV .
pAlugArarigeV byAMku mawwiwara haNakAsina saMsWeVgalYiMxa sulaBavAgi sAlavannu padeVyalu sAXya AguwwaxeV .
leVkkapawragalYannu innU heVccu uwwama rIwiyiMxa hegeV idabeku eVMba baggeV leVkka pariSoXakanu pAlugArarigeV wilYisikoVdabahuxAgixeV .
KAsagi vyakwigalYa leVkkapawragalYa wapAsaNeV ekavyakwi oVdeVwanaxa vyApAri saMsWeVgalYu saha kaddAyavAgi wamma leVkkapawragalYa wapAsaNeVyannu mAdisuva niyamavilla .
AxarU aneka KAsagi vyApArasWaru wamma leVkkapawragalYannu arharAxa leVkka pariSoXakariMxa wapAsaNeV mAdisuwwAreV .
avaru sAmAnyavAgi halavAru mUlagalYiMxa bqhaw AxAyavannu padeVyuwwiruvuxariMxa mawwu avara veVccavu vEviXyamaya Agixxu axU saha xoVdda pramANaxalli iruvuxariMxa , avaru sAmAnyavAgi leVkka wapAsaNeVgeV prASaswya koVduwwAreV .
iMWa saMxarBagalYalli , leVkka pariSoXakanu leVkkapawragalYannu wayArisuva mawwu avugalYa sawyAMSavannu parIkRisuvavanAgiyU kArya nirvahisuwwAneV .
avanu oVbba KAsagi vyakwiyiMxa nemisalpaduvuxariMxa , wAnu enu mAdabekeVMba baggeV spaRtavAgi barahaxalli A vyakwiyiMxa bareVyisikoVlYlYuvuxu avanigeV hiwakaravu .
avana kArya vyApwiyu A KAsagi vyApArasWa aWavA uxximeVxAranoVMxigeV mAdikoVMda oVppaMxavannu avalaMbisiruwwaxeV .
avanu pUrwiyAgi leVkkapawragalYa wapAsaNeVyannu mAdabekAguwwaxeV .
moVxalu A vyApArasWana leVkkapawragalYu sariyAgi bareVyalpatta baggeV hAgU lABa naRta KAweV hAgU aDAveV pawrikeVgalYu sariyAgi wayArisalpatciveV eVMba baggeV avanu KAwri mAdikoVlYlYabeku .
KAsagi vyApArasWaru mawwu uxximeVxAraru wamma leVkkapawragalYa wapAsaNeVyiMxa keVlYageV koVtta lABagalYannu hoVMxuwwAreV : wanna leVkkapawragalYu sariyAgiveV eVMba baggeV mawwu wanna gumAswaru yAvuxe bageVya mosavannu mAdilla eVMba baggeV KAsagi vyApArasWanigeV Kaciwa AguwwaxeV .
wapAsisalpatta leVkkapawragalYu sariyAgi iruwwaveV mawwu varamAna weVrigeV aXikArigalYu oVppikoVlYlYuvuxariMxa , KAsagi vyApArasWanu koVdabekAxa varamAna weVrigeVyannu sulaBavAgi nirXarisalu sAXya AguwwaxeV .
leVkkapawragalYa viBAgaxa meleV yogya niyaMwraNa hoVMxalu KAsagi vyApArasWanigeV sAXya AguwwaxeV .
KAsagi vyApArasWanu niXana hoVMxixareV , avana vArasuxAraru wamma leVkkavannu sulaBavAgi yAvuxe waMteVyillaxeV bageVharisikoVlYlYabahuxu mawwu sarakArakkeV Aswi weVrigeVyannu koVdabahuxu .
nyAsa saMsWeVgalYannu leVkkapariSoXaneV xevAlaya , maTa moVxalAxa XArmika saMsWeVgalYannu mawwu sArvajanika hiwaxa SikRaNa saMsWeVgalYannu nodikoVlYlYalu nyAsa saMsWeV aWavA viSvasWa saMsWeVgalYannu sWApisuvuxuMtu .
axaraMweV , alpavayigalYigeV aWavA viXaveVyarigeV saMbaMXisixa AswigalYannu nodikoVlYlYalu saha nyAsa saMsWeVgalYannu sWApisuvuxuMtu .
nyAsa saMsWeVgalYa AdalYiwakkAgi keVlavu vyakwigalYannu AdalYiwagAraru eVMxu nemisalAguwwaxeV .
avarigeV ' nyAsaXArigalYu ' aWavA ' XarmaxarSigalYu ' eVMxu kareVyalAguwwaxeV .
nyAsa saMsWeVgalYa sWApaneVgeV muKya AXAra oVppaMxapawra .
ixakkeV nyAsa oVppaMxapawra eVMxu kareVyuwwAreV .
ixaralli nyAsa saMsWeVya AdalYiwaxa niyamagalYu mawwu nyAsa saMsWeVyu padeVyuva AxAyavannu upayogisuva bageVgina karArugalYu iruwwaveV .
I niyamagalYu mawwu karArugalYigeV anuguNavAgi nyAsaXArigalYu wamma kAryavannu nirvahisabekAguwwaxeV .
nyAsa saMsWeVgeV halavAru AxAyaxa mUlagalYu iruwwaveV .
I mUlagalYiMxa nyAsaXArigalYu AxAyavannu padeVyuwwAreV .

niraMwara leVkka pariSoXaneVya lABagalYu : leVkka pariSoXakanu niraMwara leVkkapawragalYannu wapAsisuwwiruvaxariMxa saMBavisixa wappugalYannu mawwu mosaxa prakaraNagalYannu sulaBavAgi mawwu SIGravAgi kaMduhidiyabahuxu .

AxareV BArawakkeV PrAnsina raPwugalYu heVccuwwaveV .
axara vyApAra sWiwiyu anukUla AguwwaxeV .
I pariNAmavAgi cinnavu BArawaxiMxa prAnsinoVlYageV harixu hoguwwaxeV .
moVxalu PrAnsiniMxa BArawakkeV baMxixxa cinnavannu Iga punaH axu padeVxukoVlYlYuwwaxeV .
Iga eVradU xeSagalYalli cinna moVxalu ixxa pramANakkeV baruwwaxeV .
AxxariMxa cinnavu niraMwaravAgi oVMxe xeSakkeV calisalu sAXya iruvuxilla .
AxxariMxa cinnaxa pramiwiyalli aMwararARtrIya vyApAraxa anAnukUlakara parisWiwiyu xIrGAvaXiyalli wAnAgiye mAya AguwwaxeV .
cinnaxa calaneVyu svayaMcAliwa Agixxu , sarkAraxa aWavA haNakAsina AdalYiwa nirvahaNeVgArara haswakRepa illaxeV nadeVyuwwaxeV .
ixe cinnaxa pramiwiya kArya viXAna .
suvarNa pramiwiya yaSasvI kAryAcaraNeVya avaSyakaweVgalYu : aMwararARtrIya suvarNa pramiwiyu yaSasviyuwavAgi kArya nirvahisalu keVlavu sanniveSagalYu agawya AgiveV .
ivugalYannu I keVlYaginaMweV vivarisabahuxu .
suvarNa pramiwiya niyamagalYa pAlaneV : suvarNa pramiwiyu yaSasvi yAgabekAxareV ixannu anusarisuwwiruva xeSagalYu ixara niyamagalYannu cAcUwappaxeV pAlisabeku .
I niyamagalYu eVMxareV : rARtragalYa naduveV cinnavu mukwavAgi calisuvaMwirabeku .
cinnaxa Amaxu mawwu raPwina meleV yAva nirbaMXavU irakUdaxu .
cinnavu Amaxu mAdalpattAga xeSaxalli haNaxa pUrEkeV heVccabeku mawwu cinnaxa raPwu mAdalpattAga xeSaxalli haNaxa pUrEkeV kadimeV Agabeku .
aMwararARtrIya sahakAra irabeku aMxareV , suvarNa pramiwiyannu anusarisuwwiruva eVllA rARtragalYa haNakAsina aXikArigalYu cinnaxa pramANaxalli baxalAvaNeVgalYu AxaMweV haNaxa pUrEkeVyalli vyawyAsa mAdalu paraspara sahakarisabeku .
beVleVya namyaweV : beVleVgalYu namyaweVyiMxa kUdixxu saralYa ArWika racaneV ixxareV suvarNa pramiwiyu yaSasvi AguwwaxeV .
baxalAxa sanniveSagalYigeV wakkaMweV beVleVgalYu , vewanagalYu mawwu AxAya sulaBavAgi baxalAguvaMweV irabeku .
cinnavu xeSaxa oVlYakkeV harixu baMxAga haNaxa pUrEkeVyannu heVccisuva mUlaka beVleV , uwpAxanA veVcca , vewana hAgU AxAyagalYu heVccalu avakASa mAdikoVdabeku .
cinnavu xeSaxiMxa hoVrageV pravahisixAga haNaxa pUrEkeVyannu kadimeV mAduva mUlaka beVleV , uwpAxanA veVcca , vewana mawwu AxAyagalYu kadimeV Agalu avakASa kalpisabeku .
beVleVgalYu kATiNyaxiMxa kUdixxu sarkAravu ArWika catuvatikeVgalYannu niyaMwrisuvuxAxareV suvarNa pramiwiyu yaSasviyuwavAgi kAryAcaraNeV mAduvuxilla .
vinimaya xaraxalli sWiraweV : suvarNa pramiwiyannu anusarisuwwiruva rARtraxalli haNakAsina nirvahaNeVgAraru vinimaya xaraxa sWiraweVyannu kAyxukoVlYlYabeku .
aMxareV cinnaxa pramANakkeV wakkaMweV nigaxi mAdixa vinimaya xaraxalli svalpavU vyawyAsa AgaxaMweV nigAvahisabeku .
hIgeV mAduvuxariMxa haNaxubbara mawwu haNa kugguvikeV saMBavisi haNaxa AMwarika mOlyavu asWira Aguvuxu sahaja .
AxAgyU suvarNa pramiwiya niyamagalYannu pAlisuva mUlaka haNaxa bAhya mOlyavannu sWiravAgi ittukoVlYlYabeku .
vinimaya xaraxa sWiraweV ixxAga mAwra aMwararARtrIya suvarNa pramiwiyu suvyavasWiwavAgi keVlasa mAduwwaxeV .
mukwa aMwararARtrIya vyApAra : suvarNa pramiwiyannu anusarisuwwiruva rARtragalYalli aMwararARtrIya vyApAravu mukwavAgi irabeku .
aMxareV vaswugalYa Amaxu mawwu raPwugalYa meleV yAva nirbaMXavannU viXisaxeV , vaswugalYu rARtragalYa naduveV mukwavAgi calisuvaMweV irabeku .
beVleVgalYu eruwwiruvAga raPwugalYu kadimeV AguwwaveV mawwu AmaxugalYu heVccuwwaveV .
ixakkeV viruxXavAgi , beVleVgalYu ilYiyuwwiruvAga raPwugalYu heVccuwwaveV mawwu AmaxugalYu kadimeV AguwwaveV .
cinnaxa oVlYacalaneV aWavA hoVracalaneVyiMxa I vyawyAsagalYu sari AguwwaveV .
AxxariMxa mukwa aMwararARtrIya vyApAraxa meleV nirbaMXa viXisuva mUlaka vaswugalYa mukwa calaneVyannu wadeVgattixareV I vyawyAsagalYu hAgeVye ulYiyuwwaveV .
AxxariMxa mukwa aMwararARtrIya vyApAraxa meleV nirbaMXa viXisuva mUlaka vaswugalYa mukwa calaneVyannu wadeVgattixareV I vyawyAsagalYu hAgeVye ulYiyuwwaveV .
AxxariMxa mukwa aMwararARtrIya vyApAra aswiwvaxalli ixxAga suvarNa pramiwiyu yaSasvi AguwwaxeV .
baMdavAlYa calaneVgeV wadeV : suvarNa pramiwiyu PalapraxavAgi kAryAcaraNeV mAdabekAxareV rARtragalYa naduveV baMdavAlYavu xoVdda pramANaxalli calisabAraxu .
keVlavu sAri sAmAjika , ArWika , rAjakIya muMwAxa kAraNagalYiMxAgi baMdavAlYavu xoVdda pramANaxalli rARtraxiMxa hoVrageV hogabahuxu .
baMdavAlYavu cinnaxa rUpaxalliye hoVrageV hoguvuxariMxa xeSaxalli kadimeV pramANaxa cinnavu ulYiyuwwaxeV .
Aga cinnaxa koVraweV saMBavisi , suvarNa pramiwiyannu wyajisabekAguwwaxeV .
AxareV vixeSi saMxAyaxa koVraweVyannu wuMbalu keVlavu sAri rARtragalYa naduveV baMdavAlYaxa alpakAlIna calaneV agawya AguwwaxeV .
uxAharaNeVgeV : oVMxu rARtraxalli AmaxugalYu aXikavAxareV baMdavAlYavu hoVrageV calisuvuxariMxa A rARtraxa saMxAya bAkiyalli asamawolana erpaduvuxu mawwu baddiya xaravannu erisi baMdavAlYavannu vixeSagalYiMxa AkarRisuva mUlaka I asamawolanavannu saripadisabahuxu .
AxareV xIrGAvaXiyalli , xoVdda pramANaxalli baMdavAlYavu rARtraxiMxa hoVrageV pravahisixareV suvarNa pramiwiya kArya viXAnakkeV XakkeV wagaluwwaxeV .
1914ravareVgeV viviXa xeSagalYalli suvarNa pramiwiyu awyaMwa yaSasviyuwavAgi kAryAcaraNeV mAdiwu .
Aga meleV vivarisixa sanniveSagalYeVllavU aswiwvaxalli ixxavu .
AxareV 1914ralli moVxalaneVya mahAyaxXaxa prAraMBaxa oVdaneV aMwararARtrIya ArWika vyavasWeVyalli wIvra baxalAvaNeVgalYu saMBavisixuxariMxa suvarNa pramiwiyu muggarisiwu .
svaxeSi mawwu aMwararARtrIya suvarNa pramiwi : cinnaxa pramiwiyu nirvahisuva kAryaxa AXAraxa meleV axannu svaxeSI suvarNa pramiwi mawwu aMwararARtrIya suvarNa pramiwi eVMxu eVradu BAgagalYAgi viMgadisalu AgixeV .
xeSaxalli haNaxa pUrEkeVyannu niyaMwraNaxalli iduva mUlaka nANyaxa AMwarika mOlyavannu kApAduvikeVyu cinnaxa pramiwiya moVxalaneVya pramuKa Xyeya AgixeV .
I kAryavu rARtraxa AMwarika vyavasWeVgeV saMbaMXisi iruvuxariMxa ixannu svaxeSi cinnaxa pramiwi eVMxu kareVyalu Aguvuxu .
axara eVradaneVya pramuKa karwavya eVMxareV nANyaxa vixeSi vinimaya xaraxalli sWimiwaweVyannu kApAduvuxu .
I kAryavu bAhya vyavasWeVya kuriwu Axuxu AxuxariMxa ixakkeV aMwararARtrIya cinnaxa pramiwi eVMxu heVsaru .
bereV rIwiyalli helYuvuxAxareV , cinnaxa pramiwiyu ekakAlaxalli nANyaxa AMwarika mOlyaxalli eruperugalYu AgaxaMweV kAyxukoVlYlYuva mawwu vixeSi vinimaya xaravannu sWiravAgi iduva eVradu kAryagalYannu nirvahisabeku AguwwaxeV .
xeSaxa praXAna nANyavu oVMxu nirxiRta pramANaxa mawwu AkAraxa cinnaxa mUlaka vyakwa Agixxu , haNaxa pramANavu cinnaxa niXiya pramANaxa meleV avalaMbisiruvuxe svaxeSI cinnaxa pramiwiya sUcaka AgixeV .
ixakkeV bereVyAgi , cinnaxa pramiwiyannu hoVMxiruva viviXa xeSagalYa nANyagalYannu paraspara saMparkisi avugalYa vinimaya xaraxalli sWimiwaweV sAXisuvaMweV kArya nirvahisuva aMwararARtrIya haNakAsu vyavasWeVye aMwararARtrIya cinnaxa pramiwiya prawIka AgixeV .
svaxeSI cinnaxa pramiwiyalli idI haNakAsina vyavasWeVye cinnaxa niXiya meleV niMwiruwwaxeV .
cinnaxa niXiya pramANaxalli Aguva baxalAvaNeVyu calAvaNeVgeV waralAguva kAgaxaxa notugalYa pramANavannu baxalAyisuwwaxeV .
I baxalAvaNeVyu byAMkugalYa nagaxu haNaxa pramANa mawwu avu nIduva sAlaxa gAwravannU parivarwisuwwaxeV .
sAlaxa gAwra jAswi ixxareV byAMkugalYalli iruva TevaNiyU heVccu AgirabekAguwwaxeV .
