sAlaxa gAwra kadimeV ixxareV TevaNiyU kadimeV pramANaxalli irabekAguwwaxeV .
AxxariMxa saMpUrNa haNakAsina vyavasWeVyu cinnaxa niXiyanne walYapAyavAgi hoVMxiruwwaxeV .
aMwararARtrIya cinnaxa pramiwiya mereVgeV cinnaxa pramiwiyannu hoVMxiruva viviXa xeSagalYa naduveV cinnavu mukwavAgi calisuwwaxeV mawwu cinnavu A xeSagalYalli vinimayaxa mAXyamavAgi hAgU mOlya mApanaxa sAXanavAgi keVlasa mAduwwaxeV .
I lakRaNagalYannu padeVxiraxixxareV axu aMwararARtrIya cinnaxa pramiwi AgaxeV kevala svaxeSI cinnaxa pramiwiyAgi biduwwaxeV .
cinnaxa pramiwiyannu hoVMxiruva eVradu xeSagalYa nANyagalYa naduvina vinimaya xaravu AyA nANyagalYu hoVMxiruva cinnaxa pramANaxa meleV nirXAra AguwwaxeV .
ixannu taMkasAleVya vinimayaxa xara eVMxu kareVyalAguwwaxeV .
suvarNa pramiwiya prayojanagalYu mawwu xuRprayojanagalYu : vAswavavAgi cinnaxa pramiwiya kAryAcaraNeVyiMxa halavu prayojanagalYu xoVrakuwwaveV AxarU axaralli halavu xuRprayojanagalYU iveV .
prayojanagalYu : 1 ) svayaMcAliwa kAryAcaraNeV : cinnaxa pramiwiyu svayaMcAliwavAgi kAryAcaraNeV mAduwwaxeV .
raPwugalYoVdaneV cinnavu xeSaxoVlYageV pravahisuwwaxeV mawwu AmaxugalYoVdaneV axu hoVra xeSagalYigeV pravahisuwwaxeV .
hIgeV cinnaxa mukwa calaneVya mUlaka saMxAyaxa Silkina koVraweV , haNaxubbara , kuggu prasaraNa moVxalAxa samasyeVgalYannu sulaBavAgi bageVharisabahuxu .
2 ) sArvajanikaralli heVccina viSvAsa sqRti : cinnaxa pramiwiyu janaralli heVccina viSvAsavannu sqRtisiwu .
calAvaNeVyalli iruva notugalYannu cinnaxa nANyagalYu aWavA cinnaxa gattigalYigeV sugamavAgi parivarwisabahuxAgixxuxe I viSvAsa sqRtigeV kAraNa Agiwwu .
amUlya lohavAxa cinnakkeV kAgaxaxa notugalYu aWavA nANyagalYa mOlyavannu saMparkisixxuxu heVmmeVpaduva saMgawi Agiwwu .
AxxariMxale cinnavu rARtrIya hAgU aMwararARtrIya vinimayaxa mAXyamavAgi svIkarisalpattiwwu .
3 ) AMwarika beVleVgalYa sWimiwaweV : AMwarika beVleVgalYalli sWimiwaweVyannu sAXisalu cinnaxa pramiwiyu awyuwwamavAxa vyavasWeV Agixxiwu .
cinnaxa bAhya pravAhaxoVdaneV haNakAsina pUrEkeV kadimeVyAgi beVleVgalYu ilYiyuwwixxavu mawwu cinnaxa oVlYa pravAhaxiMxa haNakAsina pUrEkeV heVccAgi beVleVgalYu eruwwixxavu .
aMxareV cinnaxa calaneVyu beVleVya mattaxa erilYiwagalYannu wadeVgattuwwixxiwu .
4 ) vinimaya xaraxa sWiraweV : cinnaxa pramiwiyannu anusarisuwwixxa prawiyoVMxu xeSavU wanna nANyaxa mOlyavannu cinnaxa mUlaka vyakwapadisuwwixxuxariMxa viviXa nANyagalYa naduvina vinimaya xaravu svABAvikavAgi AyA nANyavu oVlYagoVMdixxa cinnaxa pramANakkeV anusAravAgi nirXAra Aguwwiwwu .
I pariNAmavAgi vinimaya xaraxalli asWimiwaweV waleVxoralu sAXya Aguwwiralilla .
5 ) vixeSI haNaxa calAvaNeVgeV prowsAha : cinnaxa pramiwiyu aMwararARtrIya pramiwi AgixxuxariMxa ixannu anusarisuwwixxa rARtragalYa naduveV haNavu anirbaMXiwavAgi calisalu avakASa iwwu .
I kAraNaxiMxa aMwararARtrIya vyApAra mawwu hUteV sugamavAgi neVraveruwwixxavu .
SIGra ArWika aBivqxXigeV I saMgawiyu uwwejanakAri Ayiwu .
6 ) haNaxubbaraxa viruxXa rakRaNeV : sarkArakkeV kAgaxaxa notugalYannu manassigeV baMxaRtu pramANaxalli muxrisi calAvaNeVgeV waralu cinnaxa pramiwiyalli avakASave iruvuxilla .
haNaxa miwimIrixa pUrEkeVyiMxa anivAryavAgi saMBavisuva haNaxubbara mawwu anirbaMXiwa beVleV erikeVya samasyeVgalYu cinnaxa pramiwiya anusaraNeVyiMxa wappuwwaveV .
xuRprayojanagalYu : cinnaxa pramiwiyu apUrvavAxa aMwararARtrIya haNakAsina vyavasWeV AgixxAgyU axariMxa Aguwwixxa xuRprayojanagalYigeV enU koVraweV iralilla .
1 ) saralYa vyavasWeV Agiralilla : cinnaxa pramiwiyu saralYavAxa vyavasWeV Agixxiwu eVMxu anekaru vAxisuwwAreV .
AxareV I vAxaxalli hurulYilla eVMbuxu spaRta .
cinnaxa nANya pramiwi mawwu svalpa mattigeV cinnaxa gatti pramiwi sAmAnya janarigeV arWa Aguwwixxavu .
AxareV cinnaxa vinimaya pramiwiya kAryAcaraNeVyu janara grahikeVgeV mIrixxu Agiwwu .
ekeV eVMxareV I pramiwiyalli svaxeSI nANyavannu beroVMxu xeSaxa nANyakkeV parivarwisi , naMwara cinnakkeV parivarwisuwwixxuxariMxa yAva haMwaxalliyU cinnavannu nodalu avakASa iralilla .
nANyaxa mOlyavannu cinnaxa mUlaka vyakwapadisalAguwwaxeV eVMba saMgawiyU eVRto janarigeV wilYixiruwwiralilla .
2 ) heVccu SramaxAyaka AdalYiwa nirvahaNeV : cinnaxa nANya pramiwi mawwu gatti pramiwigalYu haNakAsina AdalYiwaxa xqRtiyiMxa sulaBavAxa vyavasWeVgalYu AgixxarU , cinnaxa vinimaya pramiwiya nirvahaNeVyu heVccu SramaxAyaka Agixxiwu .
cinnaxa nANya pramiwiyannu hoVMxixxa beroVMxu xeSaxa nANyakkeV svaxeSI nANyavannu saMparkisi A mUlaka cinnakkeV parivarwisuvuxu kaTiNakaravAxa kArya Agixxiwu .
3 ) xubAri vyavasWeV : amUlya lohavAxa cinnavannu nANyavAgi calAvaNeVgeV waruwwixxuxu aWavA gattigalYa rUpaxalli AXAravAgi ittukoVlYlYuwwixxuxu wuMbA xubAri vyavasWeV Agixxiwu .
cinnavannu saMrakRisuva baxalu aprayojanakAriyAgi balYasalAguwwiwwu allaxeV cinnaxa nANyagalYannu accuhAkalu bahalYa veVcca wagaluwwiwwu .
4 ) beVleV sWimiwaweVya wyAga : cinnaxa pramiwiya ASrayaxalli vinimaya xaraxa sWimiwaweV sAXaneV AxarU AMwarika beVleVgalYa sWiraweVyannu wyAga mAdabekAguwwiwwu .
nANyaxa vinimaya xaraxalli sWimiwaweVyannu kApAdalu cinnaxa mukwa calaneVgeV avakASa nIdalAgixxiwu .
AxareV cinnaxa oVlYapravAhaxoVdaneV beVleVgalYu eruwwixxavu mawwu cinnaxa hoVrapravAhaxoVdaneV beVleVgalYu kusiyuwwixxavu .
keVlavoVmmeV beVleVgalYa mattaxalli aXika pramANaxa eruperugalYu uMtAguwwixxavu .
ivu arWa vyavasWeVya sWiraweVyannu kaxaduwwixxavu .
5 ) yuxXa kAlakkeV hoVMxaxa pramiwi : cinnaxa pramiwiyu sarva kAlaxalliyU mAnyavAxa vyavasWeVyAgi keVlasa mAdalilla .
yuxXa mawwu ArWika gaMdAMwaragalYa kAlaxalli svaxeSI haNakAsina pUrEkeVyannu svawaMwravAgi heVccisuvuxu I pramiwiyalli sAXya iralilla .
AxxariMxa ixu SAMwi kAlaxa pramiwi Agixxiwe hoVrawu yuxXakAlaxa illaveV gaMdAMwara kAlaxa pramiwi Agiralilla .
ixu sArvakAlika AgixxareV mAwra ixakkeV oVlYlYeVya mAnyaweV xoVrakuwwiwwu .
leVkkaxa puswakagalYannu mawwu eVlla kAgaxa - pawragalYannu pUrwiyAgi , vivaravAgi wapAsaNeV mAdixareV mAwra , avanigeV wAwvika wappugalYannu kaMduhidiyalu sAXya AguwwaxeV .
wappugalYa sWAna - nirxeSana leVkkaxa puswakagalYalli uMtAgiruva wappugalYannu kaMduhidiyuvaxu mawwu aMWa wappugalYiMxa uMtAxa vyawyAsavannu worisi koVduvuxu sAmAnyavAgi leVkka pariSoXakana karwavya alla .
leVkkaxa puswakagalYannu kevala wapAsisuvuxu mAwra avana karwavya .
AxareV aneka saMxarBagalYalli leVkkaxa puswakagalYallina wappugalYiMxa bAkigalYa wAlYeVpattiyu bAyi kUdaxixxAga , mawwu saMsWeVya leVkkAXikAriyu A wappugalYannu kaMduhidiyalu asamarWanu AxAga , leVkka pariSoXakanigeV A wappugalYannu kaMduhidiyalu saMsWeVyu kelYikoVlYlYuwwaxeV .
Aga leVkka pariSoXakanu wappugalYannu kaMduhidiyalu aMxareV wappugalYu eVlli saMBavisiveV eVMbuxannu pawweV haccalu keVlYagina viXAnavannu anusarisabeku .
bAkigalYa wAlYeVpattiyannu sariyAgi wapAsisuvuxu .
sAlagArara mawwu sAligara yAxiyannu wAlYeVpattiyoVMxigeV holisi noduvuxu .
KAweVvahiyallina bAki worisuva eVlla KAweVgalYannu wAlYeVpattiyalli weVgeVxukoVMdixeVyo illavo eVMbuxannu parIkRisuvuxu .
nagaxu puswaka , KarIxi mawwu vikraya puswakagalYa berIjannu sariyAgi mAdixeVyo mawwu avugalYannu wAlYeVpattiyalli worisalAgixeVyo eVMbuxannu parIkRisuvuxu .
wAlYeVpattiya Karcina mawwu jameVya BAgagalYa berIjugalYannu pariSIlisuvuxu .
hIgeV parIkReV mAdixa naMwaravU wAlYeVpattiyu bAyi kUdaxixxareV , leVkkapuswakagalYa vivara wapAsaNeVyannu mAdabekAguwwaxeV .
mosagalYannu kaMduhidiyuvuxu gumAswaru uxxeSapUrvakavAgi mAdixa wappugalYu mosa aWavA vaMcaneVgalYu AguwwaveV .
gumAswaru wamma saMsWeVya mAlikarigeV mosa mAdabahuxu aWavA saMsWeVyoVdaneV vyavaharisuvavarigeV mosa mAdabahuxu .
mosaxa prakaraNagalYannu pawweV haccuvuxu leVkka pariSoXakana awyaMwa mahawvaxa karwavya AgixeV .
nija helYabeku eVMxareV mosaxa prakaraNagalYannu kaMduhidiyuvuxakkAgiye leVkka pariSoXaneVyannu kEkoVlYlYalAguwwiwwu .
mosaxa kqwigalYannu mUru prakAravAgi viMgadisabahuxu : 1 . haNaxa xurupayoga . 2 . sarakugalYa xurupayoga . 3 . sulYlYu leVkkapawragalYannu sqRtisuvuxu .
haNaxa xurupayoga : saNNa vyApAri saMsWeVyalli haNavu xurupayoga Aguvuxu bahalYa kadimeV .
ekeV eVMxareV alli svawaH mAlikane nagaxu haNaxa vyavahAragalYannu mAduwwAneV .
AxareV xoVdda vyApAri saMsWeVyalli haNaxa xurupayogakkeV heVccina avakASa iruwwaxeV .
ekeV eVMxareV alli nagaxu haNaxa vyavahAragalYannu mAdalu gumAswaru nemisalpattiruwwAreV .
I gumAswarigU saMsWeVya mAlikarigU nera saMparka , saMbaMXa iraxxariMxa , gumAswarigeV saMsWeVya haNavannu xurupayoga padisikoVlYlYalu avakASa siguwwaxeV .
haNavannu xurupayoga padisikoVlYlYalu nAlku avakASagalYu uMtu : padeVxa haNavannu nagaxu puswakaxalli pUrwiyAgi bareVyaxe iruvuxu .
padeVxa haNakkiMwalU kadimeV leVkkaxa puswakagalYalli bareVyuvuxu .
haNa pAvawi mAdaxeV pAvawi mAdixeV eVMxu bareVyuvuxu .
kadimeV haNa pAvawi mAdi , heVccu moVwwavannu bareVyuvuxu .
iMWa prakaraNagalYannu nagaxu puswakaxallina xAKaleVgalYannu mUla raSIxi aWavA pAvawigalYoVMxigeV holisi nodi mawwu sAlagArarannu mawwu sAligarannu saMparkisi kaMduhidiyabahuxu .
haNavannu xurupayoga padisikoVlYlYuva viXAnagalYu aneka .
keVlavu viXAnagalYannu keVlYageV vivarisixeV : sarakugalYannu nagaxu haNakkeV mArAta mAdixAga , axara xAKaleVyannu mAdaxeV , A haNavannu eVwwihAkuvuxu .
grAhakaniMxa baMxa haNavannu eVwwihAkalu , grAhakana KAweVgeV sodi eVMxu , hiMxirugisixa sarakugalYa mOlya eVMxu aWavA karadu sAla eVMxu sulYlYu jamA bareVyuvuxu .
sAligarigeV koVtta haNavannu eVwwihAkalu , aRtu moVwwavannu sodi eVMxu aWavA aRtu beVleVya sarakugalYannu hiMxirugisixeV eVMxu sAligara KAweVgeV sulYlYu Karcu bareVyuvuxu .
oVbba grAhakaniMxa baMxa haNavannu xurupayoga padisikoVlYlYalu , innoVbba grAhakaniMxa baMxa haNavannu moVxalina grAhakana KAweVgeV jameV bareVyuvuxu , mUraneVya grAhakaniMxa baMxa haNavannu innoVbbana KAweVgeV bareVyuvuxu .
mArAta aWavA hiMxirugisuva karArina mUlaka mawwu aMceVya mUlaka beVleV weVwwuva karArina mUlaka kalYisixa sarakugalYigAgi padeVxa haNavannu xurupayoga padisikoVlYlYalu sarakugalYu hiMxirugisalpattiveV eVMxu jamA Karcu bareVyuvuxu .
yAvuxe bAbwigAgi haNa Karcu AgixeV eVMxu illaveV sarakugalYannu nagaxigeV KarIxi mAdixeV eVMxu sulYlYu leVkka bareVxu , haNavannu xurupayoga padisikoVlYlYuvuxu .
murisixa huMdigalYa haNavannu eVwwihAki , A huMdigalYannu byAMkigeV jamA mAdalu kalYisixeV eVMxu leVkka bareVyuvuxu .
yAvanoVbba karadu sAlagAraniMxa vasUli mAdixa bAki haNavannu illaveV raxxi sAmAnugalYannu aWavA halYeVya sAmAnugalYannu mArAta mAdi baMxa haNavannu jamA Karcu mAdaxe eVwwihAkuvuxu .
haNavannu xeNigeV koVttixxeveV eVMxu sulYlYu jamA Karcu bareVxu , A haNavannu eVwwihAkuvuxu .
sarakugalYa xurupayoga : gumAswariMxa haNaxa xurupayoga AxaMweV , sarakugalYa xurupayogavU AguwwaxeV .
saNNa gAwraxa mawwu heVccu beVleVya sarakugalYannu gumAswaru sulaBavAgi xurupayoga padisikoVlYlYuwwAreV .
iMWa mosagalYannu kaMduhidiyuvuxu bahalYa kaTiNa .
ivugalYannu wadeVhidiyalu , sarakugalYa KarIxi mawwu mArAtagalYa sariyAxa jamA Karcu mAduvuxu , niyawakAlikavAgi sarakugalYa xAswAnu parIkRisuvuxu , oVttu lABavannu oVttu vikrayaxoVMxigeV SekadAvAru holisi noduvuxu , ive moVxalAxa viXAnagalYannu anusarisabekAguwwaxeV .
sulYlYu leVkka pawragalYannu sqRtisuvuxu : sulYlYu leVkka pawragalYannu sqRtisuvuxu sAmAnyavAgi kUdu baMdavAlYa saMsWeVgalYalli heVccAgi kaMdubaruwwaxeV .
ixannu awyaMwa javAbxAri ulYlYa vyakwigalYAxa vyavasWApakaru aWavA nirxeSakaru mAduwwAreV .
avaru ixannu oVMxu nirxiRta uxxeSa sAXisalu mAduwwAreV .
saMsWeVya nijavAxa haNakAsina parisWiwiyannu baccittu , AkarRakavAxa ciwravannu worisuvuxe sulYlYu xAKaleV pawragalYannu wayArisuvuxara muKya uxxeSa AgixeV .
saMsWeVya iMwaha leVkkapawragalYannu vIkRisuvavarigeV avu KoVtti xAKaleVgalYannu oVlYagoVMdiveV eVMbuxu goVwwAguvuxe illa .
sulYlYu xAKaleV pawragalYannu halavAru uxxeSagalYiMxa wayArisalAguwwaxeV .
sulYlYu leVkkapawragalYannu sqRtisi saMsWeVyu mAdixa nEja lABakkiMwalU heVccu lABavannu worisuwwAreV .
ixara uxxeSagalYu hIgeV iveV : lABaxa meleV prawiSawa nirxiRta xallAlYiyannu padeVyuwwixxareV heVccu xallAlYiyannu padeVyalu wamma xakRaweVyiMxa saMsWeVyu aXika pramANaxalli lABa galYisalu sAXya Ayiwu eVMbuxannu saMsWeVya ReruxArarigeV manavarikeV mAdikoVdalu mawwu avara beVMbalavannu padeVxu wamma sWAnaxalli muMxuvariyalu , avaru aXika pramANaxalli saMsWeVya RerugalYannu hoVMxixxareV heVccina xaraxa lABAMSavannu GoRisi , wamma RerugalYannu heVccina beVleVgeV mAri , heVccu lABa mAdikoVlYlYalu , saMsWeVya haNakAsina sWiwi uwwama ixeV eVMxu worisi heVccu sAla padeVyalu aWavA kaMpaniyu nIduva hoVsa RerugalYannu sulaBavAgi mArAta mAdalu iwyAxi .
keVlavu sala saMsWeVya nirxeSakaru aWavA vyavasWApakaru saMsWeVyu galYisixa nEja lABakkiMwalU kadimeV lABavannu worisuwwAreV .
ixara uxxeSagalYu hIgeV iveV : RerupeteVyalli saMsWeVya RerugalYannu kadimeV beVleVgeV koVMdukoVlYlYalu , varamAna weVrigeVya BAravannu kadimeV mAdalu , hoVsa pEpotixAraru wamma saMsWeVya vyavahAravannu kEkoVlYlYabAraxu eVMba xqRtiyiMxa saMsWeVya vyavahAravu yaSasviyAgi nadeVyuwwilla eVMxu worisi koVdalu iwyAxi .
sulYlYu leVkkapawragalYannu sqRtisalu keVlYagina viXAnagalYannu anusarisalu AguwwaxeV .
sWirAswigalYa savakalYiyannu heVccu aWavA kadimeV worisuvuxu , aWavA axannu pUrwiyAgi bittukoVduvuxu .
AswigalYa mOlyavannu mawwu koVdawakka sAlagalYa moVwwavannu heVccu aWavA kadimeV worisuvuxu .
heVccu lABavannu worisuvuxakkAgi mArAtavannu heVccu worisuvuxu KarIxiyannu kadimeV worisuvuxu .
lABavannu kadimeV worisabeku eVMxAga ixakkeV viruxXavAxa viXAnavannu anusarisuvuxu .
saMsWeVyu bahalYa kadimeV lABa mAdixAga illaveV lABavanne mAdaxixxAga , gupwa niXiyannu upayogisi , saMsWeVyu sAkaRtu lABa mAdixeV eVMxu worisuvuxu .
AxareV gupwa niXiya baggeV saMsWeVya ReruxArarigeV eVlYlYaRtU wilYiyaxaMweV eVccaravahisalu AguwwaxeV .
kaMxAya veVccavannu baMdavAlYa veVcca eVMxu illaveV baMdavAlYa veVccavannu kaMxAya veVcca eVMxu worisuvuxu .
muMxina varRa barabekAxa AxAyavannu cAlwi varRaxa AxAya eVMxu worisuvuxu .
illaveV cAlwi varRakkeV barabekAxa AxAyavannu lABa - naRta KAweVyalli worisaxe iruvuxu .
hIgeV aneka viXAnagalYiMxa sulYlYu leVkkapawragalYannu wayArisuvuxuMtu .
AxareV avugalYannu noduvavarigeV mAwra avu sulYlYu leVkka pawragalYu AgiruwwaveV eVMba saMSayave baruvuxilla mawwu avu sulYlYu leVkka pawragalYu AgiruwwaveV eVMbuxannu kaMduhidiyuvuxU bahalYa kaTiNa .
ekeVMxareV , avugalYannu saMsWeVya awyaMwa unnawa AdalYiwagAraru pariSIlisiruwwAreV .
avaru prAmANikarU , viSvAsArharU mawwu javAbxAri ulYlYavarU AgiruvuxariMxa avaru wayArisixa leVkkapawragalYa bageVgeV eVlYlYaRtU apanaMbikeVyu ReruxArarigeV Agali aWavA saMbaMXisixa iwararigeV Agali uMtAguvuxilla .
unnawa AdalYiwagAraru KoVtti leVkka pawragalYannu bahalYa cANAkRawanaxiMxa wayArisiruvuxariMxa , leVkka pariSoXakanu axannu kaMduhidiyalu awyaMwa jANawanaxiMxa wanna kAryavannu nirvahisabeku AguwwaxeV .
wanna wapAsaNeVya kAryavannu avanu bahalYa jAgarUkaweVyiMxa nirvahisabeku AguwwaxeV allaxeV , samayociwavAxa , paripUrNavAxa mawwu cANAkRawanaxa vicAraNeVyannU avanu kEgoVlYlYabeku AguwwaxeV .
wappu mawwu mosagalYannu wadeVgattuvuxu : wappu mawwu mosa prakaraNagalYannu wadeVgattuvuxu aWavA avu saMBavisaxaMweV nodikoVlYlYuvuxu leVkka pariSoXakana karwavyagalYalli oVMxu AgixeV .
AxareV leVkka pariSoXakanu wappu mawwu mosaxa prakaraNagalYiMxa saMsWeVgeV uMtAxa naRtavannu Barisalu vimAxAranalla .
keVlavu bageVya mosaxa prakaraNagalYannu kaMduhidiyuvuxu bahalYa kaTiNa AgixxariMxa , avugalYannu pUrwiyAgi wadeVgattuvuxu avanigeV sAXya Agalikkilla .
mosagalYannu mAduvavaru bahalYa cANAkRawanaxiMxa mawwu jAgarUkaweVyiMxale mAdiruwwAreV .
AxarU leVkka pariSoXakanu xakRaweV ulYlYavanU , cANAkRanU AgixxareV , iMWa mosaxa prakaraNagalYannu kaMduhidiyuvalli yaSasvi Agabahuxu , oVMxu velYeV avanu keVlavu mosaxa prakaraNagalYannu beVlYakigeV waruvalli viPalanu AxareV , axakkeV avanu hoVNeVgAranu Aguvuxilla .
AxareV avanu wanna kAryavannu mAwra javAbxAriyiMxa mawwu xakRaweVyiMxa nirvahisabeku allaxeV , wannannu nemisixavara praBAvakkeV oVlYagAgi yAvuxe saMgawiyannu baccidalu prayawnisabAraxu aWavA mosaxa prakaraNagalYu ixxarU , wannannu nemisixavarigeV anukUla AguvaMweV wanna varaxiyannu sallisabAraxu .
leVkkapawraxalli uMtAguva wappugalYannu mawwu mosagalYannu wadeVgattalu leVkka pariSoXakanu samarWavAxa aWavA AMwarika wadeVyannu jArigoVlYisalu sUcisabeku .
leVkka pariSoXaneVya lABagalYu : leVkka pariSoXaneVyiMxa aneka lABagalYu uMtu .
AxuxariMxa , leVkka pariSoXaneVyu kaddAya AgiraxixxarU , aneka vyApAri saMsWeVgalYu wamma leVkkapawragalYa wapAsaNeVgAgi leVkka pariSoXakanannu nemisalu prAraMBisiveV .
leVkka pariSoXaneVya prayojanagalYu iMwiveV : leVkka pariSoXaneVyiMxa wappu mawwu mosagalYannu wIvravAgi kaMduhidiyalu mawwu muMxeV avu saMBavisaxaMweV wadeVgattalu sAXya AguwwaxeV .
ixU allaxeV leVkkapawragalYannu prawi varRa pariSoXaneVgeV oVlYapadisuvuxariMxa , mAlikarigeV wamma leVkkapawragalYannu coVkkatavAgi , sariyAgi ittukoVlYlYuvaMweV leVkka pariSoXaneVyu prerepisuwwaxeV .
leVkkapawragalYa pariSoXaneVyiMxa wamma wappugalYu aWavA mosagalYu hoVrabIlYuvavu eVMba Baya ixxuxariMxa , gumAswaru leVkka bareVyuvAga heVccina jAgarUkaweVyannu vahisabeku  V_VM .
agniyiMxa saMsWeVgeV naRta uMtAxareV , vimA saMsWeVyu hiMxina varRagalYalli wapAsaNeVgeV oVlYagAxa leVkka pawragalYa AXAraxa meleV naRta parihAra nIdalu oVppikoVlYlYuwwaxeV .
wapAsaNeVgeV oVlYagAxa hiMxina varRaxa lABa - naRta KAweV mawwu aDAveV pawrikeVgalYa AXAraxa meleV , byAMku mawwu iwara haNakAsina saMsWeVgalYiMxa saMsWeVyu sulaBavAgi sAla padeVyabahuxu .
saMsWeVyu wanna vyavahAravannu bereVyoVbbarigeV mArAta mAdabeku eVMxAga , axara leVkkapawragalYu wapAsaNeVgeV oVlYapattixxariMxa axara AswigalYa mOlyavannu mawwu sunAma mOlyavannu nirXarisuvalli heVccina woVMxareV uMtAguvuxilla .
wapAsaNeVgeV oVlYapatta leVkkapawragalYiMxa wayArisixa mawwu leVkka pariSoXakaniMxa xqDIkarisalpatta lABa - naRta KAweV mawwu aDAveV pawrikeVgalYannu varamAna weVrigeV aXikArigalYu , mawwu iwara weVrigeV aXikArigalYu heVccina waniKeV illaxeV oVppikoVlYlYuwwAreV .
vyApAri saMsWeVyu kaMpani AgixxareV , axara nijavAxa ReruxArarigeV kaMpaniya leVkkapawragalYa sawyAsawyaweVya baggeV leVkka pariSoXakanu wanna varaxiyannu sallisuwwAneV .
allaxeV avara hiwAsakwiyannu rakRisuva nyAsaXAriyAgi kArya nirvahisuwwAneV .
vyApAri saMsWeVyu pAlugArikeV AgixxareV , pAlugAraralli wapAsisalpatta leVkkapawragalYa baggeV BinnABiprAya uMtAguvuxilla .
AxuxariMxa avaru wamma leVkkagalYannu yAvuxe vAxa - vivAxagalYu illaxeV sulaBavAgi bageVharisikoVlYlYabahuxu .
ekavyakwi oVdeVwanaxa aWavA pAlugArikeVya saMsWeVgalYu wamma leVkkapawragalYannu kAnUnina prakAra kaddAyavAgi arharAxa leVkka pariSoXakariMxa wapAsaNeV mAdisalebeku eVMba niyamavilla .
AxareV leVkka pariSoXaneVyiMxa halavAru prayojanagalYu laBisuvuxariMxa , aneka KAsagi vyApArasWaru mawwu pAlugArikeV saMsWeVgalYu wamma leVkkapawragalYannu pariSoXaneVgAgi leVkka pariSoXakarigeV oVppisuvuxuMtu .
leVkka pariSoXakana kAryaviXAna : leVkka pariSoXakaru wamma anuBava , jFAna mawwu warabewigeV anuguNavAgi mawwu saMxarBakkeV anusAravAgi wammaxe Axa leVkkapariSoXaneVya kAryaviXAnavannu anusarisuwwAreV .
illi sAmAnyavAgi anusarisuva kAryaviXAnavannu kuriwu vivarisalAgixeV .
bereV bereV prakAraxa vyavahAragalYa xAKaleVgalYannu parIkRisalu bereV bereV prakAraxa viSiRta guruwugalYannu anusarisabeku .
uxAharaNeVgeV , KAweVgalYa aWavA sahAyaka rojavahigalYa berijugalYu , muMxuvarisixa bAkigalYu , rojapuswakagalYiMxa KAweVgalYigeV erisuvuxu , paraspara sarihoVMxuva xAKaleVgalYu ive moVxalAxavugalYigAgi bereV bereV prakAraxa guruwugalYannu anusarisabeku .
axaraMweV bereV bereV prakAraxa leVkkawapAsaNeVgeV , bereV bereV baNNaxa peVnsilugalYannu upayogisabeku .
wAnu upayogisixa guruwugalYanne saMsWeVya gumAswaru upayogisabAraxu eVMba baggeV , kattunittAxa sUcaneVyannU avarigeV nIdabeku .
wanna gumAswaru nirvahisixa leVkkapariSoXaneVya kAryaxa baggeV , tippaNi puswakaxalli bareVxu idabeku mawwu wanna gumAswaru saMsWeVya gumAswaroVMxigAgali aWavA hoVraginavaroVMxigAgali aWavA wamma wammalliye Agali saMsWeVya leVkkapawragalYa bageVgeV aWavA axara vyavahAragalYa bageVgeV eVlYlYaRtU carcisakUdaxu eVMba baggeV kattunittina sUcaneVyannu avarigeV nIdabeku .
leVkka pariSoXanA kAryakrama leVkka pariSoXakanu yAvuxe oVMxu saMsWeVya leVkka pariSoXaneVya kAryavannu prAraMBisuvuxakkiMwa moVxalu , keVlavoVMxu viRayagalYannu pariSIlisabeku AguwwaxeV .
leVkka pariSoXaneVya pUrvaxalli gamanisabekAxa aMSagalYu : saMsWeVyu kalYuhisixa nemaka pawravannu pariSIlisi , axariMxa wanna kAryaxa svarUpa mawwu vyApwigalYannu wilYixukoVlYlYabeku .
kaMpanigalYa kAyixeVyu leVkka pariSoXakana kAryavyApwi , hoVNeVgArikeV , aXikAra moVxalAxavugalYannu spaRtavAgi wilYisuwwaxeV .
AxuxariMxa kaMpeVnigalYa leVkkapariSoXakanu I aMSagalYannu vicArisabekAgilla .
AxareV iwara saMsWeVgalYa leVkka pawragalYannu wapAsaNeV mAdabeku AxAga , leVkka pariSoXakanu I eVlla aMSagalYannu pariSIlisi , saMsWeVyiMxa avugalYa baggeV bareVhaxalli weVgeVxukoVlYlYuvuxu avaSyaka .
kaMpeVniya leVkka pariSoXakanAgi nemisalpattAga , avanu wanna nemakavu kaMpanigalYa kAyixeVya prakAra AgixeVyo illavo eVMbuxannu pariSIlisabeku .
saMsWeVyu kEgoVMda vyavahAraxa muKya svarUpavannu avanu wilYixukoVlYlYabeku .
saMsWeVya vyavahAravu wAMwrika svarUpaxxu AgixxareV , axara vivaragalYannu moVxalu wilYixukoVlYlYabeku .
wanageV vyavahAragalYa bageVgeV pUrwi wilYiyaxixxAga , saMsWeVya AdalYiwagArarigeV praSneVgalYannu kelYi , vivaragalYannu padeVyabeku .
saMsWeVyalli AMwarika waniKeVya vyavasWeV ixxareV , axara svarUpa mawwu vyApwigalYannu wilYixukoVlYlYabeku .
ixariMxa kAryaxa vyApwiyannu nirXarisalu avanigeV sAXya AguwwaxeV .
saMsWeVyu ittiruva eVlla leVkkaxa puswakagalYa yAxiyannu mawwu leVkkagalYannu bareVyuva gumAswara yAxiyannu padeVyabeku .
saMsWeVyu leVkkagalYannu bareVyalu anusarisixa paxXawiyannu kUlaMkuRavAgi pariSIlisabeku .
saMsWeVya pramuKa aXikArigalYa heVsarugalYannu mawwu avara karwavya , hoVNeVgArikeV mawwu aXikAragalYannu bareVhaxalli padeVxukoVlYlYabeku .
saMsWeVya sibbaMxivargaxavarigeV leVkkaxa puswakagalYannu pUrwiyAgi bareVxu mugisi , aKEru KAweVgalYannu aMxareV lABa naRta KAweV mawwu aDAveV pawrikeVgalYannu wayArisi , avugalYannu wanageV oVppisalu avarigeV kelYikoVlYlYabeku mawwu hiMxina varRaxa aKEru KAweVgalYannu mawwu leVkkapariSoXakara varaxigalYannu avariMxa padeVyabeku .
ivugalYannu pariSIlisuvuxariMxa , avanigeV kaMpaniya ArWika parisWiwiyannu sulaBavAgi wilYixukoVlYlYalu sAXya AguwwaxeV .
niyamiwa kaMpaniya leVkkapariSoXaneVyalli , kaMpaniya nivexanA pawrikeV , liKiwa kattalYeVgalYu , nirxeSakara tippaNi mawwu varaxigalYu nirxeSakara saBeVya kAryakalApagalYa vivaragalYu ive moVxalAxavugalYannu pariSIlisabeku .
pAlugArikeVyalli , axara oVppaMxapawravannu mawwu nyAsa saMsWeVyalli nyAsapawravannu pariSIlisabeku .
kaMpaniyu hoVsaxAgi sWApiwa AgixxareV , axara vivaraNA pawra , oVttu koVlYlYuva oVppaMxagalYu mawwu iwara eVlla xAKaleV pawragalYannu pariSIlisabeku .
nivqwwi hoVMxixa leVkkapariSoXakana sWAnaxalli , wannannu nemisixxareV , avanu nivqwwiyAxa leVkkapariSoXakaniMxa avanannu nivqwwigoVlYisixxakkeV kAraNagalYu enAxarU iveVyo eVMbuxannu gupwavAgi wilYixukoVlYlYabeku .
hIgeV meleV helYixa eVlla viRayagalYannu pariSIlisixa naMwara avanu wanna leVkka pariSoXaneVya kAryakramavannu rUpisikoVlYlYabeku .
kAryakrama leVkka pariSoXakanu wanna leVkka wapAsaNeVya kAryavannu prAraMBisuvuxakkiMwa moVxalu wanna kAryaxa baggeV rUpa - reReVgalYannu hAkikoVlYlYuwwAneV .
ixakkeV ' leVkka pariSoXanA kAryakrama ' eVMxu kareVyuwwAreV .
I kAryakramaxa mUlaka avanu wanna hiriya gumAswaru yAva keVlasavannu mAdabeku mawwu kiriya gumAswaru yAva keVlasavannu mAdabeku hAgU wapAsaNeVya kAryavannu eVRtu avaXiyalli mugisabeku eVMbuxannu nirXarisuwwAneV .
ixU allaxeV , I kAryakrama pattiyalli , leVkka pariSoXakana gumAswaru anusarisabekAxa sUcaneV , mArgaxarSana , salaheV moVxalAxavugalYU iruwwaveV .
ivugalYannu anusarisi , leVkka pariSoXakana gumAswaru wamma leVkkawapAsaNeVya kAryavannu prAraMBisi , samayAnusAra yaSasviyAgi mugisuwwAreV .
leVkka pariSoXanA kAryakramavu yojiwavAxa mawwu leVkka wapAsaNeVgeV saMbaMXisixa eVlla vivaraNeV oVMxu xAKaleV pawra AgixeV .
leVkkapariSoXanA kAryakramaxa pattiyu halavAru kAlamugalYannu hoVMxiruwwaxeV .
I kAlamugalYalli leVkkapariSoXakana prawiyoVbba gumAswana heVsaru , avanu mAdabekAxa keVlasaxa svarUpa , avanu keVlasa prAraMBisixa xinAMka , keVlasa mAdixa xinAMkagalYu , mawwu keVlasa mugisixa xinAMka moVxalAxa vivaragalYu iruwwaveV .
prawiyoVbba gumAswanu wAnu mAdixa keVlasaxa baggeV wanna sahiyannu I pattiyalli hAkuwwAneV .
ixariMxa prawiyoVbba gumAswanu wAnu mAdixa keVlasaxa baggeV wanna hoVNeVgArikeVyannu oVppikoVMdaMweV AguwwaxeV .
leVkkapariSoXanA kAryakramavannu wayArisuvuxariMxa Aguva lABagalYu leVkkapariSoXakanigeV wanna gumAswaralli avara arhaweV , anuBava , jANmeV moVxalAxavugalYigeV anuguNavAgi kAryavannu haMcalu mawwu hoVNeVgArikeVyannu nigaxipadisalu sAXya AguwwaxeV .
leVkkapariSoXanA kAryakrama pattiyiMxa leVkkapariSoXakanigeV wanna gumAswaru I kAryakramaxaMweV keVlasa mAduwwiruvaro illavo mawwu avara pragawi eVRtu AgixeV eVMbuxannu wilYixukoVlYlYalu sAXya AguwwaxeV .
leVkkapariSoXakanu wanna kAryavannu sariyAgi mawwu suvyavasWiwavAgi mAdixxAneV eVMbuxakkeV leVkkapariSoXanA kAryakrama pattiyu purAveV AguwwaxeV .
wanna leVkkapawragalYannu wapAsaNeVgeV oVlYapadisixa saMsWeVyu leVkkapariSoXakanu wanna kAryaxalli alakRawana worisixxAneV eVMxu avana viruxXa moVkaxxameV hUdixAga , leVkkapariSoXanA kAryakrama pattiyu bahalYa upayoga AguwwaxeV .
muMbaruva varRagalYa leVkkapariSoXaneVgeV axu mArgaxarSi AguwwaxeV .
leVkkawapAsaNeVya kAryavannu pUrwiyAgi kEgoVlYlYalAgixeV aMxareV eVlla leVkkapawragalYannU pUrwiyAgi wapAsisalAgixeV , yAva kAlamugalYannU bittilla eVMba BaravaseVyannu I pattiyu nIduwwaxeV .
ixariMxa leVkkapariSoXanA kAryavannu suvyavasWiwagoVlYisalu mawwu axakRaweVyannu nivArisalu sAXya AguwwaxeV .
oVmmeV leVkkapariSoXanA kAryavannu keVlasamayaxavareVgeV mAdi , axannu sWagiwagoVlYisi , keVlasamayaxa mawweV axannu muMxuvarisuvAga yAva woVMxareVgalYU uxBavisuvuxilla .
leVkkapariSoXanA kAryakrama pattiyannu wayArisi , wanna gumAswarigeV axannu oVppisixa naMwara , leVkkapariSoXakanu avarigeV AgiMxAggeV salaheV sUcaneVgalYannu nIduva avaSyakaweV uMtAguvuxilla .
leVkkapariSoXanA kAryakramaxa anAnukUlaweVgalYu : leVkkapariSoXanA kAryakrama pattiyannu wayArisuvuxariMxa aneka lABagalYU AguvaMwixxarU , axariMxa halavu anAnukUlaweVgalYU AguwwaveV .
xoRapUriwa svayaMcAliwa kAryAcaraNeV : svayaMcAliwa kAryAcaraNeVgeV oVlYapattixxa cinnaxa pramiwiyu xoRapUriwa Agixxiwu .
cinnaxa oVlYa mawwu hoVra pravAhaxoVdaneV haNaxa sarabarAjinalli erilYiwagalYu Aguwwixxavu .
haNaxa gAwraxa higguvikeV mawwu kugguvikeVyoVdaneV xeSaxa ArWika sWimiwaweV kaxadi hoguwwixxiwu .
AxxariMxa aBivqxXi prakriyeVya niraMwara munnadeVgeV illi avakASave iruwwiralilla .
7 svawaMwra ArWika nIwigeV XakkeV : cinnaxa pramiwiyannu anusarisuwwiruva xeSakkeV svawaMwra ArWika nIwiyannu alYavadisikoVlYlYuvuxu kaRta AguwwaxeV .
I pramiwiyannu hoVMxiruva eVllA xeSagalYU paraspara saMparkisalpattu iruvuxariMxa sAmAnyavAgi oVMxu sAmuxAyika ArWika nIwiye jAriyalli iruwwaxeV eVMxareV wappu AgalAraxu .
axaralliyU ArWika mawwu rAjakIya viRayagalYalli bqhaw xeSagalYu cikka xeSagalYannu wamma bigi muRtiyalli ittukoVlYlYalu ixaralli aMxareV pramiwiyalli awyuwwama avakASa siguwwaxeV .
AxxariMxa viSeRavAgi cikka xeSagalYu ArWika matta kalYeVxukoVMdu SrImaMwa xeSagalYa xayAparaweVgeV oVlYagAgiruwwaxeV .
8 ArWika samasyeVgalYa vargAvaNeV : cinnaxa pramiwiyu aMwararARtrIya pramiwi AgiruvuxariMxa oVMxu xeSaxa ArWika samasyeVgalYannu innoVMxu xeSakkeV vargAyisalu ixaralli bahalYa sulaBavAxa avakASa ixeV .
suvarNa pramiwiya avanawi : jAgawika haNakAsina vyavasWeVyalli cinnaxa pramiwiyu oVMxu kAlaxalli vijraMBisiwwu .
1816ralli prAraMBagoVMda I pramiwiyu 1914ra hoVwwigeV sAmAnyavAgi sarvavyApi AgixxiweVMxe helYabahuxu .
AxareV 1914ralli prAraMBavAxa moVxalaneVya mahAyuxXavu cinnaxa pramiwiya walYapAyavanne alugAdisiwu .
keVlavu xeSagalYiMxa cinnavu aXika pramANaxalli bereV xeSagalYigeV pravahisawoVdagiwu mawwu aneka xeSagalYu niraMwaravAgi agAXa gAwraxa saMxAya Silkina koVraweV anuBavisabekAyiwu .
I samasyeVgalYiMxa mukwi padeVyalu mawwu yuxXaxa avaSyakaweVgalYigAgi heVccu saMpanmUlagalYannu padeVyalu cinnaxa pramiwiyannu wyajisuvuxu anivArya Ayiwu .
hiwAsakwiyannu gamanaxalli irisikoVMdu eVlla xeSagalYU cinnaxa pramiwiyannu kEbittavu .
AxareV yuxXowwara avaXiyalli cinnaxa pramiwiya maru alYavadikeVgeV aneka xeSagalYu Asakwi worisi , A xiseVyalli prayawnisixavu .
pariNAmavAgi 1919ralli amerikeVyu punaH cinnaxa pramiwiyannu alYavadisikoVMdixuxariMxa axakkeV punarjanma xoVreVyiwu .
naMwaraxa avaXiyalli halavAru xeSagalYu cinnaxa pramiwigeV hiMwirugixavu .
AxareV 1929ralli saMBavisixa mahA ArWika muggattiniMxa cinnaxa pramiwiyu wawwarisiwu .
I pramiwiyannu hoVMxixa xeSagalYu oVMxoVMxAgi cinnaxa vyavasWeVyannu woVreVyalu prAraMBisixavu .
iMgleVMd 1931ralli ixannu wyajisiwu .
1937ra hoVwwigeV cinnaxa pramiwiyu saMpUrNavAgi mAya Ayiwu .
ixakkeV baxalAgi ' niyaMwriwa kAgaxaxa haNaxa paxXawi ` aswiwvaxalli baMxiwu .
9 avanawiya kAraNagalYu : cinnaxa pramiwiya avanawigeV kAraNavAxa sanniveSagalYannu I keVlYaginaMweV viSleRisabahuxu .
1 . cinnaxa pramiwiya niyamagalYa viPalaweV : cinnaxa pramiwiya vyavasWiwa kAryAcaraNeVgeV axara niyamagalYannu niRTuravAgi anusarisuvuxu mUlaBUwavAxa avaSyakaweV AgixeV .
AxareV bahuweka xeSagalYu axara niyamagalYannu anusarisaxixxuxu nijakkU xuraxqRtakara saMgawi .
cinnaxa oVlYa mawwu bAhya pravAhaxoVdaneV haNakAsina pUrEkeVyannu heVccisuva aWavA kuggisuva nIwiyannu avu uxxeSapUrvakavAgi kEbittavu .
haNakAsina pUrEkeVya heVccalYaxoVdaneV uMtAguva beVleV erikeV mawwu haNakAsina pUrEkeVya saMkucanaxiMxa pariNamisuva kuggu prasaraNaxa samasyeVgalYiMxa janarannu rakRisuvuxu A xeSagalYa hiwAsakwi Agiwwu .
AxareV ixu mUlaBUwavAgi cinnaxa pramiwiya nASakke kAraNa Ayiwu .
2 . cinnaxa asamarpaka viwaraNeV : viviXa xeSagalYa naduveV cinnaxa niXiya aprApwa mawwu asamarpaka viwaraNeVyu cinnaxa pramiwiya avanawigeV mawwoVMxu pramuKa neVleV Ayiwu .
praWama jAgawika mahAyuxXaxa naMwara keVlave xeSagalYalli cinnavu keMxrIkqwa Ayiwu .
yuxXa parihAra nIdabekAxuxu ixakkeV pramuKa kAraNa Agiwwu .
uxAharaNeVgeV : moVxalaneVya mahAyuxXaxalli sowa jarmaniyu varsels oVppaMxaxa prakAra , PrAns , iMgleVMd mawwu amerikA xeSagalYigeV nirxAkRiNyavAgi bqhaw moVwwaxa parihAra Xanavannu koVdabekAyiwu .
I pariNAmavAgi prapaMcaxa oVttu cinnaxa niXiyalli Se. 34raRtu amerikA mawwu PrAns nalli keMxrIkqwa Ayiwu .
cinnaxa niXiyannu sAkaRtu pramANaxalli hoVMxiraxixxa xeSagalYu cinnaxa pramiwiyiMxa hoVrabaruva anivArya prasaMga baMxu oVxagiwu .
baMdavAlYaxa vivecanarahiwa calaneV : moVxalaneVya mahAyuxXaxa naMwaraxa avaXiyalli ArWika mawwu rAjakIya asWiraweVya kAraNa baMdavAlYaxa calaneVyu aXikagoVMdiwu .
heVccina xaraxa baddi galYisalu mawwu haNakkeV surakRaweV padeVyalu bahuweka xeSagalYu vixeSagalYalli irisixxa cinnaxa niXiyannu hiMxakkeV padeVyawoVdagixavu .
cinnaxa niXiyannu kalYeVxukoVMda xeSagalYigeV I pramiwiyannu bidaxeV anya mArgave iralilla .
beVleVgalYa cinnaxa pramiwiyu PalapraxavAgi keVlasa mAdalu AMwarika beVleVgalYa sWimiwaweVyu awyAvaSyakavAxa aMSa AgiruwwaxeV .
AxareV cinnaxa aMwararARtrIya calaneVyoVdaneV beVleVgalYalli viparIwa erilYiwagalYu Aguwwixxavu .
ixannu wadeVgattuvuxu sAXya Agalilla .
allaxeV haNakAsina AdalYiwa nirvahaNeVgAraru vinimaya xaraxalli sWimiwaweVya sAXaneVgeV prAmuKyaweV nIdi AMwarika beVleVgalYa sWiraweVyannu nirlakRisixaru .
cinnaxa pramiwiyu viPala Agalu ixU oVMxu kAraNa Ayiwu .
aMwararARtrIya vyApAraxa meleV nirbaMXa : mukwa aMwararARtrIyaJJ vyApAravu cinnaxa pramiwiya yaSasvI kAryAcaraNeVgeV mawwoVMxu Baxra neVleV mukwa vyApAra jAriyalli ixxAga mAwra cinnavannu balYasi aMwararARtrIya saMxAyagalYannu neVraverisalu sAXya AguwwaxeV .
AxareV yuxXowwara avaXiyalli aMwararARtrIya vyApAravu nirbaMXiwa Ayiwu .
halavAru xeSagalYu rakRaNA nIwiyannu anusarisi , aXika xaraxa Amaxu suMkagalYannu viXisuva mUlaka AmaxugalYannu nirbaMXisixavu .
pariNAmavAgi aMwararARtrIya vyApAravu saMpUrNavAgi niMwuhoguva mattavanne walupiwu .
aMwaha parisWiwiyalli cinnaxa pramiwiyiMxa yAva prayojanavU xoVreVyalilla .
ekeVMxareV vyApArave illaxiruvAga cinnaxa avaSyakaweVye uxBavisaxaMweV Ayiwu .
rAjakIya asWiraweV : eVradu jAgawika yuxXagalYa naduvina avaXiyalli rAjakIya sWiraweVyu saMpUrNavAgi mAya Agiwwu eVMxareV uwprekReV AgalAraxu .
yuxXagalYu mawwu rAjakIya kolAhalagalYu Aga sAmAnya saMgawigalYu Agixxavu .
baxalAxa sanniveSagalYannu vyavasWiwavAgi eVxurisalu cinnaxa pramiwiyu yaSasvi Aguvuxilla eVMxu janaru BAvisawoVdagixaru .
bereV mAwinalli helYuvuxAxareV sArvajanikarigeV cinnaxa pramiwiya vyavasWeVyalli viSvAsave naSisi hoyiwu .
cinnaxa vinimaya pramiwiya vyApaka alYavadikeV : cinnaxa pramiwiyu aswiwvaxalli ixxa koVneVya avaXiyalli cinnaxa vinimaya pramiwiyannu heVccAgi alYavadisikoVlYlYalAgiwwu .
allaxeV bahuweka cikka xeSagalYu nyUyArk aWavA laMdanninalli svalpa cinnaxa niXiyannu irisikoVMdu I pramiwiyannu hoVMxixxavu .
AxareV rAjakIya asWiraweVya samayaxalli saNNa xeSagalYu I cinnaxa niXiyannu hiMweVgeVxukoVlYlYalu prAraMBisixuxariMxa axara avanawiyu anivArya Ayiwu .
allaxeV cinnaxa vinimaya pramiwiya AdalYiwavu kaRtaxAyaka Agixxuxu mawwoVMxu kAraNa Agixxiwu .
aMwararARtrIya haNakAsina mArukatteVya aBAva : 1914kkeV moVxalu laMdan aMwararARtrIya haNakAsina mArukatteVyAgi keVlasa mAduwwiwwu .
oVMxu xeSaxiMxa mawwoVMxu xeSakkeV saMxAya Agabekixxa haNavu I mArukatteVya mUlakave saMxAya Aguwwiwwu .
aMxareV laMdan haNakAsina mArukatteVyu aMwararARtrIya keMxra byAMkinaMweV keVlasa nirvahisuwwixxiwu .
AxareV yuxXowwara avaXiyalli laMdan I sWAnavannu kalYeVxukoVMdiwu .
aMwararARtrIya haNakAsina mArukatteVyAgi naMwara bereV yAva nagaravU axara sWAnavannu alaMkarisalilla .
aMwararARtrIya haNakAsina mArukatteVya mUlaka saMxAyavu niMwuhogi , eVllA xeSagalYu svaMwa saMxAyaxalli woVdagi heVccu cinnaxa niXiyannu saMgrahisalu prAraMBisixuxariMxa cinnaxa pramiwiyu viPalagoVMdiwu .
mahA ArWika muggattu : 1929-32ralli prapaMcaxAxyaMwa saMBavisixa mahA ArWika muggattu cinnaxa pramiwiya kusiwakkeV prabalavAxa mawwu awi samIpaxa kAraNa eVnisiwu .
ArWika muggattu prAraMBaxoVdaneV beVleVgalYu , lABagalYu hUteV , uwpanna , AxAya mawwu uxyoga avakASagalYu gaNanIyavAgi kusixavu .
AxxariMxa eVllA xeSagalYU haNakAsina xivAlYiyannu eVxurisixavu .
I pariNAmavAgi AmaxugalYannu nirbaMXisabekAyiwu mawwu cinnaxa niXiyannu hiMweVgeVxukoVlYlYabekAyiwu .
moVxale kqSa Agixxa cinnaxa pramiwiya avanawigeV ArWika muggattina nirxaya AkramaNavu balADyavAxa kAraNa Ayiwu .
aMwararARtrIya sahakAraxa koVraweV : cinnaxa pramiwiya yaSasvI kAryAcaraNeVgeV eVllA xeSagalYu sahakAraxiMxa varwisuvuxu awyAvaSyaka AgixeV .
AxareV moVxalaneVya mahAyuxXaxa naMwara rARtra - rARtragalYa naduveV ArWika sWiwi naSisuwwA baMxiwu .
vyApAra , haNaxa calAvaNeV , uxyoga nIdikeV , varamAna galYikeV moVxalAxa saMgawigalYalli eVllA rARtragalYu svArWa manoBAvaneVyannu beVlYeVsikoVMdu asahakAraxiMxa varwisawoVdagixavu .
rARtrIyaweVya uxaya : moVxalaneVya jAgawika yuxXa hAgU axara naMwara jarugixa aneka aMwararARtrIya GataneVgalYu rARtrIyaweVya uxayakkeV nAMxi Axavu .
cinnaxa pramiwiyaMwaha aMwararARtrIyaJJ haNaxa vyavasWeVyannu muMxuvareVsikoVMdu hoguvuxu eVllA xeSagalYa rARtrIyaweVgeV adacaNeVya saMgawi Ayiwu .
AxxariMxa eVllA rARtragalYu wamma sarahaxxigeV sImiwavAxa hAgU rARtrIyavAxa nANya paxXawiyannu alYavadisikoVlYlYalu muMxAxavu .
cikka xeSagalYalli cinnaxa koVraweV : cinnaxa gaNigArikeVyannu mAduva mawwu cinnaxa nANyagalYannu muxrisuva keVlasavannu sAgisikoVMdu hoguvuxu bahuweka cikka mawwu aSakwa xeSagalYigeV woVMxareV Ayiwu .
A xeSagalYu sulaBa sAXyavAxa mawwu miwavyayaxa nANya paxXawiyannu anusarisalu woVdagixavu .
baxalAxa oVwwadaxiMxAgi suvarNa pramiwiyu axqSya Ayiwu .
oVMxAxa meleV oVMxaraMweV eVllA rARtragalYU suvarNa pramiwiyannu wyajisixavu .
1931ralli iMgleVMd I pramiwiyannu bittu koVttiwu .
1937ra hoVwwigeV ixu yAva rARtraxalliyU AcaraNeVyalli iralilla .
A ' halYaxi lohave ' eVllA anarWagalYigeV kAraNa Ayiwu eVMxu jeV. eVM. kens serixaMweV halavu arWaSAswrajFaru mawwu haNakAsina nirvahaNeVgAraru axannu jareVxaru .
varNaraMjiwa iwihAsavannu padeVxu meVreVxixxa suvarNa pramiwiyu yArU xuHKisuvavaru illaxaMweV pawana hoVMxiwu .
kAgaxaxa haNaxa pramiwi : cinnaxa pramiwiya avanawiyoVdaneV kAgaxaxa pramiwiyu vyApakavAgi balYakeVgeV baMxiwu .
I paxXawigeV ' vyavasWiwa haNaxa paxXawi ' eVMxu kareVyuwwAreV .
ekeVMxareV I pramiwiyalli sarakAra mawwu keMxra byAMku oVttu seri haNakAsina pUrEkeVyannu vyavasWeVgoVlYisuwwaveV .
agawyaweVgeV anuguNavAgi sarakAravu haNakAsina pUrEkeVyannu higgisabahuxu aWavA kuggisabahuxu .
iMxu prapaMcaxa eVllA kAgaxaxa pramiwiyu AcaraNeVyalli ixeV .
I pramiwiyalli kAgaxaxa notugalYa joVweVgeV , cinna allaxeV iwara lohagalYiMxa wayArisixa sahAyaka nANyagalYu calAvaNeVyalli iruwwaveV .
I vyavasWeVyalli kAgaxaxa haNave praXAna nANya AgiruwwaxeV .
prawi oVMxu xeSavU wanna haNakkeV oVMxu aXikqwa heVsaru nIdiruwwaxeV .
ixannu ' leVkkAcAraxa haNa ' eVMxu kareVyalAguvuxu .
uxAharaNeV : BArawaxalli rUpAyi , amerikaxalli dAlar raRyAxalli rUbal , japAninalli yeVn iwyAxi .
I haNaxa mUlaka mOlyavannu alYeVyalu AguwwaxeV .
vyavahAraxalli I haNavanne AXAravAgi   ittukoVlYlYalAguvuxuV_VM .
iMxu AcaraNeVyalli iruva kAgaxaxa haNavu aparivarwanIya haNa AgixeV .
aMxareV kAgaxaxa notugalYannu cinna aWavA beVlYlYigeV parivarwisalu baruvuxilla .
kAgaxaxa notugalYu svawaMwravAxa mOlyavannu padeVxiveV .
I notugalYannu svIkarisalebeku eVMxu sarkAraxa AjFeV iruwwaxeV .
AxxariMxa I haNakkeV sarvamAnyaweV ixeV .
uwpanna , vyApAra mawwu vANijyaxa pramANakkeV anuguNavAgi haNavannu calAvaNeVgeV bidugadeV mAduvuxariMxa ixu niyojiwa haNa AgixeV .
kAgaxaxa haNaxa pramiwiyu cinnaxa pramiwiyaMweV aMwararARtrIya pramiwi Agiruvuxilla .
aMxareV illi oVMxu xeSaxa kAgaxaxa haNa mawwu beroVMxu xeSaxa kAgaxaxa haNaxa naduveV yAva saMparkavU iruvuxilla .
BArawaxalli 1 , 2 , 5 , 20 , 50 , 100 , 500 , mawwu 1000 rUpAyiya kAgaxaxa notugalYu calAvaNeVyalli iveV .
allaxeV 5 , 10 , 20 , 25 , 50 pEseVgalYa sAMkewika nANyagalYu mawwu oVMxu , eVradu hAgU Exu rUpAyiya nANyagalYU iveV .
oVMxu rUpAyiya notugalYu mawwu eVllA nANyagalYannu BArawa sarkAravu calAvaNeVgeV waruwwaxeV .
ulYixa eVllA mOlyaxa notugalYannu keMxra byAMk Agiruva BArawaxa risarv byAMku calAvaNeVgeV waruwwaxeV .
AxxariMxa oVMxu rUpAyi notina meleV BArawa sarkAraxa haNakAsina kAryaxarSiya sahi ixxareV , iwara notugalYa meleV risarv byAMkina gavarnarara sahi iruwwaxeV .
haNavannu calAvaNeVgeV waruvuxakkAgiye risarv byAMkinalli prawyeka vyavasWeV ixeV .
ixakkeV ' notu calAvaNeVya ilAKeV ' eVMxu heVsaru .
xeSaxalli haNakAsina vyavasWeVyannu nirvahisuvuxakkAgi BArawa sarkAraxalli ' haNakAsina ilAKeV ' eVMba prawyeka ilAKeV ixeV .
kAgaxaxa haNaxa pramiwiya viSiRta lakRaNagalYu : kAgaxaxa haNaxa paxXawiya viSiRta lakRaNagalYannu I keVlYaginaMweV namUxisabahuxu .
kAgaxaxa haNaxa pramiwiyalli kAgaxaxa notugalYu mawwu sahAyaka nANyagalYu calAvaNeVyalli iruwwaveV .
ixu aparivarwanIya haNaxa pramiwi AgiruwwaxeV .
kAgaxaxa notugalYannAgali illave nANyagalYannAgali cinna aWavA beVlYlYigeV parivarwisuva vyavasWeV iruvuxilla .
keMxra byAMku haNavannu calAvaNeVgeV waruva ekasvAmya aXikAravannu padeVxiruwwaxeV .
kAgaxaxa notugalYu amiwa kAyixeVya haNa AgiruwwaxeV .
aMxareV avu amiwa gOravavannu hoVMxiruwwaxeV .
I pramiwiyalli haNavu sarkAraxa AjFeVgeV anusAravAgi calAvaNeVgeV baruwwaxeV .
sarkAravu svalpa pramANaxa cinna mawwu BaxraweVgalYannu AXAra AgittukoVMdu notugalYannu bidugadeV mAduwwaveV .
aMxareV cinna mawwu BaxraweVgalYa beVMbalaxa meleV haNavu calAvaNeVgeV baruwwaxeV .
suvarNa pramiwiyaMweV kAgaxaxa haNavu svayaMcAliwa Agiruvuxilla .
sarkAra mawwu keMxra byAMku oVttugUdi haNaxa pUrEkeVyannu vyavasWeVgoVlYisuwwaveV .
kAgaxaxa haNaxa pramiwiya prayojanagalYu : 1 sWiwisWApakaweV : kAgaxaxa haNaxa pramiwiya pramuKa prayojana eVMxareV axu sWiwisWApaka guNavannu padeVxiruwwaxeV .
ArWika vyavasWeVyalli avaSyakaweVgeV wakkaMweV kAgaxaxa haNaxa gAwravannu higgisalu aWavA kuggisalu sulaBa avakASa iruwwaxeV .
AxxariMxa I pramiwiyalli ArWika aBivqxXiya agawyaweVgeV wakkaMweV calAvaNeVyalli iruva haNaxa pramANavannu baxalAyisalu sAXya iruwwaxeV .
2 kadimeV veVccaxa paxXawi : kAgaxaxa haNaxa pramiwiyalli lohaxa niXiyannu AXAravAgi irisikoVlYlYabekAgiruvuxilla .
allaxeV lohaxa nANyagalYa muxraNa aWavA gattigalYa wayArikeVgeV holisixAga kAgaxaxa haNaxa muxraNavu kadimeV veVccaxalli AguwwaxeV , I xqRtiyiMxa ixu wuMbA aggaxa mawwu kadimeV Karcina pramiwi AgixeV .
AxxariMxa ArWikavAgi hiMxulYixa xeSagalYU saha I pramiwiyannu anusarisuvuxu kaRta Aguvuxilla .
3 ArWika aBivqxXigeV pUraka AgiruwwaxeV : xeSaxalli iruva viviXa rIwiya saMpanmUlagalYannu gariRTa xakRaweVyalli balYasikoVMdu ArWika aBivqxXi sAXisalu bqhaw gAwraxa haNakAsina avaSyakaweV iruwwaxeV .
iMwaha saMxarBagalYalli lohaxa pramiwiyu sahAyaka Agiruvuxilla .
ekeVMxareV A pramiwiyalli lohavu praXAna Agixxu , axu yaWecCavAgi laBya AgaxixxareV Aga haNaxa sarabarAjannu yaWecCavAgi heVccisalu sAXya Aguvuxilla .
kAgaxaxa pramiwiyalli haNakAsina nIwiya mUlaka hoVsa notugalYannu muxrisi calAvaNeVgeV waMxu mAnava saMpanmUla mawwu nEsargika saMpanmUlagalYa balYakeVya kAryakramagalYigeV upayogisikoVlYlYabahuxu .
4 kuggu prasaraNaxa viruxXa rakRaNeV : kAgaxaxa haNaxa pramiwiyalli kuggu prasaraNa mawwu muggattina samasyeVgalYigeV avakASa .
cinnaxa pramiwiyallAxareV cinnaxa bAhya pravAhaxoVdaneV haNakAsina pUrEkeV kuggi beVleVgalYu ilYixu , ArWika muggattu AvarisuwwaxeV .
AxareV kAgaxaxa pramiwiyalli sarkAravu haNakAsina pUrEkeVyannu xakRavAgi niyojisi beVleVgalYa sWimiwaweVyannu kApAdalu oVlYlYeVya avakASa ixeV .
wurwu saMxarBagalYalli prayojanakAri : yuxXa , kRAma , baragAla moVxalAxa saMxarBagalYalli aXika pramANaxa haNakAsina agawyaweV iruwwaxeV .
kAgaxaxa pramiwiyu yaWecCa pramANaxa haNakAsina pUrEkeVgeV avakASa oVxagisuva mUlaka wurwu saMxarBagalYannu eVxurisalu sahAya mAduwwaxeV .
6 vinimaya xaraxa sWimiwaweV : kAgaxaxa pramiwiyalli raPwugalYu mawwu AmaxugalYa gAwra mawwu haNaxa mOlyakkeV wakkaMweV vinimaya xaravu baxalAgi , samAnAMwara sWiwigeV baruwwaxeV .
saMxAya Silkinalli asamawolanavannu nivArisalu neVravu AguvaMweV vinimaya xaravannu niyaMwrisuvuxu I pramiwiyalli bahalYa sulaBaxa keVlasa .
7 rARtrIyaweV : kAgaxaxa pramiwiyu rARtrIya AgiruvuxariMxa , I pramiwiyalli nANya vyavasWeVya AdalYiwakkeV bereV xeSavannu avalaMbisabekAgilla .
I pramiwiyalli oVMxu xeSaxa nANya vyavasWeVyu oVMti kArya nirvahisuwwaxeV .
AxxariMxa bereV xeSagalYa ArWika samasyeVgalYu svaxeSakkeV vargAvaNeV Aguva avakASagalYu iruvuxilla .
8 byAMkugalYigeV anukUlaweV : kAgaxaxa haNavu amiwa kAyixeVya haNa AgiruvuxariMxa byAMkugalYu wamma xeNigeVgalYigeV viruxXavAgi nagaxu haNavannu irisikoVMdu vyavahAra nadeVsalu sahAyaka AguwwaxeV .
xuRprayojanagalYu : halavAru prayojanagalYannu oVxagisiruva naduveVyU kAgaxaxa pramiwiyu keVlavu xOrbalyagalYannu hoVMxixeV .
1 haNaxubbara : kAgaxaxa pramiwiya muKya xuRprayojana eVMxareV ixaralli yAvAgalU miwimIrixa pramANaxa haNaxa calAvaNeVgeV KAwariyAxa avakASa iruwwaxeV .
hoVsa haNavannu calAvaNeVgeV waruvuxu I pramiwiyalli awyaMwa sulaBa AxuxariMxa AXunika sarkAragalYu oVMxalloVMxu kAraNaxiMxa miwimIrixa gAwraxa haNakAsannu pUrEkeV mAduwwaveV .
ixu asamawolanavannu sqRtisi halavAru xuRpariNAmagalYigeV eVdeVkoVduwwaxeV .
2 beVleVya mattaxalli asWiraweV : haNakAsina nIdikeVya erilYiwaxiMxa beVleVya mattaxalli sWiraweV kaxaduwwaxeV .
beVleVya kusiwavu uwpAxaneV , vyApAra , vANijya moVxalAxa kRewragalYigeV keVduku uMtu mAdixareV , beVleV erikeVyu anuBogaxa meleV xuRpariNAma bIruwwaxeV .
iMxina yugaxalli sAmAnya Agiruva beVleV erikeVyu miwimIrixa haNaxa pUrEkeVya aviBAjya pariNAma AgixeV .
beVleV erikeVyu sAmAnya janara jIvanaxa meleV nirxayavAxa ApawkAri pariNAmagalYannu bIruwwaxeV .
3 vinimaya xaraxalli asWimiwaweV : AMwarika beVleVgalYa erilYiwagalYoVdaneV nANyaxa mOlyavU saha baxalAguwwaxeV .
ixara pariNAmavAgi vinimaya xaravu sWimiwaweVyannu kalYeVxukoVlYlYuvuxu svABAvika .
vinimaya xaraxa asWimiwaweVyoVdaneV aMwararARtrIya vyApAra mawwu hUteV bAXiwagoVlYlYuwwaveV .
4 AMwarika pramiwi : I pramiwiyu kevala AMwarika pramiwi AgiruvuxariMxa hAgU I pramiwiyalli muKyavAgi haNavu calAvaNeVyalli iruvuxariMxa , A kAgaxaxa haNakkeV vixeSagalYalli yAva mOlyavU iruvuxilla ; allaxeV oVMxu xeSaxa nANyavannu bereV xeSagalYa nANyakkeV parivarwisuvuxu pariSramaxa kArya AgiruwwaxeV .
5 haNaxa nASa AguvikeV : kAgaxaxa haNavu sulaBavAgi suttu hogabahuxu , oVxxeV Agabahuxu , aWavA krimikItagalYiMxa naSisi hogabahuxu .
lohaxa pramiwiyalli I samasyeV iruvuxilla .
haNaxa calAvaNeVya wawvagalYu : calAvaNeVyalli iruva haNavu AMwarika beVleVgalYalli sWimiwaweVyannu sAXisuva mawwu vinimaya xaravannu sWiravAgi kApAduva mahawkAryagalYannu neVraverisuva Xyeya hoVMxirabekAguwwaxeV .
joVweVgeV axu sarvamAnyaweV padeVxa vaswu Agabeku .
nANya paxXawiyu sulaBavU , surakRiwavU , namyaweV hoVMxixuxU Agirabeku .
I saMgawigalYannu gamanaxalli irisikoVMdu kAgaxaxa pramiwiyalli keVlavu wawvagalYa AXAraxa meleV haNavannu calAvaNeVgeV waralAguvuxu .
ivugalYannu ' haNaxa calAvaNeVya wawvagalYu ' eVMxu kareVyalAgixeV .
haNaxa calAvaNeVyu hegeV irabeku eVMbuxara baggeV 1844ralli iMgleVMdinalli byAMku cArtar kAnUnannu jArigeV waruvAga eVradu aBiprAyagalYu vyakwapattavu .
I aBiprAyagalYu eVradu viBinna wawvagalYannu prawipAxisixavu .
I wawvagalYu eVMxareV : 1 nANya wawva mawwu 2 byAMkoxyama wawva .
1 nANyawawva : I wawvaxa mereVgeV calAvaNeVgeV waralAguva haNakkeV Se. nUraraRtu lohaxa niXigalYannu beVMbalavAgi ittukoVMdu irabekAguwwaxeV .
prawiyoVMxu kAgaxaxa notannu muxrisi calAvaNeVgeV waruvAgalU aRte mOlyaxa cinnavannu keMxra byAMku wanna balYi irisikoVMdiruwwaxeV .
aMxareV I wawvaxa prakAra calAvaNeVyalli iruva notugalYu beVMbalavAgi irisikoVMdiruva lohaxa prawiniXigalYu AgiruwwaveV .
calAvaNeVyalli iruva haNaxa mOlyakkeV sarisamavAxa mOlyaxa lohaxa niXi ixxareV sArvajanikaru iRta baMxAga kAgaxaxa notugalYannu lohakkeV parivarwisalu sAXya AguwwaxeV .
I sOlaByavannu kalpisuva aBiprAyaxa meleV I wawvavu niMwixeV .
ixakkeV ' saralYa TevaNi paxXawi ' eVMba heVsarU ixeV .
nANya wawvaxa prayojanagalYu eVMxareV : I paxXawiyalli sArvajanikarigeV haNaxa baggeV pUrNa viSvAsa huttuwwaxeV .
ekeVMxareV wamma balYi iruva prawiyoVMxu notigU aRte mOlyaxa lohavu AXAra AgiruwwaxeV eVMba naMbikeV janaralli iruwwaxeV .
I paxXawiyalli sarakAravu wanageV iRta baMxaMweV notugalYannu muxrisi calAvaNeVgeV waralu sAXya iruvuxilla .
ekeVMxareV heVccu notugalYannu calAvaNeVgeV warabeku eVMxareV heVccina pramANaxa lohavannu beVMbalavAgi irisikoVlYlYabekAguwwaxeV .
ixu xuswaravAxa kArya .
AxxariMxa sarkAraxa veVccaxa meleV niyaMwraNa iruwwaxeV hAgU haNaxubbarakkeV vyApwi iruvuxilla .
nANya wawvaxa xuRprayojanagalYu eVMxareV : paxXawiyu sWiwisWApaka guNavannu hoVMxilla .
calAvaNeVgeV waralAguva notugalYigeV beVMbalavAgi sama pramANaxa lohavannu ittukoVlYlYabeku AguvuxariMxa wurwu sWiwigalYalli haNaxa pUrEkeVyannu heVccisalu sAXya iruvuxilla .
I paxXawiyalli haNavannu calAvaNeVgeV waruva kAryavu heVccu veVcca ulYlYaxxAgiruwwaxeV .
ixakkeV aXika pramANaxa loha agawya AgixeV .
2 . byAMkoxyama wawva : I wawvaxa prakAra calAvaNeVgeV waralAguva haNaxa mOlyakkeV viruxXavAgi svalpa pramANaxa lohaxa niXigalYannu beVMbalavAgi ittukoVlYlYalAguvuxu .
nANya wawvaxalli iruvaMweV Se. nUraraRtu lohaxa niXigalYannu hoVMxiruva avaSyakaweV illi iruvuxilla .
uxA : calAvaNeVgeV bidugadeV mAduva haNaxa mOlyaxa Se. 30 aWavA 40raRtu mOlyaxa lohaxa niXiyannu AXAravAgi  irisikoVlYlYabahuxu .
sAmAnyavAgi yAva vyakwiyU kAgaxaxa notugalYannu lohakkeV parivarwisalu heVccina Asakwi worisaxiruvuxariMxa Se. nUraraRtu lohaxa niXigalYannu AXAravAgi ittukoVlYlYuva avaSyakaweV uxBavisuvuxilla eVMba aBiprAyaxa meleV I wawvavu niMwixeV .
byAMkugalYu wammalli iruva TevaNigalYigeV viruxXavAgi svalpa pramANaxa nagaxu haNavannu hoVMxiruva niyamaxa meleV I wawvavu beVlYeVxixeV .
nANya calAvaNeV paxXawiyalli I wawvakkeV ' pArSva TevaNi paxXawi ' eVMba heVsarU ixeV .
ekeVMxareV calAvaNeVgeV haNakkeV viruxXavAgi pArSva pramANaxa lohaxa niXiyannu beVMbalavAgi irisikoVlYlYalAguwwaxeV .
byAMkoxyama wawvaxa prayojana eVMxareV I paxXawiyalli haNakAsina pUrEkeVyalli sWiwisWApakawva iruwwaxeV .
svalpa pramANaxa lohaxa niXiyannu AXAravAgi  ittukoVMdu aXika pramANaxa haNavannu calAvaNeVgeV warabahuxAgiruwwaxeV .
AxxariMxa I paxXawiyu wurwu sWiwiya mawwu ArWika aBivqxXiya agawyagalYigeV spaMxisuwwaxeV .
I paxXawiya xuRprayojana eVMxareV , miwimIrixa pramANaxa haNaxa calAvaNeVya mUlaka haNaxubbara Aguva apAya ixeV .
nANya wawva aWavA saralYa TevaNi paxXawiyu yAva xeSaxalliyU AcaraNeVyalli illa .
I paxXawiyalli calAvaNeVgeV waruva kAgaxaxa haNakkeV Sekada nUraraRtu lohaxa niXiyannu AXAravAgi hoVMxuvuxu eVMxareV wuMbA xubAri AguwwaxeV .
parivarwanIya kAgaxaxa pramiwiyalli ixara avaSyakaweVyU iruvuxilla .
parivarwaneVgoskara Se. nUraraRtu lohaxa niXiyannu irisikoVlYlYuvuxAxareV axu parivarwanIya kAgaxaxa pramiwi AguwwaxeV .
anaMwaraxa saMxarBaxalli lohaxa pramiwiyanne alYavadisikoVlYlYabahuxu .
sArvajanikaralli haNaxa baggeV viSvAsavannu kApAduva xqRtiyiMxa I wawvavannu anusarisabekAguwwaxeV eVMba kAraNavU avAswava Axuxu .
ekeVMxareV sArvajanikarigeV haNaxa baggeV naMbikeV mUduvuxu sarkAraxa haNakAsina AdalYiwa xakRaweVya mUlaka .
haNaxa mOlyavu sWira AgiruvAgale hoVrawu cinna aWavA beVlYlYi muMwAxa lohagalYiMxalla .
byAMkoxyama wawvavannu AXarisiruva pArSva niXi paxXawiyu saralYavU , namyavU AgiruwwaxeV eVMba xqRtiyiMxa eVlla xeSagalYU I paxXawiyannu anusarisuwwiveV .
I paxXawiyalli haNaxa pUrEkeVyu kadimeV veVccavannu oVlYagoVMdixxu wurwusWiwiya mawwu ArWika aBivqxXiya agawyagalYannu pUrEsuwwaxeV eVMbuxu axara janapriyaweVgeV kAraNa AgixeV .
AxareV I paxXawiyu balYakeVyalli aneka rUpagalYannu padeVxixeV .
notu calAvaNeVya paxXawigalYu :  RD_PUNC byAMkoxyama wawvaxa prakAra notu calAvaNeVyu nAlku rUpagalYannu hoVMxixeV .
ivugalYu eVMxareV : 1 gariRTa rakRaka paxXawi , 2 nirxiRta nyAsa rakRaka paxXawi , 3 pramANAnuguNa niXi paxXawi mawwu 4 kaniRTa niXi paxXawi .
1 gariRTa nyAsa rakRaka paxXawi : I paxXawiyaMweV oVMxu nirxiRta moVwwaxavareVgeV lohaxa AXAravillaxeV keMxra byAMku kAgaxaxa haNavannu calAvaNeVgeV warabahuxAgiruwwaxeV .
oVMxu nigaxiwa moVwwaxa haNavannu gariRTa miwi eVMxu nirXarisalAgiruwwaxeV .
I miwiyavareVgeV cinna aWavA beVlYlYiya AXAra bekiruvuxilla .
I miwigeV mikki haNavannu calAvaNeVgeV warabekAxareV A haNaxaRte mOlyaxa lohaxa niXiyannu beVMbalavAgi hoVMxabekAguwwaxeV .
AxareV vyApAra - vyavahAraxa agawyaweVgalYigeV anuguNavAgi keMxra byAMku gariRTa miwiyannu AgiMxAggeV punaH nirXarisabahuxu .
iMgleVMd serixaMweV aneka xeSagalYu 1939riMxa I paxXawiyannu anusarisixavu .
gariRTa nyAsa rakRaka paxXawiyalli keVlavu prayojanagalYu iveV .
avugalYu eVMxareV : I paxXawiyu sWiwisWApaka guNagalYannu padeVxixeV .
avaSyakaweVgeV wakkaMweV nyAsa miwiyannu baxalAyisi heVccigeV haNavannu calAvaNeVgeV warabahuxu .
gariRTa miwigeV mIri haNavannu calAvaNeVgeV warabekAxareV kaddAyavAgi lohaxa niXiyannu beVMbalavAgi irisikoVlYlYabekiruvuxariMxa ixu miwimIrixa haNaxa pUrEkeVgU avakASa nIduvuxilla .
I paxXawiyalli lohavannu anAvaSyakavAgi xravya koSaxalli ittukoVlYlYuva agawya iruvuxilla .
I paxXawiya xuRprayojana eVMxareV ixu haNaxubbarakkeV sulaBa avakASavannu nIduwwaxeV .
ekeVMxareV nyAsa rakRaka gariRTa miwiyannu AgiMxAggeV baxalAyisi heVccAgi nirXarisuva mUlaka lohaxa AXAravillaxeV aXika pramANaxa haNavannu calAvaNeVgeV waruva apAya iruwwaxeV .
2 nirxiRta nyAsa rakRaka paxXawi : I paxXawiya prakAra keMxra byAMku oVMxu nigaxiwa pramANaxa haNavannu sarkAraxa sAlapawragalYa AXAraxa meleV calAvaNeVgeV warabahuxAgiruwwaxeV .
I nigaxiwa pramANakkeV mIri calAvaNeVgeV waralAguva pUrwi moVwwaxa haNakkeV aRte pramANaxa lohaxa niXiyannu beVMbalavAgi idalAguwwaxeV .
1844ralli ' byAMku cArtar kAyixeVya ' prakAra britan I paxXawiyannu prapraWamavAgi AcaraNeVgeV waMxiwu .
AxxariMxa ixakkeV ' britiR paxXawi ' eVMba heVsarU ixeV .
BArawaxalli I paxXawiyannu 1861ralli alYavadisikoVlYlYalAyiwu .
Aga nAlku koti rUpAyigalYannu nirxiRta nyAsa rakRaka miwiyAgi ittukoVlYlYalAgiwwu .
hawwoVMbawwaneVya SawamAnaxa koVneVya velYeVgeV I miwiyannu rU. 10 kotigU , moVxalane mahAyuxXaxa prAraMBaxa hoVwwigeV rU. 14 kotigU , 1920ralli 120 kotigU erisalAyiwu .
I paxXawiya anukUlaweVgalYu eVMxareV : illi haNakAsina vyavasWeVyu surakRiwa AgiruwwaxeV .
ekeVMxareV , nigaxiwa miwigiMwa heVccina pramANaxa notugalYannu waMxareV avugalYannu lohakkeV parivarwisabahuxAgiruwwaxeV .
lohaxa beVMbalavillaxeV nirxiRta miwigeV mIri notugalYannu calAvaNeVgeV waralu avakASa illaxiruvuxariMxa haNaxubbaraxa apAya iruvuxilla .
I paxXawiya xoRagalYu eVMxareV : haNakAsina vyavasWeVyalli sWiwisWApakawva iruvuxilla .
nirxiRta miwigiMwa heVccina pramANaxa notugalYannu calAvaNeVgeV warabekAxareV aRte pramANaxa lohaxa niXiyannu keMxra byAMku beVMbalavAgi irisikoVlYlYabeku .
AxareV aRtu lohaxa niXiyu laBya illaxe irabahuxu .
lohaxa koVraweVyiMxAgiye notugalYa muxraNavannu kadimeV mAdabekAguwwaxeV .
nigaxipadisixa miwigeV mIri notugalYannu muxrisabekAxareV aRte pramANaxa lohaxa niXiyannu AXAravAgi ittukoVlYlYabekAguvuxariMxa ixu xubAriyAxa paxXawi AgixeV .
pramANAnuguNa niXi paxXawi : I paxXawiyalli calAvaNeVgeV waralAguva oVMxu nirxiRta pramANaxa , aMxareV sumAru Se. 40raRtu kAgaxaxa haNakkeV beVMbalavAgi lohaxa niXigalYannu ittukoVlYlYalAguwwaxeV .
uxAharaNeVgeV : rU. 200 koti moVwwaxa notugalYannu calAvaNeVgeV waruvuxAxareV rU. 80 koti lohaxa niXiyannu beVMbalavAgi irisikoVlYlYalAguwwaxeV .
ulYixa pUrNa moVwwaxa haNavu sarakAraxa sAlapawragalYiMxa beVMbaliwa AgiruwwaxeV .
moVxalaneVya mahAyuxXaxa waruvAya halavu xeSagalYu I vyavasWeVyannu anusarisixavu .
pramANAnuguNa niXi paxXawiyu amerikA mawwu yuropina keVlavu xeSagalYalli Iga AcaraNeVyalli ixeV .
ixariMxa svalpa BinnavAxa ' SekadAvAru niXi paxXawiyu ' BArawaxalli 1927riMxa 1946ravareVgeV jAriyalli ixxiwu .
I paxXawiya mereVgeV Se. 40raRtu notugalYu cinna hAgU vixeSI vinimayaxiMxa mawweV innulYixa Se. 60raRtu notugalYu sAla pawragalYiMxa beVMbaliwa Agixxavu .
pramANAnuguNa niXi paxXawiya anukUlaweVgalYu eVMxareV : ixu sWiwisWApaka guNavannu hoVMxixeV .
ekeVMxareV svalpa pramANaxa notugalYigeV mAwra lohaxa niXiyannu beVMbalavAgi irisikoVMdareV sAkAguwwaxeV .
I paxXawiyu kadimeV veVccaxxu AgiruwwaxeV .
I paxXawiyalli oVMxu muKya xoRa ixeV .
axu yAvuxu eVMxareV , ixaralli haNakAsina vyavasWeVgeV sariyAxa BaxraweV mawwu surakRaweV iruvuxilla .
ekeVMxareV lohaxa niXiyu kadimeV AxareV axe pramANaxalli notugalYa calAvaNeVyannu waggisabekAguwwaxeV .
kaniRTa niXiya paxXawi : I paxXawiya calAvaNeVgeV waruva haNaxa pramANa eVRte ixxarU saha keMxra byAMku nirxiRtapadisixa oVMxu kaniRTa pramANaxalli cinna mawwu vixeSI sAlapawragalYannu AXAravAgi hoVMxiruwwaxeV .
I kaniRTa niXiyannu mIri eVRtu moVwwaxa kAgaxaxa notugalYannu bekAxarU yAvuxe rIwiya beVMbalavillaxeV calAvaNeVgeV waralu avakASa iruwwaxeV .
kaniRTa niXiya paxXawiyu eVradu aMSagalYa AXAraxa meleV vikAsagoVMdixeV : kAgaxaxa notugalYigeV heVccina bedikeV iruvAga keMxra byAMkina haNa calAvaNeVya aXikAraxa meleV nirbaMXa viXisuvuxariMxa axu wIvra pecigeV silukuwwaxeV .
byAMkina TevaNi mawwu pawwigeV aXika prAmuKya xoVreVwiruva AXunika arWa vyavasWeVyalli notugalYannu lohakkeV parivarwisuva agawyave kaMdubaruvuxilla .
BArawaxalli 1957riMxa I paxXawiyannu jArigeV waralAgixeV .
A mereVgeV rU. 200 koti kaniRTa niXiyannu irisikoVMdu BArawaxa risarv byAMku notugalYannu calAvaNeVgeV bidugadeV mAduwwixeV .
I kaniRTa niXiyalli rU. 115 cinnaxa rUpaxalliyU , rU. 85 koti vixeSi vinimayaxa rUpaxalliyU ixeV .
I kaniRTa niXigeV mIri eVRtu moVwwaxa haNavannu bekAxarU calAvaNeVgeV warabahuxAgiruwwaxeV .
I paxXawiya pramuKa anukUlaweV eVMxareV ixaralli nANya vyavasWeVyu namyaweVyiMxa kUdiruwwaxeV .
keMxra byAMku kaniRTa niXiyannu ittukoVMdu eVRtu moVwwaxa notugalYannu bekAxarU calAvaNeVgeV waralu vyApwi iruvuxariMxa yuxXa muMwAxa wurwu parisWiwigalYannu eVxurisalu mawwu ArWika aBivqxXi kAryakramagalYigAgi sarkAragalYu koVraweV illaxaRtu pramANaxa haNavannu hoVMxalu sAXya AguwwaxeV .
I paxXawiya pramuKa xOrbalyagalYu eVMxareV : ixu haNaxubbaraxa xuRpariNAmagalYigeV sugamavAxa neVleVyannu oVxagisuwwaxeV .
ekeVMxareV , I paxXawiyalli kaniRTa pramANaxa niXiyannu irisikoVMdu eVRtu moVwwaxa haNavannu bekAxarU calAvaNeVgeV warabahuxu AxuxariMxa haNaxa pUrEkeV miwi mIruva apAya ixeV .
heVccina pramANaxa haNavu calAvaNeVgeV baMxu haNaxa mOlyaxalli wIvra beVleV erikeV saMBavisixareV janaru haNakAsina vyavasWeVyalli viSvAsavanne kalYeVxukoVlYlYuwwAreV .
oVMxu AxarSa haNakAsina paxXawi : suvarNa pramiwiya mawwu kAgaxaxa haNaxa pramiwiya prayojanagalYu hAgU xuRprayojanagalYu eVradannU gamanisixa mawwu nANya calAvaNeV paxXawiya viviXa viXagalYannu wilYixa meleV oVMxu AxarSa haNakAsina paxXawi yAvuxu Agirabeku eVMba praSneV uxBavisuvuxu sahaja .
oVMxu AxarSa haNakAsina paxXawiyu suvarNa pramiwi mawwu kAgaxaxa pramiwiya pUrNa prayojanagalYannu oVlYagoVMdirabeku .
iMwaha haNakAsina paxXawiyu keVlYakaMda lakRaNagalYannu padeVxirabeku .
axu namya Agixxu ArWika aBivqxXiya agawyaweVgalYigeV anuguNavAgi mawwu wurwu parisWiwigalYigeV wakkaMweV haNaxa pUrEkeVyannu aXikagoVlYisalu avakASa mAdikoVdabeku .
saralYa Agixxu janarigeV sulaBavAgi arWa AguvaMwiruva haNakAsina paxXawiyu AxarSaxxu AgiruwwaxeV .
nANya paxXawiyu sArvajanikara viSvAsakkeV pAwravAgi axannu ulYisikoVMdu hogabeku .
haNaxa mOlyavu wIvravAgi baxalAguwwa irabAraxu .
A mUlaka beVleVya sWimiwaweVyannu kApAdikoVMdu barabahuxu .
haNaxa bAhya mOlyavu saha sWira Agirabeku .
aMxareV vixeSI vinimaya xaraxalli vyawyAsagalYu AgabAraxu .
Aga mAwra vixeSI vyApAra mawwu baMdavAlYa hUdikeV aXikagoVMdu , ArWika pragawi sAXaneV AguwwaxeV , aMxareV AxarSa haNakAsina paxXawiyu rARtragalYa naduveV sarakugalYa , seveVgalYa mawwu baMdavAlYaxa sugama calaneVgeV mArga mAdikoVdabeku .
oVMxu AxarSa haNakAsina paxXawiyu kadimeV veVccaxiMxa nirvahisuvaMwahuxu Agirabeku .
oVMxu uwwama nANya paxXawiyalli haNaxa pUrEkeVyannu niyaMwrisuva sAmarWya sarkArakkeV irabeku .
AMwarika mawwu aMwararARtrIya beVleVgalYa naduveV samAnaweVyannu waruvaMwaha hAgU pUrNoxyoga sWApaneVgeV neVravu AguvaMwaha haNakAsina paxXawiyu AxarSa Axuxu AgiruwwaxeV .
oVMxu AxarSa haNakAsina paxXawiyu janara AxAyagalYa naduveV samAnaweVyannu erpadisuvaMweV irabeku .
kaniRTa niXi wawvavannu BArawaxa haNakAsina paxXawiyu I lakRaNagalYannu hoVMxixeV .
AxareV haNaxa pUrEkeVya heVccalYaxa mUlaka wIvra beVleV erikeV saMBavisuwwiruvuxu I paxXawiyalli kaMdubaruwwiruva nyUnaweV AgixeV .
haNaxa mOlya : sUcyaMkagalYu haNavu sarakugalYu mawwu seveVgalYannu koVlYlYuva kAryavannu mAduwwaxeV .
AxxariMxale haNakkeV viSiRtavAxa lakRaNa baMxiruvuxu .
sarakugalYu mawwu seveVgalYannu koVlYlYuva kAryaxalli haNavu padeVxiruva SakwigeV ' haNaxa mOlya ' eVMxu heVsaru .
ixannu ' haNaxa koVlYlYuva Sakwi ' eVMxU kareVyalAguwwaxeV .
haNaxa mOlyavu beVleVgalYa mattavannu avalaMbisiruwwaxeV eVMbuxu muKyavAxa vicAra .
uxAharaNeVgeV , oVMxu kilogrAM sakkareVya beVleV eVradu rUpAyigalYu eVMxu BAvisoNa .
aMxareV oVMxu rUpAyiyu arXa kilogrAM sakkareVyannu koVlYlYuva Sakwi padeVxixeV eVMxu arWa .
Iga sakkareVya beVleVyu kilogrAMgeV nAlku rUpAyigalYigeV erixeV eVMxu ittukoVlYlYoNa .
I saMxarBaxalli oVMxu rUpAyiyu kevala 250 grAM sakkareVyannu koVlYlYuva Sakwi padeVxixeV eVMxaMwAyiwu .
bereV rIwiyalli helYuvuxAxareV , sakkareVya beVleVya erikeVyiMxa haNaxa mOlyavu Se. nUraraRtu ilYixixeV .
AxxariMxa oVMxu Gataka haNavu eVRtu vaswugalYannu KarIxisuva sAmarWya hoVMxixeVyo axakkeV haNaxa mOlya eVMxu sWUla helYabahuxu .
melina uxAharaNeVyiMxa wilYiyuvuxu enu eVMxareV vaswugalYa beVleVgalYu heVccu  ixxAga haNavu kadimeV koVMdukoVlYlYuwwaxeV ; AxareV haNaxa mOlyavu kadimeV iruwwaxeV .
baxalAgi , vaswugalYa beVleVgalYu kadimeV ixxAga haNavu heVccigeV koVMdukoVlYlYuwwaxeV ; aMxareV haNaxa mOlyavu heVccigeV iruwwaxeV .
aMxareV beVleVya mattavu haNaxa mOlyavannu nirXarisuva aMSa AgixeV .
vaswugalYa beVleVgalYalli Aguva baxalAvaNeVyannu sAmAnya beVleVgalYa mattavu sUcisuwwaxeV .
ixu eVllA vaswugalYa beVleVgalYa sarAsari matta AgiruwwaxeV .
sAmAnya beVleVgalYa mattavu eruwwiruvAga haNaxa mOlyavu ilYiyawoVdaguwwaxeV .
sAmAnya beVleVgalYa mattavu ilYiyuwwiruvAga haNaxa mOlyavu heVccu iruwwaxeV .
haNakkeV neravAxa bedikeVyilla .
aMxareV sarakugalYa rIwiyalli haNavannu neravAgi upayogisalu sAXyavilla .
haNavu sarakugalYannu KarIxisuva Sakwiyannu padeVxiruvuxariMxa axakkeV bedikeV baMxixeV .
haNakkeV vaswugalYannu koVlYlYuva Sakwi iraxixxareV axakkeV bedikeVye iruwwiralilla eVMbuxu gamanArhavAxa viRaya .
sarakugalYa beVleVya AXAraxa meleV mAwra haNaxa mOlyavannu aMxAju mAdabahuxAgixeV .
sUcyaMkagalYu haNaxa mOlyavannu neravAgi kaMduhidiyalu sAXyavilla eVMbuxu melina vivaraNeVyiMxa wilYixu baMxiwu .
haNaxa koVlYlYuva Sakwiyu vaswugalYa beVleVgalYa mattavannu avalaMbisi iruvuxariMxa beVleVgalYa muKAMwara parokRavAgi haNaxa mOlyavannu kaMduhidiyabahuxu .
beVleVgalYa sArvawrika mattavannu gaNaneVgeV weVgeVxukoVMdu A mUlaka haNaxa mOlyavannu alYeVyuvuxu avaSyaka AgixeV .
I alYaweVgeV oVMxu sAXana bekAgixeV .
aMwaha sAXanave ' sUcyaMkagalYu ' , heVsare wilYisuvaMweV ivu sUcisuva aMkigalYu AgiruwwaveV .
haNaxa mOlyaxalli Aguva baxalAvaNeVyannu I aMkagalYu sUcisuwwaveV .
oVMxu nirxiRta kAlAvaXiyalli haNaxa mOlyaxalli eVRtu baxalAvaNeV AgixeV eVMbuxannu sUcyaMkagalYu wilYisuwwaveV .
haNaxa mOlyavu eVRtu ixeV eVMbuxannu sUcyaMkagalYu wilYisuvuxilla .
baxalAgi , eVradu avaXigalYa naduveV axu hegeV vyawyAsa AgixeV eVMbuxara baggeV mAwra mAhiwi nIduwwaveV .
bereV rIwiyalli helYuvuxAxareV haNaxa nirapekRa mOlyavannu kaMduhidiyalu sAXya iruvuxilla .
haNaxa sApekRa mOlya aWavA wulanAwmaka mOlyavannu mAwra aMxAju mAdabahuxAgixeV .
aMxareV haNaxa mOlya hiMxeV yAvuxo oVMxu avaXiyalli ixxuxakkiMwa Iga aXika AgixeVye aWavA kadimeV AgixeVye eVMbuxannu mAwra wilYixukoVlYlYabahuxu .
A prakAra avaXigalYa naduveV vaswugalYa beVleVgalYu eriveVye aWavA ilYixiveVye eVMba aMSavu sUcyaMkagalYa aXyayanaxiMxa arWa AguwwaxeV .
ixakkAgi oVMxu mUla varRavannu ArisikoVlYlYabekAguwwaxeV .
mUla varRaxa beVleVgalYannu praswuwa varRaxa beVleVgalYoVMxigeV holisi haNaxa mOlyaxallAxa baxalAvaNeVyannu alYaweV mAdabahuxu .
sUcyaMkagalYa racaneV : sUcyaMkagalYa sahAyaxiMxa vewanagalYu , beVleVgalYu , uxyoga , uwpanna , raPwu mawwu AmaxugalYu , jIvana veVcca moVxalAxa eVllA pariNAmagalYalliyU uMtAguva baxalAvaNeVgalYannu kaMduhidiyabahuxu .
beVleVgalYa mattaxa , vyawyAsaxa aByAsaxa mereVgeV haNaxa mOlyavannu wilYixukoVlYlYalu neVravu Aguva sUcyaMkagalYigeV ' beVleV sUcyaMkagalYu ' eVMxu kareVyalAguwwaxeV .
beVleV sUcyaMkagalYa racaneVyalli agawya Agiruva halavAru saMgawigalYannu I keVlYageV vivarisalAgixeV .
1 . sUcyaMkaxa AykeV : beVleVgalYigeV saMbaMXisixaMweV aneka rIwiya sUcyaMkagalYu iveV - sagatu beVleVgalYa sUcyaMkagalYu , cillareV beVleVgalYa sUcyaMkagalYu , anuBogi sUcyaMkagalYu iwyAxi .
ivugalYalli yAva sUcyaMkaxa avaSyakaweV ixeV eVMbuxannu nirXarisuvuxu sUcyaMkagalYa racaneVyalli moVxalaneVya haMwa AgixeV .
ixu sUcyaMkaxa uxxeSavannu avalaMbisiruwwaxeV .
yAva beVleVgalYannu kaMduhidiyabekAgi iruwwaxeVyo , axakkeV wakkaMwaha sUcyaMkagalYannu wayArisabekAguwwaxeV .
2 . vaswugalYa AykeV : vaswugalYa AykeVya sUcyaMkagalYa racaneVyalli eVradaneVya haMwa .
niwya jIvanaxalli nUrAru vaswugalYu iruwwaveV .
avugalYeVllavannu serisi sUcyaMkagalYannu wayArisuvuxu asAXyave sari .
AxxariMxa keVlave pramuKa vaswugalYannu ArisikoVlYlYabekAguwwaxeV .
illiyU saha sUcyaMkaxa uxxeSavannu parigaNisuvuxu agawya .
uxAharaNeVgeV , keVlasagArara jIvana veVccavannu kaMduhidiyabekAxareV avaru anuBogisuva vaswugalYannu mAwra leVkkakkeV weVgeVxukoVlYlYuvuxu agawya .
baxalAgi , haNaxa sArvawrika mOlyavannu aMxAju mAdabekAxareV eVllA pramuKa sarakugalYannu sUcyaMkavu oVlYagoVlYlYuvuxu avaSyaka .
3 . mUla varRaxa AykeV : mUla varRaxa AykeVyu racaneVyalli oVMxu pramuKa saMgawi mawwu praswuwa beVleVgalYannu yAvuxAxarU oVMxu hiMxina varRaxa beVleVgalYoVdaneV holisabekAguwwaxeV .
I hiMxina varRavanne mUla varRa eVMxu kareVyuvuxu .
mUla varRavu praswuwa varRaxiMxa bahalYa xUra irabAraxu .
allaxeV axu eVlla xqRtiyiMxalU AxarSaprAyaxa varRa Agirabeku .
baragAla , kRAma , pravAha , yuxXa moVxalAxavu saMBavisixa varRavannu mUla varRavAgi AykeV mAdabAraxu .
ekeVMxareV aMwaha varRagalYalli sAmAjika mawwu ArWika sWiwigawigalYu haxageVttiruwwaveV .
uxAharaNeVgeV : kRAmaxa varRavoVMxannu mUla varRavAgi AykeV mAdikoVMdareV A varRaxalli vaswugalYa wIvra koVraweVyiMxa beVleVgalYu eriruvuxu sahaja .
AxareV praswuwa varRavu yAva samasyeVyU illaxa sAmAnya varRa AgixxareV beVleVgalYu kadimeV iruwwaveV .
AxxariMxa eVradu varRagalYa naduvina holikeV asamAna AxuxAguwwaxeV .
oVttinalli beVleVgalYu wIrA eriruva aWavA varRavannu mUla varRavAgi weVgeVxukoVlYlYuvuxu samaMjasavalla .
4 . aMki aMSagalYa saMgrahaNeV : sUcyaMkagalYa racaneVgeV ArisikoVMdiruva eVllA vaswugalYa beVleVgalYannu saMgrahisuvuxu muMxina haMwa .
mUla varRa mawwu praswuwa varRakkeV saMbaMXisixaMweV vaswugalYa beVleVgalYa aMki aMSagalYannu padeVyabeku .
beVleVgalYa baggeV mAhiwiyu svecCAnusAra AgixxareV sari Aguvuxilla , axu AxaRtu mattigeV naMbalarha Agirabeku .
5 . wUka koVduvikeV : AykeV mAdikoVMdiruva eVlla vaswugalYU oVMxe prAmuKyaweVyannu hoVMxiruvuxilla .
keVlavu vaswugalYu heVccu prAmuKyaweV hoVMxixxareV , innu keVlavu vaswugalYu kadimeV prAmuKyaweV hoVMxiruwwaveV .
uxAharaNeVgeV , akki mawwu sakkareV eVradu vaswugalYannU AykeV mAdikoVMdixxareV akkiyu sakkareVgiMwa prAmuKyaweV padeVxiruwwaxeV .
ekeVMxareV akkiyu kaniRTa avaSyakaweVya vaswu AgiruvuxariMxa axara melina veVccavu sakkareVya melina veVccakkiMwalU aXika AgiruwwaxeV .
I eVradu vaswugalYigU oVMxe prAmuKyaweV nIdixareV sUcyaMkavu Agiruvuxilla .
AxxariMxa AyA vaswugalYa prAmuKyaweVgeV anuguNavAgi avugalYigeV wUka koVdabekAguwwaxeV .
eVllA vaswugalYa mOlyavannu oVttugUdisi , naMwara prawiyoVMxu vaswuvina meleV janaru Karcu mAduva pramANakkeV anuguNavAgi AyA vaswuvigeV prawyekavAgi wUkavannu nirXarisabahuxu .
uxAharaNeVgeV , eVllA vaswugalYa mOlyavu rU. 100 koti Agixxu , eVllA vaswugalYigeV nUrara wUkavannu nIduwweveV eVMxu ittukoVlYlYoNa .
Iga goXiya meleV Karcu mAdixa haNavu rU. 12 koti AgiruwwaxeV eVMxu BAvisixareV , goXigeV hanneVradara wUka koVdalAguwwaxeV .
wUkavannu nIdi racisixa sUcyaMkagalYigeV ' wUkaxa sUcyaMkagalYu ' eVMxu heVsaru .
wUkavannu nIdaxixxa sUcyaMkagalYigeV , ' saralYa sUcyaMkagalYu ' eVMxu kareVyalAguwwaxeV .
6 . sarAsari mAduvikeV : eVllA vaswugalYa beVleVgalYa sarAsariyannu weVgeVxukoVlYlYuvuxu avaSyaka .
sAmAnya balYakeVyalli aneka viXaxa sarAsari paxXawigalYu iveV .
uxAharaNeVgeV , saralYa sarAsari paxXawi , jyAmiwiya sarAsari paxXawi , svaramelYana saMKyA paxXawi iwyAxi .
sarAsariyannu kaMduhidiyalu ivugalYalli yAvuxe oVMxu paxXawiyannu anusarisabahuxu .
sAmAnyavAgi saralYa sarAsari paxXawiyannu anusarisuvuxu rUDi .
ixaralli vaswugalYa oVttu beVleVyannu vaswugalYa saMKyeVyiMxa BAgisalAguvuxu .
7 . SekadA beVleV : mUla varRaxa beVleVyannu SekadA mAduvuxu muMxina haMwa .
prawi oVMxu vaswuvina mUla varRaxa beVleVyannu 100 eVMxu ittukoVlYlYalAguvuxu .
mUla varRaxa beVleVya AXAraxa meleV wulaneV mAdabekAxa varRaxa beVleVyannu SekadAvAru pramANaxalli parivarwisalu AguwwaxeV .
uxAharaNeVgeV , mUla varRaxalli sakkareVya beVleVyu ki. grAM.geV mUru rUpAyigalYu iveV eVMxu BAvisixareV , ixannu 100 eVMxu ittukoVlYlYalAguvuxu .
wulaneV mAdabekAxa varRaxalli sakkareVya beVleVyu ki. grAM.geV Aru rUpAyigalYu AxareV axannu 200 eVMxu parivarwisalu AguwwaxeV .
A mereVgeV SekadA beVleVya viXAnaxa mUlaka mUla varRaxa beVleVya AXAraxa meleV wulaneV mAdabekAxa varRaxa mUla varRaxa beVleVyannu kaMduhidiyalAguvuxu .
8 . sUcyaMkaxa racaneV : I melina aMSagalYa sahAyaxiMxa sUcyaMkavannu racisuvuxu koVneVya haMwa .
ixakkAgi mUla varRaxa beVleVgalYa sarAsari mawwu wulaneV mAdabekAxa varRaxa beVleVgalYa sarAsariyannu kaMduhidixu avugalYannu holisabeku .
mUla varRaxa beVleVgalYa sarAsariyu yAvAgalU oVMxu nUre AgiruwwaxeV .
AxareV wulaneV mAdabekAxa varRaxa beVleVgalYa sarAsariyu nUrakkiMwa heVccu irabahuxu illaveV kadimeV irabahuxu .
ixara AXAraxa meleV wulaneV mAdabekAxa varRaxa beVleVgalYa mattavannu nirXarisalu AguwwaxeV .
uxAharaNeVgeV , wulaneV mAdabekAxa varRaxa beVleVgalYa sarAsari 150 AgixeV eVMxareV beVleVgalYu Se. 50raRtu eriveV eVMxu arWa .
aMxareV mUla varRaxalli oVMxu vaswuvina beVleV oVMxu rUpAyi AgixxareV Iga axu rU. 1-50 AgiruwwaxeV .
ixakkeV viruxXavAgi , wulaneV mAdabekAxa varRaxa beVleVgalYa sarAsari 80 AgixeV eVMxareV beVleVgalYu Se. 20raRtu ilYixiveV eVMxu arWa .
sUcyaMkaxa racaneVyalli adacaNeVgalYu : vAswavavAgi sUcyaMkagalYa racaneVyalli halavAru samasyeVgalYannu eVxurisabekAguwwaxeV .
aMxareV mUla varRaxalli oVMxu vaswuvina beVleV oVMxu rUpAyi AgixxareV Iga axu rU. 1-50 AgiruwwaxeV .
ixakkeV viruxXavAgi , wulaneV mAdabekAxa varRaxa beVleVgalYa sarAsari 80 AgixeV eVMxareV beVleVgalYu Se. 20raRtu ilYixiveV eVMxu arWa .
sUcyaMkaxa racaneVyalli adacaNeVgalYu : vAswavavAgi sUcyaMkagalYa racaneVyalli halavAru samasyeVgalYannu eVxurisabekAguwwaxeV .
beVleVgalYa baggeV aMki aMSagalYa saMgrahaNeVyu xoVdda samasyeV AgixeV .
prAwiniXikavAxa mawwu niKaravAxa beVleV mAhiwiyu xoVreVyuvuxu wuMbA viralYa .
keVlavoVmmeV sagatu beVleVgalYa baggeV mAhiwi xoVreVwarU cillareV beVleVgalYa baggeV sariyAxa mAhiwiye xoVreVyuvuxilla .
ekeVMxareV cillareV beVleVgalYu kAla kAlakkeV mawwu sWalYaxiMxa sWalYakkeV wuMbA baxalAguwwaxeV .
allaxeV beVleVgalYa baggeV mAhiwi saMgrahaNeVyu wuMbA Srama hAgU heVccu veVccavannU oVlYagoVlYlYuwwaxeV .
vaswugalYa AykeVyalliyU woVMxareVyannu eVxurisabekAguwwaxeV .
xina kalYeVxaMweV aneka hoVsa vaswugalYa AviRkAra AguwwaxeV .
avU kUda pramuKa vaswugalYAgi bedikeVyalli iruwwaveV .
AxxariMxa prAwiniXikavAgi yAva vaswugalYannu ArisikoVlYlYabeku eVMbuxu samasyeV AguwwaxeV .
allaxeV sUcyaMkaxalli iruva yAvuxe oVMxu vaswuvu viviXa avaXigalYalli guNAwmakavAgi heVccukadimeV Agirabahuxu .
guNaxarjeVya vyawyAsakkeV wakkaMweV axara beVleVyalli baxalAvaNeV Agirabahuxu .
AxxariMxa gaNisaxeV beVleVya baxalAvaNeVyannu mAwra leVkka hAkixareV xAri wappixaMweV AguwwaxeV .
joVweVgeV , AxAya , janara aBiruci moVxalAxavugalYalli uMtAguva baxalAvaNeVyu bedikeV mawwu beVleVgalYa meleV pariNAma bIruwwaveV .
I eVllA saMgawigalYiMxAgi sUcyaMkagalYa racaneVyu wuMbA kaRtaxAyakavU , avugalYa uxxeSavu asaMgawavU AguwwaxeV .
3 mUla varRaxa AykeVyU woVMxareVgeV sikkuwwaxeV .
sarva sAmAnyavAxa mawwu AxarSaprAyaxa varRavannu AykeV mAduvuxu wuMbA kaTiNaxAyaka kArya AxxariMxa yAva rIwi nodixarU mUla varRaxa AykeVyalli svalpa asamarpakaweV ixxe iruwwaxeV .
AykeV mAdikoVMdiruva viBinna vaswugalYigeV yAva wUkavannu nIdabeku eVMbuxu mawwoVMxu samasyeV AguwwaxeV .
viviXa vaswugalYa prAmuKyaweVyalli heVccukadimeV iruwwaxeV .
avugalYa prAmuKyaweVyannu nirXarisalu samaMjasavAxa mAnaxaMdavannu alYavadisuvuxu kaRta .
koVneVyaxAgi , beVleVgalYa sarAsari weVgeVyuvuxakkeV yAva paxXawiyannu anusarisabeku eVMbuxu sUcyaMkagalYa racaneVyalli mawwoVMxu samasyeV .
sUcyaMkagalYa upayukwaweV : vAswava jIvanaxalli beVleV sUcyaMkagalYu nAnA viXagalYalli upayukwa AgiveV .
sUcyaMkagalYa neVraviniMxa viviXa avaXigalYalli haNaxa koVlYlYuva Sakwiyalli saMBavisiruva baxalAvaNeVgalYannu grahisabahuxu .
I baxalAvaNeVgalYannu sarkAravu wilYixukoVlYlYuva mUlaka haNaxa mOlyaxalli sWimiwaweV sAXisalu agawyavAxa kramagalYannu kEgoVlYlYalu sahAyaka AguwwaxeV .
2 janaweVya jIvana mattavannu wilYixukoVlYlYalu sUcyaMkagalYu neVravu AguwwaveV .
beVleVgalYu heVccu  ixxareV jIvana mattavu kadimeV AgiyU , beVleVgalYu kadimeV ixxareV jIvana matta uwwama AgiyU iruwwaxeV .
nigaxiwa AxAyavaMwaru mawwu kUlikArara jIvana mattaxa alYaweVyu awyupayukwa AxuxAgixeV .
ekeVMxareV svalpa mattina beVleVgalYa erilYiwavU kUda avara jIvana mattaxa meleV wIvra pariNAma bIruwwaxeV .
uxAharaNeVgeV , beVleVgalYu ilYixu haNaxa mOlyavu aXikagoVMdareV kUlikArara nEja vewana mattaxalli erikeV saMBavisixaMwAguwwaxeV .
3 beVleVgalYa mattaxa sAligaru mawwu sAlagArara meleV uMtAguva pariNAmagalYannu sUcyaMkagalYa sahAyaxiMxa wilYixukoVlYlYabahuxu .
uxAharaNeVgeV , beVleV erikeVya saMxarBaxalli sAlagArarigeV anukUla AxareV sAligarigeV anAnukUla AguwwaxeV .
ekeVMxareV sAligaru kadimeV mOlyaxa haNavannu hiMxakkeV padeVyuwwiruvuxariMxa avarigeV naRta AguwwaxeV .
ArWika muggattu , haNaxubbara , uwpannaxa matta , uxyogagalYu ive moVxalAxa ArWika saMgawigalYannu wilYixukoVlYlYalu sUcyaMkagalYu avaSyaka AgiveV .
aMwararARtrIya vyApAraxa sWiwigalYannu wilYixukoVlYlYalu sUcyaMkagalYu sahAya mAduwwaveV .
uxAharaNeVgeV : Amaxu beVleVgalYa sUcyaMkavu ilYiyuwwiruvAga aWavA samasWiwiyalli iruvAga raPwu beVleVgalYa sUcyaMkavu eruwwixxareV aXika pramANaxa raPwu galYikeVyu sUciwa AguwwaxeV .
baxalAgi raPwu beVleVgalYa sUcyaMkakkiMwa Amaxu beVleVgalYa sUcyaMkavu heVccu AgixxareV vixeSi vyApAraxa matta wilYixubaruwwaxeV .
AxxariMxa prawiyoVMxu AXunika sarkArakkU sUcyaMkagalYa racaneVyu awyamUlya AgixeV .
ArWika kRewraxa viviXa saMgawigalYa wulaneVgeV ivu gaNanIyavAgi neVravu AguwwaveV .
sUcyaMkagalYa sahAya illaxixxareV ArWika nIwigalYa sUwrIkaraNakkeV mArgave xoVreVyuvuxilla .
AxxariMxa sUcyaMkagalYa upayukwaweVyannu eVRtu varNisixarU kadimeVye .
sUcyaMkagalYa miwigalYu : sUcyaMkagalYu ArWika sWiwigawigalYannu ariwukoVlYlYalu awyuwwama hAgU awyupayukwa sAXanagalYu iruvAgalU saha avu keVlavu miwigalYannu hoVMxiveV .
AxxariMxa avugalYa uxxeSaxa IderikeV keVlavu saMxarBagalYalli bahalYa kaRta AguwwaxeV .
sUcyaMkagalYu sarisumArAxa saMKyeVgalYu AgiruwwaveVye hoVrawu niKaravAxa saMKyeVgalYu Agiruvuxilla .
AxxariMxa avugalYannu sarvasAmAnyavAxa mawwu samarpakavAxa mArgaxarSigalYu eVMxu oVppikoVlYlYalu sAXyavilla .
sUcyaMkagalYu kevala keVlavu varRaxa sarakugalYa beVleVgalYa mattavannu mAwra wilYisuwwaveV .
haNaxa mOlyaxa baxalAvaNeVyiMxa arWa vyavasWeVya vargagalYa janaweVya melina pariNAmagalYa aXyayanakkeV sahAyaka AguvaMwaha vyApaka sUcyaMkagalYa racaneVyu wuMbA kaRtaxAyaka AgiruwwaxeV .
AxxariMxa sUcyaMkagalYa vyApwiyu bahalYa miwa AgiruwwaxeV .
eVradu avaXigalYa naduveV beVleVya mattaxa holikeVyU asaMgawa Agabahuxu .
ekeVMxareV mUla varRaxalli anuBogaxalli illaxa vaswugalYe praswuwa varRaxa anuBogaxalli irabahuxu ; aWavA keVlavu vaswugalYu ixxarU saha guNa mawwu racaneVyalli saMpUrNavAgi baxalAgirabahuxu .
4 bereV bereV xeSagalYalli viBinna nANyagalYu mawwu viviXa rIwiya sarakugalYu aswiwvaxalli iruvuxariMxa sUcyaMkagalYannu aMwararARtrIya wulaneVgeV balYasikoVlYlYuvuxU asamarpaka AguwwaxeV .
sAXAraNavAgi prakataNeVgalYigeV upayogisuva leKanigalYannu oVMxu aMgula gAwraxa bixirina kaddigalYannu sumAru 8 aMgula uxxakkeV wuMdarisi sixXapadisikoVlYlYabeku .
bixiriniMxa mAduva leKanigalYa viXAnavannu nAlku haMwagalYalli vivarisalAgixeV .

Iga bekiruva alYaweVgeV wuMdarisi ciwraxalli worisiruva vaMki AkArakkeV baggisi bixirina raMXrakkeV serisabeku .
serisuvAga gamanaxalli idabekAxa viRaya eVMxareV , spriMg muMBAgavu bixirinalli iruva raMXraxa maXya BAgakke baruvaMweV irabeku .

nIve mAdabahuxAxa puswaka pITa karakOSala prayogaxiMxa AkarRakavU upayukwavU Axa paxArWagalYa wayArikeV prAcIna kAlaxiMxalU beVlYeVxu baMxiruva kEkasubu .

axakkeV bedikeVyU heVccuwwaxeV .

I paxXawi namma pUrvikariMxale baMxaxxu .
aMxu rAmAyaNa , mahABArawa , mawwiwara mahAkAvyagalYannu xegulagalYalli nirxiRta pITagalYalli irisuwwixxaru .

uppukAgaxaxiMxa koVyxiruva vinyAsavannu nayamAdi kappu baNNavannu balYiyabeku .

heVccu velYeVyannu makkalYu AtikeVgalYoVdaneV Ata Aduwwale kalYeVyuvuxu eVllara gamanakkU baMxiruva viRaya .
nAvu balYasuva goVMbeVgalYalli eVradu viXa .
calisuva goVMbeVgalYu hAgU calisaxa goVMbeVgalYu .

grAP hAlYeVya meleV ciwra 1raMweV bekiruva gAwrakkeV bareVxukoVlYlYabeku .
eVradu adi eVwwaraxa 10ne gej kaMbiyannu oVMxu halageVya maXyaBAgakkeV sikkisabeku aWavA bEsikal stoks .
saNNa waMwiyannu 10ne gej kaMbiya meleV sumAru ExAru suwwu surulYi baruvaMweV suwwikoVMdu surulYiyannu viswarisikoVlYlYabeku .
surulYi waMwiya meluBAgaxa waMwiyannu kowiya muMBAgakkeV sikkisabeku .
sixXavAxa kowiyannu surulYi samewa waMwiya meluBAgaxiMxa surulYi raMXrakkeV serisi melu BAgaxiMxa bittAga kowiya BAraxiMxalU mawwu spriMg kaMbiya hidikeVyiMxalU kaMbaxiMxa jAruva maMgavu kuNixAduwwA niXAnavAgi ilYiyalu prAraMBisuwwaxeV .
kowiya calaneVyu makkalYannu heVccAgi AkarRisuvuxaralli saMxehave illa .

BArawaxa saMskqwiyalli goVMbeVgalYigeV oVMxu pramuKa sWAna ixeV .
jAnapaxa kaleVyannu weVgeVxukoVMdareV allina viSiRtavAxa goVMbeVgalYannu gamanisabekAgixeV .
woVgalu goVMbeVgalYu , sUwra goVMbeVgalYu , kIlu goVMbeVgalYu , jAwreVya xinagalYalli mArAta Aguvuxaralli rAteV , kisagAlu goVMbeV , aMbeVgAlu kqRNa , pIpi kuxureV , giNi , rAjArANi , AneV , xevaweVgalYa goVMbeVgalYu heVccu .
prawi varRa xasara xinagalYalli I AtikeVgalYa praxarSanaxa vAdikeV IgalU nammalli ixeV .
vijFAna beVlYeVxaMweVllA kEkeVlasaxiMxAgi plAstik , rabbar , pAliwen moVxalAxa vaswugalYannu balYasikoVMdu yaMwraxiMxa wayArisixa goVMbeVgalYu janapriya AguwwiveV .
kIlu kuxureV ciwraxalli bareVxiruva kuxureV eVlla kuxureV aMwalla .
I kuxureV biduvu iruvAgaleVllA kulYiwiruwwaxeV .
kattiruva xAravannu eVlYeVxAga eVxxuniMwu muMxeV calisuwwaxeV .
kattiruva xAravannu eVlYeVxAga eVxxu niMwu muMxeV calisuwwaxeV .
kuxureVya calaneV wamAReVyannu uMtu mAduwwaxeV .
mEgalYlYa kuxureV mAduva viXAna : kuxureVya bidiBAgagalYannu plEvud aWavA rattina meleV - kuxureVya alYaweVya uxxa 13 aMgula , eVwwara 8 aMgula mawwu jodisuvAgina gAwra oVMxUvareV aMgulakkeV alYavadisuvaMweV ciwrisabeku .
bidi BAgagalYannu hariwavAxa AyuXaxiMxa kawwarisikoVlYlYabeku .
pITakkeV oVMxu aMgula xappa , eVradu aMgula agala mawwu eVMtu aMgula uxxaxa halageVya eVradu BAgaxallU eVradu aMgulaxa ciwragalYannu wirupu moVlYeVyiMxa serisabeku .
aMgagalYa bidi BAgagalYannu jodisuva moVxalu , naya mAdalu uppu kAgaxa upayogisabeku .
vajraxa wilYi nIrannu halageVya meleV balYixu neVralYalli oVNagisabeku .
ceVnnAgi oVNagixa meleV wEla aWavA jalavarNavannu upayogisabahuxu .
jalavarNa upayogisixalli vArniR balYiyalebeku .
iRteVllA keVlasavAxa meleV , bidi BAgagalYannu ciwraxalli worisiruvaMweV jodisabeku .
kuxureVya kIlugalYeVllA nayavAgi calisuvaMwAgalu wirupu moVlYeVyannu , maXyaBAgaxalli vARar noVdaneV serisabeku .
kuxureVya eVlla BAgagalYannU serisixa meleV ciwraxalli worisiruvaMweV xAravannu serisi , pITaxa muMBAgaxa raMXraxa wirupina mUlaka hoVrageV weVgeVxu sixXapadisabeku .
Iga xehaxa BAraxiMxa kuxureVyu kulYiwiruvuxu .
makkalYu xAravannu eVlYeVxAga , xAraxa eVlYeVwakkeV xehavu kIlugalYa sahAyaxiMxa melakke elYuwwaxeV .
Aga namageV kuxureVyu eVxxu niMwaMweV BAsa AguwwaxeV .
I mEgalYlYa kuxureVyu yAva makkalYigeV bekilla ! svalpa Srama vahisixareV I kuxureVya AtikeVyannu soVgasAgiyU varNamayavAgiyU mAdabahuxu .
wUgAduva sarkas goVMbeV AtikeVgalYalli bahu muKya Axuxu eVMxareV goVMbeVgalYu .
goVMbeVgalYa wayArikeV BArawaxa oVMxu prAcIna kEgArikeV .
goVMbeVgalYannu heVccAgi maNNalli mAdi suttu axakkeV suNNa balYixu anaMwara bekiruva baNNa koVduva vAdikeV iwwu .
viSiRtavAxa goVMbeVgalYalli woVgalu goVMbeVgalYu , sUwraxa goVMbeVgalYu , kIlu goVMbeVgalYu ivu muKya Axuvu .
woVgalu goVMbeVgalYannu hulleVya illaveV eVlYeVya AdugalYa haxa mAdixa carmaxiMxa mAduwwAreV .
anaMwara reKeVgalYiMxa ciwra bidisuwwAreV .
ciwragalYa AkArakkeV kawwarisi gidamUlikeVgalYiMxa weVgeVxa baNNavannu lepisi neVralYalli oVNagisuwwAreV .
rAwriya xIpa bixxa kUdale avugalYa kAMwi eVxxu woruwwaxeV .
ixe rIwi maraxa hoVttiniMxa mAdixa goVMbeVgalYannu sUwraxa goVMbeV AtakkeV balYasuwwAreV .
IceVgeV bixiru boVMbiniMxa , araginiMxa , batteVgalYiMxa , kappeV cippiniMxa nAnA namUneVya goVMbeVgalYannu mAduwwAreV .
vijFAna beVlYeVxaMweVllA yaMwragalYu prAmuKyakkeV baMxu ivugalYa pariNAmavAgi suMxara mawwu muxxAxa plAstik rabbar goVMbeVgalYu janapriya AguwwiveV .
uwwama mattaxa AtikeVya wayArikeVyalli japAn xeSavu moVxalaneVyaxu eVMxareV uwprekReVyalla .
avara kaleV nijakkU jIva wuMbisiruva AtikeVgalYu AguwwaveV .
