ciwraxalli worisiruva wUgAduva boVMbeVgalYannu prayawnisixareV nAve mAdabahuxu .
I wUgAduva AtikeVyannu mAdalu , ciwravannu bekiruva alYaweVgeV bareVxukoVlYlYuvuxu , wUgAduva pITakkeV sixXaweV goVMbeVyu kUduva pITa wUgAdalu goVMbeVgeV bekiruva BAravAxa lohaxa pAxarakReV .
grAP ciwraxalli worisiruvaMweV , bekiruva alYaweVgeV beroVMxu bilYiya rattina meleV geVreVgalYannu eVlYeVxu , hAsyagArana reKA ciwravannu bareVxukoVlYlYabeku .
reKeVgalYannu iMdiyA SAyiyiMxale bareVyabeku ,
anaMwara kawwarisabeku .
Iga muKakkU , kEgU halYaxi baNNavannU , udupigeV keVMpu baNNavannU , kuwwigeV patti mawwu kulAvi pattigeV nIli baNNavannU kuMcaxa sahAyaxiMxa balYiyiri .
gamanaxalli idabekAxa viRaya eVMxareV , rattina eVradu muKaxallU baNNavannu balYiyabeku .
ceVnnAgi Arixa meleV vArniR balYixareV oVlYlYeVya meVrugu baruvuxu .
wUgAduva pITavannu ciwraxalli worisiruvaMweV alYaweVgeV bareVxu kawwarisi , goVMbeVya walYaBAgaxalli koVreVxiruva BAgakkeV idabeku .
goVMbeVyannu kUdisuva walYaxa pITavannu weVlYu halageV mawwu maraxiMxa alYaweVgeV sarihoVMxuvaMweV mAdi , pITaxa melina BAgavannu wagadiniMxa mAdi 4 raMXragalYannu mAdabeku .
koVneVya raMXragalYannu maraxa kAlina BAgakkeV moVlYeVyiMxa bigiyabeku .
maXyeV iruva raMXragalYa meleV goVMbeVyannu kUdisabeku .
goVMbeVyu wUgAdabekAxareV kAlina BAgakkeV sIsaxiMxa mAdiruva pAxavannu sikkisabeku .
iRteVllA sixXavAxa meleV I sarkas natanannu pITakkeV jodisi oVMxu sala muMxeV walYlYixareV sAku avana wUgAta AraMBa .
gamanaxalli idabekAxa viRaya : ciwraxalli koVttiruva alYaweVgeV sariyAgi bidisikoVlYlYabeku .
bixirina leKanigalYu postarugalYalli balYasuva akRaragalYu gAwraxalli xoVddaxu irabeku mawwu sumAru 20 adigalYa xUraxiMxa viRayavannu sarAgavAgi oxalu anukUla Agirabeku .
AxuxariMxa oVMxoVMxu akRaravU oVMxu aMgulaxiMxa mUru aMgula gAwra iruvuxu oVlYlYeVyaxu .
I gAwraxa akRaragalYannu muxrisalu liWoV muxraNaxalli mAwra sAXya .
namageV bekiruva keVlave prakataNeVya cItigalYigeV xubAri veVcca mAduvuxaralli prayojanavilla .

prAraMBaxalli svalpa kaRta Agabahuxu , keVdabahuxu .
AxarU Srama pattareV suMxaravAxa akRaragalYannu bareVyalu sAXya .

I leKaniyannu balYasixa naMwara nIrinalli ceVnnAgi woVlYeVxidabeku .
haNaxubbara mawwu haNa kugguvikeV : haNaxubbara iMxina AXunika haNakAsina jagawwinalli haNaxubbaravu viSva vyApaka GataneV AgixeV .
namma xeSa iMxu eVxurisuwwiruva halavAru pramuKa samasyeVgalYalli haNaxubbaravu oVMxu bahu gaMBIravAxa samasyeV eVnnabahuxu .
rARtraxa sarvawomuKa elYigeVgeV ixoVMxu mArakavAgi pariNamisixeV .
haNaxubbarakkeV sarvasammawavAxa vyAKyeVyannu koVduvuxu kaTiNa .
bereV bereV leKakaru bereV bereV viXaxalli vyAKyeVyannu nIdixxAreV .
keVlavaru haNaxubbara eVMxareV beVleVgalYa mattavu wvariwa vegaxalli eruwwiruva parisWiwi eVMxu kareVxixxAreV .
sAXAraNavAgi haNaxubbaravu beVleVgalYa eruvikeVyoVdaneV saMbaMXa hoVMxixxu , koVlYlYuva Sakwiyalli kadiwavannu waMxoVdduwwaxeV .
aMxareV beVleVgalYalli eruvikeV uMtAguvuxariMxa haNaxa mOlya kadimeV Aguwwa hoguwwaxeV .
beVleV eralu muKya kAraNa haNaxa pramANaxallina heVccalYa .
avaSyakaweVgiMwa heVccina haNavu calAvaNeVgeV baMxAga haNaxubbara uMtAguwwaxeV .
haNaxa AXikyaxiMxa beVleVgalYu eruvuxannu haNaxubbara eVMxu kareVyabahuxu .
AxareV beVleVya erikeVyu haNaxubbaraxiMxale AguwwaxeV eVMxu helYalu Aguvuxilla .
ekeVMxareV uwpAxaneVya veVcca heVccixAga bedikeV aXikagoVMdAga , vaswuvina pUrEkeV kadimeVyAxAga beVleVgalYu eruwwaveV .
AxxariMxa calAvaNeVyalli haNaxa pramANa heVccixAga beVleVgalYu erixareV mAwra axu haNaxubbaraxiMxa uMtAgiruva heVccalYa eVnnabahuxu .
AxareV haNaxubbaraxiMxa beVleVgalYu eriye eruwwaveV eVMxu helYalAguvuxilla .
keVlavu bAri haNaxubbara ixxarU beVleVgalYu eraxe irabahuxu .
axe rIwi haNaxa pramANavu oVMxe samanAgixxu beVleVgalYalli bereV kAraNagalYiMxa vyawyAsa Agabahuxu .
muKyavAgi eVradu saMxarBagalYalli haNaxubbara uMtAgixeV eVMxu helYabahuxu .
haNaxa pUrEkeVyu bedikeVgiMwalU bahalYa heVccAxAga , vaswugalYa beVleVgalYalli asAmAnya erikeV uMtAxAga .
si. pi. gU avara prakAra varamAnavannu galYisuva catuvatikeVgiMwalU heVccu vegaxalli haNaxa AxAyavu heVccAxareV haNaxubbara uMtAguwwaxeV .
haNaxubbara AxAga janara varamAna heVccuwwaxeV .
janarigeV heVccina uxyogagalYu xoVreVwu kEwuMbA AxAya baruwwaxeV .
ixariMxa janaralli heVccu haNa seri avara bayakeVgalYu mawwaRtu heVccAgi avaru heVccu vaswugalYannu beduwwAreV .
Aga vaswugalYigeV bedikeVyu heVccAguwwaxeV .
AxareV vaswugalYa pUrEkeVyu bedikeVgiMwa kadimeV iruvuxariMxa avugalYa beVleVgalYu eruwwaveV .
ixe nijavAxa haNaxubbara eVMxu pigU avaru aBiprAya pattixxAreV .
kens avara prakAra , pUrNa uxyoga sWiwi hoVMxixa naMwara calAvaNeVyalli haNa heVccixareV mAwra haNaxubbara uMtAguwwaxeV .
pUrNa uxyogavannu hoVMxaxixxalli laBya iruva saMpanmUlagalYannu , jana SakwigalYannu saMpUrNavAgi balYasikoVMdiruvuxilla .
Aga calAvaNeVyalli iruva haNavannu heVccisixalli beVleVgalYu erixarU uwpAxaneVyalli heVccalYa uMtAguwwaxeV .
janarigeV heVccina uxyoga avakASagalYu xoVreVyuwwaveV .
I parisWiwiyalli haNaxubbara Aguvuxilla .
AxareV pUrNa uxyogaxa sWiwiyannu walupixa naMwara calAvaNeVyalli heVccixareV axu haNaxubbarakkeV eVdeVmAdi koVduwwaxeV .
uwpAxaneVyalli heVccalYavAgalI , uxyoga avakASagalYa viswaraNeVyAgali Aga sAXya iruvuxilla .
sahaja Agiye beVleVgalYu eruwwaveV .
aMxareV kens avara prakAra pUrNa uxyoga sWiwiyannu muttixa naMwara calAvaNeVya haNavannu heVccisixAga mAwra haNaxubbara uMtAguwwaxeV .
amerikAxa arWaSAswrajFarAxa irviMg PiRar avara samIkaraNaxa prakAra balYakeVyalli iruva haNaxa moVwwavu heVccAgi , mArAta mAdalu iruva paxArWagalYa pramANa moVxalinaRte ixxareV beVleVgalYu eralu AraMBisi haNaxubbara uMtAguwwaxeV .
kAraNagalYu : haNaxubbarakkeV muKyavAgi keVlYagina aMSagalYu kAraNagalYAgi pariNamisuwwaveV .
yuxXa : yuxXa kAlaxalli xeSakkeV heVccina haNaxa avaSyakaweV iruwwaxeV .
ixannu weVrigeVgalYu aWavA sAlagalYiMxa wuMbabekAxareV kUdale Aguva keVlasavalla .
AxakAraNa sarakAravu xeSaxa rakRaNeVya kAryagalYigeV balYasalu heVccina haNavannu calAvaNeVgeV waruwwaxeV .
ixariMxa haNaxubbara uMtAguwwaxeV .
koVraweV haNa : paMcavArRika yojaneVgalYannu kAryarUpakkeV waralu heVccu haNaxa avaSyakaweV iruwwaxeV .
Aga koVraweVya haNaxa agawyaweV nIgisalu heVccu notugalYannu muxrisi calAvaNeVgeV waruvuxuMtu .
ixariMxalU haNaxubbaravAgi vaswugalYa beVleVgalYu miwimIri erawoVdaguwwaveV .
haNaxa pUrEkeV aXika Aguvuxu , KAsagi mawwu sarakAri valayagalYa veVccagalYu eruvuxu , ivugalYa joVweVgeV byAMkugalYu heVccAgi sAla koVduvuxu vixeSiyariMxa xeSIya vaswugalYigeV bedikeV heVccAguvuxu iwyAxi aMSagalYu haNaxubbarakkeV kAraNa AguwwaveV .
beVleVgalYu eruwwixxAga grAhakaru , vyApArigalYu mawwu uwpAxakaru beVleVgalYu muMxeV mawwaRtu erabahuxu eVMxu heVccu vaswugalYannu koVMdu xAswAnu mAduwwAreV .
ixariMxalU beVleVgalYu eri haNaxubbara waleVxoruwwaxeV .
uwpAxanA kAryakkeV muKyavAgi kaccA vaswugalYu , oVlYlYeVya yaMwragalYu , xakRaweV mawwu pariSrama sAkaRtu pramANaxalli beku .
ivugalYa koVraweV ixxalli haNaxubbara uMtAguwwaxeV .
haNaxubbaraxa lakRaNagalYu : haNaxubbaravu muKya lakRaNagalYannu hoVMxiruwwaxeV .
oVMxu bAri uMtAxa haNaxubbara bahukAlaxavareVgeV muMxuvareVyuwwaxeV .
moVxamoVxalu kadimeV vegaxalli iruva haNaxubbara barubaruwwA wIvragawiyiMxa heVccAguwwA hoguwwaxeV .
kadimeV pramANaxalli eralu AraMBisuva vaswugalYa beVleVgalYu krameNa gaganavannu muttalu AraMBisuwwaveV .
beVleV erikeVyiMxa uwpAxakaru aXika lABa padeVyuvuxariMxa avaru wamma uxximeVgalYannu viswarisalu woVdaguwwAreV .
heVccu lABa galYisuva AseVyiMxa hoVsa hoVsa uxximeVgalYannu sWApisuwwAreV .
ixakkeVllA avarigeV heVccina pramANaxa baMdavAlYa bekAguwwaxeV .
byAMkugalYu vyApAra mawwu vANijyagalYigeV avaSyakaweVgiMwalU heVccu sAlavannu kadimeV baddigeV koVdalu sixXa AgiruwwaveV .
ixariMxAgi uxximeVgAraru hAgU iwararu heVccina sAlagalYannu padeVyuwwAreV .
I bageVya kAryakramagalYiMxa baMdavAlYa hUduvikeVyu aXikagoVMdu janara kEyalli haNavu heVccAgi seruwwaxeV .
ixariMxa avara koVlYlYuva Sakwiyu heVccuwwaxeV .
hIgeV haNaxa oVttu pUrEkeV mawwu byAMkina sAlagalYu oVttu haNaxa uwpAxaneVyu veVccavannu heVccisuwwaveV .
calAvaNeVyalli iruva haNaxa pramANa erixAga vaswugalYa beVleVgalYU eruwwaveV .
beVleVgalYu erixaMweV jIvana veVcca heVccAgi uxyoga mAduvavara vewana , wuttiBawyeV , nagaraBawyeV iwyAxigalYannu heVccisale bekAguwwaxeV .
ixakkAgi sarakAra heVccu haNavannu veVcca mAdabekAguwwaxeV .
Aga sarakAravu keMxra byAMkiniMxa sAla padeVxu , koVraweV haNa viniyogavannu mAdabekAguwwaxeV .
sarakAraxa veVccagalYu calAvaNeVyalli iruva haNavannu heVccisuwwaveV .
ixara PalavAgi beVleVgalYu mawwaRtu eruwwaveV .
nEsargika aMSagalYAxa pravAhagalYu , BUkaMpagalYu ; kRAmagalYu rARtraxallina sAmAnya uwpAxanA kriyeVgeV addiyannu uMtu mAduwwaveV .
ixariMxa keVlavu vaswugalYa pUrEkeVyalli aBAva uMtAgi avugalYa beVleVgalYu eruwwaveV .
A vaswugalYu awyAvaSyakavAxa mUla vaswugalYu AxareV aWavA kEgArikA kaccA paxArWagalYu AxareV avugalYa beVleVgalYu mawweV mawwaRtu eruwwaveV .
I eruvikeVya parisWiwigeV SrIsAmAnyaru bali AguwwAreV .
pariNAmagalYu : haNaxubbaraxiMxAgi beVleVgalYa eruvikeVyu samAjaxa eVllA vargaxa melU oVMxe rIwiya pariNAmavannu uMtu mAduvuxilla .
beVleV erikeVyiMxa keVlavarigeV lABa AxareV , mawweV keVlavarigeV hAni Agabahuxu .
AxxariMxa beVleV erikeVyiMxa Aguva pariNAmagalYannu wilYiyabekAxareV janarannu aneka haMwagalYalli viMgadisabeku AguwwaxeV .
uwpAxaneVya prAraMBaxalli haNaxubbaravu uwpAxaneVya heVccalYakkeV neVravu AguwwaxeV .
miwavAxa haNaxubbaravu ArWika kriyeVya matta , uxyogagalYu hAgU varamAnagalYigeV uwwejaka AguwwaxeV .
aMxareV heVccu uxyoga avakASagalYu kalpiwagoVlYlYuwwaveV .

ixariMxa rARtraxa AxAya heVccuwwaxeV .

haNaxubbaraxa vega heVccAxaMweV I sOlaByagalYu mAya AguwwaveV .

haNaxubbara heVccAxaMweV beVleVgalYu eralu AraMBisuwwaveV .

allaxeV niruxyoga heVccuwwaxeV .
AxakAraNa haNaxubbaravu prAraMBaxalli heVccu uwpAxaneVgeV neVravu AxarU kAlakrameNa oVMxu miwiyannu xAtixa naMwara axariMxa uwpAxaneVgeV XakkeV wagaluwwaxeV .

hIgeV avaSyaka vaswugalYa beVleVgalYu miwimIri eruvuxariMxa bada mawwu maXyama vargakkeV serixavara AxAyaxa bahuBAgavu A vaswugalYannu padeVyuvuxakke veVcca AguwwaxeV .

uxA : namma xeSaxalli vaswugalYa beVleVgalYu erixAga iwara rARtragalYu namma vaswugalYigeV wamma bedikeVyannu kadimeV mAduwwaveV .
ixariMxa namma raPwu kugguwwaxeV .

raPwu kuggi Amaxu heVccAxAga vixeSi vinimayaxa samasyeV uMtAguwwaxeV .

vewana padeVyuvavaru nirxiRta varamAna padeVyuva guMpigeV seriruvuxariMxa avaru haNaxubbaraxiMxa woVMxareV anuBavisabekAguwwaxeV .
avara vewana sWira Agixxu , eVllA bageVya veVccagalYU heVccAgi iruvuxariMxa avarigeV jIvana avaSyaka vaswugalYannu oVxagisikoVlYlYuvuxU kaRta AguwwaxeV .

avu eVMxareV - haNakAsina nIwi : beVleVgalYu eralu muKya kAraNa bedikeVya oVwwada .

rAjagiri soVppu : ixannu xinaniwyaxa adigeVgAgi balYasuvuxu kadimeVye .
AxareV mUlavyAXiyiMxa balYaluvavarigeV I soVppina sevaneV adigeVya rUpaxalli wuMbA guNakAri .
ixaralli kyArotin lavaNAMSagalYu hAgU " eV " jIvasawva aXika pramANaxalli iruwwaxeV .
awi srAva hAgU muttina woVMxareV iruvAga rAjagiri soVppu ORaXiya rUpaxalli pariNAmakAri nIduwwaxeV .
hoVtteVyalli uri ixxareV I soVppina kaRAyavannu sevisuvAga bahumattigeV uriSamana Aguvuxu .
puxinA soVppu : adigeV rUpaxalli ixannu balYasuvuxu kadimeVye AxarU beyisaxe hasiyaxanne viviXa rIwiya vyaMjanagalYigeV upayogisalAguvuxu .
puxinA catni rucikaravU hOxu , xehakkeV ArogyakaravU hOxu .
oVggaraNeV anna mAduvAga soVppannu beVreVsi mAduvuxariMxa sevisuva samayaxalli heVccina svAxavannu , mAdixa UtavU sulaBavAgi jIrNa Agalu sahakarisuwwaxeV .
puxinA soVppiniMxa jyUsannu wayArisalAguvuxu .
ixU saha ORaXiya rUpaxalli uwwama rIwiya pariNAmavanne uMtu mAduvuxu .
keVmmu , neVgadi iwyAxigalYigeV jyUsannu upayogisixareV kUdale nilluvuxu .

sabbasigeV soVppu : ixarallU sAkaRtu pORtikAMSagalYu iveV .
bANaMwiyarigaMwU ixu xEhika Arogya suXAraNeVgeV awyavaSyaka .
ixara sevaneVyiMxa , eVxeVhAlina pramANa aXikagoVlYlYuvuxu .
kAraNa aMSavannu heVccisuva kyAlsiyaM , raMjaka , kabbiNa , WiyAhin niyAsin " si " jIvasawva iveVllavU sabbasigeV soVppinalli seriveV .
suvAsayiMxa kUdiruva ixara bIjagalYalli wElAMSa ixxu halavu roga niroXaka guNa hoVMxiruvuxu eVMbuxu Ayurvexa paMdiwara aBiprAya .
sabbasigeV soVppinalli nArina aMSa heVccu iruvuxariMxa ixannu malabaxXaweVya samayaxalli heVccAgi adigeVgeV upayogisabahuxu .
boVjju nivAraNeVgAgi sabbasigeV awyuwwama soVppu sevaneV AgixeV .
qwucakraxalli vEparIwyavannu kANuva mahilYeVyaru keVlavu xinagalYa kAla ixara soVppina rasavannu sevisuwwixxareV qwucakravu krameNa vikAsa padeVyuvuxu .
paracixa gAyagalYu AxAga sabbasigeV soVppigeV ariSina serisi areVxu lepisuvuxariMxa guNa Aguvuxu .
arjIrNaxiMxa Bexi AguwwixxareV sabbasigeV bIjagalYannu kutti pudimAdi , hulYi majjigeVyalli kudiyuvuxariMxa Bexi nilluvuxu .
soVppina bIjaxa kaRAyakkeV jenuwuppa serisi xinavU mUru bAri oVMxeVradu xinagalYa kAla sevisuwwixxareV , keVmmu neVgadi kadimeV Aguvuxu .
vAwa saMbaMXaxa rogigalYigaMwU sabbasi soVppannu vipula pramANaxalli balYasuvuxariMxa SIGraxalli roga nivAraNeV Aguvuxu .
oVNagisixa soVppiniMxa catni pudi mAdi balYasuvuxariMxa jIrNaSakwi heVccuvuxu .
kadubu , vadeV , palya wayArikeVyalli sabbasigeV soVppannu balYasuvuxariMxa winisugalYalli ruciyU heVccuvuxu , ArogyavU vqxXisuvuxu .
sabbasigeV soVppiniMxa wayArisabahuxAxa adugeVgalYu : , bassAru , kUtu , masAleV vadeV , palya , sabbasigeV soVppina roVtti .
puMdisoVppu : AhAra sAmAgrigalYoVMxigeV beVreVsi upayogisuvuxariMxa ruci heVccisuwwaxeV .
sevisixa AhAravu sulaBavAgi jIrNa Agalu sahAya mAduwwaxeV .
piwwa , vAkarikeVya samayaxalli ixara hUvina rasakkeV sakkareV hAgU karimeVNasina pudi serisixa miSraNavannu oVMxu bAri sevisixareV vAkarikeV nilluvuxu .

keVsaru nIru iruva hAgU keVreVya aMcugalYalli keVsaveV xaMtu svABAvikavAgi kaMdu baruwwaxeV .

I vyaMjanagalYu ruci Agiruvuxu allaxe pORtikAMSagalYiMxa kUdiruwwaxeV .
mUla vyAXiyiMxa naralYuva rogigalYigeV ixu xivyORaXa .

keVsaveVya mUru - nAlku eVleVgalYannu ceVnnAgi kuxisi oVMxeVradu bAri nIrannu kudiyuvuxariMxa uxara saMbaMXiwa rogagalYu xUra AguwwaveV .
koVwwaMbari soVppu : warakAri hAgU palleVgalYa rUpaxalli neravAgi balYasaxixxarU avugalYa oVMxigeV hiwamiwa rIwiya miSraNaxa rUpaxalli balYasuvuxariMxa viviXa rIwiyalli sAkaRtu svAsWya , suXAraNeV AguwwaxeV .
koVwwaMbari soVppinalli viSeRavAxa rIwiyalli kabbiNaxa pORtikAMSa wuMbixeV .
joVweVgeV eV , bi , si jIvasawvagalYu viPula pramANaxalli iruwwaveV .
ixaralli roga niroXaka SakwiyU ixeV .
ajIrNa hAgU vAMwiyiMxa naralYuvavarigeV ixara rasavannu oVMxu lotaxaRtu kudisuvuxariMxa guNa kANabahuxu .
bAyi kahi AgixxareV , bikkalYikeV awi AgixxareV ixara sevaneV guNakAri .
xinavU adugeVyalli viviXa rIwiyalli balYasi sevisuvuxariMxa hallugalYu hAgU vasadugalYu gatti AguwwaveV .
rakwahinaweVyannu xUra mAduvuxu allaxe rakwa SuxXiyU saha I soVppina sevaneVyiMxa AguwwaxeV .
karibevina soVppu : koVwwaMbari soVppinaMweV karibevina soVppannu saha neravAgi adugeVyalli balYasaxixxarU , viviXa vyaMjanagalYoVMxigeV miSraNa rUpaxalli balYasalAguwwaxeV .
ixu wuMbA suvAsaneVyiMxa kUdiruwwaxeV .

soVppina catni wuMbA rucikara .
aRte roga nivAraka hAgU viroXaka .
ajIrNaxalli naralYuvavaru karibevina soVppannu wuppaxalli ceVnnAgi hurixu oVNa koVbbari , oVNa SuMTi , karimeVNasina pudi , puxInA , jIrigeV , huNase haNNannu sAkaRtu pramANaxalli serisi , kuttiyo , rubbiyo catni mAdi bisiyanna hAgU svalpa mAwra bisi wuppaxoVMxigeV kalasikoVMdu wiMxareV , ajIrNa roga wAne wAnAgi xUra AguwwaxeV .
sumAru mUru - mUrUvareV wiMgalYa kAla xinavU wappisaxe eVMtu - hawwu hasiya karibevina soVppannu winnuwwixxareV Sugar kaMplIt aMxareV maXumeha rogigalYu guNa kANuvaru .
awisAra , AmaSaMkeV saMBavisixa samayaxallU karibevina soVppina catniyannu balYasuvuxariMxalo illave jenuwuppaxoVMxigeV ciguru soVppannu winnuwwale ixxareV Bexi nilluwwaxeV .
allaxe BexiyiMxa Aguwwixxa suswu saha kadimeV AguwwaxeV .
mUlavyAXiyiMxa naralYuwwiruvavarigU saha I soVppina sevaneV awyuwwama .
oVMxu hidi karibevina soVppannu nuNNageV areVxu oVMxu kap eVlYanIrinoVMxigeV beVreVsi beVlYaggina jAva bari hoVtteVyalliye sevisuvuxariMxa ariSina kAmAleV aMxareV jAMdis roga nivAraNeV AguwwaxeV .
AxareV I rIwiya sevaneVya samayaxalli eVNNeV hAgU jiddina paxArWagalYa sevaneV varjanIya .
boVjju beVlYeVxiruvavaru xinavU karibevina catniyannu UtaxoVMxigeV aXika pramANaxalli sevisuvuxariMxa xehaxa gAwra mawwu wUka kadimeV Aguvuxu allaxe sevisixa AhAravU sulaBavAgi jIrNa AguwwaxeV .
hoVtteV nuliyuwwixxareV , AyAsa woruwwixxareV karibevina soVppina sevaneV hiwakAri .
garBiNiyarigU saha Arogyaxa xqRtiyiMxa karibevina soVppannu sevisuvuxu awyuwwama .
karibevina soVppannu areVxu niMbehaNNinalli svalpa ariSina beVreVsi muKakkeV lepisikoVMdu keVlakAlaxa naMwara bisi nIriniMxa woVlYeVxukoVlYlYuvuxariMxa muKaxa meliruva moVdaveVgalYu xUra Aguvuxu allaxe muKa kAMwiyU saha heVccuwwaxeV .
xaMtina soVppu : xaMtu Arogyaxa xqRtiyiMxa badava - ballixareVllarigU BAgyaxa naMtu .
ixaralli kabbiNaxa aMSa heVccixeV .

ixariMxa xehaxa wUka heVccuwwaxeV .

jvarapIdiwarigeV , xaMtina soVppina hulYi , palya wuMbA Arogyakara .

SarIraxalli rakwa kadimeV iruvavaru , naraxOrbalyavannu hoVMxiruvavaru , xqRti xoRa iruvavaru , kAmAleV rogigalYu , SvAsAMgakkeV saMbaMXisixa roga iruvavaru xaMtina soVppannu balYasuvuxariMxa ArogyavaMwaru AguwwAreV .

xoVddapawreV soVppu : ixannu karpUravalli eVMxu kareVyuwwAreV .
jIrNaSakwi kadimeV AxAga xoVddapawreVya eVleVgalYigeV svalpa uppu serisi sevisuvuxariMxa jIrNaSakwi vqxXisuwwaxeV .
xoVddapawreV mawwu ariSina koVneVyannu nuNNageV areVxu mEgeV lepisikoVMdu , keVla kAlaxa naMwara bisi nIrinalli snAna mAduvuxariMxa mE meleV gulYlYeVgalYu ixxareV mAya AguwwaxeV .
piwwaxa nivAraNeVyU AguwwaxeV .
keVmmu , xammu , ubbasa , unmAxa , hoVtteV nuliyuvuxu moVxalAxa rogagalYigeV xoVddapawreV xivyORaXi .
xoVddapawreV eVleVya rasa weVgeVxu axakkeV jenuwuppa beVreVsi makkalYigeV kudisuvuxariMxa makkalYigeV ajIrNaxiMxa uMtAgiruva hoVtteV novu , hoVtteV ubbara guNa AguwwaxeV .
xoVddapawreV eVleVya rasa weVgeVxu axakkeV jenu wuppavannu serisi oVMxu tI camacaxaRtu xinakkeV mUru bAri makkalYigeV kudisixareV keVmmu nivAraNeV AguwwaxeV .
ExAru xoVddapawreV eVleVgalYoVdaneV jIrigeV serisi bisi mAdi , areVxu rasa weVgeVxu , axannu jeninoVMxigeV sevisixareV gaMXeV kUdale nivAraNeV AguwwaxeV .
neVgadi baMxAga wulYasI eVleVyoVMxigeV xoVddapawreVyannu jajji weVgeVxa rasakkeV jenuwuppa beVreVsi sevisixareV guNa AguwwaxeV .
xoVddapawreVya catniyannu sevisuvuxariMxa waleV suwwuvikeV nilluwwaxeV .
cakkowa soVppu : avareV belYeVyoVMxigeV cakkowa soVppina hulYi mAdi sevisuvuxariMxa Arogya suXArisuvuxu .

hoVnagoVneVsoVppu : hoVnagoVneV soVppannu basixu mAduva sArinalli balYasuvuxariMxa kaNNuri hAgU iwara bageVya newra rogagalYu xUra AguwwaveV .
moVlYeV roga aWavA mUlavyAXiyiMxa naralYuvavarigeV hoVnagoVneV soVppina palya hAgU basixa sAru Arogyaxa xqRtiyiMxa pariNAmakAri .

huNase ( haNNu ) Arogyaxa xqRtiyiMxa halYeVya huNaseV haNNu wuMbA Arogyakara .
hoVsa huNaseV haNNannu adigeVyalli balYasuvuxariMxa Bexi Aguvuxu .
halYeVya huNaseV haNNigeV svalpa beVlla hAgU jIrigeV beVreVsi kutti winnuvuxariMxa hoVtteVnovu , vAMwi , waleV suwwuvikeV moVxalAxa rogagalYu SamanagoVlYlYuwwaveV .
AmaSaMkeV uMtAxAga halYeVya huNaseV haNNinoVMxigeV puxInA , kAlYumeVNasu , elakki hAgU svalpa uppu serisi kutti catni bisi annaxoVMxigeV hiwavAgi sevisuvuxariMxa guNa kANabahuxu .
huNaseV goVjjigeV hulYi majjigeV svalpa beVreVsi , mAgixa bAlYeVhaNNannu axaralli ceVnnAgi wiruvi sevisuvuxariMxa awisAra hAgU AmaSaMkeV rogagalYu guNa AguwwaveV .
huNaseV soVppina rasavannu moVsarinalli kalasi sevisuvuxariMxa mUwra visarjaneVya samayaxalli uri ixxareV kadimeV AguwwaxeV .
huNaseV ciguru hAgU nuggeV kAyiya sAru wuMbA ruci .
joVweVgeV xehArogyakaravU hOxu .
huNaseV ciguru hAgU eVlYeV mAvina kAyiyannu beyisi winnuvuxariMxa piwwaxoRa nivAraNeV AguwwaxeV .
saMXivAwaxa kAraNa SarIraxa yAvuxAxarU aMgaxalli Uwavo novo saMBavisixAga huNase eVleVgalYannu bisi mAdi batteVyalli katti kApata koVduvuxariMxa guNa kANabahuxu .
huNase eVleVgalYannu ceVnnAgi kuxisixa nIriniMxa bAyi mukkalYisixareV bAyihuNNu vAsi AguwwaxeV .
goNisoVppu : ixu winnuva soVppu .

vilYyaxeVleV : wAMbUla rUpaxalli sAmAnyavAgi vilYyaxeVleVyannu meVlluvuxu rUDi .

mUlYeVgalYa beVlYavaNigeVgeV sahakAri .
" eV " jIvasawva annAMgavU iruvuxariMxa SarIra puRTavAgi beVlYeVyuvuxu .
kabbiNa hAgU kyAlsiyaM iruvuxariMxa mUlYeVgalYu xehaxalli gatti AguwwaveV .
vArakkeV oVMxu xina AxarU agaseV soVppina sArannu upayogisuwwixxareV sarva rogagalYigU rAmabANa .

garaga soVppu : ixannu BqMgarAja eVMxu Ayurvexa graMWagalYu hoVgalYuwwaveV .
soVMpAgi kUxalu beVlYeVyalu I soVppina rasa wuMbA anukUlakara Axuxu .
ixara eVNNeVyannu sulaBavAgi maneVyalle wayArisikoVlYlYabahuxAxa viXAnavannu AyurvexIya graMWagalYu vyakwagoVlYisiveV .
lyAtin BAReVyalli ixannu eVklipta alba eVMxu kareVyalAgixeV .
garaga kUxalu beVlYavaNigeVgeV wuMbA hiwakAri eVnisiruvuxariMxa keSarAja eVMxu biruxu padeVxixeV .
keSa aMxareV kUxalina hulusu beVlYavaNigeVgeV prasAxana eVnisiruvuxe allaxe iwara ORaXIya guNagalYannU saha garagaxa soVppinalli guruwisabahuxu .
viviXa rIwiya carma rogagalYu I soVppina viviXa prayogagalYiMxa guNa AguwwaveV .
ixariMxa wayArAxa ORaXaxiMxa keVmmu xammugalYU xUra Aguvuxu kaMdubaMxixeV .
viryoRNa eVnisiruva ixu ruciyalli kadu kahi .
garagaxa soVppannu kAMda sahiwa woVlYeVxu , jajji nuNNageV areVxu rasa weVgeVxu sevisuvuxariMxa rakwahInaweV kadimeV Aguvuxu .
eVllakkU migilAgi keSavqxXigeV anukUla iruvuxariMxa ixannu keSaraMjaka eVMxU kareVyuwwAreV .
pulYlYaM puruci soVppu : pulYlYaMpuruci soVppinalli iruva ORaXIya guNagalYu : yAvuxAxarU hulYa kaccixAga wakRaNa pulYlYaMpuruci soVppannu hiMdi rasa weVgeVxu , axannu hulYu kaccixa jAgakkeV haccuvuxariMxa novu , uri , naveV kadimeV AguwwaxeV .
pulYlYaMpuruci soVppina catniyannu yAvAgalAxaru oVmmeV sevisuvuxariMxa SarIrakkeV bekAxa kabbiNa , suNNa muMwAxa jIvasawvagalYu xoVrakuwwaxeV .
viSeRa sUcaneV : mUwra kallu xoRa iruvavaru pulYlYaMpuruci soVppannu heVccAgi balYasabAraxu .
cakkowaneV soVppu : cakkowaneV soVppina hulYi mAdikoVMdu winnuvuxariMxa AhAra ceVnnAgi jIrNa Aguvuxu .
waMpu nIduvuxu .
cakkowaneV soVppannu AgAga balYasuvuxariMxa naragalYalli hoVsa cEwanya wuMbikoVlYlYuvuxu .
cakkowaneV soVppannu heVccAgi balYasixalli ariSina kAmAleV mawwu mUlavyAXi heVccu guNa kaMdubaruvuxu .
cakkowaneV soVppannu sevisuvuxariMxa mala sadilagoVlYlYuvuxu .
hasivu heVccAgi jIrNa Agaxe ulYixiruva AhAra saha jIrNa Aguvuxu .
hakkarikeV soVppu : hakkarikeV soVppannu kAyiyoVMxigeV winnuwwixxareV lEMgika Asakwi aXika AguwwaxeV .

xaMwa kRaya nivAraNeV Aguvuxu .
kiruwasAleV soVppu : mUwraxa uri ixxareV oVMxu tI camaca kiruwasAleV soVppina rasakkeV Aru woVttu niMbeV rasa beVreVsi xinakkeV mUru aWavA nAlku bAri sevisuvuxariMxa upaSamana Aguvuxu .
awi uRNa AgixxareV waMpu mAdikoVlYlYalu kiruwasAleV soVppina adigeVyannu sevisuvuxu oVlYlYeVyaxu .
kiruwasAleV soVppannu niyamiwavAgi balYasuvuxariMxa , mUwrapiMdagalYa woVMxareV nivAraNeV Aguvuxu .
mUwrakallu hoVra bIlYuvuxu .
mUlaMgi soVppu : huNNu piwwa malabaxXaweV nivAraNeV Agalu mUlaMgi soVppina rasavannu mawwu gaNikeV eVleV rasavannu mUlaMgi soVppina rasaxa pramANaxaRte jenuwuppaxoVMxigeV xinakkeV mUru bAri sevisabeku .
mUwra saragavAgi Agalu hAgU mUwrASayaxalli uMtAguva kallu hoVra bIlYalu mUlaMgi soVppina rasavannu sevisabeku .
kuxiyuva nIrinalli mUlaMgi soVppannu beyisi , jenuwuppaxoVMxigeV sevisixareV kAmAleV roga niyaMwrisalpaduvuxu .
mUlaMgi soVppu jvara , neVgadi , keVmmu muMwAxa rogagalYigU xivyORaXa .
wotaxa soVppu : wotaxa soVppina bIjagalYannu cIpi axara rasa keVmmu nivAraNeVgeV sahAyaka AguwwaxeV .
hallina novu iruvAga wotaxa soVppina bIjagalYannu cIpuvuxariMxa hallina krimigalYu sawwu hallu novu guNa AguwwaxeV .
gaMtalu novu iruvavaru wotaxa soVppina bIjaxa kASAyaxiMxa gaMtalu mukkalYisixareV gaMtalu novu nivAraNeV AguwwaxeV .
mUlaMgi soVppina upayogagalYu : huNNu , piwwa , malabaxXaweV nivAraNeV Agalu mUlaMgi soVppina rasavannu mawwu gaNikeV eVleV rasavannu mUlaMgi rasaxa pramANaxaRte jenuwuppaxoVMxigeV beVreVsi xinakkeV mUru bAri sevisabeku .
mUwra sarAgavAgi Agalu hAgU mUwrASayaxalli uMtAguva kallu hoVra bIlYalu mUlaMgi soVppina rasavannu sevisabeku .
kuxiyuva nIrinalli mUlaMgi soVppannu beyisi , jenuwuppaxoVMxigeV sevisixareV kAmAleV roga niyaMwrisalpaduvuxu .
mUlaMgi soVppu jvara , neVgadi , keVmmu muMwAxa rogagalYigU xivyORaXa .
hariveV soVppuna upayogagalYu : adigeVyalli yaWecCavAgi hariveV soVppannu balYasixareV roganiroXaka Sakwi heVccAguwwaxeV hAgU yakqwwina rakRaNeV AguwwaxeV .
hariveV soVppannu suttu axara bUxiyannu nIrinalli kalasi , muKakkeV haccikoVMdareV moVdaveV nivAraNeV AguwwaxeV .
ariSina hAgU hariveV soVppannu areVxu kEkAligeV haccixareV carmaxa kAMwi heVccAguwwaxeV .
kUxalu soVMpAgi beVlYeVyalu hariveV soVppina rasa hacci snAna mAdabahuxu .
mulYlYukIreV soVppu : upayogagalYu : mulYlYukIreV soVppannu waleVgeV haccikoVMdareV waMpu AguwwaxeV mawwu kUxalu soVMpAgi beVlYeVyuwwaxeV .
garBiNiyarigeV kAlu UxikoVMdAga oVMxu lota mulYlYukIreV soVppina rasakkeV oVMxu camaca niMbeV haNNina rasa beVreVsi weVgeVxukoVMdareV Uwa ilYiyuwwaxeV .
mulYlYukIreV soVppannu beyisi jeninoVMxigeV wiMxareV karulYina huNNu mawwu malabaxXaweV nivAraNeV AguwwaxeV .
mulYlYukIreV soVppina wAjA rasavannu jenu mawwu elakki pudiyoVMxigeV heVrigeVya naMwara sevisixareV hAlina pramANa heVccuwwaxeV .
viRNukAMwi soVppu : viRNukAMwi soVppinalli eVradu jAwigalYu iveV .
bilYi baNNaxa viRNukAMwi soVppu nIli baNNaxa viRNukAMwi soVppuna upayogagalYu : bilYiya viRNukAMwiyu buxXivarXaka AgixeV hAgU ixannu adugeVyalli sevisuvuxariMxa hoVtteVyalli jaMwu hulYugalYu nASa AguwwaveV .
viRNukAMwi soVppannu adigeVyalli upayogisixareV hiwavannu uMtumAduwwaxeV .
viRNukAMwi soVppigeV viRanASaka guNa iruvuxariMxa maMdala hAvina viRavannU nivAraNeV mAduwwaxeV .
nIli jAwiya viRNukAMwi soVppina palyavannu winnuvuxariMxa jvaraxa wApa wagguwwaxeV .
nIli jAwiya viRNukAMwi soVppina palyavannu winnuvuxariMxa rakwaBexi nilluwwaxeV .
hAleV soVppu : upayogagalYu : hAleV soVppina palyavannu sevisuvuxariMxa aneka rIwiya jIvasawvagalYu SarIrakkeV xoVreVyuvuxu .
hAleV soVppina palyavannu xinavU sevisuvuxariMxa arbuxa roga kRINisuvuxu .
aNNeV soVppu : upayogagalYu : bAyihuNNu nivAraNeV Agalu aNNeVsoVppina palyavannu upayogisixareV uwwama .
aNNeVsoVppina palyavannu xinavU sevisuvuxariMxa kaNNu roga kadimeVyAgi xqRti curukAguwwaxeV .
kelnalli sasArajanaka , piRTa , koVbbu , raMjaka , suNNa , kabbiNa , sodiyaM , jIvasawvagalYAxa eV , bi hAgU si - iwyAxigalYa aMSagalYu iveV .
sArannu xinavU sevisuvuxariMxa jIrNaSakwi vqxXiyAgi hasivu heVccuwwaxeV .
palyavannu sevisuvuxariMxa SarIrakkeV bekAxa jIvasawva xoVreVyuwwaxeV .
SawAvari geVddeVya cUrNavannu awisAra BexixiMxa naralYuwwiruvavaru wiMxareV Bexi nilluwwaxeV .
geVddeVyannu eVlYlYeVNNeVyalli hAki novu iruva BAgagalYigeV haccixareV novu kadimeV AguwwaxeV .
palyavannu sevisuvuxariMxa hqxroga nivAraNeV AguwwaxeV .
eVxeVhAlu vqxXi Agalu SawAvariya geVddeVyannu niwya adugeVyalli upayogisikoVlYlYabeku .
adugeVyannu kramavAgi sevisuvuxariMxa mUwra sarAgavAgi AguwwaxeV .
wulYasi : wulYasi gidavu saha hiMxU Xarmaxalli paviwra hAgU pUjanIya sWAnavannu padeVxixeV .
mahAviRNuvina pawni eVMba BAvaneVyU hiMxU XarmIyaralli ixeV .
XarmIyaralli prawi maneVya muMxeVyU , oVMxoVMxu wulYasIkatteV ixxe iruwwaxeV .
ixannu bqMxAvana eVMxU kareVyuwwAreV .
bqMxAvanaxa praxakRiNeVyannu SqxXeV - BakwiyoVMxigeV hiMxU mahilYeVyaru mAduvuxariMxa , mAMgalya BAgya aMxareV sOBAgyawana SASvawavAgi ulYiyuwwaxeV eVMba XArmika naMbikeVyU pracaliwaxalli ixeV .
keVmmu , neVgadigalYaMwaha sAmAnya KAyileVgalYu , wulYasI rasa sevaneVyiMxa vAsi AguwwaveV .
kaPa saMbaMXiwa rogagalYU wulYasiyannu Ayurvexa paMdiwara sUkwa salaheVyaMweV viviXa rUpagalYalli balYasuvuxariMxa xUra Agiruvuxara prasaMgagalYu beVlYaku kaMdiveV .
rasa bahalYaRtu roga nivAraNeVgeV Ayurvexaxalli upayukwa eVnisixeV .
kqRNa wulYasi - SrI wulYasi eVMba eVradu prakAraxa gidagalYu ixxu , ORaXIya xqRtiyiMxa kqRNa wulYasi ( kappu ) wuMbA pariNAmakAri eVMxu parigaNisalpattixeV .
saMbaMXiwa KAyileV , ixara rasakkeV jenuwuppa kallusakkareV hAgU SuMTi rasavannu miSra mAdi sevisuvuxariMxa guNamuKa Agabahuxu .
wulYasiyannu xinaniwyaxa maneVmaxxu eVMxu parigaNisixxarU maneVya muMxeV wulYasI gidagalYannu hiMxinaMweV kANuvuxu viralYa Agiruvuxu oVMxu viparyAsave sari .
nimma waleV sidiyuwwixeVye ? mUgu kattixeVye ? usirAtakkeV woVMxareVye ? baggalu kaRtave ? prANa Sakwi kuMxiwe ? sUryana eVxuru hoxAga nIroVsaruvuxe ? hAgixxareV nimageV sEnasEtis ixeV .
mUgu hoVlYlYeVya paMkcar baggeV Bayave ciMweV bidi .
anAxi kAlaxiMxalU namma Arogya kApAduwwixxa Aryuvexavu nimma xeha prakqwigeV sariyAxa cikiwseV oVxagisaballuxu .
sEnasEtis enixu ? mUgina melina BAgaxa guNiyalli soMku wagulixa pariNAma ixu ; mUgina hoVlYlYeVgeV mawwu waleV burudeVya oVlYa kulYigalYigeV nera saMbaMXa .
4 kulYigalYu alli iveV .
avu nAlkU saha nera saMparka ulYlYavu .
oVlYa srAva mawwu gAlYiya saMcArakkeV anukUla ixeV .
iMWa kulYiyalli saMgrahiwa SleRma mUgina mUlaka hoVra hoVmmalu sarAga avakASa ixeV .
neVgadi baMxAga I kulYigalYalli uriyUwa mawwu avaroXa .
hAgAgi oVlYagaNa oVwwada eruvikeV sahaja .
I maXyeV kulYiyalli ixxa gAlYi hoVra bAraxa sWiwi hAgU wawpariNAmavAgi nirvAwa .
kelYuva xaniyalli eruperigeV ixu kAraNa .
sEnasEtisigeV kAraNagalYu : XUlYu praveSa , bIsilu gAlYigeV muKa koVduvikeV , PyAn gAlYigeV oVdduvikeV muKya kAraNa .
aMWa kAraNagalYiMxa xUra iruvikeV kRemakara .
anivArya prasaMgagalYalli waleVgeV batteV muccixareV oVlYiwu .
iMgixa hasiveV , awi AhAra sevaneV , maXura SIwa AhAra sevaneVyiMxa kaPa vqxXi .
axe ulYixeVdeV pasarisi woVMxareVgeV iMbIyuwwaxeV .
rogakRamaweV kuMxiruvAga kulYigalYigeV soMku balu bega pasarisalu avakASa .
sEnasEtis lakRaNagalYu : " wIvra " mawwu " cirakAlIna " rIwiyaxxu Agirabahuxu .
wIvra sEnasEtis : wIvra eVMba avasWeVyalli lakRaNagalYu ugra hAgU hoVsaxu AgixeV .
jvara , waleV BAra , bAgixAga novu wIvra , haTAwwAgi waleVxorIwu .
novu , Uwa , kaNNuguddeV suwwa BAra , haNeVgulYi bIlYuvaRtu Uwa , keVnneV , galla saha noviniMxa kUdiruwwaxeV .
hubbu BAra iruwwaxeV .
rogi saxA kAla kaNNu mucciyo , keVlYageV noduwwale irabekAguwwaxeV .
mUgu srAva hAgU mEkE novu .
purANa ( cirakAlIna ) sEnasEtis : 3 - 4 wiMgalYu paxepaxe marukalYisuva rUpaxxu .
saxA kAla kaNNa meleV maMxa SUleV , BAra .
oVlYa pareV BAra , uriyUwa , saxA srAva , avaroXa .
kattixa mUgina xeVseVyiMxa baggixAga wIvra novu , beVlYaku sahisalAgaxu , usirAta woVMxareV , malagixAga woVMxareV aXika .
kaNNu keVMpu AgixxareV , kaNNu cuccuwwixxareV , kaNNinalli yAwaneV uMtAguwwixxareV eVxeV hAligeV SuxXavAxa haralYeVNNeVyannu miSra mAdi kaNNugalYigeV hAkixareV SIGrave eVllA vexaneV parihAra Aguvuxu .
halasaMdeV kAlYu : halasaMdeV kAlYannu hurixu halavu xinagalYa kAla winnuwwixxareV ajIrNa , aMgAgagalYa novu guNa Aguvuxu .
hasiru halasaMdeV kAlYannu beVllaxoVMxigeV agixu wiMxareV Alasya nivAraNeV ; heVccu nixreV baruvuxilla .
halasaMdeVyannu beyisixa nIrannu oVMxu mUru xinagalYa kAla kudixareV xuMdu hulYugalYu nASa Aguvuvu .
halasaMdeVya kAlYina palyavannu winnuvuxariMxa swrIyaralli eVxeVhAlu aXika Aguvuxu .
gaMdasaralli vIrya uwpawwi heVccu Aguvuxu .
halasina haNNu : eVlYeV halasina kAya hulYi mAdikoVMdu Uta mAduvuxariMxa piwwa SAMwi AguwwaxeV .
halasina haNNina woVlYeVgalYannu bidisi rasAyana wiMxareV naragalYigeV heVccu bala baruwwaxeV .
halasina haNNina bIjagalYannu hurixu catni mAdi wayArisi wiMxareV vIrya vqxXi AguwwaxeV .
halasina haNNina woVlYeV bidisi svalpa akki beVllavannu serisikoVMdu ceVnnAgi rubbi xoseV hittu wayArisikoVlYlYi .
halasina haNNina xoseV mAdikoVMdu wiMxareV mEkE novu biduwwaxeV .
piwwa SAMwi AguwwaxeV .
rAgi : rAgi hitti mAdixa muxxeVyannu wiMxareV maXumeha roga ulbaNa Aguvuxilla .
XadUwigalYa boVjjannu karaguvaMweV mAduwwaxeV .
hurixa rAgi hittannu beVlla mawwu huNise goVjjinalli kaxadi kudixareV piwwa SAMwi AguwwaxeV .
neVgadiyannu hogalAdisalu rAgi hittannu ariSina pudiyoVMxigeV beVreVsi keVMdaxa meleV svalpasvalpave hAkixAga xattavAxa hoVgeV elYuwwaxeV .
I hoVgeVyannu mUgina mUlaka sevisuvuxariMxa axu guNa AguwwaxeV .
hasiru weVneVgalYannu kiwwu waMxu keVMdaxa meleV ittu suttu naMwara kAlYannu ujji uxurisi , A kAlYugalYigeV beVlla koVbbari serisi wiMxareV yakqw xoRa , hqxroga mawwu maXumehaxa rogagalYu guNa Aguvavu .
eVxeVhAlina koVraweV ulYlYa bANaMwiyaru ixannu sevisuwwixxalli hAlina uwpawwi aXikagoVlYlYuvuxu .
rAgiyannu kappu AguvavareVgeV hurixu naMwara kutti pudi mAdi , naMwara meVNasu , jIrigeV , oma , SuMTi , adigeV uppinoVMxigeV serisi hallu pudi mAdikoVMdu prawixina hallu ujjixareV hallugalYu xqDa Aguvavu .
neVneVsixa rAgiya hAlu weVgeVxu axannu kAyisi naMwara lavaMga , xAlcinni , elakki , hAlu mawwu sakkareV beVreVsikoVMdu kudixareV beVlYavaNigeV ceVnnAgi AguwwaxeV .
lavaMga : oVMxu lavaMgavannu kallu uppinoVMxigeV capparisuwwA nIru kudiyuwwixxareV gaMtalu keVreVwa mawwu keVmmu guNa Aguvuxu .
lavaMgaxa kaRAyavannu mUru bAri sevisixareV ajIrNa mawwu hoVtteV ubbara guNa Aguvuxu .
hulYuku hallu noyuwwixxareV oVMxeVradu woVttu lavaMgaxa eVNNeVyannu hallina meleV bidi - yAwaneV kadimeV Aguvuxu .
adikeV eVleVya joVweVgeV lavaMgavannu wiMxareV lEMgika Sakwi heVccuvuxu .
joVweVgeV bAyiya xurgaMXa xUra Aguvuxu .
vIlYyaxeVleV : oVMxu vIlYyaxeVleV , svalpa kariwulYasi , oVMxu lavaMgavannu areVxu xinakkeV eVradu bAri sevisixareV ajIrNa kadimeV Aguvuxu .
vIlYyaxeVleVgeV haralYeVNNeVyannu hacci axannu bisi mAdi hoVtteV ubbaraxiMxa naralYuwwiruva maguvina hoVtteVgeV kAvu koVttareV novu mAyavAgi mUwra sulaBavAgi Aguvuxu .
vIlYyaxeVleVyannu hAge agixu winnuvuxariMxa xaMwakRayaxa bAXeV iruvuxilla .
keVmmu sAkaRtu hawotigeV baruwwaxeV .
oVMxu vIlYyaxeVleV , kAlYumeVNasu mawwu uppannu serisikoVMdu agixu wiMxareV keVmmu kadimeVyAgi kaPaxa nivAraNeV Aguvuxu .
vIlYyaxeVleVyannu nuNNageV areVxu koVbbari eVNNeVyalli kalasi waleVgeV eVradu mUru xina hacci snAna mAdixareV waleVya kUxalu uxuruvuxu niMwu hoguvuxu mawwu hoVttu elYuvuxilla .
sajjeV : sajjeV roVttiyannu wayArisi jenuwuppa naMcikoVMdu wiMxareV AhAra sulaBavAgi jIrNisi bala heVccuvuxu .
sabbasigeV soVppu : heVrigeVya naMwara sabbasigeV soVppannu sevisixareV eVxeV hAlina heVccAguvuxu .
oVNagixa sabbasigeV soVppigeV meVMwyavannu serisi wuppaxalli hurixu oVNameVNasinakAyi , uppu , sAsiveV hAki kutti pudi mAdi catnipudi wayArisi majjigeV annaxa joVweV naMcikoVMdu wiMxareV hoVtteV ubbara , ajIrNaweV nivAraNeV Aguvuxu .
sabbasigeV soVppannu ariSinaxoVMxigeV ceVnnAgi areVxu huNNugalYigeV lepisixareV kIvu wuMbikoVlYlYuvuxilla hAgU huNNugalYu mAyuwwaveV .
I soVppina palya wiMxareV malabaxXaweV nivAraNeV AguwwaxeV .
nixreV bAraxavaru sabbasigeV soVppannu heVccu balYasuvuxariMxa oVlYlYeVya nixreV baruvuxu .
Arogya heVccuvuxu .
sAsiveV : hasi sAsiveVyannu bAyigeV hAkikoVMdu ceVnnAgi agiyuvuxariMxa hallu novu xUra Aguvuxu .
sAru mawwu hulYiya oVggaraNeVgeV sAsiveVyannu balYasuvuxariMxa jIrNaSakwi heVccuvuxu .
sAsiveVyannu nuNNageV areVxu hulYukaddiya meleV haccuvuxariMxa SIGra guNa kANuvuxu .
viRa prARana AxAga sAsiveVyannu uguru beVccagina nIrinalli kudiyuvuxariMxa vAMwiyAgi viRa axara mUlaka hoVrabIlYuvuxu .
bitrot : bitrot sevisuvuxariMxa malavisarjaneV sulaBavAgi Aguvuxu .
bitrot rasa weVgeVxu jenuwuppa mawwu niMbeVrasa beVreVsi kudixareV AmaSaMkeVya nivAraNeV Aguvuxu .
bitrot prawixina balYasuwwixxareV rakwaxa oVwwada kadimeV AguwwaxeV .
bitrot beyisaxeV winnuvuxariMxa namma xehakkeV agawyavAxa " si " jIvasawvavu sAkaRtu pramANaxalli xoVrakuwwaxeV .
bUxuguMbalYa : bUxuguMbalYa sevisuvuxariMxa ceVnnAgi mUwravisarjaneV Aguvuxu .
xehaxa wUka heVccuvuxu ; joVweVgeV hqxayaxa sAmarWya aXikagoVlYlYuvuxu .
rakwasrAva AguwwiruvAga bUxuguMbalYa sevisixareV axu begane heVppugatti srAva nilluvuxu .
beVlla : halYeVya beVllavannu huNaseV haNNinoVMxigeV bisi mAdi ulYukiruva sWalYakkeV kattixareV guNa AguwwaxeV .
moVsarinoVMxigeV beVllavannu serisi kudixareV siMbalYa suriyuvuxu sWagiwagoVlYlYuvuxu .
hasuvina wuppaxalli gajjuga gAwraxa beVllavannu bari hoVtteVyalli prawixina nAlku xinagalYa kAla wiMxareV arXa waleVnovu mAya Aguvuxu .
beVllavannu belaxa haNNina joVweV pAnaka mAdikoVMdu kudixareV bAyArikeV iMguvuxu .
wuppaxoVMxigeV serisi bisi mAdi ulYukiruva sWalYakkeV lepisi patti bigiyuvuxariMxa SIGrave guNa kaMdubaruwwaxeV .
beVMdeVkAyi : oVMxu vAragalYa kAla beVMdeVkAyi palyavannu kivucikoVMdu wiMxareV hoVtteVya uri mawwu AsanAgraxalli Aguva uri niMwu hoguvuxu .
eVlYeVya beVMdeVkAyannu kallu sakkareVya joVweV agixu wiMxareV lEMgikaSakwi vqxXi Aguvuxu .
mUlaMgi : Utaxa joVweV hasi mUlaMgiya cUrannu upayogisuvuxariMxa Uta mAdixa AhAra ceVnnAgi jIrNa Aguvuxu .
capAwi mawwu roVttiyoVMxigeV hasi mUlaMgiyannu kacci wiMxareV kaNNu , kivi , mUgu , gaMtalugalYa xoRa nivAraNeV Aguvuxu .
hasi mUlaMgiyannu yaWecCavAgi winnuvuxariMxa mUlavyAXi guNa Aguvuxu .
hasi mUlaMgiya holYugalYigeV kAlYu meVNasina pudi , uppu mawwu niMbeVrasavannu hAkikoVMdu wiMxareV ajIrNa malabaxXaweV , kAmAleV xqRtimAMxya guNa AguwwaxeV .
eVlYeVya wrixoRagalYannu Samana mAduvuxu .
mUgu , bAyi mawwu kaNNugalYigeV hiwa uMtu mAduvuxu .
mUlavyAXigeV ixu xivya ORaXa .
mUlaMgiya soVppu swrI rogagalYigeV awyaMwa oVlYlYeVyaxu .
wadeVxa muttu kramabaxXa Aguvuxu .
mUlaMgi bIjagalYannu niMbeVrasaxalli areVxu hulYukaddi , kajjiwuri iruva sWalYakkeV haccixareV SIGrave vAsi Aguvuxu .
mUlaMgi bIjagalYannu nuNNageV areVxu oVMxu kappu majjigeVyalli kaxadi kudixareV wadeVxa muttu kramabaxXavAgi Aguvuxu .
mUlaMgi mawwu uppannu areVxu celYu kutukixa sWalYakkeV haccixareV uri nilluvuxu hAgU viRa ilYiyuvuxu .
musukina jolYa : eVlYeVya musukina jolYaxa kAlYugalYannu hasiyAgiye winnuvuxariMxa eVxeVya hAlu heVccuwwaxeV .
musukina jolYavannu keVMdaxa meleV suttu winnuvuxariMxa hoVtteV huNNAguvuxilla .
joVweVgeV hallugalYu mawwu vasadugalYu gatti Aguvavu .
musukina jolYaxa hAlu weVgeVxu barI hoVtteVyalli kudixareV kaPa nASa AguwwaxeV hAgU Sakwi aXika AguwwaxeV .
musukina jolYavannu hurixu winnuvuxariMxa vasadu mawwu hallugalYa Arogya rakRaNeV AguwwaxeV .
joVweVgeV hoVtteV huNNAguva sAXyaweVyannu nivArisuwwaxeV .
xAlYiMbeV haNNu : mUru tI camaca hulYi xAlYiMbeV haNNina rasa mawwu tI camaca jenuwuppavannu beVreVsi keVlavu vAragalYu sevisixareV mAnasika oVwwadaxa waleVSUleV guNa Aguvuxu .
xAlYiMbeV haNNina bIjagalYannu areVxu waNNIrinoVMxigeV kudisixareV AmaSaMkeV Bexi nilluvuxu .
xAlYiMbeV haNNina xiMdannu beyisi kaRAya wayArisabeku .
A kaRAyakkeV uppu serisi halavu sAri bAyi mukkalYisixareV bAyi huNNu , hallunovu mawwu gaMtalu novu guNa Aguvuxu .
neralYeVhaNNu : neralYeVhaNNu Sarabawwu wayArisi Bexi Aguwwiruva makkalYigeV kudisixareV Bexi wattaneV nilluvuxu .
jenuwuppaxoVMxigeV neralYeVhaNNina Sarabawwu sevisixareV kaNNuri mawwu mUlavyAXiya nivAraNeV Aguvuxu .
neralYeV eVleVgalYannu areVxu sutta gAyagalYigeV haccuwwA baMxareV gAya SIGrave guNa Aguvuxu .
neralYeV maraxa eVleVgalYannu haniyAgi jagixareV bAyi xurgaMXa rahiwavAgi joVweVgeV hallugalYu saha gatti AguwwaveV .
neralYeV haNNu sihi - hulYiyiMxa kUdiruwwaxeV .
ixannu wiMxareV uRNaweVyannu kadimeV mAdi , piwwavannu SAMwagoVlYisi Arogyavannu heVccisuwwaxeV .
puxIna soVppu : nAlkExu puxInA eVleVgalYannu jagixu wiMxareV jIrNaSakwi heVccuvuxu .
joVweVgeV hallugalYu saha bahu kAla roga rahiwa Agiruvavu .

ajIrNa , hoVtteV ubbara : mawwu neVgadi ixxareV puxIna soVppina tI wayArisi xinakkeV eVradu bAri kudixareV vAsi AguwwaxeV .
puxInA soVppina wiMxareV jIrNa ceVnnAgi AguwwaxeV .
batANi : carmaxa melina kaleVgalYannu hogalAdisalu batANiya hittannu balYasabeku .
A hittannu hAlinalli kaleVsi wikkuvuxariMxa kaleVgalYu mAya Aguvavu .
hasi batANiyannu nIrinalli ceVnnAgi beyisi uppu hAkaxeVyeV wiMxareV Arogya heVcci xqDakAyaru Aguvaru .
batANiyannu ceVnnAgi beyisi bisi Arixa naMwara toVmeVto haNNina cUrugalYannu serisi Uta mAdixareV Arogya heVccuwwaxeV .
baxaneVkAyi : baxaneVkAyi palya mAdikoVMdu wiMxareV kaNNina rogagalYu xUra Aguvavu .

bilYi jolYa : bilYi jolYaxa roVtti mAdikoVMdu ceVnnAgi agixu wiMxareV malabaxXaweV nivAraNeV Aguvuxu .
jolYaxa kAMdavannu suttu haralYeVNNeVyalli kalasi haccuvuxariMxa hulYukaddi hoguvuxu .
jApawreV jAyikAyi : adikeV pudigeV sAmAnyavAgi jApawreV jAyikAyannu beVreVsi sevisuvuxu .
ixariMxa jIrNaSakwi heVcci lEMgika SakwiyU aXikagoVlYlYuvuxu .

tI : bisiyAxa tIgeV niMbeVhaNNina rasavannu hiMdi kudiyuvuxariMxa bAyArikeV xUra Aguvuxu ; neVgadi guNa Aguvuxu .
tI dikAkRan ilYisixa naMwara ulYiyuva caratavannu isubu mawwu hulYukaddigeV haccixareV avu SIGrave guNa hoVMxuvavu .
heVccu jalAMSa naRta AgiruvaMWa saMxarBagalYalli rogigeV lEt tI kudisixareV guNa AguwwaxeV .
hAlu beVreVsaxe tI dikAkRan kudixareV Bexi wattaneV niMwuhogi jIvakkeV hagura AguwwaxeV .
tI kudixareV uwwejaka AgiruwwaxeV .
awiyAgi sevisixareV pacanaSakwi kuMTiwa AguwwaxeV .
toVmeVto : toVmeVto jyUs weVgeVxu uppu mawwu kAlYu meVNasina pudiyannu serisi beVlYiggeV bariya hoVtteVyalli sevisixareV , sihimUwra rogigalYa roga nivAraNeV Aguvuxu .
toVmeVto haNNina wirulYannu moVdaveVgalYigeV haccikoVMdareV oVMxu vAraxalle moVdaveV mAyavAgi muKa kAMwiyukwa Aguvuxu .
nAlkExu wiMgalYu beVlYiggeV eVxxa wakRaNa oVMxu xoVdda toVmeVto haNNannu winnuwwA baMxareV boVjju karagi hoguvuxu .
woVgaribelYeV : belYeVya kattannu jvara baMxavarigeV , xurbala makkalYigeV xravarUpaxa AhAravAgi koVttareV aneka rIwiya upayogavAgi Arogya suXArisuwwaxeV .
xaMtina soVppu: : naralYuwwiruva rogigalYu xaMtina soVppannu heralYavAgi balYasixareV rogaxalli SIGra guNa uMtAguvuxu .
soVppiniMxa rasa weVgeVxu waleVya kUxaligeV haccuwwixxareV kUxalu samqxXiyAgi beVlYeVyuvuxu .
reRmeVyaMweV nuNupAgi kappu varNakkeV wiruguvuxu .
bAlaneVreV kANisikoVlYlYuvuxu illa .
soVppina sArannu jvara baMxavarigeV winnisixareV jvara bittuhoguwwaxeV .
samayaxalli heVccu rakwa srAvavAguwwixxareV xaMtina soVppu balYasixareV guNa Aguvuxu .
xAlcinni kAlYu meVNasinapudi hAki ceVnnAgi kuxisi kaRAya wayArisikoVMdu axakkeV jenuwuppa serisikoVMdu sevisixareV gaMtalu keVreVwa , maleriyA neVgadi guNa Aguvavu .
xAlcinniyannu wexu moVdaveVgalYigeV haccixareV moVdaveV guNa Aguvuxu .
arXa waleVnovigeV saha ixannu haccikoVMdareV mUru nAlku xinagalYalle saMpUrNa guNa Aguvuxu .
naMwara bANaMwigeV xAlcinniya kaRAya kudisixareV novu svalpa samayaxalliye nivAraNeV Aguvuxu .
muttu muMxUdalu xAlcinni cUrNavannu sevisabeku .
heVccu mUwra visarjisuwwixxareV xAlcinni pudiyannu jenuwuppaxalli miSra mAdi kudixareV mUwra visarjaneV hawotigeV baruwwaxeV .
naragalYu anagawya pracoxaneVgeV oVlYapadaxe jFApakaSakwi heVccAguwwaxeV .
kuMbalYakAyi : kuMbalYakAyannu beyisi palya mAdikoVMdu kramavAgi wiMxareV xehaxa Arogya heVccAgi Sakwi baruvuxu .
rogaxavarigeV XadUwi SarIraxavarigeV sihi kuMbalYa awyuwwamavAxa AhAra .
kuMbalYa woVttannu gaMXaxalli weyxu viRajaMwugalYu kaccixa sWalYakkeV praWama cikiwseVya rUpaxalli lepisixareV gamanArha parihAra uMtAguwwaxeV .
soVppina rasavannu weVgeVxu lepisuvuxariMxa hulukaddi , isubu muMwAxa carmarogagalYu vAsi Aguvuvu .
keVMpu mUlaMgi : mUlaMgiya jyUs wayArisi sevisixareV Sakwi aXika AguwwaxeV .
keVmmu , saMXivAwa rogagalYa nivAraNeV AguwwaxeV .
mUlaMgiyannu wurixu kosaMbari mAdikoVMdu wiMxareV xeha waMpu AguwwaxeV .
kaNNina Arogya gaNanIya pramANaxalli suXArisuvuxu .
mUlaMgiya halva wiMxareV vIrya vqxXiyAgi saMBoga Sakwiyalli vqxXi Aguvuxu .
KarjUra : rogigalYu , mUlavyAXiyiMxa naralYuvavaru oVNa KarjUravannu sevisuwwixxareV guNa Aguvuxu .
KarjUra , bAxAmi bIjavannu hAlinalli areVxu jenuwuppaxoVdaneV xinakkeV oVMxu bAri eVradu tI camacaxaRtu sevisuwwA baMxareV rakwa vqxXi AguwwaxeV .
lEMgika Sakwi heVccuwwaxeV .
basuri heVMgasaru ixannu sevisuvuxariMxa naragalYa xOrbalya nivAraNeV Aguvuxu .
niyamiwavAgi sevisuwwA ixxareV AmaSaMkeV , awisAra rogagalYu saha upaSamana Aguvuxu .
gasagaseV : gasagaseV mawwu oVNa koVbbariyannu agixu wiMxareV bAyi huNNu guNa Aguvuxu .
pAyasa mAdikoVMdu sevisixareV xehakkeV waMpu uMtAgi ceVnnAgi nixreV baruvuxu .
goXi : goXi hittina capAwi mAdi winnuvuxariMxa hallu mawwu vasadugalYigeV Sakwi baruvuxu hAgU hoVtteVya huNNu nivAraNeV Aguvuxu .
waMbittu mAdikoVMdu wiMxareV kIlu novu mawwu eVlubu novu illavAguvuxu .
annavannu maXumeha rogigalYigeV koVttareV axu uwwama AhAra AgiruwwaxeV .
cakkowaneV soVppu : soVppina hulYi mAdikoVMdu winnuvuxariMxa AhAra ceVnnAgi jIrNa Aguvuxu .
xehakkeV waMpu nIduvuxu .
soVppannu AgAggeV balYasuvuxariMxa naragalYalli hoVsa cEwanya wuMbikoVlYlYuwwaxeV .
soVppannu heVccAgi balYasixalli ariSina kAmAleV mawwu mUlavyAXiyalli heVccu guNa kaMdubaruvuxu .
soVppannu sevisuvuxariMxa mala sadilagoVlYlYuvuxu .
hasivu heVccAgi jIrNa Agaxe ulYixiruva AhAra saha jIrNa Aguvuxu .
kabbu : kabbina wAjA rasavannu sevisixareV AyAsa parihAra Aguvuxu .
naMwara kabbu wiMxareV AhAra ceVnnAgi jIrNisuvuxu .
rasavannu niyamiwavAgi prawiniwya sevisuvuxariMxa saMBoga Sakwi heVccuvuxu .
kabbu sigixu wiMxareV , xaMwakRaya nivAraNeV AguwwaxeV .
sAkaRtu winnuwwixxareV ariSiNa kAmAleV roga baruvuxe illa .
karibevina soVppu : meVNasina pudiyalli sAkaRtu karibevina soVppannu pudi mAdi beVrasi sAru wayArisi axannu sevisixareV ajIrNa waleVxoruvuxilla .
vyakwigalYu karibevina catniyannu prawixina upayogisuwwixxareV boVjju karagi xehaxa wUka kadimeV Aguvuxu .
93 xinagalYa kAla hawwu wAjA karibevina eVleVgalYannu wiMxareV maXumeha roga xUrAgi hoguvuxu .
soVppina eVlYeVya cigurannu jeninalli axxi wiMxareV AmaSaMkeV , awisAra mawwu mUlavyAXigalYalli gaNanIya pramANa guNa kaMdubaruvuxu .
kallaMgadi haNNu : visarjisuva samayaxalli uriyAxareV kallaMgadi haNNina rasavannu majjigeVya joVweV samanAgi serisi axakkeV uppu serisi kudiyuvuxariMxa guNa AguwwaxeV .
oVMxu battalu kallaMgadi haNNina rasakkeV oVMxu niMbeV haNNina rasavannu serisi sevisuvuxariMxa jalAMSaxa koVraweVya nivAraNeV AguwwaxeV .

mUsaMbi : hqxaya xOrbalya ulYlYavaru mUsaMbi rasavannu jenuwuppaxalli prawixina sevisuwwA baMxareV bahalYa Arogya xoVrakuwwaxeV .
tEPEd mawwu kRayarogaxiMxa pIdiwarAxavaru mUsaMbi rasavannu niyamiwavAgi sevisixareV roga niroXakaSakwi heVccuwwaxeV .
garBiNiyarigeV mUsaMbi rasavannu XArAlYavAgi koVdabeku .
ixariMxa heVrigeV susUwra Aguvuxara joVweVgeV wAyi magu roga niroXaka Sakwiyannu padeVxukoVlYlYuvaru .
mUsiMbi haNNina rasavannu sevisuvuxariMxa AyAsa parihAra Aguvuxu .
bAyArikeV hogi hasivu kANisikoVlYlYuvuxu .
rakwaxa SuxXiyalli I rasa viSeRa kArya nirvahisuvuxu .
kiwwalYeV : kiwwalYeV haNNannu sevisuvuxariMxa bAyArikeV wagguvuxu hAgU rakwa SuxXi Aguvuxu .
prawixina oVMxu kiwwalYeV haNNannu winnuvuxu aByAsavAgi ittukoVMdareV neVgadi baruvuxulla .
niwya jIvanaxalli hoVsa hurupu uMtAguvuxu .
kiwwalYeV sippeVyannu hicukixAga suvAsaneV bIruva xrava hoVrabaruvuxu .
A sippeVyannu muKaxa meleV ujjuwwixxareV moVdaveVgalYu mAyavAgi hoguwwaveV .
eVlYlYu : karieVlYlYu mawwu bevina eVleVgalYannu weVgeVxukoVMdu haralYeVNNeVyalli hurixukoVlYlYabeku .
ariSina karpUraxa joVweVgeV areVxu mulAmu mAdikoVMdu gAyagalYigeV haccixareV gAyagalYu bahu bega mAgi vAsi AguwwaveV .
garBa Xarisixa prAraMBaxa xinagalYalli garBapAwa bayasixareV karieVlYlYigeV wAti beVlla serisi kutti cigalYi mAdikoVMdu xinakkeV mUru bAri wiMxareV garBapAwa AguwwaxeV .
kariya eVlYlYina oVMxu camacakkeV arXa camacaxaRtu kallusakkareVya pudiyannu beVreVsi jagixu winnabeku .
naMwara mekeVya hAlannu kudiyabeku .
13 xinagalYavareVgeV I rIwi mAduvuxariMxa mUlavyAXiyalli rakwa bIlYuvuxu niMwu hoguvuxu .
sutta gAyagalYannu SIGrave guNapadisalu karieVlYlYina eVNNeVyannu haccabeku .
rakwa illaxa avivAhiwa waruNiyara muttu novu SAMwavAgalu oVMxu tI spUn karieVlYlYina pudiyannu bisiya hAlinoVMxigeV sevisabeku .
eVlYlYeVNNeVyannu aMgAMgalYigeV wikkikoVMdu svalpa samaya neVneVxu bisi nIriniMxa snAna mAdixareV mEkE novu mAya AguwwaxeV .
carmaroga baruva saMBava iruvuxu illa .
elakki : niMbeVhaNNina pAnakakkeV elakki pudiyannu hAki kudixareV vAMwi mawwu waleV suwwuvikeV sWagiwa Aguvuxu .
jIrigeV kaRAyakkeV elakki pudiyannu beVreVsi sevisuvuxariMxa piwwa saMkata nivAraNeV AguwwaxeV .
viRa hAkabahuxu eVMxu Baya ixxalli UtakkeV muMceV elakkiyannu munnaccarikeVya wAwkAlika rUpaxalli sevisuvuxu oVlYlYeVyaxu .
prawixina bAlYeVhaNNinoVMxigeV oVMxu saMpUrNa elakkiyannu winnuvuxariMxa mUlavyAXi mawwu malabaxXaweV xUra Aguvuxu .
tIyoVMxigeV elakki pudi miSra mAdi sevisixareV urimUwra mawwu AmaSaMkeV guNa kANuvuxu .
hAligeV elakki pudiyannu hAki kuxisi axakkeV mUru tI camaca jenuwuppa serisikoVMdu prawi rAwri sevisuwwA baMxareV jFApaka Sakwi heVccu Aguvuxu .
uri mUwra nivAraNeV Aguvuxu ; joVweVgeV lEMgika Asakwi aXikavAgi uwwama rawisuKa siguvuxu .
elakki kAlYugalYannu ceVnnAgi agixu nuMguvuxariMxa bAyi suvAsaneVyiMxa kUdiruvuxu .
bAyArikeV hogi AhAra ceVnnAgi jIrNa Aguvuxu .
hoVtteV woVlYasuvikeV illavAguvuxu .
oma : omakAlYu mawwu meVMwya kaRAyavannu jenuwuppaxoVdaneV xinakkeV mUru bAri sevisixareV keVmmu , kaPa nivAraNeV Aguvuxu .
beVllaxoVMxigeV omakAlYannu winnuwwixxareV aneka rIwiya carma rogagalYu xUra AguwwaveV .
Uwaxa BAgakkeV niMbeVhaNNina rasaxoVdaneV oma areVxu patti hAkixareV Uwa kadimeV Aguvuxara joVweV novu saha mAya Aguvuxu .
gaMtalu huNNAgixxareV , gaMtalu kattikoVMdixxareV oma kaRAyakkeV adigeV uppu serisi AgAggeV bAyi mukkalYisixareV SIGravAgi guNa Aguvuxu .
oma kAlYannu koVbbari eVNNeVya joVweVgeV ceVnnAgi beyisittukoVlYlYabeku .
peVttu bixxu noyuwwiruva BAgakkeV I eVNNeVyannu wikkuvuxariMxa novu mAya Aguvuxu .
Uta naMwara oma kAlYannu jagixu winnuvuxariMxa karulYina aneka hAni jIvigalYannu nASapadisuvuxu .
ajIrNa , hoVtteV ubbara mawwu AmaSaMkeVya nivAraNeV Aguvuxu .
oma kAlYugalYannu hallugalYiMxa agixu winnuvuxariMxa xaMwakRaya hoguwwaxeV .
hAgU bAyiyiMxa hoVraduva xurnAwa alYisi hoguwwaxeV .
kadaleVkAyi : maXumeha rogigalYu oVMxu svalpa kadaleVkAyiyannu prawixina wiMxareV Arogya suXArisuvuxu .
hurixa kadaleVkAyannu beVllaxoVMxigeV wiMxareV garBiNiyarigeV mawwu hAlu uNisuva wAyaMxirigeV awyuwwama pORtika AhAra Aguvuxu .
xurbalavAxa makkalYa SarIrakkeV kadaleVkAyi eVNNeV hacci bisilinalli halavu gaMteVgalYu nillisuvuxariMxa kEkAlugalYigeV Sakwiyu baruwwaxeV .
kadaleV : kadaleV hittannu sopigeV baxalAgi balYasixareV carmaxa kAMwi heVccuvuxu mawwu mqxu Aguvuxu .
hurigadleVyannu miwavAgi balYasixareV vIrya vqxXi Aguvuxu .
sippeV illaxa hurigadaleVyannu bisi mAdi AgAggeV winnuvuxariMxa neVgadi kadimeV Aguvuxu .
mUsi noduvuxannu AgAggeV AcarisixareV kaPa hoguwwaxeV .
koVbbari eVNNeVgeV oVMxu citikeV ariSina mawwu kadaleV hittannu serisi meVxxiri .
naMwara aMgAMgagalYigeV ceVnnAgi mAlIsu mAdi .
ippawwu nimiRagalYa naMwara waNNIriniMxa woVlYeVxukoVlYlYuvuxariMxa carma oVdeVyuvuxannu wadeVgattabahuxu .
KarjUravannu saNNageV cUru mAdi hurigadaleV hittinoVMxigeV serisi hAlu mawwu sakkareV miSra mAdi sevisixareV xehaxa wUka heVccuvuxu .
vIrya vqxXi Aguvuxu .
avareV kAlYu : hasi kAlYannu beyisi wiMxareV jIrNaSakwi vqxXi AguwwaxeV .
rakwaxa vqxXiyAgi kaPa nivArisuwwaxeV .
adigeV soda beVreVsixa nIrinalli avareVkAlYannu neVneVsi woVlYeVxu hasiyAgiye wiMxareV gyAs trabal xUra AguwwaxeV .
avareVkAlYannu bANaMwiyaru beyisi wiMxareV eVxeVhAlina uwpawwi aXika AguwwaxeV .
AlUgeVddeV : keVMdaxa meleV ittu AlUgeVddeVyannu suttu wiMxareV malabaxXaweVya nivAraNeV Aguvuxu .
joVweVgeV mUwravisarjaneV ceVnnAgi Aguvuxu .
AlUgeVddeVyannu niMbeVhaNNina rasaxalli ceVnnAgi areVxu isubu , hulYakaddi mawwu gajakarNaxa aMwaha huNNugalYa meleV lepana mAdi patti bigiyuwwixxareV keVlave xinagalYalli avu guNa Aguvavu .

Saswra cikiwseVgalYu : heVccina mahilYeVyarigeV SaswracikiwseV awyagawya .
idI swanavannu weVgeVyuvuxu - swanavannu weVgeVyaxeV SaswracikiwseV ( saNNa geVddeVgalYu ixxAga ) , vikiraNa cikiwseV SaswracikiwseVya naMwara ulYixirabahuxAxa kyAnsar koSagalYannu vikiraNagalYiMxa nASa mAdixareV kyAnsar marukalYisuva saMBava kadimeV .
